story:
WTF is GRRRL? And Why Should You Support Us?

We are GRRRL, a revolutionary clothing company for women,  and we’re changing the goddamn game! We’ve been busting our vag for 2 years straight, winning awards every year in our short life, and along the way, have built an incredible army of women with a crystal clear mission and vision.

We passionately believe that women have to be free to reach their potential if we are to have any  chance of saving this world. And to help us, to help more women reach that potential, we need funding.

 
The clothing is the highest quality. lowest price and we have totally rewritten all the rules of fashion:

No photoshop. No body discrimination. No fat shaming. No ethnicity, religious, gender identity, or body type discrimination. No models only athletes. No sizes.

Because it's time to call bullshit on the evil that comes from fashion and create something that genuinely has positive outcomes.

Instead of raising money through predominantly male venture capitalists who couldn’t give a flying fuck about why we exist, we’re coming to you, the people. 

We believe in win + win relationships, and know you will feel empowered, and may even feel a sense of purpose, in having a hand in rewriting HERSTORY. 

Support US > we will reward YOU with an amazing piece of GRRRL Gear > we will take OUR life changing live experience on the road.

So, when you support the growth of our mission, we will give you an amazing item from our range in return for your support. And take our life changing live event on the road to five cities in the USA and make access to the event completely free of charge.

Every pledge of support will count, and the region with the most numbers of supporters will get the live experience events.

The Self-Love Rebellion Project

It's really more than win:win. It's win:win:win.

Support our growth.

Get an amazing piece of clothing or one of our accessories, and

We will take self love on the road.

Will you stand with us? We didn't get to where we are today alone. All along there has been an Army of women driving us forward. We need YOU to help us keep the momentum going.

Last year our first annual event in Las Vegas, helped women from around the world change their lives indefinitely.  It was a combination of experience sharing, teaching, seminars and interactive sessions.
 
Women quit their 9-5 job on the drive home, and start their own company the next day; created new best friends; Stopped abusing their bodies; Found freedom from self-harm; Made a connection they've never felt before.  
 
So if you fund us, we won't just reward you with our something amazing from the award winning GRRRL. We'll also get that show on the road.
 
And it will be entrance fee free so every woman will be able to access the community, support and empowerment they need.
 

 

$85,000 will give us the funding we need and kick off the tour and in the process, create thousands of foot soldiers, to deliver a series of projects that will ultimately change the future for women around the world. 

The tour will consist of day long events hosted by our MFCEO, Kortney Olson, key note speakers, educators, trainers and accompanied by our resident photographers and videographers to capture and share your experiences and stories, GRRRL Athletes, fun, food, and life changing experiences. And the events will be streamed live to send the self-love message around the world.

Free of cost, the day events will be open to anyone aged 13 and up who is living and presenting as Female.  The numbers of attendees will be open to as many as humanly possible, with location and details, driven by the votes of our campaign supporters, announced once the campaign has concluded.  The tour will come to the region with the greatest number of supporters. Every perk purchase will count towards bringing the tour to your region. 

If we smash through that target we have more self-love for the world, local community groups, more roadshows, digital self love courses, a new self loving social media platform and a hundred more projects we can fund to take self love to the world.

SOME OF THE AMAZING GRRRL GEAR YOU GET FOR YOUR SUPPORT

TEE, TANK AND HOODIE TEE PERKS - SINGLES FROM $29, COMBOS FROM $39 AND BUNDLES FROM $55.
￼



NEXT LEVEL LEGGING PERKS - SINGLE PAIRS FROM $49, COMBOS $52 - $65, CLASSIC 3 PACK $110, PLATINUM 5 PACK $175, TITANIUM 7 PACK & VOUCHER $270.

￼

All of our Next Level leggings are made from a ultra high-quality 27% spandex + 73% polyester fabric blend with a 7x stretch capacity. Our leggings are durable, high quality, and can be used for a variety of power athletics from powerlifting to crossfit, grappling to yoga and Netflix and chill.

 

To find your fit, measure around waist and hips and find your athlete match from the chart below. If you’re unfamiliar with our brand, we ditched traditional sizing and it’s ridiculous stigma. Instead we use powerful Athletes names and measurements.

With the leggings, we’ve added the option to pick a digital program of YOUR choice with ALL legging purchases, because we BELIEVE IN WOMEN HAVING THE OPTION FOR CHOICES!
Assertiveness E-Book or KO 4-week MASS Beginner Arm Program or KO 4-week MASS Beginner Leg Program.  See below for a description of digital programs.

 

SPONSOR A GRRRL TO GL18 $310

Send a grrrl in need to our 2 day/2 night life changing weekend in Las Vegas at the Golden Nugget April 28/29th. This is the cost of our general admission ticket which includes everything from workouts, keynote speakers, workshops of choice on both days, and events. If you know a woman who is struggling with body dismorphia, isolation, self harm, alcohol/drug addiction, depression, anxiety, eating disorders, self-hatred, lack of motivation or inspiration, this event will guarantee to impact and massively improve her life. For single fathers, we will even have someone to chaperone your Daughter ages 11 and up, as long as you remain on the Golden Nugget property for the duration of the weekend.

From direct experience, we fully understand the importance of coming together and spending time working on ourselves, and being amongst our sisters.

Ticket includes access to our grrrl only buy-out pool party Friday night from 7-10pm. All event info and past testimony can be found at www.grrrl.com/live/

You’ll receive a personal video from the grrrl you’ve sent on your generous behalf with an update of how you’ve had a role in impacting her life.

TRAIN WITH THE MFCEO IN UAE FOR 5 DAYS - $6,000


￼
Have the week of your life, training every day, all day, with Kortney Olson and Trish Cadden @ The Vault, a multi million dollar training lab in Abu Dhabi. Receive time with KO for 7 days straight, 5 hours a day to train, Teen-whisper, visit diplomats, teach you new life skills, or just hang and explore the amazing city and surrounds. This includes the cost of Kortney's travel,  but those needing to travel to Abu Dhabi need to provide their own travel and accommodation.

BRING THE TOUR TO MY REGION $20

The SLRT’s location is dependent upon the people!  The region with the highest amount of supporters will see the tour come to their region. Of course we want to tour the entire goddamn world, but to start, as long as we hit our milestone goal, we’ll hit the highest grossing region to kick the tour off.  

The tour will consist of day long events hosted by our infamous watermelon crushing MFCEO, Kortney Olson, educators, trainers, coaches along with our resident photographer, videographer, GRRRL Athletes, fun, food, and life changing experiences.  Free of cost, the day events will be open to anyone aged 13 and up who is living and presenting as a Female.  The numbers of attendees will be open to as many as humanly possible, with location and details announced once the campaign has concluded.  We’ll have a comment section for the reigning Queendom to put forth their requests on topics they want to experience during the events because the sky’s the limit!  We’ll be organising everything from clinics, experiences, and presenters from all across the country. 

WEST COAST includes Arizona, California, Oregon, Washington, Vancouver

MESS WITH TEXAS! Includes New Mexico, Texas, Oklahoma, Kansas, Missouri

DIRTY SOUTH includes Arkansas, Louisiana, Miss, Bama, Georgia, Florida, North/South Carolina, Tennessee

MOUNTAIN STATES includes Montana, Idaho, Utah, Wyoming, Colorado

PRINCE’S HOOD Minnesota, North/South Dakota, Nebraska, Iowa, Wisconsin

ARNOLD’S HOOD Illinois, Indiana, Kentucky, West Virginia, Ohio, Michigan

EAST COAST includes Penn, Virginia, Maryland, New York, New Jersey, Mass, New Hampshire, Maine, Toronto, Vermont, New Hampshire
￼

HOW TO FIND YOUR SHIRT OR LEGGINGS ATHLETE MATCH

Why Indiegogo?

Since the day GRRRL launched, every single cent has gone back into the business.  We bootstrapped this bitch SO HARD AND SO TIGHT, that we can hardly breath.  In order to obtain the growth we need to create an even bigger impact in the world, we need working capital without the patriarchy breathing down our neck.

Traditionally businesses owners will approach VC’s (venture capitalist) and give up a massive stake of their equity (ownership) for cash.  Historically, most VC’s are male ran, and only care about the money. But most of all, VCs only care about the ca$h not the vision.

We love men, but we are not about the patriarchy. 

Instead of taking someone else’s money and giving up a part of who we are, and what we’ve worked SO HARD to create, we want to deliver incredible experiences and products that will continue to create change, AND offer the people a direct pathway to helping co-create. 

HOW YOU CAN GET INVOLVED:

If the  Tour doesn’t come anywhere close to your town or city, you can

TAKE THE PLEDGE

Join the grrrlarmy by taking ThePledge and join us in our closed Facebook group (if you identify as female and are 18+) until we can build our ‘GRRRL BOOK’. 

WEAR GEAR

By wearing our clothing, you are making a statement that you are:

  1. DONE hating your body and yourself
  2. DONE being judgmental towards other females and seeing them as competition

When you see another grrrl in the street (or what we call “grrrl in the wild”), you could walk up to her and instantly feel like family.  Knowing that you come from the same philosophy and practice the same ethos, you two would have an immediate connection.

All of our clothing comes with hangtags containing The Pledge, along with a compliment card for you to brighten up another female’s day.

SHARE

Share our media.  The more we fill our lives with meaningful media and advertising, where women are doing things that are “unladylike” and by bodies of all shapes, abilities, colors, and sizes- you are helping to dismantle the old Paradigm of illusion.

THANK YOU FOR YOUR SUPPORT.

 

Why Self Love Is The Game ChangeHer.

All the research. All the data. All the studies. Show that self-love is the personal pillar that underpins the achievement of potential.

And with your help, support and involvement, we can change the world by spreading self love to every woman on earth.

Why We Need The Self-Love Rebellion

It’s time to change the game. You know it. We know it. And together we can make it happen.

The statistics are shocking. There is no wonder we can't have a greater influence. When we have so much holding us back.

THIS is why we need a Self-Love Rebellion.

story:
Transcending the boundaries of seasons and breaking the limits of weather, FOOXMET+ offers you genuine and controllable warmth.

FOOXMET+ adopts a revolutionary heating material that offers you supreme comfort and controllable warmth. It warms up to 95°F in just 10s and weighs only 220g. Designed by award-winning Japanese designer, Takeshi Minagawa, it is practical to use in all seasons, weather, and conditions. It’s the only vest missing from your wardrobe.

The ultimate heated vest  FOOXMET+  insulates you from the cold while you immerse yourself in nature. Its ability to change temperature makes it unlike any vest you’ve ever had. Also, it is practical to use literally in all seasons, all weathers and all conditions.

Clothes should be able to provide you with enough insulation as needed, while being slim and lightweight without adding extra bulk to allow you to enjoy the great outdoors. That’s why we created FOOXMET+! It’s the world’s innovative vest that combines cutting-edge material technology and 3D-tailored design, and it has all the features you’d expect from a top-notch vest. Let’s start by peeking into some of its remarkable features:

In freezing weather, you can wear the FOOXMET+ heated vest under your jacket or coat to get extra warmth without looking puffy or bulky. It is convenient to carry because you can just roll it and pack it in your bag for a trip to freezing places or for unexpected weathers. You can also pair it with a sweater or a shirt underneath to keep warm. It is an ideal insulating garment to wear on the move or at quick stops, during physical activities or exercises.

 

FALL IN LOVE WITH COLD WEATHER

Efficient and comfortable distribution of heat from your back to the rest of your body.

 

Why the FOOXMET+ heated vests are much lighter, slimmer and warmer than the heated vests on the market?

Our core competence: CARBON NANOTUBE FILM

The most advanced heating material ever adopted into apparel.

"...the operation of high-performance carbon nanotube film heaters, which show a clear advantage over traditionally employed materials...The results have shown very effective conversion of electric power into heat." - Dawid Janas and Krzysztof K. <Improved Performance of Ultra-Fast Carbon Nanotube Film Heaters >

"For comparison, you probably remember the story of Rapunzel letting her hair down for the prince to climb up. If Rapunzel’s hair were made of carbon nanotubes, around four strands of hair would suffice to support the prince’s weight without snapping." - Andrew Hyer <Microchips and Nanotubes: Using Carbon Nanotubes in Electronics>

1. STAY WARM WITHOUT WEARING BULKY LAYERS

It takes forever to put on heavy clothes and then take them off one by one.

 

With FOOXMET+, you will always stay warm while look slim.

 

2. ALWAYS READY FOR UNEXPECTED WEATHER CHANGE

Hot during the day but freezing during the night?

 

Throw FOOXMET+ in your bag and no more worries of temperature drop.

Functional in environments from -22°F to 158°F.

 

3. TAKING LEAST SPACE, OFFERING MOST WARMTH

Always frustrated packing your getaway luggage?

 

FOOXMET+ is small and light enough to pack in your little carry-on without taking up much space.

 

4. MATCHING ALL YOUR FASHION STYLES

On top or underneath, no matter how you wear it, you always look gorgeous with FOOXMET+.

 

FOOXMET+ heated vest is a versatile piece of gear for all kinds of outdoor sports such as climbing, hiking, running, camping, golfing, motorcycling, tailgating. You name it; it will keep you warm when the cold sets in, while not too hot while moving. It is waterproof, windproof and sweat absorbing, to make sure you still get warm and comfortable when it is rainy or windy.

The FOOXMET+ heated vest is an efficient insulating gear adaptive to all seasons, weather, and conditions. It saves you the trouble of fine-tuning your insulation continually. When it is hard to guess the weather and an insurance piece of gear is needed, like you need to get up early on a chilly morning to walk your dog, stay overnight on a beach, work in a cold environment like a basement, or just feel cold due to poor health, the FOOXMET+ heated vest will offer you constant and unconditional warmth. 

 

2017 Technical Innovation: Heat Reflecting Fabric 

Via heat reflecting material Iron Silver Paper, the vest helps to dissipate heat flexibly when the heat is excessive, and when the heat is insufficient, the fabric of silver heat reflective dots can store heat, to achieve constant temperature function. With its highly breathable, you can reduce excess heat and moisture to regulate body temperature, in outdoor or  temperature changeable environment. It can also maintain comfort for users.

The old temperature control has been entirely updated to a brand new technical style, which makes the vest smart and concise as well as brings you best intelligent and energy efficient user experience.

  • Technical central processor
  • Auto power on/off reaction when you put it on and take it off 
  • Low power consumption
  • Wireless and one-click heat control
  • 100% machine and hand washable

​

Smart heated vest FOOXMET+ bring you heat at the touch of an App(for both iPhone and Android). Use the smart phone by hand click App to control the temperature of the cloth.

Download the FOOXMET+ APP onto your cell phone to get to the heart of your vest. The APP allows you to easily adjust the heating temperature quickly.

Set to any temperature you want through your smart phone. Heat up to 95°F in only 10s. Heat up to 221°F in just 60s.

 

FOOXMET+ is appropriate for any portable charger. 5000mAh energy can fully warm it up to 8 hours.

BATTERY RUN TIME BASED ON TEMPERATURE LEVEL（5000mAh）:  

High = 3-4 hours, Mid= 5-6 hours, Low=6-8hours 

 

The FOOXMET+ heated vest will continue to heat without posing any danger even after being cut or immersed in the water.

  • Auto shut-off if it overheats.
  • 5V low-voltage battery.
  • No radiation.
  • Flame-retardant material.

100% Machine-Washable and Hand-Washable.

Super durable with over 1000+ flexing.

FOOXMET+'s innovative heated temperature control will provide you with an effortless way to adjust the temperature within two steps as well. 
PUT the portable charger in the interior pocket of the vest, and OFF YOU GO!

Fooxmet+ comes with its best partner now – handheld portable power, which is exclusively developed for Fooxmet smart heat vest and can charge it up to 4 hours. 

Elaborately designed with smooth corners, we engineered FOOXMET+ portable power with high density battery core to provide customers with the safest, smartest, and easiest charging experience.

It will apparently show working condition to remind you the rest of the power, and would be compatible with most of smart products.

 

Unit: in. Error: 0.4-0.8in 

How To Measure 

Shoulder Length: 

Measure the length from shoulder to shoulder. 

Back Length: 

Measure from the base of the collar, straight down the middle of the back, to the hem of the vest. 

Chest: 

Measure around the fullest part of the bust/chest. 

Front Bottom Sweep: 

The bottom edge of the front of the garment measured horizontally straight across from edge to edge.

Back Bottom Sweep: 

The bottom edge of the back of the garment measured horizontally straight across from edge to edge.

Takeshi Minagawa

Since his graduation from the ITOH Institute of Apparel in Japan in 2000, our designer has won The Best New Designer of the 17th Fashion Frontline, and Tokyo’s New Designer Fashion Award in 2015. He has also started his own brand and clothing company. FOOXMET+ is the outcome of his many years’ experience and knowledge in apparel design, perfectly integrates practicality, functionality and fashion.

We are a group of young entrepreneurs (Jenny, Bryan, Perla, Rain, Bruce) born in the '80s and '90s. We are adventurers seeking to change ourselves and the world we live in. We found it difficult to keep warm without looking bulky and puffy with multiple layers on, especially in challenging weathers. We created FOOXMET with the connection and resources of the advanced nano-material R&D outcomes of Suzhou Institute of Nano-Tech and Nano-Bionics, Chinese Academy of Sciences, and more importantly, the notion to keep our families and friends warm with slim and comfortable clothing. FOOXMET is the smartest heated vest ever that combines technology and design. We need your support to help deliver more warmth to this world!

Its ability to change temperature makes it unlike any vest you’ve ever had. Also, it is practical to use literally in all seasons, all weathers and all conditions.Clothes should be able to provide you with enough insulation as needed, while being slim and lightweight without adding extra bulk to allow you to enjoy the great outdoors. That’s why we created FOOXMET+! It’s the world’s innovative vest that combines cutting-edge material technology and 3D-tailored design, and it has all the features you’d expect from a top-notch vest. Let’s start by peeking into some of its remarkable features:In freezing weather, you can wear the FOOXMET+ heated vest under your jacket or coat to get extra warmth without looking puffy or bulky. It is convenient to carry because you can just roll it and pack it in your bag for a trip to freezing places or for unexpected weathers. You can also pair it with a sweater or a shirt underneath to keep warm. It is an ideal insulating garment to wear on the move or at quick stops, during physical activities or exercises. FALL IN LOVE WITH COLD WEATHEREfficient and comfortable distribution of heat from your back to the rest of your body. Why the FOOXMET+ heated vests are much lighter, slimmer and warmer than the heated vests on the market?Our core competence: CARBON NANOTUBE FILMThe most advanced heating material ever adopted into apparel."...the operation of high-performance carbon nanotube film heaters, which show a clear advantage over traditionally employed materials...The results have shown very effective conversion of electric power into heat." - Dawid Janas and Krzysztof K. <Improved Performance of Ultra-Fast Carbon Nanotube Film Heaters >"For comparison, you probably remember the story of Rapunzel letting her hair down for the prince to climb up. If Rapunzel’s hair were made of carbon nanotubes, around four strands of hair would suffice to support the prince’s weight without snapping." - Andrew Hyer <Microchips and Nanotubes: Using Carbon Nanotubes in Electronics>1. STAY WARM WITHOUT WEARING BULKY LAYERSIt takes forever to put on heavy clothes and then take them off one by one. With FOOXMET+, you will always stay warm while look slim. 2. ALWAYS READY FOR UNEXPECTED WEATHER CHANGEHot during the day but freezing during the night? Throw FOOXMET+ in your bag and no more worries of temperature drop.Functional in environments from -22°F to 158°F. 3. TAKING LEAST SPACE, OFFERING MOST WARMTHAlways frustrated packing your getaway luggage? FOOXMET+ is small and light enough to pack in your little carry-on without taking up much space. 4. MATCHING ALL YOUR FASHION STYLESOn top or underneath, no matter how you wear it, you always look gorgeous with FOOXMET+. FOOXMET+ heated vest is a versatile piece of gear for all kinds of outdoor sports such as climbing, hiking, running, camping, golfing, motorcycling, tailgating. You name it; it will keep you warm when the cold sets in, while not too hot while moving. It is waterproof, windproof and sweat absorbing, to make sure you still get warm and comfortable when it is rainy or windy.The FOOXMET+ heated vest is an efficient insulating gear adaptive to all seasons, weather, and conditions. It saves you the trouble of fine-tuning your insulation continually. When it is hard to guess the weather and an insurance piece of gear is needed, like you need to get up early on a chilly morning to walk your dog, stay overnight on a beach, work in a cold environment like a basement, or just feel cold due to poor health, the FOOXMET+ heated vest will offer you constant and unconditional warmth.  2017 Technical Innovation: Heat Reflecting Fabric Via heat reflecting material Iron Silver Paper, the vest helps to dissipate heat flexibly when the heat is excessive, and when the heat is insufficient, the fabric of silver heat reflective dots can store heat, to achieve constant temperature function. With its highly breathable, you can reduce excess heat and moisture to regulate body temperature, in outdoor or  temperature changeable environment. It can also maintain comfort for users.The old temperature control has been entirely updated to a brand new technical style, which makes the vest smart and concise as well as brings you best intelligent and energy efficient user experience.
Technical central processor
Auto power on/off reaction when you put it on and take it off 
Low power consumption
Wireless and one-click heat control
100% machine and hand washable
​Smart heated vest FOOXMET+ bring you heat at the touch of an App(for both iPhone and Android). Use the smart phone by hand click App to control the temperature of the cloth.Download the FOOXMET+ APP onto your cell phone to get to the heart of your vest. The APP allows you to easily adjust the heating temperature quickly.Set to any temperature you want through your smart phone. Heat up to 95°F in only 10s. Heat up to 221°F in just 60s. FOOXMET+ is appropriate for any portable charger. 5000mAh energy can fully warm it up to 8 hours.BATTERY RUN TIME BASED ON TEMPERATURE LEVEL（5000mAh）:  High = 3-4 hours, Mid= 5-6 hours, Low=6-8hours  The FOOXMET+ heated vest will continue to heat without posing any danger even after being cut or immersed in the water.
Auto shut-off if it overheats.
5V low-voltage battery.
No radiation.
Flame-retardant material.
100% Machine-Washable and Hand-Washable.Super durable with over 1000+ flexing.FOOXMET+'s innovative heated temperature control will provide you with an effortless way to adjust the temperature within two steps as well. 
PUT the portable charger in the interior pocket of the vest, and OFF YOU GO!
Fooxmet+ comes with its best partner now – handheld portable power, which is exclusively developed for Fooxmet smart heat vest and can charge it up to 4 hours. Elaborately designed with smooth corners, we engineered FOOXMET+ portable power with high density battery core to provide customers with the safest, smartest, and easiest charging experience.It will apparently show working condition to remind you the rest of the power, and would be compatible with most of smart products. Unit: in. Error: 0.4-0.8in How To Measure Shoulder Length: Measure the length from shoulder to shoulder. Back Length: Measure from the base of the collar, straight down the middle of the back, to the hem of the vest. Chest: Measure around the fullest part of the bust/chest. Front Bottom Sweep: The bottom edge of the front of the garment measured horizontally straight across from edge to edge.Back Bottom Sweep: The bottom edge of the back of the garment measured horizontally straight across from edge to edge.Takeshi MinagawaSince his graduation from the ITOH Institute of Apparel in Japan in 2000, our designer has won The Best New Designer of the 17th Fashion Frontline, and Tokyo’s New Designer Fashion Award in 2015. He has also started his own brand and clothing company. FOOXMET+ is the outcome of his many years’ experience and knowledge in apparel design, perfectly integrates practicality, functionality and fashion.We are a group of young entrepreneurs (Jenny, Bryan, Perla, Rain, Bruce) born in the '80s and '90s. We are adventurers seeking to change ourselves and the world we live in. We found it difficult to keep warm without looking bulky and puffy with multiple layers on, especially in challenging weathers. We created FOOXMET with the connection and resources of the advanced nano-material R&D outcomes of Suzhou Institute of Nano-Tech and Nano-Bionics, Chinese Academy of Sciences, and more importantly, the notion to keep our families and friends warm with slim and comfortable clothing. FOOXMET is the smartest heated vest ever that combines technology and design. We need your support to help deliver more warmth to this world!

story:
THE HELIOS 42 COLLECTION - THE DAWN OF CATALYST

 

People come to LA from all corners of the world to try and make their dreams a reality. As founders of Catalyst, we truly appreciate and realize how fortunate we are to have grown up surrounded by such a unique melting pot of culture, art, and fashion. With this in mind, we were inspired to create a high quality, contemporary design lifestyle brand that truly embodies the forward thinking, diverse and persevering attitude of LA. We've created a collection with 5 distinct watch faces and 8 different strap options to offer 40 different looks to suit a diverse range of styles.

 

PRODUCT SPECIFICATIONS

 

We wanted to fully load the watch, offering a timepiece with luxury level components while still passing on our cost savings to our consumers. Fortunately, we have a direct connection in the industry that is reliable and honest. They have enabled us to source the best quality components and produce our timepieces in the same factories as global luxury brands. We have personally visited these factories to further educate ourselves in the manufacturing process. Additionally, by incorporating the interchangeable strap feature in our timepieces, we allow our consumers to essentially get two watches from one watch head, by simply changing out the straps at a minimal additional cost. 

 

316L STAINLESS STEEL CASE:  316L surgical grade stainless steel casing ensures superior hardness and resistance to corrosion. For added protection, all timepieces are water resistant up to 5 ATM (50 meters/165 feet). Sophisticated multi-directional brush finishes provide a refined look. Further, our custom designed case back depicts the iconic LA skyline.   

SAPPHIRE CRYSTAL:  Sapphire Crystal allows you to enjoy your lifestyle carefree. As the most desired crystal for luxury timepieces, sapphire crystal is scratch resistant and falls just behind diamond in the MoHS scale for hardness. This premium material preserves the longevity of your timepiece.  

ANTI-REFLECTIVE COATING: Anti-reflective coating offers better visibility of the dial by reducing the light reflection. The benefits include more clarity especially when outdoors and more ambient light to be transmitted to the dial making the colors and textures more visible. 

JAPAN MOVEMENT:  The movement is the heart of your timepiece. The Japan made movements assembled in our timepieces are built to last as they are manufactured under the highest quality standards by the world renowned Miyota, from Citizen Co. Miyota movements are appreciated in the industry for their accuracy and dependability.   

INTERCHANGEABLE STRAPS:  All straps are interchangeable and feature a quick release lever, allowing your timepiece to take on different styles to fit for any occasion. Our Italian leather straps are made with high quality leather — ensuring comfort and durability. Looking for something bolder? Quickly switch out the leather straps for our stainless steel mesh straps. The mesh straps are a contemporary take on the traditional metal link straps.   

MOLDED HANDS:  Our hands are specially molded with diamond cut edges, and a debossed center. The sandblasted center adds contrast to the polished frame for a luxurious look.   

MULTI-LAYERED DIAL:  Our dual layer dial offers our timepieces more depth and possibilities. With varying textures and finishes from the top layer and the subdial, our cutout minute track and logo highlights the dual layer effect.

DIMENSIONS: Case - 42mm diameter, 8.40mm height; Strap - 20mm width

 

We believe in our brand mission and challenged ourselves with this new adventure. As we all come from different cultural and professional backgrounds in the LA area, we wanted to produce a unique watch that we truly felt represented the diversity of lifestyles in LA. We feel this is showcased by the varying finishes on the case, the depth and detail in the dual layered dial and hands, and the interchangeable straps. 

 

Catalyst empowers you to step out of your comfort zone and BE BOLD! #BeTheCatalyst

story:
Stay comfortable and dapper in any situation. Crafted with the same premium fabrics use by the world’s leading fashion brands, the Crafted Cleverly blazer is durable and the most innovative blazer on the market. Unlike traditional blazers, the Cleverly blazer requires zero maintenance, liquid repellent, 4-way full stretch, machine washable, and even 10 built-in pockets to hold all your daily essentials.

 

With our travel bag, you can easily bring the Cleverly blazer on the go.

Traditional blazers are high maintenance. They are often not machine washable and the ones that are required daily ironing. It took many R&D material research to develop a polyester and elastane blend that has wrinkle-free, machine washable and 4-way full stretch features, but still, maintain the look and feel of a cotton blend that is still light and breathable, which is not found in many polyester and elastane materials. 

The Cleverly blazer doesn’t require any maintenance.

Since 2017, we’ve dedicated the past 7 months to researching and developing a blazer that requires zero maintenance. A blazer that can adapt to any situation. With Cleverly, take it right out of the suitcase and go.

 

The Cleverly Blazer protects you from any liquid; such as wine or coffee.

You never know what life could hit you with, however, our Cleverly blazer is ready to shield you from all those unknowns. Our blazer is crafted with a special coating technology to protect you from any liquids whether it’s water, wine, sauce, coffee, or those deadly condiments. Eat each meal freely and fearlessly because our Cleverly blazer is liquid and stain repellent. 

 

The Cleverly blazer is made of polyester and elastane; which is commonly used for athletic wear. Elastane enhances the garment by making it flexible so the wearer can keep their full range of motion and retains the original shape of the blazer with four way full stretch for extended durability. The Cleverly blazer is made for the modern men with a fast-paced active lifestyle. 

 

It’s the blazer for the modern man with more than 10 Cleverly hidden pockets. There is an interchangeable 2 in 1 Tablet pocket, to put an iPad and notebook in the large pocket or separate it into two smaller pockets to hold even more by using the built-in velcro strap.

This pocket can fit your iPad, notebook and more.

Everything is meticulously designed to hold every you need without the look or feel of being weighed down. There’s an RFID safety buckle anti-theft pocket that blocks 2.45 GHz frequencies to protect your valuables and a transparent smartphone touchscreen pocket for easy access just to name a few. Travel without any extra carry-ons because everything you need is already on you.

 

 

 

Traditional product selling channels pass lots of middlemen with N+ times the markup from its production price. We want to offer an affordable blazer that everyone can wear. So we decided to turn to crowdfunding to help us deliver directly from our manufacturer to you, the consumers.

Cleverly Blazer is a stunning blend of classy minimalism with cutting-edge textile technology. From the delineates design, its strength lies in its innovation and craftsmanship.

With minimalistic styling, the Cleverly blazer combines a classic fashion piece with modern tech wear. A well-made blazer is a modern take on a classic shape. A double stitching adds a refined touch as well as insurance for longevity.

 

Please follow the following washing care instructions for best machine washable results:

Step 1 - Put blazer inside washing machine.

Step 2 - Wash with warm water only.

Step 3 - Pour washing liquid and non-chlorine bleach.

Step 4 - Hang blazer with enough ventilation without exposure to sunlight for too long. Or put blazer into tumble dry machine, and dry on medium for 5 to 10 minutes only.

 

At Crafted Cleverly, we continually strive to compose our designs and creations with a unique and unconventional perspective. We actively try to fuse contemporary fashion pieces with modern tech features to create the most fashion forward utilitarian collection for the modern society.

As a small startup composed of professional designers, manufacturers, and marketers, we’ve quit our jobs after almost a decade in our field respectively to start Crafted Cleverly in order to fulfill what we think about a versatile blazer should be.

Our inspiration came from our trips across 3 continents and 5 countries where we had the opportunity to choose from a vast variety of fabrics and finalized designs with experts from Italy, Turkey, Japan, and more. We’re on a mission to revolutionize menswear with a single belief; to combine classic fashion items with the most cutting-edge textile technology.

Risks and challenges

Before launching our project on Kickstarter, we’ve made most than 15 prototypes for Cleverly, went through multiple rounds of manufacturing feedback with our partners, and built out a detailed schedule.

Therefore, we already have existing partners to cooperate with the product design and production. The above videos and pictures shown on the campaign page are working prototypes of pilot run. We are committed to delivering the Cleverly blazer on time with the highest quality. Please feel free to shoot us an email to hello@craftedcleverly.com if there is any inquiry.

story:
My name is Nina and I am a high school senior in Hawaii. Getting
tired of being broke and spending hundreds on bathing suits, I
decided to borrow my mom’s sewing machine and make my own. It
was a little rough around the edges because my sewing skills were
not top notch, but the design was what I wanted so I began wearing
them to the beach.

 My friends really liked it and asked for suits. Pretty soon I had more requests so I slapped up a page online and started getting orders. I had to work to get my sewing to a higher standard, so my mom spent some time with me and I got better. Orders started picking up. But hey, it’s only me and my mom’s old machine so it began to get hectic.

Then my parents sprung for a new machine of my own.
This was a big deal, because my parents never handed me anything.
After I began getting orders I set up a bank account and the savings
began to pile up. I knew I had to pay back my parents back but as a
teenage girl, you need gas money to get to the beach.

My suits are now becoming more popular. I have always followed
fashion and bikini design. But they’re ridiculously expensive. Plus, they
aren’t even made in Hawaii. There is so much creative talent but it’s
really hard to turn that talent into something succesfull. I’m trying to
do that and I want to be an inspiration to other young designers and
show them that they can do this too.

I’m getting orders not only from Hawaii, but all across America. And now
the word is spreading. What’s really important to me is
that I can make them fast at an affordable price, wherever they may
be.

So what makes my bikini line special? Well, several things, starting
with current design trends, photos, great friends, and a pretty
wide social network. And the fact that a high school student is doing
it. Plus the obvious; quality and price. Living in Hawaii is special.
too. I can get great photos of my friends having a blast and wearing
Akela Swim suits. My friends are awesome, they really support me with pictures, and they help spread the word with posts and IGs.

And, why am I here on Indiegogo with a campaign?

Well, it’s time to up my game and I need a little boost. I think a realistic
way to do that is to start by asking for enough funds for a new
professional sewing machine and an updated website that can showcase my line and handle the orders. The home sewing machine and generic web sites I am selling
through just aren’t cutting it anymore. I want to do better. I’m at that
point where I have outgrown my equipment.

 

Right now I have less than a year before starting college.
My family is not super rich, that means I will have to work my way
through college. Tuition is one thing, spending money is another.
How many times have I had to hear from my parents that they had
jobs in college. They have really encouraged me to continue with my business
so that I don’t have to wash dishes, or flip burgers, or compete for
a job. Plus, jobs are really hard to get right now. With my bikini
business I have my own job, I’m building business skills, and I am
showing people that it can still be done.

This will all come in steps, the success of one leading up to the next.
Right now I am well pass the bottom and asking you for your support
in my next step up to better equipment. Thanks for
checking us out. Aloha and Mahalo.

Akelaswim.com

Etsy/shop/Akelaswim.com

Akelaswim.tumblr.com

Facebook.com/Akelaswim

@akelaswim

Special thanks to models Emily Evans, Mariko Langevin, Emma Taylor, Malia Smith, Kelly Kumove, Mariah Haight, Lily Adelae, Lili Stewart, Madi Bartlet, Briana Wilson, and all my lovely customers out there for the support and purchases. xoxo

Special thanks to models Emily Evans, Mariko Langevin, Emma Taylor, Malia Smith, Kelly Kumove, Mariah Haight, Lily Adelae, Lili Stewart, Madi Bartlet, Briana Wilson, and all my lovely customers out there for the support and purchases. xoxo

story:
Short Summary

Rose Lin has been designing and making handcrafted jewelry by herself for years now. She started out just making a few pieces and selling them in a small stand. However, she has slowly expanded her catalogue and now her jewelry has been apart of art and craft exhibitions and she's had her products sold in botiques and department stores. To her, it's not about the jewelry or the money, but about following her dream and having her art make people happy.  Recently some of her American friends, decided to help her expand her reach and truly realize her goal. Our international team is working now to bring her dream to life.

What We Need & What You Get

We want to use the money to buy new materials so she can make even better designs. She's been invited to new exhibiitons and shows, but she needs to have more of her jewelry ready made for the shows. Furthermore, if we can raise enough funds, we can sell directly to consumers and expand our reach. We can open our own store, attend more international art and craft exhibitions and negotiate better deals through third party sellers. 

We are offering our most popular products in exchange for your support. We are giving them at a discounted rate with shipping included in the cost.  You will be our first global customers and the first outside of Asia to own a piece of handcrafted art. 

PERKS

Lily of the Valley Ring

Craved from White coral, handcrafted from high quality resin and fashioned with Swarovski Crystal. 18K White gold plated copper. (Adjustable)

$30 USD Contribution

 

Simply Lily of the Valley Earrings (pink flower)

$ 35 USD Contribution

Craved from white coral and handcrafted from high quality resin. 18K White gold plated copper.

 

Lily of the Valley Necklace (Pink Flower)

Craved from white coral and handcrafted from high quality resin and fashioned with Swarovski Crystal. 24K Gold plated copper.

$40 USD

 

Lily of the Valley Earrings (Blue Flower)

Craved from white coral and handcrafted from high quality resin and fashioned with Swarovski Crystal. 24K Gold plated copper.

$45 USD

Lily of the Valley Bracelet (Blue Rose)

Craved from white coral and handcrafted from high quality resin and fashioned with Swarovski Crystal. 24K Gold plated copper.

$50 USD

 

 

 

Lily of the Valley Rose Necklace (Green Rose)

Craved from white coral and handcrafted from high quality resin and fashioned with Swarovski Crystal. 24K Gold plated copper.

$60 USD

 

 

Lily of the Valley French Necklace

Craved from white coral and handcrafted from high quality resin and fashioned with Swarovski Crystal. 24K Gold Plated Copper.

$ 70 USD

 

The Impact

Rose Handmade Accessories has been designing and making jewelry and accessories for six years.  We have been selling not online in shops and stores, but also online to buyers in Asia. Additionaly, our accessories will be featured in upcoming art expos in Taipei and Beijing. Your support allows us to attend these art and craft exhibitions. With your support we can expand our sales to include the United States, Canada, Australia, Europe, and Latin American.  

Your support is greatly appreciated.

Other Ways You Can Help

If you cannot help us financially, share this page with friends, like us on Facebook, follow us on Twitter.  This allows you first access to new designs and special offers. Rose is an artist first, so sometimes she only makes one or a few of her pieces. You can also put in special requests for custom pieces.

Like us on FACEBOOK raffle.

 

Facebook Like  Prize

Simple Lily of the Valley Necklace 24K  gold plated copper necklace. Handcrafted from resin. Carved from white coral. 

5 Available.

 

 

 

Lily of the Valley Unique Necklace


Only one necklace ever made. The leaves are crafted from high quality resin. Fashioned with high quaility crystal, white coral, 24K Gold plated copper and fixed with high quality glass pearls.  

 

 Raffle Ticket Donate $1 USD

Donate one dollar USD and be entered for a chance to win.

 

Everyone on our team appreciates your help and we appreciate any feedback you can give us or any questions you may have. You may contact us via Facebook or email us at  Roselinjewelry@gmail.com. Thank you for your support. 

Delivery Date 

Order before 4/18 and receive your item before 5/5.

Order from  4/18-5/4 and receive your item before 5/24.

Order after 5/4 and receive your item before 6/10.

story:
brand:me clothing works with individuals, charities, and other organizations to help develop a community built around a simple phrase. brand:me provides an avenue to help others stand up and say “This is me and I have something unique to offer our community.” It’s not about pride or boasting, but about being confident with oneself. It’s about knowing you have the strength to get through the hard times, but the humility to say you couldn’t have done it without the support of a community rallying around you.

We often wear clothing that promotes a company. Logos and labels rule the world of popular clothing. Let's not be defined by companies that have different morals and values than us. Define yourself through the clothing you wear; don't let your clothing define you.

 

brand:me started as a basis for a school marketing project, but has grown into something much deeper. 

We all want to feel important in some way, like what we do actually matters and is making some kind of impact on this world. brand:me wants to help develop a community for people to stand up for what they believe in. To show the world that different is good and that going against the grain is perfectly fine. 

With your contributions we can help build this community.

 

 

what we need & what you get...

Our goal is $7500. We have this goal for a few different reasons:

First, we need to increase our inventory so that we can fulfill orders. Currently we only have a limited supply of shirts and have to produce on an as ordered basis which slows down delivery time. We want to have enough back stock to ship orders as they come in and keep production moving. We feel that $2000 can get us to that point.

Second, we want to develop new products. These products will include new colors, shirt styles, new phrases, hoodies, hats, and stickers. The development costs for all of this are estimated around $3000 to start small production runs of each of these.

Finally, The last $2500 would go towards website development, marketing, packaging and operating costs. We want to make your experience with brand:me the best possible. This includes a simple to use website with a feeling of community and acceptence, simple checkout processes and amazing graphic design. Plus, we want to be able to share it with the world!

If we don't make our goal of $7500 then we will start from the top and work our way down. The main goal is to aquire inventory. We need to be able to get this product into your hands. 

For the contributors, we will set aside specific amounts to fulfill your chosen perk. Even if we aren't able to make full runs of new products the contributors will get limited editions of the perk they chose. 

 

 

the impact...

When we purchase clothes from large labels we are promoting a product for a company which may not have the same morals and values that we do. When you wear brand:me clothing you are wearing something you personally believe in. You are supporting organizations that raise awareness for different causes.

other ways you can help...

If you aren't able to contribute you can still help us spread the word! Help us with getting our campaign known and out in the world! Share it on Facebook, tweet about us, tell your friends and family or ask someone to gift you a perk! We want to make our story and cause known. Everyone in some way fits into the brand:me mindset. It's just about finding it for yourself.

Now go and tell the world!

 

causes we support...

Hundred for Hope

Hundred for Hope is a 100 mile bike ride created by one father to prove to his 4 year old daughter than she can do anything she sets her mind to. Through this ride we are working with Stand Against Suicide, an organization out of New York, to raise awareness for suicide prevention. 20% of brand:me website Hundred for Hope sales go toward helping this event and its mission.

Stand Against Suicide is a nonprofit organization started in 2011. Their Mission is to raise suicide awareness and prevention by educating about suicide and mental illness. They are dedicated to promoting alternatives to suicide through education and awareness. They also distribute awareness and educational materials to schools, colleges, businesses and to the general public. 100% of profits go back into the organization.

More about Hundred for Hope www.facebook.com/hundredforhope

More about Stand Against Suicide www.standagainstsuicide.org

 

Conner Wayne Combs Foundation for PPROM

Preterm Premature Rupture of Membranes is a condition during pregnancy where a mother's water breaks and goes into labor pre-maturely. The CWC foundation was created by Stephen and Caroline Combs who lost their son Conner to PPROM at 26 weeks old. They started the organization to offer encouragement to mothers currently experiencing PPROM as well as help to provide finiancial support through grants.

Their mission and desire is to see more mothers choose to give their own child and body a chance to run the course of pregnancy naturally, empowering mothers to do everything they can to make that happen.

20% of brand:me website CWC sales go toward helping this organization and their mission.

More about CWC Foundation www.cwcpprom.org

We are still working on a shirt design with the CWC Foundation. For now here is a look at the  official CWC t-shirt.

 

Stay tuned for more organizations. We will be adding more as this campaign and our company progresses.

story:
Short Summary

We are one of the three fashion programs offered at a high school in the United States. Every May we host a fashion show to display junior and senior student designers work.  Every student puts a lot of time and effort into the program leading up to the show. However funding for our program, Une Belle Revolution, is very low. 

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need funding primarily for fabric, new sewing machines, and other tools and supplies. 
  • Donators will receive a special thank you in the show dvd for $25 donated. Those who donate over $50 will receive a free ticket to the fashion show. For $100 donations and over donators will receive a copy of the shows dvd in addition to a free ticket. 
  • If our goal of $2000 is not met the money will still be used buy students to buy fabric. Every dollar counts. 

The Impact

Une Belle Revolution inspires students to channel their creativity and talents into unique designs. This program and show can not run with out proper funding to support these young designer's ideas. Any donation is appreciated. 

Other Ways You Can Help

If you are a business or corporation interested in sponsoring Une Belle Revolution please contact Ms. Valerie Williams at 404-308-6545

story:
"Seraphina Plus is Montreal's premier plus size bridal retailer with the greatest variety of designer brands exclusively in plus size. Seraphina Plus provides the largest array of plus size styles in our showroom. With the guidance of our specialized consultants, the ultimate plus-size bridal gown destination is Seraphina Plus."
Seraphina Plus was envisioned by both Jessica Van Nispen and I (Emily Stirtzinger) when we interned under a popular Montreal bridal salon during our second year in fashion marketing school. We interned at the salon for five months, and during that time were completely dismayed with the options that were available for the plus size brides that came to the salon. There were not many options for brides to choose from, and no samples were above a size 26! Most brides were shoved into a teeny corner of the salon, or told to choose from a catalogue to pick their gown...without even trying it on!

For our final project in our last year of school, our brainchild of Seraphina Plus came alive- a wedding gown playground for plus size brides where they can feel accepted, beautiful and get the full bridal gown shopping experience - no matter their size.

Post-graduation, we feel its time to make our concept into a reality and that is why we are asking for you all to fuel our unique business!

We intend to open up our doors in September 2012 and will utilize the money raised from RocketHub for business start-up costs, acquiring inventory, marketing and public relations, and all other necessary costs involved with starting Seraphina Plus!

If our project fuels over 100%, the more, the better! A bridal salon recquires a large financial investment, with our goal just being the tip of the ice-berg, so all extra funding will go to making our store be the best it can be for our plus-size brides.

Spread the word - Seraphina Plus will be coming to everyone shortly!

story:
LETS FACE THE WORLD

“Our job as professional Makeup Arstists and Hair Stylists is to recognize beauty and bring it out for everyone to see, whether it’s a model on the catwalk, an actress in front of the camera, a bride on the most important day of her life, or a teenager on their first school ball…FACE ME…you are the star…”
                                                                        Elizabeth Canales-Ron (Face Me Creator)

  • My name is Elizabeth Canales-Ron, I have been a Makeup Artist and Hair Stylist for 12 years, I am also a mother to a 2 year old boy. 
  • FACE ME is a brand in itself a company providing Makeup and hairstyling services on a freelance mobile basis.  Our website offers services for fashion photo shoots, runway, film, tv and also weddings, balls, corporate events.  The website was recently launched and we are hoping to launch our own makeup brand within 3 months.
  • This campaign is about being able to sustain an income for myself, providing more work opportunities for nz artists, especially the new generation of artists and launching a quality cosmetic brand that is pure mineral quality, style and affordability.
  • What you will be helping to achieve is a more reliable income for myself so that I can have more time with my son and not having to go and work full time in an office compromising my talent and dreams, also I have a passion for youth and being able to provide more opportunity for new talent has always been one of my goals, the Face Me makeup line will also help provide more income opportunities for artists and also to help YOU, FACE THE WORLD.

What We Need & What You Get

  • We need firstly $5000 US to be able to get the first order of FACE ME cosmetics and get them screen printed and order merchandising. We then also need an $1500 in shipping and custom fees, we also need $1000 in legal fees to be able to set up all necessary systems. And the rest will be used in advertising, new equipment and do a good launch so that we get quality contacts and start providing more work for everyone involved.
  • You can expect free makeup from our soon to be launched brand, free makeovers, big discounts and much more.
  • If we don’t reach our entire goal we will keep seeking the rest of the funding so that everyone gets to experience, FACE ME makeup artistry, hair styling and cosmetics.

The Impact

  • You will be helping firstly in providing more opportunities for emerging talented artists that may just be needing a little push and good management to succeed in a very competitive industry.
  • We will actively seek contacts, publicity, and create events to help everyone share their talent.
  • And a more financially secure income for a lot of us struggling artists.

IF you cant contribute,, you can STILL HELP

  • Please help us get the word out there, share the campaign and make some noise!
  • Visit our website, to create traffic, write on our blog.
  • Follow us on facebook
  • Follow us on twitter.
  • Don’t forget to use the Indiegogo share tools!

VIDEO COMING UP SOOOOOOOOONNNN!!!!!!!

IN THE MEAN TIME PLEASE CHECK OUT OUR WEBSITE 

www.facememakeup.com

story:
Ocean Mimic is a recycled swimwear collection for men and women to power a movement to protect our oceans. We are trying to solve the complex plastic issue at the source while cleaning up the mess by developing a one-of-a-kind clean up community. 

We have created a vibrant collection of recycled swimwear inspired by creatures or plastic found in the ocean. For every $10 you spend on a product we will collect 1 kg of trash from the beaches and oceans.

In Indonesia around 65,000 tonnes of trash a day fails to make it to landfill. Instead, it fills our oceans, buries the beaches and is disrupting the true essence of this beautiful country. Indonesia is the second greatest contributor to ocean plastic responsible for dumping an estimated 3.2 million tonnes a year. That’s 90 tonnes every single minute!

We moved to Bali and started beach clean ups there. One weekend we picked up over 1 ton of plastic from a single beach with over 80 volunteers. Awareness is the first step towards taking action. We have a much bigger vision than clean ups and with your help we can not only spread awareness but implement solutions to stop the plastic at the source

Beach clean ups drive awareness and empower a community to recognize that when united we all have the ability to be a part of a movement bigger than ourselves. Not only are they inspiring to the individual but they start a conversation and they are powerful tools to spread awareness.

If this project is a success we will be boosting our clean ups to the next level and worldwide. If we get enough funding we will be developing an app to track the clean ups so you can see exactly where your trash was collected from and even who by. We also want to start local projects in schools and villages to educate on plastic and provide alternatives. 

This is what 1 Kilo looks like. Spend $10 today and we will pick up this much trash.

And this is what 20 Kilos looks like. 

We have created a unique collection of recycled swimwear inspired by the crafty Mimic octopus. The mimic octopus imitates other creatures in the ocean to outsmart its predators. We wanted to take our inspiration from the marine life we love to create bright and colourful designs which educate and inspire.

Our swimwear is made of Carvico Vita, a fabric made of recycled plastic and fishing nets. Why not turn waste into fashion? Vita results in a drastically lower carbon footprint without compromising on quality. Our swimwear is stretchy, soft and breathable with factor 50 UV protection.

This campaign will also allow us to continue developing new designs based on your suggestions. What would you like to see next?

We

We also have our 100% cotton t-shirts suitable for everyone! Simple logo on the front and plain back. White, black and turquoise options. 

For every $10 you spend we will collect 1 kg of trash from the beaches and oceans. The movement can’t grow without the collection. We designed products for ocean lovers to fund our clean up mission to form a sustainable environmental project.

Ordering on Indiegogo is a little bit different from an online store. 

We have a few different "perks" which you can see below that you can chose from or you can donate money without a reward. You pick your perk or donate and you choose your design and your size later on along with your shipping address.

We are Emma and Chelsea. We are both scuba divers who fell totally in love with the ocean. The thrill of the unknown, the mystery of the strange and wonderful creatures, the beauty of the reefs and it's inhabitants and the calming sensation of flying effortlessly and weightlessly in the water. We met on Rawa Island in Malaysia working for Orca Nation as dive professionals. Little did we know then what our friendship would end up creating!

Part of our work with Orca Nation was doing regular ocean and beach clean ups. Through experiencing the overwhelming amounts of plastic first hand we were not only inspired to be more conscious of our lifestyle but felt compelled to build a whole business around it. We also at the same time realised that there weren't many exciting options for dive wear. It felt wrong to be entering such a colourful and vibrant world in black or grey! 

We came up with the idea of developing designs inspired by marine life. People have been wearing animal prints for decades - why not fish prints!? Somehow we merged these ideas together and voila - Ocean Mimic was born. 

Honestly we didn't expect the support we have had. We still hop up and down with happiness when we get encouraging messages, reach a new milestone or see a new product in our hands. After all we are just two girls who truly care about the ocean. We took a leap of faith and put everything into this. We really hope it all goes well and thank you for your support and your interest. It means the world to us. 

Emma & Chelsea  ❤

Creating a product line has been tough but luckily we have established friendships with many incredible people who are helping us along the way. Their experience in business, manufacturing and distribution has been extremely helpful. We are also lucky to be working with mentors and have a partnership with Orca Nation.

This campaign will directly fund our first production run of the Ocean Mimic collection. We are confident that we will meet our timeline given that the manufacturer's keep to the agreed schedule. If we do experience delays you will be the first to know! If you have any questions about the campaign please send us an email at hello@ocean-mimic.com.

In the past year we have overcome so many obstacles already and learnt so much, it’s unreal! Sometimes we can’t believe that we are here finally launching our first collection on Kickstarter.

Ocean Mimic’s mission is to create an empowered community inspired to protect and restore the oceans. Our swimwear helps to fund this mission and we hope the designs inspire us to protect the beauty found in our oceans. Remember - it all starts with you.
story_txt: Ocean Mimic is a recycled swimwear collection for men and women to power a movement to protect our oceans. We are trying to solve the complex plastic issue at the source while cleaning up the mess by developing a one-of-a-kind clean up community. We have created a vibrant collection of recycled swimwear inspired by creatures or plastic found in the ocean. For every $10 you spend on a product we will collect 1 kg of trash from the beaches and oceans.In Indonesia around 65,000 tonnes of trash a day fails to make it to landfill. Instead, it fills our oceans, buries the beaches and is disrupting the true essence of this beautiful country. Indonesia is the second greatest contributor to ocean plastic responsible for dumping an estimated 3.2 million tonnes a year. That’s 90 tonnes every single minute!We moved to Bali and started beach clean ups there. One weekend we picked up over 1 ton of plastic from a single beach with over 80 volunteers. Awareness is the first step towards taking action. We have a much bigger vision than clean ups and with your help we can not only spread awareness but implement solutions to stop the plastic at the sourceBeach clean ups drive awareness and empower a community to recognize that when united we all have the ability to be a part of a movement bigger than ourselves. Not only are they inspiring to the individual but they start a conversation and they are powerful tools to spread awareness.If this project is a success we will be boosting our clean ups to the next level and worldwide. If we get enough funding we will be developing an app to track the clean ups so you can see exactly where your trash was collected from and even who by. We also want to start local projects in schools and villages to educate on plastic and provide alternatives. This is what 1 Kilo looks like. Spend $10 today and we will pick up this much trash.And this is what 20 Kilos looks like. We have created a unique collection of recycled swimwear inspired by the crafty Mimic octopus.
