story:
In October of 2015, business and financial institutions were required to implement stricter security protocols (called the liability shift) for payments that switched away from magnetic-stripe cards which paved the way for safer payments. In light of the many recent credit card data breaches, now is an especially good time to present a solution that finally shields our wallets from theft and fraud. The Bee fob takes these new protocols to the next level with a more convenient, safer and easier way to manage your transactions.

 

 

Bee was engineered to save money, reduce clutter, increase security and keep better records with an impressive set of features packed into a compact, minimalist design. Check out the video below to learn how you can get started with quick and easy payments using Bee.

 
 
 
 

Minimize your everyday carry by allowing Bee to consolidate multiple cards onto one tiny device.

 

No need to wait for the cashier to tell you to slide your credit card or insert it into the chip reader, With Bee you can quickly pay and be on your way!

 

  

The easiest way to pay, simply look for the universal NFC Tap-To-Pay symbol and tap your Bee.

 

The Bee payment fob ends the complicated mobile tap payment apps by transitioning the technology in to a compact, one-tap fingerprint authorization fob. Using Bee is easy to authorize a payment, save money with customer loyalty cards or use a gift card balance, simply:

  1. Pull out Bee fob.
  2. Scan fingerprint to authorize
  3. Tap your Bee on the NFC Tap-To-Pay symbol

The future is here, go ahead, look around for the universal NFC (Near Field Communication) symbol next time you swipe your card, it is almost everywhere

 

  

 

    

Bee is convenient and discreet, allowing you to connect it to what you use most.

 

Measuring 24mm in diameter by 8mm thick and weighing only 0.52oz, Bee was engineered to be compact and hardly noticeable for every day carry. With Bee's accessories you have the freedom to easily accesss on your keychain, purse, belt, backpack, etc.

 

  

Reduce clutter with the ability to store up to 20 cards on Bee.

Through Bee's encrypted smartphone app, securely register any NFC enabled card of your choice:

  • Payments - Authorize payments for debit, credit or gift cards from any institution: Visa, MasterCard, Discover, etc.
  • Loyalty - Get discounts by loading your customer cards from retailers: pharmacy, grocery, coffee, etc.
  • Membership - Sign in at the gym, spa, YMCA, etc by registering your club membership cards to Bee.
  • Access - Reduce clutter by registering your apartment, office, elevator, garage, etc access key cards.
  • Transit - Never lose or miss a train by registering public transit cards for subway, bus, amtrak, etc.

Bee makes life easy with the ability to store up to 20 different card types on one simple, tiny device. Learn how to add cards to your Bee device below:

 

 

 

 

By using payment tokenization, multiple layer encryption and fingerprint authorization, Bee is the safest way to pay.

 

 

  

With biometric security prevents unauthorized, fraudulent or accidental access and authorization.

Securely scan and store up to 3 users fingerprints within the Bee encrypted smartphone app, allowing kids, spouses, or employees to access joint cards as you permit. After fingerprint registration, simply press your finger on the Bee's fingerprint sensor near any NFC device to authorize your card of choice. 

 

  

Bee does not store any personal information, data or account numbers.

Instead of providng sensitive information, Bee uses "tokens" instead of PANs (real card numbers) during transaction to increase privacy, ensure security and prevent fraudulent transactions or comprimised data. Bee conforms and surpasses all EMV Co. technical standards for smart payments and authorizations.

 

 

  

Your personal information, data and finances are safe even when lost.

Bee allows you the freedom to temporarily or permanently enable or disable specific cards anytime, anywhere from the Bee smartphone app.

 

 

Better insights to easily manage personal, business or family member expenses.

  

Bee also includes easy to understand money management and expense tracking solutions.

Bee's app provides user-friendly graphics to educate on spending behavior through visual graphs of your spending habits.

 

 

 

 

 

25+ years of experience in IT products, software and consulting across diverse industry segments. 

25+ years of experience in IT consulting, process improvement, product development and business applications. 

With 25+ years of experience in industrial product engineering and consumer electronics, he adds a critical perspective to product design. 

18 years of consulting experience in product, applications development and process management. 

Passionate about wireless communications and how it can be implemented in day-today life. 

Enjoys working on emerging technologies and aspires to create products that create an impact. 

Experienced in multiple domains such as Telecom, Datacom, Wireless communications, Security, Multimedia and Systems programming. 

 

 

 

ABOUT BEE

How big is the Bee?

  • Bee weighs about 15 grams or half an ounce. Bee stands at a diameter of 24 mm (size of a US Quarter) and a thickness of 8mm (thickness of a pencil).

How many cards can I store on the Bee?

  • You can store up to 20 cards on your Bee. This includes your credit cards, debit cards and prepaid cards. In future Bee users can expect to store access control cards, and transit cards.

How secure is my Radiius Bee?

  • Bee is equipped with a biometric fingerprint scanner that makes sure you are the one true user of your Bee. You can store multiple fingerprint information and unlock the device any time before using your Bee.The security of Bee is more nuanced and in layers. It has a biometric fingerprint scanner, it conforms to EMV Co. standards and it uses tokens instead of PAN (or real card numbers) during transactions.In addition, Radiius does not store any sensitive information on your smartphone. All data communication is encrypted with strong keys end-to-end. We consider these as basic hygiene.

Does my Bee require charging?

  • Bee does not require charging, and is expected to work for two years with normal usage.

 

BEEHIVE APP

What is BeeHive?

  • BeeHive is a one stop Android/iOS solution that lets you add, delete, update and manage your cards for use with Bee. BeeHive is a safe and secure solution and does not store your complete payment card info anywhere in your phone or outside Bee.In future, BeeHive plans to include money management and expense tracking solutions as well as advise Bee users on where to get the best deals and offers.

Can my Bee connect to more than one smartphone at the same time?

  • For safety’s sake, one Bee wallet or account can only be linked with one smartphone at a time, to make sure only you have access to your card information.

 

USING BEE

How do I add cards to my Bee?

  • Bee works in sync with the BeeHive, and BeeHive gives you an option to scan your cards or manually enter the details. BeeHive works in the background with bank applications to get the secured credentials and store them on Bee.

Can I upload both my credit and debit cards to Bee?

  • Yes, you can upload debit, credit, pre-paid, rewards and loyalty cards to Bee

Can I add my new bank card before it arrives from the bank via postal/mail service?

  • Yes banks can deliver new cards directly to the Bee device via the mobile application. What we mean here is that banks do not have to go through the process of issuing plastic cards and shipping it to consumers. They can directly provide tokens for the new cards to the Bee device through the Bee app on the mobile.

Do I need a smartphone to use the Bee?

  • To manage cards, activating Bee and registering your fingerprint information, you’re going to need the BeeHive app. For a payment transaction on PoS terminals, you do not need the BeeHive app.

What brands of smart watches can Bee attach to?

  • All android and iOS based smart watches can pair with the Bee Device.

Where can I use my Bee?

  • Anywhere, everywhere. As long as the retailer you’re paying at has a PoS device that supports contactless payments, your Bee will work flawlessly.In future, you may be able to use your Bee instead of ID cards that require NFC-security walkthrough, and instead of your regular transit ticket.

How do I make a purchase using Bee?

  • Look for a terminal that has NFC sign on it.- Unlock the Bee by placing your finger on the sensor.
  • Bring it close to the terminal and complete the verification (signature, if needed)
  • That’s it!

What transit tickets can Bee integrate with? (i.e. Metro Card, Charlie Card, Tap Card, etc. )

  • Any transit card or access card that uses NFC reader at the turnstile can be integrated on the Bee device 

I have multiple cards enrolled in my Bee. How do I know which card is being used?

  • The BeeHive app on your smartphone allows you to identify your default card. Once you mark your default card, the Bee pre-selects this card during payment. You can, of course, always select another card as your default anytime.

Will all features and functionalities be available when I receive my Bee?

  • Support for Transit, Access and Location based rewards would be future releases that will be updated via App updates or FOTA (firmware over the air) updates to a user's existing Bee device
  • Additionally, while Radiius would like to ensure support from most of the large banks and issuers, some banks may not be immediately supported at the time of our launch. Similarly, our network partner may have either readiness issues or may require additional approvals to support us in some countries and geographical regions. 

 

PROBLEM RESOLUTION

What if my Bee stops working?

  • Your Bee comes with a 1 year warranty, that lets you replace your device in case there are any manufacturing defects. We guarantee you receive your Bee free of manufacturing defects.

I lost my Bee. What should I do now?

  • Losing anything valuable can be stressful. But you need not worry about misuse of Bee. It has multiple layers of security.Bee cannot be used without your biometrics. If any unauthorized person tries to use your Bee, it will permanently lock itself after 10 wrong tries.Next, you can disable all the cards on Bee by using ‘Disable all cards’ feature in BeeHive. Your physical cards will continue to work.You can call and ask for a replacement. You will have to pay the cost of a new Bee in your account. Radiius is planning a 24-hour replacement program for most metro locations in the United States.

How do I restore my cards on the replaced Bee?

  • Simply open the BeeHive app and activate your replacement Bee as before. The enrolled cards will automatically synch up with your new Bee and will be restored.

What if I change my smartphone?

  • You will need to go through a simple process to link your new smartphone with Bee. As a part of it, we will verify you as the right owner of the Bee. Since, we do not store any payment information on the phone, the process is very secure.This is where you get the freedom and peace of mind. You are not tied to a phone company or model in order to continue using your Bee.

Can I use Bee to withdraw cash at an ATM?

  • Very few ATM machines work on NFC. If your ATM machine supports NFC, Bee will work.

Can a transaction decline while using the Bee?

  • If a transaction declines, it would most like be due to a server issue on your card providers’ end. None of your transaction information goes through our servers in real time.

 

ORDERING

How much does a Bee cost?

  • Stay tuned for early-bird offers.

Can I buy more than one Bee?

  • Yes, of course! The more, the merrier. You can link all your Bees to a single BeeHive wallet (on your smartphone) and they would behave exactly like each other. So carry one on your watch, one in your handbag and one as your key fob. We leave this to your imagination.

How do I pre-order a Bee?

  • You can pre-order through our Indiegogo campaign or directly through our website.

Can I invite friends and family to try the Bee?

  • Certainly, you can. You can invite people who have not yet purchased a Bee. At Radiius, we are pushing for the convenience of a cashless, cardless, hassle-free lifestyle.

When will the Bee ship?

  • The first batch is expected to ship out in February 2018.

Can I choose any color?

  • Bee comes in stylish and sporty colors, some of them are limited in number. You can choose which color you want while placing the pre-order.

I am outside the US. When can I get my Bee?

  • If you’re outside the US, please subscribe to Bee updates and we’ll let you know when we can ship you your Bee.

Can I change or cancel my perk?

  • Indiegogo has now made it easier than ever to upgrade your perks. You can now do so on the contributions tab of your Indiegogo profile. See more information on how to do this for Indiegogo here: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526756-How-to-Upgrade-Your-Perk Regarding cancellations, Indiegogo policy dictates that campaign owners have no ability to adjust perk selections. Backers can upgrade, change, or cancel their perks/rewards at any time on their contributor's profile until the campaign has closed. After the campaign has ended and funds have been disbursed, the campaigners will evaluate such requests will be handled on a case-by-case basis.

How is shipping handled?

  • We will be shipping via the United States Postal Service First Class mail with delivery tracking confirmation. International shipments will be sent via International First Class.

How much is shipping and handling?

  • Shipping is decided based upon which perk you choose for your contribution. We recommend choosing perks which offer free shipping and best value.

Will I be able to replace my Bee battery after two years?

  • Bee devices would need to be reordered after two years. we are working a replacement solution that allows for change of battery every year.

 

REGULATORY

Is Bee certified by any authority?

  • Yes. It is EMV Co. certified and the solution is approved by payment networks (MasterCard and Visa). The Radiius ecosystem including all applications hosted on cloud are compliant with Payment Card Industry (PCI) standards.

If Bee is ever hacked and I have money stolen or unauthorized payments from the device, will your company cover the funds lost?

  • Bee conforms to all security standards in vogue by the concerned authorities (EMV Co). These standards are globally accepted and recognized by banks and card issuing authorities and better than the security currently in place for cards. Effectively this means that current treatment viz unauthorized transactions will apply. That means - consumers right/ ability to contest and refute a transaction are intact. In cases of losses due to such conflicts, the original card issuing authority owns the liability.

Your physical cards will continue to work.You can call and ask for a replacement. You will have to pay the cost of a new Bee in your account. Radiius is planning a 24-hour replacement program for most metro locations in the United States.How do I restore my cards on the replaced Bee?Simply open the BeeHive app and activate your replacement Bee as before. The enrolled cards will automatically synch up with your new Bee and will be restored.What if I change my smartphone?You will need to go through a simple process to link your new smartphone with Bee. As a part of it, we will verify you as the right owner of the Bee. Since, we do not store any payment information on the phone, the process is very secure.This is where you get the freedom and peace of mind. You are not tied to a phone company or model in order to continue using your Bee.Can I use Bee to withdraw cash at an ATM?Very few ATM machines work on NFC. If your ATM machine supports NFC, Bee will work.Can a transaction decline while using the Bee?If a transaction declines, it would most like be due to a server issue on your card providers’ end. None of your transaction information goes through our servers in real time. ORDERINGHow much does a Bee cost?Stay tuned for early-bird offers.Can I buy more than one Bee?Yes, of course! The more, the merrier. You can link all your Bees to a single BeeHive wallet (on your smartphone) and they would behave exactly like each other. So carry one on your watch, one in your handbag and one as your key fob. We leave this to your imagination.How do I pre-order a Bee?You can pre-order through our Indiegogo campaign or directly through our website.Can I invite friends and family to try the Bee?Certainly, you can. You can invite people who have not yet purchased a Bee. At Radiius, we are pushing for the convenience of a cashless, cardless, hassle-free lifestyle.When will the Bee ship?The first batch is expected to ship out in February 2018.Can I choose any color?Bee comes in stylish and sporty colors, some of them are limited in number. You can choose which color you want while placing the pre-order.I am outside the US. When can I get my Bee?If you’re outside the US, please subscribe to Bee updates and we’ll let you know when we can ship you your Bee.Can I change or cancel my perk?Indiegogo has now made it easier than ever to upgrade your perks. You can now do so on the contributions tab of your Indiegogo profile. See more information on how to do this for Indiegogo here: https://support.indiegogo.com/hc/en-us/articles/526756-How-to-Upgrade-Your-Perk Regarding cancellations, Indiegogo policy dictates that campaign owners have no ability to adjust perk selections. Backers can upgrade, change, or cancel their perks/rewards at any time on their contributor's profile until the campaign has closed. After the campaign has ended and funds have been disbursed, the campaigners will evaluate such requests will be handled on a case-by-case basis.How is shipping handled?We will be shipping via the United States Postal Service First Class mail with delivery tracking confirmation. International shipments will be sent via International First Class.How much is shipping and handling?Shipping is decided based upon which perk you choose for your contribution. We recommend choosing perks which offer free shipping and best value.Will I be able to replace my Bee battery after two years?Bee devices would need to be reordered after two years. we are working a replacement solution that allows for change of battery every year. REGULATORYIs Bee certified by any authority?Yes. It is EMV Co. certified and the solution is approved by payment networks (MasterCard and Visa). The Radiius ecosystem including all applications hosted on cloud are compliant with Payment Card Industry (PCI) standards.If Bee is ever hacked and I have money stolen or unauthorized payments from the device, will your company cover the funds lost?Bee conforms to all security standards in vogue by the concerned authorities (EMV Co). These standards are globally accepted and recognized by banks and card issuing authorities and better than the security currently in place for cards. Effectively this means that current treatment viz unauthorized transactions will apply. That means - consumers right/ ability to contest and refute a transaction are intact. In cases of losses due to such conflicts, the original card issuing authority owns the liability.

story:
Don’t you dare click away from this!!

Problem

A Mobile Device sold today no longer includes a user manual.  However, manuals provided with a mobile device in the past didn’t really help understanding how to use all those functions anyway.  Unless you happen to be Tech-Savvy, they can understand the techno-talk used in these manuals.  For the Non-Tech-Savvy this techno-talk was/is the same as a foreign language and they may hold a master’s degree.

The gap between Tech-Savvy and Non-Tech-Savvy is revealed further in “simple” basic functions.  Basic functions of a mobile device are now managed by applications (Apps), which are small programs on the device identified by an icon.  You must be able to identify and master these apps with or without the help of a manual. Some app names are self-descriptive and some are not. Many of these basic apps also have alternatives, referred to as third-party-apps, which are not designed by the manufacturer of that device but an outside vendor. Some of these alternative apps are actually better than the basic apps provided by the manufacturer and some not.

So we have the Technology-Savvy or Tech-Savvy in society, defined in the dictionary as “knowing a lot about technology, especially computers” and the Non-Tech-Savvy who are actually not defined.  When the term Non-Tech-Savvy is used, it commonly refers to seniors, though a large part of this group are not seniors.  The Non-Tech-Savvy members of society does include seniors but it also includes those of many ages, educational level, income level and language that just don’t know a lot about technology of any kind.  The population of the Non-Tech-Savvy has been estimated to be as large as the Tech-Savvy, but no-one actually knows.

AARP reports 64 percent of their members are “very uncomfortable with technology, for many digital immigrants the path to becoming smarter than a smartphone many require a little instruction”. (This percentage equates to millions in the world’s population)

Eighty-one percent of U.S. cell phone users send text messages, but only half of them tackle more complex tasks like downloading apps and reading or sending email. These Non-Tech-Savvy are usually not accounted for in media releases and are the non-senior in the Non-Tech-Savvy population. (This percentage equates to billions in the world’s population)

With so many Non-Tech-Savvy members of society, it truly surprises me that so-very few seem to care about the dilemma they face every day.  Taken for granted are the benefits and potential benefits mobile devices can provide for the Non-Tech-Savvy.  Benefits such as reminders (medicine, meals, appointment, etc.), emergencies, announcements, keeping in touch with loved ones and services. But does society voice a real concern for this dilemma, No!  Shame on you!

Each and every one of you (Including media journalists, authors & writers) reading this campaign has a family member or friend that is Non-Tech-Savvy.  Only a few scant articles have made note of it.  Do not treat this as trivial, consider who they really are, people you care about!  These are some of the most important members of society and they deserve your support.

Current Status

Since introduction of the mobile device, manufacturers and sellers marketing strategies have been designed for the Tech-Savvy, leaving Non-Tech-Savvy members of society to fend for themselves.  Sellers have made small attempts to address this problem in various ways. They identify YouTube videos that tell you how a particular device works. Some will provide a free clinic in which they tell you how best to use a particular device. Some identify online resources where you can download a PDF version of the manual and some sellers will provide a PDF app of the manual on the device. Unfortunately none of these efforts really take into consideration their customer base, Tech-Savvy and Non-Tech-Savvy.

On the other hand, manufacturers of mobile devices have made no attempts at all to address this dilemma. To the contrary, they no longer provide the lowly cousin to a mobile device, the user’s manual.  Now, supposedly, they are developing a marketing strategy aimed at the Non-Tech-Savvy.  How do they expect the Non-Tech-Savvy to learn how to use current and future mobile devices without any effective means of instruction?

Why did manufacturers of mobile devices stop providing users manuals?  They referred to this event as “Going Green”, saving trees and the forest.  Which is true, for every device they were including a small booklet that was eventually going to be thrown away.  If it was effective as an instructional document or not is a question only the reader can answer.  But the manufacturer saved millions of dollars by not including a manual.  What green are they saving?  Who is pay the price for this savings?

Social City Net

Another aspect of the Non-Tech-Savvy, is an individual’s reading comprehension level which some may wish were better.  Social City Net understands this as part of the Non-Tech-Savvy dilemma and designed an Interactive Webinar Class which we feel best addresses this global issue.

Our Webinar’s allow a person to log into an Interactive Class from anywhere in the world, and actively participate in a presentation, question & answer session from the privacy of their own home or location. Each class covers a specific mobile device with maximum of 15 students and is offered multiple times over a period of days and weeks based on demand.

The structure of each device presentation is based on the device manual but presented in an easy to understand manner while allowing for questions and answers from each class member. Each webinar is recorded and added to a video library which any member can access for playback at any time in the future.  Webinars are facilitated by an expert on the specific device scheduled for that class. Individuals book a class thru the Social City Net website which shows a schedule of classes, dates & times for selected mobile devices.

Details on how to connect to your webinar emailed to you at the time a class is booked, connection details are also provided on the website’s side menu.

Support Needed For

Business functions currently in place include Website, Scheduling & Booking, Basic Internet Marketing and 256 Bit SSL Website Security (This is high level security is required for a website that accepts credit cards to protect personal verification information). For a 3 month period, funding will secure:

Office Space – In McClellan Park, formally McClellan Air Force Base, where $7,143 (2,381 per month) will provide 3 months to firmly establish this service location in Sacramento California.  This location provides a financial advantage as utilities are included in this monthly fee.

Staffing for 3 Months – Systems technician $6,960, Facilitator (commission), Founder (military retirement)

Office requirements for 3 Months – Furniture $800, Equipment $650, Communications $550

Expanded Marketing - $1,300

There are 6 unique perks for donations

(1)  $5 (Support) – Receive a special thanks and our appreciation,

(2) $25 (Copper) – Receive a special thanks and entry on our sponsorship page,

(3) $100 (Bronze) – Receive Copper perks and a 1 year membership,

(4) $500 (Silver) – Receive Bronze perks and a free class of your choice,

(5) $1000 (Gold) – Receive Silver perks and your image in our Sponsorship image slider,

(6) $5000 (Platinum) – Receive Gold perks and your name on our classroom.

If the entire goal is not met I will still go forward with the business, and funds collected will go towards additional marketing, facility and office requirements. I am confident the shortfall can be covered by sales and a loan with operations on a month by month basis. This will be a much slower startup with exposure to a higher risk but I refuse to give up on such an awesome idea.

Operations

Our initial class schedule of current popular devices is a selection from the 2014 Global Mobile Awards. Future classes will include past popular devices in addition to current and new devices as they enter the market. Classes will also be provided in different languages and coupons made available reducing the already low class price. Classes are held in a Webinar conference manner which means they are interactive. So at any time during the presentation a class member may ask questions. These interactive classes can help anyone gain working knowledge and understanding of their device, no matter what their reading level.  . When you book a class, $14.95 USD, you automatically become a website member.

About me

I have worked in Software Development and Business Analysis for over 15 years, with expertise in programming and project management. The purchase of a smartphone for my daughter and her/our frustrations learning to use it began this project. Social City Net is centered on the website, it provides class description, scheduling, booking and client information. Taking the website through concept, design and finally construction has been quite a journey.

I believe Social City Net is an awesome concept and this campaign is a funding effort, but it also conveys a serious message.  The Non-Tech-Savvy face a serious dilemma every day for no reason and without a voice to raise an alarm.  You might think this trivial today but tomorrow hopefully you will see it is not.

If you feel it’s a great idea but aren't able to contribute financially, no problem. There are so many other ways to help out. We appreciate those who tell us they talk about Social City Net with people they meet. It helps us when people join in on our social media pages to "like", comment, share, tweet, and pin. We have to give a special shout out to our wonderful Facebook fans who have formed a sort of grass roots movement to help spread the word. Thank you to each and every one of you!  LinkedIn

If you are not supporting this campaign because you are Tech-Savvy and feel this message trivial, think about who the Non-Tech-Savvy really are!  If you still can’t donate but realize what a great idea this is, please tell others about it and share the Indiegogo tools!

story:
FRAGRANCES OF WINE IS NOW IN PRODUCTION!!!

Read on and take a look at our new Perks!

If you choose the Perk "Full Set of Fragrances of Wine " you only pay the price for 3, so you get one free!

Have you ever wanted to live the wine country dream?  To have a Chateau in the South of France with a Golden Retriever running through the vineyard....

There are many Chateaux in the South of France and probably a good number of Golden Retrievers as well.  However, I envisioned a new project, to create a line of perfumes based on the scents found in white, rose, red and sparkling wines.  A new concept, a new dream, and now a reality! 

There is something magical about Wine, Perfume and Provence

"In every scent, lies a story"


MY STORY

Hello, my name is Amy Mumma, founder and President of Fragrances of Wine.  I've been working in the wine industry for 20 years was awarded the Professional Wine Woman 2005 and 2006 title in Paris at the International Wine Women Awards, named Western Innovator 2008 by the Capital Press and recognized by United States Representative Doc Hastings in the U.S. Congressional Record for service to the wine industry.  I am the Founder and was Director of the Central Washington University Wine Program which offers the only four year accredited Global Wine Studies degree in the US.  I also hold an MBA in Wine Studies from the University of Bordeaux. 

After 15 years at the university, I needed a new challenge.  I was offered a teaching position in Provence, so I sold or gave away nearly everything, boxed up a few special items, left my job and my home town of Seattle.  I arrived in France with two suitcases, two dogs and a goal:  to start a new company called Fragrances of Wine. 


WHY WINE AND PERFUME?

Aromas impact every area of our lives.  They surround us in the air, on our skin, stirring conversation and crossing cultural barriers.  Aroma is what gives wine its personality.  Both wine and perfume have the ability to transform our day, evoke memories, stir emotions affect mood, hopes and dreams. 


On extensive research, I found that a perfume based on the scents of wine is an untapped niche market with extremely limited competition.  And no, you won't go around smelling like alcohol! 

Fragrances of Wine captures the enchanting blend of wines and perfumes made in Provence, France.  I want the woman who wears it to know that she is worth it, beyond all, she loves herself.   I want her to walk out that door every morning knowing she is unique, special and amazing.    


OUR PRODUCTS

Fragrances of Wine consists of four perfumes: 
Blanc, Rose de Provence, Noir and Sparkle

Our perfumes do not contain wine and are not alcoholic. They are made with essential oils that capture the scents found in the aromas of many different types of wine.  




WHY PROVENCE?

The minute I arrived, I was struck by the beauty of the area, the multitude of flowers, colors, the lavender fields, the sparkling sea and of course the wonderful wines.  Many people dream of living or visiting the wine country in southern France but many may never have that chance.  So, I asked myself, how can I share this?  How can I combine my knowledge of wine with the essence of Provence? 


The town of Grasse is known as the "Perfume Capital of the World".  Most of the famous brands we know are made here.  I contacted Richard Asfour, a famous Master Perfumer and President of Corialys Perfumes to see what he thought of the idea. He loved it! Together we created Fragrances of Wine to express the essence of Wine and Provence.  


WHAT WE ARE ASKING FROM YOU


We are asking for $20,000 to launch Fragrances of Wine on the marketplace.  


LET'S MAKE IT REAL!  

We've already invested over $6,000 of our own funds towards this product.  This money has gone toward the creation of the actual Fragrances of Wine Line,  professional logo design, domain registrations, all legal and licenses for the Fragrances of Wine LLC.  

We are now in initial production of 

Fragrances of Wine! 


To complete our production, we are asking for your help.  Due to limited quantities, we are offering futures of Fragrances of Wine for you.  The retail price will be $50 not including shipping and handling.  

If you donate today by choosing the $50 Perk for "ONE FRAGRANCE OF WINE" you will be one of the first to own such a special product.  

If you choose the Perk "Full Set of Fragrances of Wine " you will only pay the cost for three, giving you one free!


MARKETING

The vast majority of our initial marketing will be via Social Media.  Did you know that if Facebook were a country, it would be the third largest country in the world in terms of population?  We need funding to partner with Project Bionic, a well known Social Media firm in Seattle with a track record of success for clients including Taco Time, Tully's Coffee, Washington Wine Commission and many others.  Project Bionic will create and manage all our social media platforms.    

DONATIONS

Some of our Fragrances of Wine "Sparkle" will be donated to the Seattle Chapter of Dress for Success, an organization to promote the economic independence of disadvantaged women by providing professional attire, cosmetics and networking skills.  


What We've Accomplished So Far

We are now in our intitial run of Fragrances of Wine and are so excited!

Fragrances of Wine is a registered LLC in Washington State.  All the legal and business paperwork has been completed.  We have test marketed our products via focus groups, defined target markets and goals, our logo and packaging is designed and samples are available. 

We have established a distribution center in Washington State.  All perfumes will be sent there directly from France.  Orders will be taken via our website and perfumes shipped directly to our customers.  Customers based in Europe will have their orders sent from Provence. 

I have been successful with businesses in the past.  From being an international wine consultant to building a full four year university degree, this is an exciting new project, that with your help, I believe will be a new concept in a great market!  

I've assembled a team to assist with this campaign and with Fragrances of Wine.  The team includes people who have started up their own businesses, others with public relations skills, wine knowledge, fashion and cosmetics knowledge, fundraising efforts and more.  


YOUR PERKS

Check out our great perks ranging from Fragrances of Wine perfumes, discount on bottles to products from Provence.  Even think about the whole Provence experience! 

Every donation, no matter what Perk, your name will be highlighted on our Fragrances of Wine Facebook Page.

With your help, based on initial feedback and response, I am certain Fragrances of Wine will be a great success!  



OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Whether you do contribute monetarily to Fragrances of Wine or can't at this time, we would love for you to spread the word about Fragrances of Wine.  Please promote us on your Facebook page, Pin us on Pinterest, give us a shout out Tweet and talk about us over a bottle of wine with your friends.  The Indiegogo tools are a super way to spread the word.  
We would also love to have your support for Dress for Success.  There are chapters around the world and perhaps you have an item of clothing, a new cosmetic, or networking skills you can offer for women in need.  This is just as important to us.  My hope is that owning a custom perfume made in France will help boost the confidence of that woman, knowing she has something special.    


FAQ

  • No, you will not smell like you just came from a wine bar!  Our perfumes are not alcoholic, they are based on the scents found in wine and do not contain any wine at all.
  • We can send your Perks worldwide.  Estimated delivery will be determined on your location
  • Our partner, Corialys Perfumes has decades of experience and is ISO 9001 Certified Quality Management meeting international standards of production.    
  • Fragrances of Wine are Perfumes are made of essential oils and not an Eau de Toilette meaning they are more concentrated and will last longer.
  • Sorry, we can't offer wine as a perk, you have to buy that yourself.  But, please raise a glass in our honor!
