story:
We've also successfully funded on Kickstarter and hundreds of Colibry had already been shipped! ;)

Say Goodbye to Depilation. Welcome Threading Epilation!

Do you know that Depilation and Epilation have two different meanings? Depilation removes hair at just the surface, while epilation removes the entire hair and lasts longer than depilation.

Here you can find the smartest and chicest tool for epilation: COLIBRY removes body hair follicles, delaying the re-growth until follicles bulbs are reformed.

COLIBRY uses the ancient hair removal technique of threading and makes it smarter. 

Conventional Hair Removal Technique Pain Points

Let's be honest: how much do you struggle to remove body hair? How much do you spend on body care? No matter the answer. What we know is that:

Razors and Chemicals are as fast as dangerous, and hair grow faster and stronger. This method cannot be included in the hashtag #bodycare.

Waxing and Electric Epilators are as efficient as painful, not even yet to consider they both waste materials and energy; they also affect aggressively on the skin, thereby causing irritation.

Electroepilators and Laser are even more dangerous and infinitely more expensive. Above all, "burning" the skin is quite far from the idea of natural beauty.

That's why COLIBRY is committed to threading epilation, because the ancient tradition is still the best option that we have to remove body hair efficiently. In modern times, all efforts to make an efficient tool for threading are not enough. We've tried them all, but they didn't work as well as we expected.

COLIBRY Features 

COLIBRY is a whole new concept: it's delicate on the skin without irritation, actually stimulating micro-circulation under skin tissue; it epilates with long duration and weakens the hair; it's ecological because it doesn't need battery and doesn't produce waste; it's precise because you can see clearly where you are epilating; and it's economic because you only need COLIBRY, and voilà - it's done.

How COLIBRY Works

This technique of hair removal is possible thanks to a durable thread which is rolled up on itself forming a small spiral: rendering hair uprooting possible because hair remains trapped following the hand movement.

Colibry is designed to save time and allows you to easily move around removing even the shortest hair on the skin.

COLIBRY is very simple, and very efficient

The passage is rapid. You won't believe how pleasant it is.

Who Tried It First?

"You designed it, so you try it!" - said everyone ever.

And so I let the designers test COLIBRY on themselves first, turns out, it worked wonderfully even on strong hair, and even for men.

 "I used to wax my legs when I was a football player. I remember so much pain. But Colibry is different: just a constant tickle on the skin. And then smoothness.."

"..obviously I epilated my entire body after this shot"

 What You Can Do With COLIBRY

COLIBRY is so manageable that you can use it on different occasions, starting from a self-application on the legs.

The hair on the arms won't be a problem anymore. Usually they are the weakest, and few epilation will be enough for preventing re-growth

COLIBRY will be distributed to beauty salons too, so there will be more threading epilation services in town. Let your beauty specialist know about Colibry: we are offering special deals for epilation services!

No matter the gender, color or pain tolerance.. COLIBRY takes off every kind of hair, from any kind of skin surface.  

 Which One Is for You?

Colibry can be produced into 2 different colors for the main structure, 4 color solutions for secondary components (as the metal ring and the tiny beads at thread extremities), and 6 amazing tonalities for threads. 

Choose the combination that best suits your skin, and text us the hashtag you prefer.

 

Aren't You Convinced Yet?

We collected reactions of Italian women who tried Colibry for the first time. Watch the COLIBRY Threading Experience to see their reactions!

Obviously you can buy COLIBRY here. Check out the pledges and pick one now!

Team

COLIBRY is the innovative concept I have developed with my own hands, with the help and support of my husband, the energy and love of my children, and technical consultancy of enthusiastic design studios. Thanks to my family and the designers & engineers of Civico 13 and Repstar, COLIBRY is now alive, and you are the only chance to let it fly.

Above all, "burning" the skin is quite far from the idea of natural beauty.That's why COLIBRY is committed to threading epilation, because the ancient tradition is still the best option that we have to remove body hair efficiently. In modern times, all efforts to make an efficient tool for threading are not enough. We've tried them all, but they didn't work as well as we expected.COLIBRY Features COLIBRY is a whole new concept: it's delicate on the skin without irritation, actually stimulating micro-circulation under skin tissue; it epilates with long duration and weakens the hair; it's ecological because it doesn't need battery and doesn't produce waste; it's precise because you can see clearly where you are epilating; and it's economic because you only need COLIBRY, and voilà - it's done.How COLIBRY WorksThis technique of hair removal is possible thanks to a durable thread which is rolled up on itself forming a small spiral: rendering hair uprooting possible because hair remains trapped following the hand movement.Colibry is designed to save time and allows you to easily move around removing even the shortest hair on the skin.COLIBRY is very simple, and very efficientThe passage is rapid. You won't believe how pleasant it is.Who Tried It First?"You designed it, so you try it!" - said everyone ever.And so I let the designers test COLIBRY on themselves first, turns out, it worked wonderfully even on strong hair, and even for men. "I used to wax my legs when I was a football player. I remember so much pain. But Colibry is different: just a constant tickle on the skin. And then smoothness..""..obviously I epilated my entire body after this shot" What You Can Do With COLIBRYCOLIBRY is so manageable that you can use it on different occasions, starting from a self-application on the legs.The hair on the arms won't be a problem anymore. Usually they are the weakest, and few epilation will be enough for preventing re-growthCOLIBRY will be distributed to beauty salons too, so there will be more threading epilation services in town. Let your beauty specialist know about Colibry: we are offering special deals for epilation services!No matter the gender, color or pain tolerance.. COLIBRY takes off every kind of hair, from any kind of skin surface.   Which One Is for You?Colibry can be produced into 2 different colors for the main structure, 4 color solutions for secondary components (as the metal ring and the tiny beads at thread extremities), and 6 amazing tonalities for threads. Choose the combination that best suits your skin, and text us the hashtag you prefer.  Aren't You Convinced Yet?We collected reactions of Italian women who tried Colibry for the first time. Watch the COLIBRY Threading Experience to see their reactions!Obviously you can buy COLIBRY here. Check out the pledges and pick one now!TeamCOLIBRY is the innovative concept I have developed with my own hands, with the help and support of my husband, the energy and love of my children, and technical consultancy of enthusiastic design studios. Thanks to my family and the designers & engineers of Civico 13 and Repstar, COLIBRY is now alive, and you are the only chance to let it fly.

story:
How is it possible that we are still constantly taking our leather gloves off to do something as simple as texting a friend? Enter Maestrale Napoli, the ultimate men's leather glove that has the functionality of your finger, the quality of a luxury leather good, the comfort of a soft cashmere blanket and the style of a damn good looking accessory.

 

 

FUNCTIONALITY

Born from years of R&D, our leather undergoes a treatment that allows it to work seamlessly with any smartphone or touchscreen.

As opposed to other gloves out there that only have one touchscreen enabled spot on your index finger, Maestrale gloves have Patented full palm touchscreen ability. You heard that right, our proprietary technology makes the entire palm of the hand conductive.

Our technology is tried and tested, Maestrale’s touchscreen functionality is certified to last years by the Italian Leather Research Institute (See Appendix).

 

QUALITY

Our gloves are handmade in Naples, Italy by expert artisans in their bottega using skills passed on from one generation to the next. Each glove we produce has decades of experience, tradition and history behind it.

We searched high and low for the highest quality raw materials. Our leather is sustainably sourced and goes through a stringent selection process to ensure evenness in color and texture.

The mastery of trade and excessive attention to detail are what differentiates an ordinary glove from a Maestrale Glove.

 

COMFORT

Things can look great and work great, but that wouldn’t matter much if they didn’t feel great.

We started by breaking it down, analyzing every element that goes into the construction of glove from the stitching to the lining. We tested numerous prototypes in varieties of shapes, materials, and trimmings.

 

 

DESIGN

Italian design and premium materials, because these things matters. Enough with ugly touchscreen gloves that feel and look cheap.

Each Maestrale glove is produced in Naples, the historic capital of menswear in Italy. Centuries of tradition have formed artisans that have the talent and eye to bring first class sartorial creations to life.

The same craftsmen that make your Maestrale gloves produce leather goods for some of the top European luxury brands.

 

 

PRICE

Fair prices. We manage our supply chain from sourcing through production to delivery.

Procuring our own materials and working directly with craftsmen allows us to cut the middleman and offer you a product for about ⅓ of its retail market price. From the bottega to your doorstep.

 

Maestrale gloves come in 2 different leather types and 4 different colors so you can mix and match based on your style and preference. 

  • Classic Touchscreen Nappa Leather in Notte Black with a light grey cashmere lining and leather border

 

  • Classic Touchscreen Nappa Leather in Espresso Brown with a dark green cashmere lining and leather border

 

  • Classic Touchscreen Nappa Leather in Foresta Green with a dark brown cashmere lining and leather border 

  • Classic Touchscreen Nappa Leather in Mare Blue with an ivory cashmere lining and leather border

 

Taking It To The Next Level

Drumroll please, we’d like to introduce the Touchscreen Deerskin Leather Glove. Reserved for ultra luxury leather goods, deerskin is considered one of the softest and most durable materials on the market. It is harder to source and more difficult to treat but after multiple stages of prototyping we are proud to offer you this Maestrale Masterpiece. Holding true to our business model, you can expect unbeatable price for quality.

  • Classic Touchscreen Deerskin Leather in Notte Black with a light grey cashmere lining and leather border

 

How to Select Your Size

Our head artisan Antonio would love to personally meet you and take your measurements, hopefully one day! In the meantime, we have put together this Sizing Guide to make sure that you get the size right. 

 

 

Let’s make Maestrale a reality and ordinary gloves a thing of the past.

Grazie e Ciao!

 

 

Customer Feedback

The Origin of the Name: Maestrale Napoli 

Our gloves are made in Naples, Italy.

This is a drone image we captured when shooting our video. You can see how the city is overlooking a big gulf (the gulf of Naples) where a strong wind regularly blows. This wind is called Maestrale (Mistral in English) and this is where the inspiration for our gloves came from.  We were in Naples one winter when the idea came to mind. The Mistral was blowing strong and we were constantly removing our gloves as we texted our friends about the weekend plan. We thought to ourselves, there has to be a better way. That is how Maestrale was created. 

 

 

Italian Leather Research Institute: Long-lasting Touchscreen Performance Certification

story:
In our last Kickstarter, we commissioned a study revealing that over 500 women say dress shirts typically have incorrect fit, wrinkles and gaping buttons. Lastly, most dress shirts are uncomfortable. Driven by LEZÉ the Label's core principle for comfort, the world's first recycled coffee dress shirts was created. Using 100% sustainable and vegan materials, we've crated the best fitted dress shirt brought by extensive research on different body types. 


 



IF YOU'RE DRINKING COFFEE, WHY NOT WEAR IT?  

Every year, 2.25 billion cups of coffee is enjoyed by the world annually. Instead of ending the cycle of utility, we are taking the benefits from the roasted coffee grounds into our shirts. When coffee beans are roasted, they experience expansion, which activates its natural moisture-wicking & odor-fighting properties.
 

 

The oil from used ground coffee is extracted at a micro-level to create this patented S Cafe® technology. Next, it is infused during the production of our yarn to maintain its coffee benefits, without its original colors or scent.   

Our vegan-friendly recycled coffee yarn and bamboo rayon are knitted into a single jersey using a single needle weft machine. The entire process takes place at Blue Sign and Global Recycle Standard certified facilities.

 

We are proud to partner with a women-owned and operated manufacturer based in Taiwan, who proudly compensates employees with 15% higher pay than industry standard.

 

 

 

Our anti-gaping button technology starts with strategically placed buttons over the bust for maximum coverage, supplemented with added fabric width to prevent stretching around the armpit. The buttons are further reinforced by hidden magnets that automatically clasps your shirt closed during sudden movements.

 

 

Gone are the days where a simple movement will create permanent creases on your shirt for the rest of the day. Our wrinkle-resistant article ensures this shirt will never see the existence of an iron.  

 

 

 

 

Life is stressful. Face high-intensity situations with the certainty knowing your armpits will be sweat stain-free. Our innovative technology wicks away sweat for 200% faster drying process than cotton. At the same time, our fabric's coffee pores absorb odors that pass through, allowing you to stay fresh for longer.  

 

 

 

Experience the versatility of our knit fabric in a 4-way stretch. Its flexible construction adapts to your body's natural movements, so you are comfortable no matter what you're doing.
 

 

 

 

To complete your hunt for dress shirts, we have three styles with anti-wrinkle, moisture-wicking, and no-gaping technology. Whatever function or event that you're dressing up for, we have a shirt for you.

 
Our Slim Fit dress shirt showcases a minimalist style with a mandarin collar and rounded cuffs. Pleats are strategically placed in the back only to maintain a clean look. The hidden placket further conceals our magnetic no-gape technology to ensure your blouse stays closed at all times.  


 

 

Our Classic Fit consists of a traditional collar with infusion for the perfect amount of stiffness in its structure. Two buttons adorn the cuffs to allow for flexibility in wrist comfort. Similar to the Slim, pleats line the back so the front is sleek and modern, while the chest is enclosed with our magnetic no-gape technology.  
 

 

 

Our Boyfriend Fit sports a relaxed fit, while still maintaining an appealing silhouette. The statement 7" cuffs add a French twist. A singular pocket dresses the front chest, while the lining adopts a hi-low fashion and a layered slit for ease of tucking in the shirt. Instead of our magnetic no-gape technology, the bust has a precise amount of space to prevent buttons from gaping.  


 



                                                       

 We highly recommend that you measure yourself to find the right size, and avoid referencing off other brands, as sizing can be subjective. Our sizes are True to Fit.  


 

 


Feeling daunted in the workplace is a feeling that we can all relate to, and entrepreneurs Tanya and Karen were no different. Before starting LEZÉ the Label, the pair leveraged their wardrobe to combat self-doubt - but found that most workwear were neither versatile or comfortable.   

With a fond affinity for loungewear, the two became inspired to create functional and fashionable workwear beyond one purpose. After successfully raising $320,000 CAD in their first Kickstarter, the pair continues to strive towards create clothing that embody all types of activities and environments experienced by today's modern working women.

story:
As you may know i recently set up my own business Planetzero. I doing really well but at the moment the business is growing quicker than me!! 

Im looking for people to help contribute really get going. If you choose to lend me a hand I will be able to lay real foundations and take the business to a new level.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

 just because you can’t contribute, but that doesn’t mean you can’t help:

Im looking for anyone who wants to help out with my website, designers, designers and any other creatives!! 

please drop me a line and join me!!

http://www.planetzero.bigcartel.com

story:
Please note: For all reward options, shipping is FREE for US addresses. International orders please add $7 or $15 depending on your support level.

We will ask for your color preference and shipping address at the end of the campaign! Check out our website to see all the shades to choose from! www.SidebarEyewear.com 

EVERY CONTRIBUTOR will receive Sidebar shades. Even if we do not meet our $9,600 funding goal.

 

Hey Indiegogo!

My name is Justin Sohn and I’m here to launch Sidebar Eyewear.

As a college student, I have always loved and needed sunglasses. One morning, I woke up to my Oakleys chewed up on the floor next to my bed, thanks to my puppy Melo. Immediately I went out and started looking for my next pair. The only options available were cheap $10 knockoffs that don’t protect your eyes or crazy expensive designer brands.

So why are sunglasses so expensive? A few large powerhouses have been running a monopoly and inflating prices since the 1980s. The worlds largest eyewear company, Luxottica, owns almost every brand or store you can think of related to sunglasses such as, Rayban, Oakley, LensCrafters, and Sunglass Hut. They also control all aspects of manufacturing, including design, pricing, and distribution. This results in extremely inflated prices for sunglasses.

THE IDEA WITH SIDEBAR

I wanted stylish and durable shades that I could wear anywhere without having to worry about breaking or scratching them. I have always wanted sunglasses for places like the beach, parties, skating, surfing, or just chilling by the pool and enjoying life; and that is what I am now offering to you. I also wanted shades that I wouldn't get bored of. Shades and colors that I could customize to rep sports teams or just switch up the vibe when I wanted to.

My goal with Sidebar is to offer the highest quality, polarized, and fully customizable sunglasses at an extremely affordable price. AKA, offer you guys awesome sunglasses that I, myself, am proud to wear.

 -Justin

SIDEBAR PREMIER LINE

The premier line will be Sidebar's first production run ever and that is why we're offering it on Indiegogo.

Over the past two years, we have progressed through multiple product design stages, created 3D electronic renditions, built prototypes, sourced samples, refined the design again, completed product durability tests and overall perfected the product.

Sidebar's premier line allows you to be unique every single day. Whether you want to rep your school, your sports team, match any color of clothing possible, or just switch up your style.

MATERIALS AND CONSTRUCTION

We've done our best sourcing and testing of the highest quality materials available. As project backers, I believe you have the right to know exactly how your sunglasses are made.

SnapBar Hinges

The premier line has a SnapBar hinge system that allows you to take apart the sunglasses in a matter of seconds. With SnapBar hinges you can custom build your own shades whenever you want, where ever you want, by interchanging the parts between glasses.


Polarized Polycarbonate Lenses

The lenses are polarized polycarbonate and have UV filters which block 100% of UVA and UVB ultraviolet rays up to 400 nanometers.

We chose polycarbonate because it is an extremely light weight and strong material. This material is also commonly used to make bullet proof glass, crash helmets, and riot shields. It protects your eyes much better than the often used acrylic or CR-39 lenses.

The Frames

The frames are made of a TR90 memory polymer that is extremely flexible and durable. It can be put under enormous pressure and flex and still return back to its original shape, completely unphased.

You can bend it and twist it in any which way without having to worry about stress marks or cracks. We even ran over the frames with a 4,000 pound truck and it held up like champs!

The flexibiltiy combined with the lightweight frame really allows Sidebars to shape nicely and fit comfortably to your face.

COLOR OPTIONS

If you opted for custom Sidebars, check out the 'Build Your Own' sunglasses cuztomizer page of our website at:

www.SidebarEyewear.com/products/custom.

Here's what it looks like!

THE COLLECTION

 


 

 

 

PERKS & REWARDS

As a reward for your support, we're going to send you the first Sidebars ever made!

FREE SHIPPING anywhere within the United States! For international shipping, please add $7 or $15 depending on your level of support.

At the end of the Indiegogo campaign, you will receive a survey so you can specify which colors you would like.

Pictures of all the color options are shown below!

$25 Perk: One pair of Sidebars (any color) + microfiber pouch

$34 Perk: Custom build you own pair of Sidebars + microfiber pouch

$50 Perk: Two pairs of Sidebars (any colors) + microfiber pouches

$65 Perk: Custom build two pairs of Sidebars + microfiber pouches

$80 Perk: Four pairs of Sidebars (any colors) + microfiber pouches

$195 Perk: Ten pairs of Sidebars (any colors) + microfiber pouches

$375 Perk: Twenty pairs of Sidebars (The full collection!) + microfiber pouches

$1000 Perk: Forty pairs of Sidebars + microfiber pouches + lifetime 20% discount!

 

HELP SPREAD THE WORD!

Please help let people know about this project.  Repost, retweet, re-whatever is possible. Indiegogo makes it easy with their handy share tools listed at the top of the page.

Our direct Indiegogo link is www.igg.me/at/SidebarEyewear


Thank you so much for your support, and checking out our campaign!

www.SidebarEyewear.com/products/custom.
Here's what it looks like!

THE COLLECTION
 
 
 

 

PERKS & REWARDS
As a reward for your support, we're going to send you the first Sidebars ever made!FREE SHIPPING anywhere within the United States! For international shipping, please add $7 or $15 depending on your level of support.

At the end of the Indiegogo campaign, you will receive a survey so you can specify which colors you would like.
Pictures of all the color options are shown below!

$25 Perk: One pair of Sidebars (any color) + microfiber pouch
$34 Perk: Custom build you own pair of Sidebars + microfiber pouch
$50 Perk: Two pairs of Sidebars (any colors) + microfiber pouches
$65 Perk: Custom build two pairs of Sidebars + microfiber pouches
$80 Perk: Four pairs of Sidebars (any colors) + microfiber pouches
$195 Perk: Ten pairs of Sidebars (any colors) + microfiber pouches
$375 Perk: Twenty pairs of Sidebars (The full collection!) + microfiber pouches
$1000 Perk: Forty pairs of Sidebars + microfiber pouches + lifetime 20% discount!
 

HELP SPREAD THE WORD!
Please help let people know about this project.  Repost, retweet, re-whatever is possible. Indiegogo makes it easy with their handy share tools listed at the top of the page.
Our direct Indiegogo link is www.igg.me/at/SidebarEyewear
Thank you so much for your support, and checking out our campaign!

story:
About veer nyc

veer nyc started as a personal need. We had no place to go where clothing was curated with attention to androgynous style for women, and with the understanding that can only come from fitting the description yourself. 

Over the past year, veer nyc, has evolved from a need, to a concept, and now onto a business. Both Jenny and Allie have a history in different aspects of the fashion industry. Allie is a photographer and works for a high fashion, multi-brand photo studio. Jenny manages the marketing/advertising division of a large, commercial photo and video production company specializing in fashion and entertainment. Simply put, we look at fashion season after season. Personally, our interests and needs for andro-accessible clothing will help give depth and understanding to the collections we intend to curate.  

What We Need & What You Get

veer nyc is about to curate our very first collection! To do this we need to purchase a full inventory of apparel and accessories for AW 13 to sell exclusively online [at first]. We've spent the last few months meeting with designers and brands from all over our country and the world. We've individually selected pieces from men's, women's, and unisex collections that will fit your style, and your body. 

Every penny you donate will go towards curating an impeccable first collection that will be on sale later this year. In order to make sure we have everything ready, our selections must be placed and paid for within the next few weeks. So, we are on a serious deadline.

So far, veer nyc has been 100% self-funded. Jenny and Allie believe so much in this business and this need that we are ready and willing to continue to self-fund as much as we possibly can. We are only asking for what we need right now, and every little bit can be used. 

The more we get, the more you get.

We have spent a lot of time trying to determine what we could give back to you for your support! What we've come up with is a series of coveted personal artwork (some which has been published ONLY for our supporters), gift cards (think of it as pre-buying your new wardrobe!), PIZZA PARTIES, styling sessions, and more. The truth is that we could never give back enough though.

Beyond veer nyc

veer nyc will help you curate your own wardrobe, but it also is an important step for our culture. Gender presentation is not so black and white. It's easier for many to think the solution is offering "menswear" for women, but in reality, we need to get back to just offering clothing; clothing free of men's or women's intentions. 

Fashion is one of the most common forms of self-expression. It is an art in itself and every one of us is a walking masterpiece. 

"…it occurred to me looking around at all of your things and your work and going through years of work in my mind, that of all your work, you are still your most beautiful. The most beautiful work of all." - Patti Smith

For every one of us that begins to break the mold, we will become that much closer to opening the world's eyes to a new understanding of gender and physical expression. Join us in making a difference both personally and culturally.

Other Ways You Can Help

Help does not just come in the form of money! Spread the word, tell your friends, connect.

story:
Say Goodbye to All Dull Outfits

Looking for that unique final touch to your outfit? Or simply feeling too lazy/woke up too late to spend hours pulling together that perfect look? Worry no more! 

  • 2-in-1 wearable on BOTH sides - 2 styles for the cost of 1

  • Feel like changing your outfit up in the middle of the day? Simply flip it over and you've got a brand new look!
  • Takes 2 seconds to put on - wake up too late? no sweat.
  • Stylish touch to casual OR formal wear - spice up any outfit
  • Just the right amount of unique - eye-catching, but not outlandish - easily transition from t-shirt every day to fashionista on the way!
  • A new dimension of accessories to diversify your every outfit - choose from our ever-increasing selection of funky fabrics: photo print, metallic, felt, & more

  • Solid color or photo print - matching your outfit couldn't be easier
  • Beautiful photo prints - your uniqueness guaranteed 

• Story Behind Our Prints - Reflections Theory:

All prints are original and made from photos taken on the Yale campus during the designer's last semester there as a student. Yale was where Loop Theory and all the memories surrounding it were first created. This collection's surrealist designs entail both metaphysical and metaphorical reflections of an illusive Yale based in reality but perceived only through memory in the realm of mind.

So what is Loop Theory then?

Loop Theory is a clothing line, a concept, a way of perceiving, a way to exist. The original double-sided detachable collar is part of our clothing line that includes a wide range of exquisite photo print garments.

It all started one day when a physics and psychology double major at Yale decided to hold her own fashion show inspired by the nature of space and time...

• The Birth of the Line:

In spring 2012, while Elliy passionately pursued her studies in physics and psychology at Yale University, she held her first solo fashion show, a series of collections inspired by philosophical musing of the universe and the mind. Since she graduated from Yale in 2012, Elliy has devoted herself to pursuing the dream of becoming both a fashion designer and theoretical physicist. "Loop Theory", a conceptually inspired clothing line, launched officially in 2013 with the ultimate goal of inspiring the belief that there is no reason why anyone should only live their life the way others may believe they should or can.

• The Theory Philosophy:

“Loop Theory” is an abstract theory of everything thought up by Elliy. It supposes that reality is defined only by the limits of imagination and exists circularly from a convoluted causal relationship between objective existence and subjective perception. Loop Theory embodies the idea of a conceptual clothing line with an added dimension of conceptual complexity and diversity beyond visual aesthetics, inspiring others to think and perceive differently by showing that fashion can indeed challenge the limits of the mind just as much as anything else.

Help Further Inspire, Help Support Female Innovators!

It's been almost a year since Loop Theory first launched, and we want to use this opportunity to further inspire by expanding our line and giving back in a particular way. We need your help to bring our line and our inspiration to more corners of the world and the vast universe!

Where will your contribution in funding go?

  • Design and production of Solid Color Double-Sided Collars - available as a perk at a lower price than our original photo print/metallic detachable collars!
  • Production of collars in more sizes for both women and men
  • Design and development of more photo print and collar shape designs
  • Further support to female innovators in all different areas (below)

How many female theoretical physicists are there in the world? Not very many? How about fashion designer physicists? Even fewer? But why?!

Half of our population is female, and therefore half of the world's creative and innovative potential lies in the minds of girls and women. But so much of this potential is untapped due to limiting beliefs in different cultures and societies. Empowering girls and women around the world not only gives them the chance to believe in themselves and be who they truly are on a personal level but also drives advancement in different areas with twice the number of brilliant minds and ideas.

In addition to helping us expand Loop Theory's line, a portion of your contribution will be further donated to causes that support female innovators around the world, from education to entrepreneurship, in developed and developing countries.

Introducing... Our One of a Kind Collars!

Now offering limited time exclusive deals with FREE INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING, limited edition designs, and even the change to work with us to create your own CUSTOM collar! 

Introducing... LIMITED EDITION Print Collars!

Don't miss out on this exclusive Indiegogo offer: Work with the designer to create your very own CUSTOM detachable collar!

Perks: Exclusive Limited Time Offers

  • Delivery for ready-made is available IMMEDIATELY - as soon as you place your order! FREE STANDARD INTERNATIONAL SHIPPING or express international shipping at extra cost.
  • Manufacture and delivery for custom orders available within 4 weeks of your order!
  • We print our own fabric - our prints are all completely original, made from original photographs you won't find anywhere else. 
  • Digitally printed in high detail with high quality environmentally friendly ink.
  • Our collars are each handmade with extra care one by one. We insist on making a small quantity at a time, carefully controlling the quality of each collar.

story:
DIESEL MOTORCYCLES FOR THE WORLD!   

Support MotorEarth's® efforts to provide an ultra-efficient, multi-fuel diesel to the world.


HOW IT ALL STARTED

Years ago, at a biodiesel meeting in Boulder, CO, Tom Judd and Aaron Scott first met. Tom, engineer, machinist, mechanic amongst other things, and Aaron, business owner and environmentally conscious 'gearhead,' decided to build a diesel motorcycle so that they could benefit from the high efficiency and fuel economy of a diesel engine, and also be able to run alternative, sustainable, locally made fuels in the bike. This union spawned the creation of MotorEarth®. The idea was to build a diesel bike that, up to now, has not been available here in the U.S.

It was obvious early on that manufacturing a completely new bike was cost prohibitive, so they decided to convert an existing gas powered bike to diesel and provide these machines to those who have wanted a simple, rugged, 130+mpg motorcycle able to run on a variety of fuels.


THE BIKE


The bike is a multi-fuel, diesel powered motorcycle converted from a vintage Royal Enfield motorcycle. The original gas engine is swapped out with a brand new, single cylinder diesel engine, giving the rider a fuel economy between 130 and 150mpg and designed to run on a variety of alternative and traditional fuels, including biodiesel, diesel, SVO/WVO (Straight Vegetable Oil/Waste Vegetable Oil, with proper conversion for utilizing vegetable oils) .

In an age of ever increasing complexity and electronic controls in the machines we depend on, this bike is a throw-back to times when the average person could service and repair their own transportation with only a few tools and the willingness to get a little dirty. Its design and mechanics are elegantly simple, rugged, affordable, now fuel flexible and ultra-efficient.

Fill it up on whatever fuel is available, ride it down the block, or take it on the open road.  Any way you choose it, this bike will get you to where you want to go, efficiently, reliably, and with a stylishly unique character.


130+ MPG!! – The efficient 456cc 13HP single cylinder diesel engines that power these give you fuel-sipping 130+ miles per gallon!!  Ultra simple in function and dead reliable in operation , this power plant is designed for long life and low maintenance.


Multi Fuel - The unique design of a diesel engine (compression ignition engine) is that it is able to run on a variety of different fuels, including environmentally friendly, sustainable, carbon neutral fuels such as biodiesel and vegetable oil.


Simple, Reliable - These motorcycles (Royal Enfields) are known for their simplicity. They are rugged, field tested, easy to maintain and repair.


Serviceable - When the time comes for maintenance to keep your bike in tip top shape, they are extremely easy to service and repair. 90% of the parts that make up these motorcycles are very affordable, stock Royal Enfield parts which are readily available here in the US and elsewhere around the world. The motor we have chosen to use in the design of these is one of the most prolifically produced, single cylinder engines in the world. Parts are also very affordable and available from a variety of vendors here in the U.S. and around the world.


WHY WE NEED YOUR SUPPORT

The goal of this Indiegogo campaign is for you to have the opportunity to support a product built by the “little guys.” We are two environmentally-conscious motorcycle enthusiasts, trying to bring something to the market that the major manufacturers just have not provided. We are doing our part to bring alternatives to those like us, wishing to cease our dependence on imported, unsustainable and environmentally destructive fossil fuels.

With the funds raised in this campaign, we will purchase the remaining parts needed to finish the eleven (11) uncompleted chassis we currently have here in Denver. The parts we need include: engines, transmission and drive line parts, body parts and paint, rims and tires, and the specialty conversion parts. After these are taken care of, we would ultimately like to purchase more conversion chassis' and the corresponding parts needed to complete the bikes. If there is room for it in the funding, we will put research into moving full production to India and making a completely new, high-efficiency, light, diesel motorcycle for the world market. We also plan to adapt these to a Power Take Off unit (PTO) in order to power generators and water pumps for remote power for those in need, especially in 3rd world countries that do not have power in remote areas.

By providing your support, we will be able to get these bikes into production quickly, and you will be directly involved in the process of bringing this diesel motorcycle to life. More than just helping us achieve this goal, you'll lay claim to being among a select group of supporters to own one of the FIRST commercially available diesel powered motorcycle in the U.S., and be able to take advantage of this one time only Indiegogo pricing on these conversions. You have the chance to be the first to experience the empowerment that comes with running alternative fuels and the incredible mileage that this bike offers firsthand. And you'll be able to say that you helped make it a reality!


PERK DETAILS:

Small Logo Sticker - MotorEarth® Logo toolbox/fridge sticker 



Bumper Sticker - High-quality vinyl long MotorEarth® logo bumper sticker



T-shirt  - 100% cotton, Black t-shirt with MotorEarth® logo print


Kickstand plate - Rugged plate for your kickstand with the MotorEarth® Logo.


Travel Royal Enfield Tool Roll -   Carry this tool roll on your bike. Perfect for roadside fix-it situations. 

Includes Metric wrenches: 7-19mm, 24, 27,  30, and 32mm double ended wrenches, Also includes your choice of British Standard or SAE wrenches. Feeler gauge, rubber fuel line, Spark plug wrench, emery cloth/sand paper, 8mm hex wrench, Long flathead screwdriver, Phillips and flat head screwdriver, Needle nose pliers, Valve stem remover, pliers, electrical tape, small hammer, valve stem remover/spoke tightener, and set of tire irons. These are tool rolls made for Royal Enfields, but are stocked with all-around roadside fix-it tools.

NOW ON TO THE BIKE PERKS!


Classic Silver Diesel:

 

This is the bike you see in the pictures and video. It has been run and used for testing with ~50 miles on it, to break it in, film it, and work out kinks. It has been fully restored from the frame up.

Specs:  418cc, 10hp electric Start diesel engine. Rebuilt 4 speed transmission with sealed bearing kit installed. Power-coated frame, black.  Front disc brake. Glow plug. electronic fuel shut off solenoid, Renthal grips. Custom/oversize tank. Chemical resistant fuel lines for long lasting usage with all types of fuels.


The Sentinel:

This is the other bike you see in the video. The Sentinel is a rugged, tough as nails diesel bike built to be used on road or off.

Specs: 456cc, 13hp electric Start (and kick start) diesel engine. Rebuilt 4-speed transmission with sealed bearing kit installed. Powder-coated frame, black. Powder-coated parts including: Fork tubes, headset, foot pegs, kickstand, brake pedal, primary covers inner/outer, front disc brake. Dual Glow plugs. gearbox with sealed bearing kit, front DISC brake,  Renthal handle bars. Renthal grips. Black Leather solo seat (Dual seat available), Bridgestone Trail Wing dual sport tires. Custom/oversize tank. Chemical resistant fuel lines for long lasting usage with all types of fuel.


Classic Diesel-

The perfect bike for those who like the classic looks.  Standard features include: 13hp electric start diesel engine, front Disc brake, switched electric fuel shut-off.

Specs: 456cc, 13hp engine, electric start, dual glow plug set up, rebuilt 4-speed gearbox with sealed bearing kit, front DISC brake,  electronic fuel shut off solenoid. Custom/oversize tank. Chemical resistant fuel lines for long lasting usage with all types of fuel.


“The TAG©”- CVT Automatic Diesel :

This perk is the opportunity to get our special model, an Automatic CVT diesel motorcycle. This bike is great around town, for commutes, and on the road. Eliminates the need to shift gears, letting you carry that "six pack"....of soda.... with your otherwise occupied shifting hand. 

Specs: 456cc, 13hp electric start Diesel engine. CVT automatic transmission. Powder-coated frame- black. Front disc brake. Dual Glow plug. Custom/oversize tank. Chemical resistant fuel lines for long lasting usage with all types of fuel.


Additional Bike Details:

These bikes are all converted to diesel from vintage Royal Enfield 'Bullet' motorcycles. The bikes are completely taken down to the frame, and most parts replaced with brand new parts. They are newly painted, assembled with a NEW diesel engine, rebuilt 4-speed transmission, new hardware, new tires, tubes, brakes, electrical, etc. They come with free and clear titles and can be immediately registered and plated in your state.  Please click here for more information on the detailed restoration process on our web site.  Below is a highlight of some additional unique features of these diesel motorcycles.

Engine:  456cc, 13hp single cylinder air-cooled diesel engine. These units are replications of one of the most solid single-cylinder engine designs by Yanmar diesel, made in China. We the engines we chose are by a manufacturer called Winsun, which has the highest quality and standards we’ve seen from any manufacturer of these small power plants. Their engines include SKF main bearings, Bosch injector, quality seals, balanced rotating and reciprocating assembly and QC that surpasses most other manufacturers of these kinds of engines. 


Gearbox - The original 4-speed Enfield gearboxes were designed to use a mix of heavy grease and oil as lubrication. We modify these boxes and fully seal them (replacing non-sealed bearings with quality Japanese sealed bearings, new O-rings and other seals/parts). Every gearbox is completely taken apart and checked for part quality, proper tolerances, parts replaced as-needed, then they are fully re-sealed to use standard synthetic gear oils.

OR

Automatic CVT - This custom designed unit transforms this Diesel into an automatic transmission motorcycle. No need to use a clutch and shift gears, just twist and go.  The CVT  eliminates the need of the traditional Royal Enfield 4-speed gearbox and clutch, which even at its best can take some getting used to.

Use of the CVT transmission requires moving the rear brake pedal to the right side of the bike, which most riders in this country are used to.  Aside from no longer needing to shift gears, the advantage of a CTV is that it optimizes the diesel engine’s power band to provide effective gear ratios across the entire range of engine operation.


Glow Plug - Each chassis has been wired for a glow plug for assistance in cold starting. The thumb operated momentary switch is conveniently located on the handle bar control.


Electronic Fuel shut off.- convenient handlebar mounted kill switch shuts down the engine. 


DISC Brake-  A powerful disc brake can be added as an upgrade for improved stopping power (most of these chassis came with drum brakes, still made today).


THE FINAL WORD-

The bottom line with this project is to provide an ultra high mileage motorcycle that provides an alternative to the petroleum energy source (gasoline or petroleum diesel) fuel that just isn't widely used at the moment. We wanted to provide people the ability to transport themselves efficiently, economically, and in an environmentally friendly way by using carbon neutral vegetable oils or biodiesel.

In an all-encompassing sense, we're looking at being able to produce these economically enough to provide them both here in the U.S. and to other countries that need economical transportation and that can run on a variety of fuels that may be available at any given time (palm oil, rapeseed oil waste vegetable oil, among other vegetable-based oils, with the proper addaptions needed for diesel engines) and to provide a transportable powerplant that can adapt to a PTO (power-take-off), running a generator, water pumps, manufacturing equipment, etc., all from this one machine.


WE WILL GET IT DONE-

Tom Judd has been a designer, engineer and machinist since 1981, working on a variety of projects during his career.

Aaron Scott has been sourcing and manufacturing in India and here in the U.S. for over 10 years, and has provided clients the world-over with affordable, well made, products.

Together we have manufactured a range of items, from biodiesel processing equipment to motorcycle and automotive parts to textiles, and most everything in between. We have decades of combined experience in all aspects of manufacturing and supply, both domestically and abroad. We know how to  work efficiently with suppliers in the U.S. and numerous foreign manufacturing countries. In short, we have the experience, the know-how, and can get things done.

    RISKS AND CHALLENGES :

    These bikes are not just an idea, or sitting on a drawing board somewhere. These are a reality. We here at MotorEarth® will make every effort to stay on schedule and deliver the product to our supporters as soon as possible. We currently have eleven motorcycles that are in modified-chassis stage…, meaning the frames have been modified and welded, ready for diesel adaption. Once we secure funding, we will be able to finish the assembly of these. All of these bikes are located here in our shop in Denver, Colorado. We have already test run the prototype bike for many miles, and are confident in its operation, longevity, and safety. At this point, we just need the final financial push to be able to complete the remaining motorcycles and launch our business, which is where you, our supporters, come in.

    You will never find a more resourceful, determined, and dedicated team. We have overcome every obstacle thrown at us so far (and there have been quite a few in this venture!) and are supremely confident that we will continue to overcome any challenge that arises to get these bikes to you as soon as possible. Finally, if there are problems or delays during the production process, it is our policy to communicate this information and keep our customers in the loop.


    Other Ways You Can Help

    If you are unable to contribute with your wallet, you can still help!  We ask you for support in helping spread the word. Share this Indiegogo campaign with anyone you think would be interested, including: friends, family,  blogs, special interest forums, and any other party you feel may have an interest in a Diesel Motorcycle. Indiegogo has some very convenient share tools right here on the site to make it east to help spread the word and help us make this happen!!

original gas engine is swapped out with a brand new, single cylinder diesel engine,
giving the rider a fuel economy between 130 and 150mpg and designed to run on a
variety of alternative and traditional fuels, including biodiesel, diesel,
SVO/WVO (Straight Vegetable Oil/Waste Vegetable Oil, with proper conversion for utilizing vegetable oils) .


In an age of ever increasing complexity
and electronic controls in the machines we depend on, this bike is a throw-back
to times when the average person could service and repair their own
transportation with only a few tools and the willingness to get a little dirty.
Its design and mechanics are elegantly simple, rugged, affordable, now fuel
flexible and ultra-efficient. 
Fill it up on whatever fuel is
available, ride it down the block, or take it on the open road.  Any way
you choose it, this bike will get you to where you want to go, efficiently,
reliably, and with a stylishly unique character.

130+ MPG!! – The efficient 456cc 13HP single
cylinder diesel engines that power these give you fuel-sipping
130+ miles per gallon!!  Ultra simple in function and dead reliable in operation , this power
plant is designed for long life and low maintenance. 
Multi Fuel - The unique design of a diesel engine (compression
ignition engine) is that it is able to run on a variety of different fuels,
including environmentally friendly, sustainable, carbon neutral fuels such as
biodiesel and vegetable oil. 


Simple, Reliable - These motorcycles (Royal Enfields) are known for their
simplicity. They are rugged, field tested, easy to maintain and repair. 
Serviceable - When the time comes for maintenance to keep your bike
in tip top shape, they are extremely easy to service and repair. 90% of the
parts that make up these motorcycles are very affordable, stock Royal Enfield
parts which are readily available here in the US and elsewhere around the world.
The motor we have chosen to use in the design of these is one of the most
prolifically produced, single cylinder engines in the world. Parts are also very
affordable and available from a variety of vendors here in the U.S. and around
the world.

WHY WE NEED
YOUR SUPPORT



The goal of this Indiegogo campaign is for you to
have the opportunity to support a product built by the “little guys.” We are two environmentally-conscious motorcycle enthusiasts, trying to bring something to the market that the major manufacturers just have not provided. We are doing our part to bring alternatives to those like us, wishing to cease our dependence on imported, unsustainable and environmentally destructive fossil fuels.
With the funds raised in this campaign, we will purchase the remaining parts needed to finish the eleven (11) uncompleted chassis we currently have here in Denver. The parts we need include: engines, transmission and drive line parts, body parts and paint, rims and tires, and the specialty conversion parts. After these are taken care of, we would ultimately like to purchase more conversion chassis' and the corresponding parts needed to complete the bikes. If there is room for it in the funding, we will put research into moving full production to India and making a completely new, high-efficiency, light, diesel motorcycle for the world market. We also plan to adapt these to a Power Take Off unit (PTO) in order to power generators and water pumps for remote power for those in need, especially in 3rd world countries that do not have power in remote areas. 
By providing your support, we will be able to get
these bikes into production quickly, and you will be directly involved in the process of
bringing this diesel motorcycle to life. More than just helping us achieve this goal, you'll lay
claim to being among a select group of supporters to own one of the FIRST commercially
available diesel powered motorcycle in the U.S., and be able to take advantage
of this one time only Indiegogo pricing on these conversions. You have the
chance to be the first to experience the empowerment that comes with running
alternative fuels and the incredible mileage that this bike offers firsthand. And
you'll be able to say that you helped make it a reality!





PERK DETAILS:

Small Logo Sticker - MotorEarth® Logo toolbox/fridge sticker  



Bumper Sticker - High-quality vinyl long MotorEarth® logo bumper sticker
T-shirt  - 100% cotton, Black t-shirt with MotorEarth® logo print
Kickstand plate - Rugged plate for your kickstand with the MotorEarth® Logo.



Travel Royal Enfield Tool Roll -   Carry this tool roll on your bike. Perfect for roadside fix-it situations.   
Includes Metric wrenches: 7-19mm, 24, 27,  30, and 32mm double ended wrenches, Also includes your choice of British Standard or SAE wrenches. Feeler gauge, rubber fuel line, Spark plug wrench, emery cloth/sand paper, 8mm hex wrench, Long flathead screwdriver, Phillips and flat head screwdriver, Needle nose pliers, Valve stem remover, pliers, electrical tape, small hammer, valve stem remover/spoke tightener, and set of tire irons. These are tool rolls made for Royal Enfields, but are stocked with all-around roadside fix-it tools.
NOW ON TO THE BIKE PERKS!
Classic Silver
Diesel:

 
This is the bike you see in the pictures and video. It has been run
 and used for testing with ~50 miles on it, to break it in, film it, and
 work out kinks. It has been fully restored from the frame up. 

Specs:  418cc, 10hp electric Start diesel engine. Rebuilt 4 speed transmission 
with sealed bearing kit installed. Power-coated frame, black.  Front disc
 brake. Glow plug. electronic fuel shut
off solenoid, Renthal grips. Custom/oversize tank. Chemical
resistant fuel lines for long lasting usage with all types of fuels.


The Sentinel:


This is the other bike you see in the video. The Sentinel is a rugged, tough as nails diesel bike built to be used on road or off. 
Specs: 456cc, 13hp electric Start (and kick start) diesel engine. 
Rebuilt 4-speed transmission 
with sealed bearing kit installed. Powder-coated frame, black. 
Powder-coated parts including: Fork tubes, headset, foot pegs, 
kickstand, brake pedal, primary covers inner/outer, front disc
 brake. Dual Glow plugs. gearbox with sealed bearing kit,
front DISC brake,  Renthal handle bars. Renthal grips. Black Leather 
solo seat (Dual seat available), Bridgestone Trail Wing dual sport tires. Custom/oversize 
tank. Chemical
resistant fuel lines for long lasting usage with all types of fuel.

Classic Diesel- 

The perfect bike for those who like the classic looks.  Standard features include: 13hp electric start diesel engine, front Disc brake, switched electric fuel shut-off. 




Specs: 456cc, 13hp engine, electric
start, dual glow plug set up, rebuilt 4-speed gearbox with sealed bearing kit,
front DISC brake,  electronic fuel shut
off solenoid. Custom/oversize tank. Chemical
resistant fuel lines for long lasting usage with all types of fuel.
“The TAG©”- CVT
Automatic Diesel :
This perk is the opportunity to get
our special model, an Automatic CVT diesel motorcycle. This bike is great
around town, for commutes, and on the road. Eliminates the need to shift gears,
letting you carry that "six pack"....of soda.... with your otherwise occupied shifting hand. 

Specs: 456cc, 13hp electric start Diesel engine. CVT automatic transmission.
Powder-coated frame- black. Front disc brake. Dual Glow plug. Custom/oversize tank. Chemical
resistant fuel lines for long lasting usage with all types of fuel.Additional Bike Details:
These bikes are all converted to
diesel from vintage Royal Enfield 'Bullet' motorcycles. The bikes are
completely taken down to the frame, and most parts replaced with brand new
parts. They are newly painted, assembled with a NEW diesel engine, rebuilt 4-speed transmission, new hardware, new tires, tubes, brakes, electrical, etc.
They come with free and clear titles and can be immediately registered and
plated in your state.  Please click here for more
information on the detailed restoration process on our web site.  Below is
a highlight of some additional unique features of these diesel motorcycles.
Engine:  456cc, 13hp single cylinder air-cooled
diesel engine. These units are replications of one of the most solid
single-cylinder engine designs by Yanmar diesel, made in China. We the engines
we chose are by a manufacturer called Winsun, which has the highest quality and
standards we’ve seen from any manufacturer of these small power plants. Their
engines include SKF main bearings, Bosch injector, quality seals, balanced rotating and
reciprocating assembly and QC that surpasses most other manufacturers of these
kinds of engines.  




Gearbox
- The original 4-speed Enfield gearboxes were
designed to use a mix of heavy grease and oil as lubrication. We modify these
boxes and fully seal them (replacing non-sealed bearings with quality Japanese sealed
bearings, new O-rings and other seals/parts). Every gearbox is completely taken
apart and checked for part quality, proper tolerances, parts replaced
as-needed, then they are fully re-sealed to use standard synthetic gear oils. 

OR
Automatic CVT - This custom designed unit transforms this
Diesel into an automatic transmission motorcycle. No need to use a clutch and shift
gears, just twist and go.  The CVT  eliminates the need of the traditional Royal
Enfield 4-speed gearbox and clutch, which even at its best can take some
getting used to.
Use of the CVT transmission requires moving the rear brake pedal to the
right side of the bike, which most riders in this country are used to.  Aside from no longer needing to shift gears, the
advantage of a CTV is that it optimizes the diesel engine’s power band to
provide effective gear ratios across the entire range of engine operation. 


Glow
Plug - Each
chassis has been wired for a glow plug for assistance in cold starting.
The thumb operated momentary switch is conveniently located on the handle bar control. 


Electronic Fuel shut off.- convenient
handlebar mounted kill switch shuts down the engine. 


DISC Brake-  A powerful disc brake can be added as an upgrade
for improved stopping power (most of these chassis came with drum brakes, still
made today). 


THE FINAL WORD-The bottom line with this project is to provide an ultra high mileage motorcycle that provides an alternative to the petroleum energy source (gasoline or petroleum diesel) fuel that just isn't widely used at the moment. We wanted to provide people the ability to transport themselves efficiently, economically, and in an environmentally friendly way by using carbon neutral vegetable oils or biodiesel. In an all-encompassing sense, we're looking at being able to produce these economically enough to provide them both here in the U.S. and to other countries that need economical transportation and that can run on a variety of fuels that may be available at any given time (palm oil, rapeseed oil waste vegetable oil, among other vegetable-based oils, with the proper addaptions needed for diesel engines) and to provide a transportable powerplant that can adapt to a PTO (power-take-off), running a generator, water pumps, manufacturing equipment, etc., all from this one machine. WE WILL GET IT DONE-Tom Judd has been a designer, engineer and machinist since 1981, working on a variety of projects during his career.Aaron Scott has been sourcing and manufacturing in India and here in the U.S. for over 10 years, and has provided clients the world-over with affordable, well made, products. Together we have manufactured a range of items, from biodiesel processing equipment to motorcycle and automotive parts to textiles, and most everything in between. We have decades of combined experience in all aspects of manufacturing and supply, both domestically and abroad. We know how to  work efficiently with suppliers in the U.S. and numerous foreign manufacturing countries. In short, we have the experience, the know-how, and can get things done. 
 
RISKS AND CHALLENGES :
These
bikes are not just an idea, or sitting on a drawing board somewhere. These are a reality. We here at MotorEarth® will make every effort to
stay on schedule and deliver the product to our supporters as soon as possible.
We currently have eleven motorcycles that are in modified-chassis stage…, meaning the
frames have been modified and welded, ready for diesel adaption. Once we secure funding, we will be able to finish the assembly of these. All of these bikes are located here in our shop in Denver, Colorado. We have already test run the prototype
bike for many miles, and are confident in its operation, longevity, and safety.
At this point, we just need the final financial push to be able to complete the
remaining motorcycles and launch our business, which is where you, our supporters, come in. 
You will never find a more resourceful,
determined, and dedicated team. We have overcome every obstacle thrown at us so
far (and there have been quite a few in this venture!) and are supremely confident that we will
continue to overcome any challenge that arises to get these bikes to you as
soon as possible. Finally, if there are problems or delays during the
production process, it is our policy to communicate this information and keep our customers in the loop.

Other Ways You Can HelpIf you are unable to contribute with
your wallet, you can still help!  We ask
you for support in helping spread the word. Share this Indiegogo campaign with
anyone you think would be interested, including: friends, family,  blogs, special interest forums, and any other party you
feel may have an interest in a Diesel Motorcycle. Indiegogo has some very
convenient share tools right here on the site to make it east to help spread
the word and help us make this happen!!

story:
I am a World Citizen

I have worked in international health for over 10 years; traveling the world to address issues of women’s health and reproductive rights. In my frequent business travels, I often found myself frustrated with my work wardrobe-- everything in black or suitable for safari.  I needed a cute dress that would keep me modest and professional in Mali. A perfect blouse to take me from a New York summer to a South African winter. I needed clothes that were wrinkle-resistant EVERYWHERE I went. I needed MORE, from my professional travel wardrobe. And so did most of my friends and colleagues who travel for work! 

My travel experiences and personal encounters with extraordinary women around the world motivated me to design and create an innovative line of clothing for the business traveler, Nomadic World Apparel Inc. (NWA Inc.).  

Nomadic World Apparel strives to find the perfect balance of style and practicality in all that we do. Elegant yet comfortable, our clothing, and accessories take you from business lounge to boardroom, effortlessly. 

What We Need & What You Get

For my debut, Nomadic World Apparel proudly introduces our  2014 Collection, Le Décollage, meaning “the takeoff” in French. The theme of this incredibly versatile collection is World Citizen at Work, as it features pieces that make it easy for business travelers to pull together a complete professional wardrobe. There are 10 pieces in the collection, all wrinkle-resistant, of course, that can be mixed and matched to achieve different looks.

I aim to mobilize $19,000 to get my first bulk production run to market! 
Contributors to the campaign will receive pieces of their choice from the 2014 collection , will have their choice of exclusive Nomadic World Apparel travel accessories and an invitation to an exciting trunk show of the collection in Atlanta, Austin, New York, Portland or Washington D.C. Select showings will also be held in a few international locations to be announced.

    Risks & Challenges

    All fabric and trims have already been secured and are ready for production, thus timing for rewards is reasonably solid. In the event that there is a an issue  during production that would cause a delay,  all contributors will be notified immediately. 

    I am available by email to answer any questions.

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Become a Nomadic World Citizen

    Like our FB Page- https://www.facebook.com/NomadicWorldApparel?ref=hl

    Follow us on Twitter - https://twitter.com/NomadicWorldAp

    Follow our Pintrest Page - http://www.pinterest.com/buttababy8/traveling-in-style-wardrobe-and-travel-advice-for-/

story:
MNPHARM needs $42,000 to complete our testing and begin production. After meeting this goal, we have additional stretch goals laid out that will help us get this process completed even sooner.



Process | Impact | Mission | Facilities | Team | News | FAQ


MNPHARM will produce proteins for vaccines and antibodies that are personalized and can be produced as much as 30 times faster than current methods. Our methods can be used to fight maladies like cancer and infectious diseases.

The technology MNPHARM intends to utilize is proven to work and, in all likelihood, will be how most vaccines and antibodies are made in the future.


Below are a few examples of this technology being used today:

  • The treatment used to treat the two U.S. citizens that were suffering from Ebola last fall, ZMAPP, was made using tobacco plants at Kentucky BioProcessing, LLC.
  • Medicago Inc., a Canadian company, recently won a 2012 DARPA Blue Angel Challenge by producing 10,000,000 flu vaccines in just one month using tobacco plants. 
  • A personalized cancer vaccine clinical trial was recently featured on the Dallas Hope documentary series.

MNPHARM's forward-thinking approach to cancer treatment and desire to make personalized cancer treatments will lead the way to faster and lower cost treatments, making our methods more accessible to everyone. 


For some people, cancer is a condition that comes and goes. It is believed that if managed successfully, certain cancers can be kept from coming back after initial treatment. Many devastating medical conditions from the past are now conditions that are managed with the right medical treatment. 

If successful, the impact will be immense. Personalized and faster treatment will allow for better targeting of many medical conditions. 

Our impact doesn't stop there. For more benefits, see our FAQ.


MNPHARM was formed to advance plant based medicine.  We have combined advances in three key areas of technology to address public health challenges: 

  • Indoor Agriculture

  • Biochemistry


  • Medical Treatment


Indoor Agriculture

Below is an example of the patented grow equipment we use. It uses 75% less energy than other indoor growing systems and 95% less water than traditional outdoor agriculture. 

Biochemistry

In recent years, the process for creating proteins for vaccines and antibodies in transgenic plants is experiencing rapid advancement. Our goal is to normalize personalized cancer treatment.

Medical Treatment

Our methods of using transgenic plants to produce proteins and antibodies can be completed in 6 days, while traditional methods take up to 6 months. In many medical conditions, speed is life.



Risks & Challenges

Our biggest risk is also our biggest challenge. Acceptance of this new technology and approval of our process. In our favor is the fact that much of the technology that we are using has gained acceptance individually. 

We will be combining several technologies to achieve our goals. We are using proven indoor agriculture technology, proven biochemistry, and proven medicinal treatments. 

Working with us, are the right research scientists and consultants to assist our team to ensure that we have a full range of in-house expertise. We are partnering with various labs needed to facilitate certain activity. Outsourcing some of our process in the beginning will speed our progress. 

The Future of Bio-Pharmaceuticals

The pharmaceutical drug market is changing. Bio medicine is growing by 5% a year. By 2020, this market will be a $1 trillion market and 52% of this market will come from biologics.


Below is a drawing of what our first grow facility will look like when it is built out. By combining this 6,000 square feet space with our patented growing system, MNPHARM will be able to produce as much output as a typical grow facility 10 times its size. Not to mention, this facility will use 75% less energy than typical indoor growing methods and 95% less water than traditional farming methods.


The founders

Below is a photo of Dave Roeser left and Jeff Reinert right, co-founders of MNPHARM, standing next to their orbital growing equipment.

Dave and Jeff have 55 combined years of business experience. Both have extensive backgrounds in indoor agriculture, manufacturing, and distribution.


We get by with a little help from our friends

A dedicated team of eight students from the University of Minnesota - Carlson School of Management reached out to us about possibly running a crowd funding campaign to champion our cause. We said yes and we are sure happy we did! A special thanks for all of their help! 


KSTP- http://kstp.com/news/stories/s3788474.shtml

Minnesota Daily- http://www.mndaily.com/news/metro-state/2015/05...

LillieNews- http://www.bulletin-news.com/articles/2015/03/18/maplewood-company-prepares-cultivate-tobacco-based-vaccines

Pioneer Press- http://www.twincities.com/health/ci_27337773/cultivating-medicine

Quad Community- http://www.presspubs.com/quad/news/article_c74bc598-abc0-11e4-a779-6fe415974055.html

Duluth News Tribune - http://www.duluthnewstribune.com/news/health/3658240-hydroponic-gardener-raise-plants-produce-valuable-medicines


So why tobacco?
Tobacco is a highly transgenic plant. There are several plant species that are transgenic, such as lettuce, rice and potatoes. Tobacco grows quickly and grows taller than wide. This makes it perfect for our orbiting garden growing system. Because we are using the entire leafy green plant, we can produce larger quantities faster than other plants. Think tobacco leaf vs. a grain of rice.
The plant can produce vaccines  and other medicines that can be dried and mixed in with food products, liquid to be ingested, injected or vaporized or processed into pill form. Delivery of the medicine will depend on the patient and where the treatment will be best applied.

Where is the money you receive from this campaign going?

I'm glad you asked. Below, we've listed out our expenses for the coming months:


Are you a non-profit organization?
No, not exactly. MNPHARM, SBC is one of the first Public Benefit Corporations in Minnesota. We are a "C" corporation for tax reporting and a Specific Benefit Corporation (SBC) for annual reporting to the Secretary of State. Our stated SOCIAL goals are "baked" into our Articles of Incorporation, so there will always be a social benefit as a corporate goal of equal importance to making a profit.

What other benefits could this treatment-creation process have?

The benefits of this process are endless. We can theoretically tackle everything from the flu vaccine to research with rare diseases. In fact, we have partnered with the University of Minnesota's Office for Technology Commercialization in hopes of allowing world-class researchers the opportunity to test their hypothesis faster and cheaper using our process.


Is this the same as immunotherapy?
Not quite. What we are doing is a variation of immunotherapy. The field of immunotherapy is extremely promising for treating cancer, using your own body's defenses to battle cancer cells. This method of treatment has been featured in the media recently, specifically the 60 Minutes segment discussing the possibility of polio treating brain cancer.

I have some more questions, who do I contact?
Feel free to contact MNPHARM's founders Dave (DRoeser@MNPHARM.com) and Jeff (JReinert@MNPHARM.com) via email.

Other Ways You Can Help

Every little bit helps! If you can't contribute at this time, help us spread the word by sharing our Indiegogo link on your Facebook and Twitter accounts. Share our video and use Indiegogo share tools to make our goal of personalized cancer treatments a reality.


References

Good general Information video- http://youtu.be/waUfFVv7aKA

Cancer- http://www.medscape.com/viewarticle/551998

Cost- http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC307...

Speed of Production-http://med.stanford.edu/news/all-news/2008/07/plants-can-be-factories-making-vaccine-to-treat-cancer.html


Campaign Disclaimer

This video is intended for informational purposes only. The narrator is not a medical professional, and no part of this presentation is intended as medical advice. The author and publisher of this video assume no responsibility for any medical decisions based on any part of this video. Viewers are referred to qualified medical professional for all diagnoses, treatments, and medical advice. IF YOU BELIEVE YOU HAVE A MEDICAL EMERGENCY, YOU SHOULD IMMEDIATELY CALL 911 OR YOUR PHYSICIAN. If you believe you have any other health problem, or if you have any questions regarding your health or a medical condition, you should promptly consult your physician or other healthcare provider. Never disregard medical or professional advice, or delay seeking it, because of something you read on this site or a linked website. Never rely on information on this website in place of seeking professional medical advice. You should also ask your physician or other healthcare provider to assist you in interpreting any information in this Site or in the linked websites, or in applying the information to your individual case.
