I'm glad you asked. Below, we've listed out our expenses for the coming months:



Are you a non-profit organization?

No, not exactly. MNPHARM, SBC is one of the first Public Benefit Corporations in Minnesota. We are a "C" corporation for tax reporting and a Specific Benefit Corporation (SBC) for annual reporting to the Secretary of State. Our stated SOCIAL goals are "baked" into our Articles of Incorporation, so there will always be a social benefit as a corporate goal of equal importance to making a profit.


What other benefits could this treatment-creation process have?
The benefits of this process are endless. We can theoretically tackle everything from the flu vaccine to research with rare diseases. In fact, we have partnered with the University of Minnesota's Office for Technology Commercialization in hopes of allowing world-class researchers the opportunity to test their hypothesis faster and cheaper using our process.

Is this the same as immunotherapy?
Not quite. What we are doing is a variation of immunotherapy. The field of immunotherapy is extremely promising for treating cancer, using your own body's defenses to battle cancer cells. This method of treatment has been featured in the media recently, specifically the 60 Minutes segment discussing the possibility of polio treating brain cancer.

I have some more questions, who do I contact?
Feel free to contact MNPHARM's founders Dave (DRoeser@MNPHARM.com) and Jeff (JReinert@MNPHARM.com) via email.

Other Ways You Can Help
Every little bit helps! If you can't contribute at this time, help us spread the word by sharing our Indiegogo link on your Facebook and Twitter accounts. Share our video and use Indiegogo share tools to make our goal of personalized cancer treatments a reality.


References
Good general Information video- http://youtu.be/waUfFVv7aKA
Cancer- http://www.medscape.com/viewarticle/551998
Cost- http://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/pmc/articles/PMC307...
Speed of Production-http://med.stanford.edu/news/all-news/2008/07/plants-can-be-factories-making-vaccine-to-treat-cancer.html

Campaign Disclaimer

This video is intended for informational purposes only. The narrator is not a medical professional, and no part of this presentation is intended as medical advice. The author and publisher of this video assume no responsibility for any medical decisions based on any part of this video. Viewers are referred to qualified medical professional for all diagnoses, treatments, and medical advice. IF YOU BELIEVE YOU HAVE A MEDICAL EMERGENCY, YOU SHOULD IMMEDIATELY CALL 911 OR YOUR PHYSICIAN. If you believe you have any other health problem, or if you have any questions regarding your health or a medical condition, you should promptly consult your physician or other healthcare provider. Never disregard medical or professional advice, or delay seeking it, because of something you read on this site or a linked website. Never rely on information on this website in place of seeking professional medical advice. You should also ask your physician or other healthcare provider to assist you in interpreting any information in this Site or in the linked websites, or in applying the information to your individual case.

story:
Our Story

Gorilla Workshop is a growing collective of artists, illustrators and fashion designers intent on creating the freshest of fresh apparel. Run out of San Francisco but open to anyone with the right chops, we have heaps of fun scribbling and laughing and collaborating. Oh and selling gear too!


The Impact

By launching this project we hope to enable us as well as other artists and designers to promote their work and earn money too!


We are also promoting other local businesses. We are currently using several California businesses to work with us. Our screen printers and cut and sew teams are here in San Francisco and Oakland and our shirt manufacturer is in Los Angeles. Our project is moving forward, but with this campaign we hope to get things started even faster.


What We Need & What You Get

We are looking to raise $10,000 during this campaign. The funds are going to pay for the production of the "Gorilla Kick Off Set" - the first 6 designs. You can check them out below or on our website - www.gorillaworkshop.com

 

We plan on retailing our shirts from $25-30 each, but through this campaign you can get them for half that price!

 


If we don't raise the full amount this round we will still produce shirts and apparel. It will just take longer to get different styles and designs made.

 

Starter: $5+

Shout out on our site and social media networks

 

Titanium: $15+

Your choice of 1 of our first 6 shirts, listed sponsor on our website and Titanium level membership on our site

 

Silver: $25+

Your choice of 2 of our first 6 shirts, listed sponsor on our website and Silver level membership on our site

 

Gold: $50+

Your choice of 5 of our first 6 shirts (mix and match, get one of each or all 5 of the same design!), listed sponsor on our website and Gold level membership on our site


Platinum: $100+

Your choice of 12 of our first 6 shirts, listed sponsor on our website and Platinum level membership on our site


Diamond: $500+

Custom color ink! Your choice of 12 of our first 6 shirts printed in your choice of ink and shirt colors available. You will work with us on a few design mock-ups and pick the colors you like best. Listed sponsor on our website and Diamond level membership on our site


Designer!: $1000+

We will design you your very own shirt! You will work with us on a custom designed shirt for you and we will make you 10 shirts! You will also be a listed sponsor and Designer level membership on our site.

 

We haven't yet nailed down what the different membership levels receive but ideas are things like % off final sale, free shipping, promotional sales, and first choice on limited edition prints.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

Thanks for all your support and checking out our campaign. Any help is greatly appreciated. If you know of any artists, illustrators, graphic and fashion designers that would benefit from our site let them know about it. If you have friends or family members that would love our apparel shoot them a link to our campaign!

story:
LACEVAULT TO THE RESCUE

Hi, we are Fale and Leihana, the parents of five wonderful children, two of which have significant disabilities, Isaiah who has Down Syndrome coupled with a hearing impairment and Ariana who was born blind, is intellectually impaired with severe Autism.  Among their many every day struggles includes the inability of tying shoelaces.  

Our oldest son, Viliami, wondered what the solution could be to help them tie their laces, and so with his little brother and sister as his inspiration, he came up with a device that would tighten, neatly and simply lock away the Shoe Laces with a few twists. And so the LACEVAULT was born.

The LACEVAULT is not a product just for the disabled, but is a great tool for athletes, the elderly and every day laced up shoe wearers. Simply insert the aglet and turn, that is how simple it is to use.

That's not all, LACEVAULT also goes a step further to become not just a functional device but also the latest in shoe fashion accessories with the release of a great range of colors, and finishes to compliment any laced shoe, for any occasion, from the sports fields and courts to the dance floor or work place.  There is a LACEVAULT style for everyone and everywhere.

     

So what is Lacevault and how does it work?

Insert the aglet into the Lacevault and turn the dial for a perfect fit and to lock the loose lacing neatly away. To release, simply press the button and pull, that is how simple it is to use.

50% of all PROFITS DONATION

Through our own experiences of the struggles of raising two disabled children, we have connected and met with many families, and there are thousands of families like ours out there, who have similar struggles and positive desires for their families. However, one underlying need with so many of us, was the lack of opportunity to break away from the endless routines, medical, therapy and educational appointments, and the ongoing constant support of the family member in need. 

We all love our children and dedicate our lives to their care, however the chance to take a holiday, to rejuvenate, to reflect and to replenish the body, mind and soul, is almost an impossible dream to reach for many families.  Money is always needed for medical and educational tools and expenses which leaves little or none at all for quality family time, and a break from what can often become tense and stressful situations. Up to 70% of families with special needs individuals end up in divorce. Fathers and even mothers walk out on their family simply because they cannot get a break, a time out or take their family on a holiday.

Because of this great need being so evident among families who support special needs family members, with the sale of each LACEVAULT, we have committed to pledge 50% of our profit to a foundation that will fund families with time outs, holidays, and family centered recreational activities.  

We have invested time and significant capital to get as far as we have with the designs, and samples, but to go that one step further to commercially launch and fully manufacture and package the LACEVAULT we need your help.  

We know that our product is simply fantastic, it will help almost everyone and will also look amazing on every laced shoe, but we love the help we could offer families like ours with disabled family members with the sale of each pair. 

Win "Limited Edition" Lacevault +Shoes

To get us started and promote the campaign, here are some initial incentives:

  1. Get the $12 or $20 Perk, fill out the Order Form at www.lacevault.com and you could WIN a pair of "Limited Edition" Original Lacevault fitted onto a pair of "Air Jordans". 
  2. Get the $50 Perk, fill out the Order Form at www.lacevault.com and you could win a pair of GENUINE GOLD LACEVAULT ($500) fitted onto the latest pair of Lebron James, Air Jordan or or any shoe of your choice to the value of $300.
  3. Get $100 Perk, fill out the Order Form at www.lacevault.com and you could win a pair of SUPER DELUXE LACEVAULT ($1,000) on a pair of the latest Lebron James, Air Jordans or any shoe of your choice to the value of $300.

   

Win a pair for yourself or for your son or daughter. A Lacevault made out of Genuine GOLD fitted onto a pair of the most expensive basketball shoes. Order to win.

When you fill in the form, please include your shoe size and shoes you would like.

Spread the WORD and GET FREE Lacevaults:

  1. 100 of your friends Register at www.lacevault.com on your behalf. We will send you a "Limited Edition" Lacevault Original.
  2. 5 friends purchase a pair of Lacevault each, we will send you a "Limited Edition" Lacevault Pro. 10 friends buy, we'll send you 2. 
  3. 20 friends buy, you receive 4 "Limited Edition" Lacevaults and a bonus 2.5% lifetime discount.
  4. Also Like us on Facebook or Follow us on Twitter.  Share Lacevault and our commitment pledge with 50 friends and we'll send you a "Limited Edition Original Lacevault. 

Keep posted for updates on the release of the final design, colors and finishes here on Indiegogo, on Twitter, Facebook and at www.lacevault.com 

Business Opportunity & Distribution:

If you are looking for a business opportunity through the distribution of the Lacevault, the 40% and 50% Lifetime Discounts Rates are also available prior to Launch, but only from www.lacevault.com as buyers will need to be pre-qualified before they are awarded with these enormous lifetime discount rates.

Contact us via email at sales.orders@lacevault.com

The Perks:

The perks are offered to:

  • Establish an innovative functional product that will simplify the lives of parents, children, sports people, the elderly, disabled  and all laced up shoe wearers.
  • Provide a Trendy, Fashionable, colorful and unique  Accessory for laced shoes. 
  • Develop, Manufacture and Deliver the best quality Lacevault to you, the consumers.
  • Establish the Isaiah and Ariana Charity Foundation through our 50% profits Donation that will perpetually help families get a break, time out or even a holiday.

So get involved, purchase one (1) or as many Lacevaults that you can and become a part of a campaign that is unique and very, very special. 

Specialty Perks:

  1. $200 for the First ever Lacevault "Original" to be made
  2. $50each for the First 2-50 Lacevault "Originals" made
  3. $300 for the First ever Lacevault "Pro" to be made
  4. $70each for the First 2-50 Lacevault "Pros" made
  5. $400 for the First ever Lacevault "Epic" to be made
  6. $90each for the First 2-50 Lacevault "Epics" made

These Lacevault will be the very first to be manufactured, each one of them will have the First 1-50 Authenticity Certificate signed by the inventor and his inspiration, Viliami & Isaiah. And these buyers will be the first to receive their Lacevault.

Please contact us via email: sales.orders@lacevault.com for all sales enquiries and to purchase these "Specialty Perks".  

Successful Demand:Retail Outlets are ready to buy and $50,000 is a good start, but we need more to achieve worldwide distribution. And so we are looking at achieving the following timeline:

  1. Sept - Oct: Raise the Needed Funds
  2. Nov - Dec: Moulds, samples, manufacture and Final Checks
  3. Dec - Jan 2014: Delivery of all pre orders
  4. Feb - 2014: Official launch of LACEVAULT for international sale and first few retail orders fulfilled

Even if we do not reach our goal here, the Lacevault is coming out to a store near you!

story: We are a clothing company, based in Jakarta, Indonesia who specializes in street wear. Anything from SnapBack Hats to T-shirts. We call our stuff, SwagWear :)
story_txt: We are a clothing company, based in Jakarta, Indonesia who specializes in street wear. Anything from SnapBack Hats to T-shirts. We call our stuff, SwagWear :)

story:
NOTE: Please read the frequently asked questions section below before contacting us. If you still have a question, don't hesitate to contact us.









How much do you spend each month to keep your sneakers looking fresh? With every new outfit, every color scheme, every change of venue, you're back at the sneaker store to touch up your look with those perfect kicks. Chalk it up to the cost of looking good, as you put more money into the pockets of sneaker manufacturers who get to dictate what you wear next.


Not anymore. Introducing ShiftWear.



ShiftWear Classics are the badass sneakers that let you display custom designs, right from your phone or tablet in seconds.




Built for the street

We know that shoes have to hold up to the elements. ShiftWear sneakers are waterproof, so you can machine-wash them. Their soles are coated with Kevlar Fibers, to resist the normal wear and tear of traditional sneakers. The flexible electronics in the shoes charge with every step you take - or wirelessly.




Full customization

ShiftWear shoes will be available in high, medium and low tops. Use our app to display HD-quality images right on the display areas of your sneakers. In addition to static designs and images, ShiftWear shoes can also display animations. However, if your design is static, the sneaker will consume no power and your design will stay that way till you change it.





A design community

The app you use to program new designs on your shoes is the same app that will connect you to a marketplace with the freshest designs from artists all over the world. Buy their designs right from the app, and they'll show up on your shoes in seconds. And unlike shopping for traditional shoes, you know that any custom design you pick out will fit just right.


Designers couldn't ask for a better outlet to showcase and sell their art. Why let a few big names decide your color schemes? ShiftWear lets people take their shoes back. Design your own pair. Take pictures, tag and share. Enter the marketplace and become a top seller.



Limited Edition M1 Classic

 



Stretch Goals

 

Note: If we don't hit the stretch goals here on indiegogo. We still have outside investors on board who will ensure we get ALL these advanced features into the final unit.


Who we are
We are a team of entrepreneurs, futurists and engineers who dream of disrupting the fashion and technology industries. We have great ideas and determined to push ahead on our goal to make these sneakers a reality. Everyone loves to look a certain way and we want to put this power back into your hands. We will do everything in our power to bring you the coolest sneakers ever! While we love to innovate and push the boundaries, we are really annoying perfectionists who will not sacrifice on quality.

What We Need & What You Get
We are determined to make these sneakers take off and be seen everywhere. But we still need a financial push to make the shoe a reality. Our goal at this stage is to finish our prototype and to move ShiftWear into mass production. We have all the key elements and teams ready to go for this project and just need the proper funding to make it all happen. We're hoping that with your help we can make animated, interactive shoes a reality.

You will own a sneaker unlike anything out now. Just think of the endless fun you can have customizing your shoes. Your name will be reserved on a first come first serve basis and you will be one of the only ones walking around in a sneaker this cool. You also will have helped launch a revolution in footwear.

The Impact
Your help would allow our small team to grow in size. Every single donation matters and will let us pay for all remaining development, testing, manufacturing, quality control, packaging and shipping expenses. The final product would be released sooner and with the highest quality. We also have a vision to bring a ShiftWear store in all the major cities so everyone can get a chance to check out our products. Without your contribution, we simply won't be able to continue with this project and the world will be stuck with the same boring sneakers out now.

Risks & Challenges
Selecting the right companies and factories to partner with is the biggest challenge for us right now because of inadequate funding. There are always ups and down in any venture and while delays can happen, we will update you with the progress. With your support, we will be able to work with the right people because our aim in the end is to deliver the highest quality and functionality possible.

Other Ways You Can Help
Help us raise awareness by sharing, liking or tweeting this campaign to your friends. Get 10% of your friends contribution amount credited to your purchase of a sneaker. You can also just refer as many friends as you can and if their contributions total $1,500, you get a free pair of L1 classic sneakers.
 
Note: You must be logged into Indiegogo when you share and you can also use the UNIQUE URL in the address bar of your browser to refer friends. We can then track everything and you can also track your referrals in your profile area.

Frequently Asked Questions

What about my size, color and quantity preference?
When the campaign ends, you will receive an e-mail to register at our website asking for specific information like colors, sizes and quantity. The foot size (not shoe size) we can currently build for will be in the range of 177mm to 330mm or 7 inches to 13 inches in length. Everything will be sorted out during the registration process including the amount you paid or overpaid. You will also be able to join the community and get to vote on everything from final designs and features to future products and ideas.

When can we expect these to be released?
We have set the ship date for Fall 2016.

How do I get more than one pair?
Just select your perk and add the additional amount as a custom amount. We will sort everything out during registration on our website once this indiegogo campaign ends.

How can all this be possible?
The technology and components have already existed for years now. It’s a matter of the different components working together in flexible form factors. The existing technologies suffer from certain issues and we are working to solve them. Our work is focused right now mostly on software tweaks and hardware performance. We are looking forward to unveiling our prototype in Q1 2016. We are knee-deep into development and are working out all of the kinks before we unveil this model. We want to be as transparent as possible, but at the same time we want to protect our proprietary information.

Will the sneakers be waterproof?
Yes! Completely waterproof and machine washable.

Will the soles wear out?
Depending on use, but the soles are coated with Kevlar Fibers. Kevlar is the same material they use to make bullet proof vests. They will be extremely durable but won’t be able to take a bullet.

How will the designs look on the sneaker outdoors?
It would have a natural paper like look to it and won’t glow like LED technology or lighted fabrics. The colors and designs can be viewed under direct sunlight just as you would see designs on normal sneakers. In darkness, you won't see anything again just like a normal sneaker. If you turn on the backlight, you can see designs in really dark lighting conditions.

How will the Mobile App work?
You can use the app (compatible with iOS, Android and Windows devices) to browse through designs others have created, select them, customize and display on your sneakers. You can create your own designs and share them with friends or sell them. It’s a design software, marketplace and social network all in one. You can have unlimited designs saved. You can sell designs you create and keep 70% of the revenue.

How does early design access work?
You back us with $75 and get to beta test the software before it launches. You get to post your art and designs for sale before the rest of the world. It's a one year license from when the app launches. The normal 1 year license will cost $99.

With every new outfit, every color scheme, every change of venue, you're back at the sneaker store to touch up your look with those perfect kicks. Chalk it up to the cost of looking good, as you put more money into the pockets of sneaker manufacturers who get to dictate what you wear next.Not anymore. Introducing ShiftWear.  ShiftWear Classics are the badass sneakers that let you display custom designs, right from your phone or tablet in seconds. Built for the streetWe know that shoes have to hold up to the elements. ShiftWear sneakers are waterproof, so you can machine-wash them. Their soles are coated with Kevlar Fibers, to resist the normal wear and tear of traditional sneakers. The flexible electronics in the shoes charge with every step you take - or wirelessly.  Full customizationShiftWear shoes will be available in high, medium and low tops. Use our app to display HD-quality images right on the display areas of your sneakers. In addition to static designs and images, ShiftWear shoes can also display animations. However, if your design is static, the sneaker will consume no power and your design will stay that way till you change it. A design communityThe app you use to program new designs on your shoes is the same app that will connect you to a marketplace with the freshest designs from artists all over the world. Buy their designs right from the app, and they'll show up on your shoes in seconds. And unlike shopping for traditional shoes, you know that any custom design you pick out will fit just right.Designers couldn't ask for a better outlet to showcase and sell their art. Why let a few big names decide your color schemes? ShiftWear lets people take their shoes back. Design your own pair. Take pictures, tag and share. Enter the marketplace and become a top seller. Limited Edition M1 Classic Stretch Goals Note: If we don't hit the stretch goals here on indiegogo. We still have outside investors on board who will ensure we get ALL these advanced features into the final unit. Who we areWe are a team of entrepreneurs, futurists and engineers who dream of disrupting the fashion and technology industries. We have great ideas and determined to push ahead on our goal to make these sneakers a reality. Everyone loves to look a certain way and we want to put this power back into your hands. We will do everything in our power to bring you the coolest sneakers ever! While we love to innovate and push the boundaries, we are really annoying perfectionists who will not sacrifice on quality. What We Need & What You GetWe are determined to make these sneakers take off and be seen everywhere. But we still need a financial push to make the shoe a reality. Our goal at this stage is to finish our prototype and to move ShiftWear into mass production. We have all the key elements and teams ready to go for this project and just need the proper funding to make it all happen. We're hoping that with your help we can make animated, interactive shoes a reality.You will own a sneaker unlike anything out now. Just think of the endless fun you can have customizing your shoes. Your name will be reserved on a first come first serve basis and you will be one of the only ones walking around in a sneaker this cool. You also will have helped launch a revolution in footwear. The ImpactYour help would allow our small team to grow in size. Every single donation matters and will let us pay for all remaining development, testing, manufacturing, quality control, packaging and shipping expenses. The final product would be released sooner and with the highest quality. We also have a vision to bring a ShiftWear store in all the major cities so everyone can get a chance to check out our products. Without your contribution, we simply won't be able to continue with this project and the world will be stuck with the same boring sneakers out now. Risks & Challenges Selecting the right companies and factories to partner with is the biggest challenge for us right now because of inadequate funding. There are always ups and down in any venture and while delays can happen, we will update you with the progress. With your support, we will be able to work with the right people because our aim in the end is to deliver the highest quality and functionality possible.Other Ways You Can HelpHelp us raise awareness by sharing, liking or tweeting this campaign to your friends. Get 10% of your friends contribution amount credited to your purchase of a sneaker. You can also just refer as many friends as you can and if their contributions total $1,500, you get a free pair of L1 classic sneakers. Note: You must be logged into Indiegogo when you share and you can also use the UNIQUE URL in the address bar of your browser to refer friends. We can then track everything and you can also track your referrals in your profile area.Frequently Asked QuestionsWhat about my size, color and quantity preference?When the campaign ends, you will receive an e-mail to register at our website asking for specific information like colors, sizes and quantity. The foot size (not shoe size) we can currently build for will be in the range of 177mm to 330mm or 7 inches to 13 inches in length. Everything will be sorted out during the registration process including the amount you paid or overpaid. You will also be able to join the community and get to vote on everything from final designs and features to future products and ideas.When can we expect these to be released?We have set the ship date for Fall 2016.How do I get more than one pair?Just select your perk and add the additional amount as a custom amount. We will sort everything out during registration on our website once this indiegogo campaign ends.How can all this be possible?The technology and components have already existed for years now. It’s a matter of the different components working together in flexible form factors. The existing technologies suffer from certain issues and we are working to solve them. Our work is focused right now mostly on software tweaks and hardware performance. We are looking forward to unveiling our prototype in Q1 2016. We are knee-deep into development and are working out all of the kinks before we unveil this model. We want to be as transparent as possible, but at the same time we want to protect our proprietary information.Will the sneakers be waterproof?Yes! Completely waterproof and machine washable. Will the soles wear out?Depending on use, but the soles are coated with Kevlar Fibers. Kevlar is the same material they use to make bullet proof vests. They will be extremely durable but won’t be able to take a bullet.How will the designs look on the sneaker outdoors?It would have a natural paper like look to it and won’t glow like LED technology or lighted fabrics. The colors and designs can be viewed under direct sunlight just as you would see designs on normal sneakers. In darkness, you won't see anything again just like a normal sneaker. If you turn on the backlight, you can see designs in really dark lighting conditions.How will the Mobile App work?You can use the app (compatible with iOS, Android and Windows devices) to browse through designs others have created, select them, customize and display on your sneakers. You can create your own designs and share them with friends or sell them. It’s a design software, marketplace and social network all in one. You can have unlimited designs saved. You can sell designs you create and keep 70% of the revenue. How does early design access work?You back us with $75 and get to beta test the software before it launches. You get to post your art and designs for sale before the rest of the world. It's a one year license from when the app launches. The normal 1 year license will cost $99.

story:
Short Summary

Jo Dunlop is a health and humanitarian aid worker based in Freetown, Sierra Leone who runs the style blog "Freetown Fashpack " in her spare time.  In July 2014, Jo had to take a break from blogging about "the important issue of fashion in Sierra Leone" to address the Ebola outbreak that was consuming a record number of lives as well as the attention of the international media.  In order to learn more about the impact of the crisis, Jo travelled to Kenema, named by the World Health Organization as one of the epicenters of the Ebola outbreak and interviewed nurses and family of victims.   Jo reported that a staff of 6 nurses cover a floor of patients that would normally require a staff of 65, nurses work 14 hour shifts often with no one to relieve them for breaks to eat or rest, surviving patients are left with nothing to wear since they must burn all clothing when leaving the ward and  seven staff members including the country's leading virologist have contracted Ebola and died while treating patients in Kenema.  After reading this report, US based, but Sierra Leone focused non-profits Mamawa, Inc and the Sierra Leone Watershed Project decided to team up with Jo and provide some assistance to the staff in Kenema.

What We Need

Jo is in direct contact with the nursing staff in Kenema and is remaining abreast of their evolving needs. The contributions you provide will go directly to the hospital staff for purchase of the following supplies which will empower them as they fight this deadly disease.  Here is what we will buy and deliver:

  • Admission packs for patients:  
  •         2  lapas per patient [Africana cloths worn around the waist], 
  •          1  towel
  •          1  bar of soap
  •          1   cup, 1 plate and 1 spoon  [for water and to strengthen hygiene]
  • Hospital needs:
  •       50 new mattresses
  • Bed sheets   
  •         50 sets including fitted and flat
  • Pillows   
  •          50 pillows with plastic covers
  • Plastic 'INCO' sheets: to cover hospital beds and prevent the transfer of fluids to the mattresses  
  • Clothes: 50 sets of clothes for patients on the ward who need frequent changes as Ebola causes vomiting and hemorrhaging. For survivors, all clothes are burned upon discharged and new clothes are needed.
  • Discharge:
  •      1 pack of powder chlorine to maintain hygiene 
  •      rice to eat as the patient has not been able to work and maintain a supply of     food
  •      the equivalent of $20 USD to replenish burned belongings   

The Impact

Kenema is still awaiting the arrival of international aid and resources. As major airlines discontinue service to Sierra Leone, this makes the delivery of essential items like test kits more difficult, and adds additional burden on an already fledgling health system:

  • The items listed were identified directly by the Nurses in Kenema as essential needs
  • Contributing quickly will provide relief for the people and the nurses while they wait for international aid that has been further delayed by discontinuation of transportation to and from Sierra Leone
  • Jo, the founder of Freetown Fashpack, will help facilitate the delivery of the items purchased and communicate with the Kenema hospital staff to ensure delivery

Risks & Challenges

Providing humanitarian aid to Sierra Leone from abroad is challenging even without the threat of one of the world's deadliest diseases and reduced transportation items as Kenema is quarantined from other parts of the country and Sierra Leone is quarantined from other parts of the world.  But here is why we can overcome these obstacles: 

  • We KNOW Sierra Leone.  We've grappled with the tough task of scouring the country for scarce resources and delivering them to remote areas of the country and we've delivered.  See: www.sierraleonewater.org
  • We are well connected within Sierra Leone and have the ability to identify key people on the ground to support our mission
  • Jo, the coordinator for this mission has over 10 years of international experience and has been working in Sierra Leone since 2011.  She is also well acquainted with the Kenema staff and is capable of ensuring that our help reaches them.

Other Ways You Can Help

Some people just can't contribute, but that doesn't mean they can't help:

  • If you simply can't afford to contribute please share this campaign far and wide so that others can learn about it
  • Share on social media: Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Blogs/Websites etc.

We KNOW Sierra Leone.  We've grappled with the tough task of scouring the country for scarce resources and delivering them to remote areas of the country and we've delivered.  See: www.sierraleonewater.org

story:
Visit us at:

www.JuntosProject.com


Top Questions

 How do I choose my sizes, colors, and styles?
At the end of the campaign we will send you a link to a page where you can chose your sizes, colors, and styles.   Sizes currently run up to 10 for women and 12 for men.

Do you ship internationally? If so, what is the cost?
Yes! Please add $15 to your order for international shipping.

What are Juntos Shoes?
Super light, pliable and form fitting canvas low top lace-ups inspired by the working class in Ecuador. Each pair sold results in an Education Backpack for at-risk students where the style originates.

Look Good. Do Good.

Ecuadorian Street Style Repurposed for the Common Good.

A super light weight and sharp looking shoe with an amazing story and purpose.

With every purchase made, an education backpack filled with crucial school supplies is donated to an at-risk student in the same neigborhoods where we take our inspiration.

The Shoe

El Zapato de Lona. The Ecuadorian street shoe. Like the flip-flop is to Rio, this simple canvas lace-up is to cities like Guayaquil, Ecuador.

Worn by the working class, day in, day out, they’re an iconic part of the landscape - part functional necessity, part social signifier.

Juntos embraces this heritage and brings it to you, refining and repurposing the design while preserving everything that makes the shoe, the shoe.

That’s why you’ll find a map of Ecuador on the inside of every pair, so you never forget where they came from.

It’s also why for every pair sold, we donate an education pack filled with crucial school supplies to a local child – a small way of giving back to the places where we find our inspiration.

To us, that’s the real meaning of an ethical footprint.

 

 

The Inspiration

 

 

The Juntos Shoe

The Purpose

Like the shoe, the purpose is perfectly simple.

For every Juntos pair sold, an education pack is given to an at-risk child in the source region.

So, because we discovered an amazing canvas street shoe in Guayaquil, Ecuador, a child in that city gets a backpack.

Filled with a year’s supply of pens, pencils, notepads and other basic but crucial educational tools so often taken for granted, this resource allows a child to participate more fully and effectively in school.

Look Good. Do Good.

The Story

Our vision is to create a community based brand that scours the untapped corners of the globe for hidden fashion discoveries, making them available to the style conscious & ethically conscientious customer.

Juntos Project has been in the works for over 2 years. It all started while visiting Ecuador and taking notice of the social signifying  Zapto de Lona, "The Canvas Shoe" that is found throughout the coast of Ecuador. Typically produced in mass and with low quality, the shoe is a social signifier for the working class. 

We set to work redesigning and manufacturing the traditional style at a higher quality and comfort level. The Juntos shoe is incredibly light and features special design features.

With prototypes of our new design ready, we introduced the Juntos Shoe from a food truck during Art Basel. We were invited by Soho Beach House to present our shoe to their members and received amazing feedback and the courage to continue. So far, people seem love our mission, love our shoes and have worn them around the world. Now we invite you to join us!

Thanks - The Juntos Team

 

The Lookbook

The Tote

 

Juntos Shoes are super light, pliable and form fitting. Now Available in the sizes below and shipping in September. Enjoy!


Women's Sizes:
5, 6, 6.5, 7, 7.5, 8, 9, 10

Men's Sizes:
7, 8, 9, 10, 10.5, 11, 12


FAQ:
How do I choose my sizes, colors, and styles?

At the end of the campaign we will send you a link to a page where you can chose your sizes, colors, and styles.

Do you ship internationally? If so, what is the cost?

Yes! Please add $15 to your order for international shipping.

story:
Hello, I'm Mark Robelli from Clinton Township, Michigan, USA.  My product is called the Shoe Buddy, patent pending and trademarked. I have worked real hard on it. The Shoe Buddy is a brand new product.  Can't remember where you put your shoes? Ever trip over your shoes on the floor?  Want a better, more convenient place for your shoes?  Have a bad back and don't like bending down to get your shoes?  Family shoes scattered all over the floor and is messy?  Need more floor space in your college dorm room, apartment or home?  If you answered yes to any of these questions, you could use a Shoe Buddy!!!  

The Shoe Buddy is a convenient space saving home for shoes that goes on doors and walls.  No hooks, No nails, No damage to walls or doors.  Easy to apply and easy to remove.  Great for homes, apartments, college dorm rooms and more.  Great for mudrooms, hallways and entryways. Great for garage walls when you take your shoes off before you enter the home.  Great for children and bedrooms.  Great for people with medical conditions and the elderly who have trouble bending down.  Will hold up to a mens size 12 shoe.  Need a better place for your workout shoes, running shoes or best pair of shoes, so you always know where they are, put them in your Shoe Buddy!!!  The Shoe Buddy logo is also removable, so you can customize it with your own school's logo, team or whatever you want to put on it!!! 

I need donations to buy the mold and materials to make the Shoe Buddy.  A good quality mold made of steel is expensive.  The Shoe Buddy is made here in Michigan, USA.    Not China.   I'm hoping to raise as much money as I can. Anyone who makes the $40 donation will get a brand new Shoe Buddy.  Colors will be Blue, Red, Purple, Pink, Green and Black. Please specify what color you would like. Free Shipping for the Continental USA.  If you live in Alaska, Hawaii or International, add $20 for shipping.  Anyone who makes a $70 donation will get 2 brand new Shoe Buddies, and anyone who makes a $95 donation will get 3 brand new Shoe Buddies.                                                         

Your donation allows me to raise the money I need to begin manufacturing and make the Shoe Buddy.  Please help support an American made product.

Thanks,

Mark

story:
Short Summary

Hello Everyone.  My name is Lindsey Drewes and I am the founder of Moving Mountains Jewelry.  A handmade jewelry company that specializes in beautiful minimalist silver soldered jewelry.  In the fall of 2015 I found myself driving to work one day thinking about my next career move and noticed I was simply “playing it safe.” I was no longer dreaming the way I had before.  Somewhere along the line I had lost the belief that I had developed as a child that with faith the size of a mustard seed could move mountains, and that there was no need to settle for less when God has so much in store for us.  It was then that the idea for Moving Mountains Jewelry came to life, a jewelry company whose everyday designs could be worn with any outfit and for any occasion that would serve as reminder of this truth that with a small amount of faith we can do tremendous things. But the vision didn’t stop there, once we are established the goal is to:

  1. Be a reminder to the wearer of the minimalist jewelry that with a small amount of faith you can do tremendous things
  2. Support other “Mountain Movers” by contributing 20% of the proceeds back to their cause.

What We Need & What You Get

In order to start our grassroots American made minimalistic jewelry company we are in need of additional equipment, inventory, and other business startup costs. We are dedicated to this dream and while our goal is lofty and we have prioritized the needs based on the immediate needs if the entire goal is not met.

We greatly appreciate any support you feel led to give and in exchange we will send you a fabulous handmade reward to be cherished for years to come.  From our fridge magnet  to the entire collection reward we have designed something for everyone.  Each piece is carefully meticulously handcrafted out of sterling silver, brass and basswood to create a piece that we believe you will love.

The Impact

Overall our goal with Moving Mountains Jewelry is twofold, first to serve as a reminder to the wearer of God’s promise to us that in times of great adversity, great joy, or one of life’s many changes that we are not alone and with a small amount of faith we can do tremendous things. Secondly our goal is that we will eventually be able to support others who are already moving mountains both globally and locally, shedding light on the tremendous work that is taking place. However, we need your help to make this dream become a reality and humbly ask that you will consider making a pledge towards our campaign

Risks & Challenges

We have carefully limited the amount of rewards available to reduce the risks.  Based on these limitations we have set on ourselves we have carefully calculated how many products we can produce prior to Christmas to ensure you and your loved ones will receive their Moving Mountains Jewelry products in December or prior to.

Other Ways You Can Help

We are dedicated to having Moving Mountains be a standout company in the jewelry industry and have large hopes and dreams for what our future holds.  Please feel free to follow us on Facebook and Instagram to stay up to date on things that are happening in the future.  We look forward to you coming with us on this journey.

Be a reminder to the wearer of the minimalist jewelry that with a small amount of faith you can do tremendous things
Support other “Mountain Movers” by contributing 20% of the proceeds back to their cause.
What We Need & What You GetIn order to start our grassroots American made minimalistic jewelry company we are in need of additional equipment, inventory, and other business startup costs. We are dedicated to this dream and while our goal is lofty and we have prioritized the needs based on the immediate needs if the entire goal is not met.We greatly appreciate any support you feel led to give and in exchange we will send you a fabulous handmade reward to be cherished for years to come.  From our fridge magnet  to the entire collection reward we have designed something for everyone.  Each piece is carefully meticulously handcrafted out of sterling silver, brass and basswood to create a piece that we believe you will love.The ImpactOverall our goal with Moving Mountains Jewelry is twofold, first to serve as a reminder to the wearer of God’s promise to us that in times of great adversity, great joy, or one of life’s many changes that we are not alone and with a small amount of faith we can do tremendous things. Secondly our goal is that we will eventually be able to support others who are already moving mountains both globally and locally, shedding light on the tremendous work that is taking place. However, we need your help to make this dream become a reality and humbly ask that you will consider making a pledge towards our campaignRisks & ChallengesWe have carefully limited the amount of rewards available to reduce the risks.  Based on these limitations we have set on ourselves we have carefully calculated how many products we can produce prior to Christmas to ensure you and your loved ones will receive their Moving Mountains Jewelry products in December or prior to.Other Ways You Can HelpWe are dedicated to having Moving Mountains be a standout company in the jewelry industry and have large hopes and dreams for what our future holds.  Please feel free to follow us on Facebook and Instagram to stay up to date on things that are happening in the future.  We look forward to you coming with us on this journey.

story:
Our Cause:

Your generous donations will assist with the start up cost of Undine Apparel, a family owned apparel and accessories business. Our goal is to use your donation to assist with the store first months’ rent, deposit, and utilities. If we exceed our goal, we will use the remaining proceeds to purchase a point of sales system that will help us with the day-to-day inventory control, shipping, and item purchasing.

Get to know the owners:

Undine Apparel is a family owned and operated business, stemming from the dream Eileen Byrd had to open her own women’s boutique. Eileen is now handing her business over to her daughters and its their vision is to expand on their mother’s dream, while incorporating their our own style and flare to reach a wider target market.

Meet Eileen, Mother, Grandmother, and sole proprietor of Byrd’s Paradise boutique previously located in Laramie, Wyoming and now open in Helena, Montana.  Eileen has had Byrd’s Paradise in operation for 7 years and has been sewing and providing alterations for more than 30 years.

Meet Monique, Monique is a dedicated daughter and mother and has been in the customer service industry for several years. Monique has her Associates Degree in Fashion Merchandising and has traveled the world and lived 2 years in Japan studying fashion and interior design. Monique is meticulously organized in every aspect of her life; she is constantly striving to create new fashion and business ideas that are innovative and exciting.

Meet Cori, Cori is a single mother and earned her Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing and currently working on her Master’s in Marketing Management. She is knowledgeable in trend spotting was a hired consultant, supplying companies with online advertising and marketing strategies.

Meet Simone. Simone is a loving sister and daughter. Simone has earned a Bachelor’s Degree in Marketing and over the past 5 years has built a flourishing career in marketing and advertisement.  Simone will be lending her expertise to the social media aspect and be our marketing consultant.  

What is Undine Apparel and Accessories?

Undine Apparel and Accessories is opening to bring affordable, unique, quality apparel to the Pocono, Pennsylvania area. Our goal is to support and showcase local artists and designers by selling their crafted jewelry along side our unique apparel. Undine Apparel will offer the unique experience of having an on-site tailor and personal shopping assistant, to ensure the best fit and experience for our costumers. 

How we got our name:

Undine is a park located in Laramie, WY the location of Eileen Byrd’s first store. We all were fortunate enough to live around this beautiful park and spent a great deal of time using it’s amenities.  Monique could frequently be found enjoy the swings to clear her mind. Cori enjoyed playing several sports such as soccer and baseball.   Eileen was on the board to save the park when the city was contemplating tearing it down to build an ice skating rink; She helped create a campaign called Arts in the Park, a weekend festival with the focus to rise money and awareness of Undine Park and it’s local artists. Undine has a special meaning to the Byrd family and we are proud to bring that important part of our lives across the country to the Poconos.

Any donation will help; your generosity is greatly appreciated.

 Gifts for your donation:

$1- 5 Good Karma!

$5- Personalized Thank You, post card

$50- Custom Canvas Bag with Logo

$75- Homemade Scented Candles

$125- Hand-made Infinity Scarf

$200- Personalized acknowledgement on our Social Media page, Infinity Scarf, & Custom Canvas Bag

 

Any larger donations will receive a goody bag with all the items listed above, as well as a specialty item/gift. J

story:
The Earlybirds are on the way to their new home...

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Blogposts about our compagnon camera bag

BlogTimes // http://blogtimes.info/compagnon-taschen-kann-man-nie-genug-haben/

Ben Hammer // http://www.benhammer.de/compagnon-die-etwas-andere-fotografentasche-crowdfunding-kampagne/

Dressed Like Machines // http://www.drlima.net/?s=Compagnon

Der Stilpirat // http://www.stilpirat.de/compagnon-meine-gefahrtin/

dpicture // http://www.dpicture.net/2013/11/compagnon-fototasche-ein-erfahrungsbericht/

andersgrafie // http://andersgrafie.de/compagnon-die-reise-beginnt

offenesauge // http://offenesauge.de/compagnon-bags/

A few facts about us

We are Vitalis and Valentin. We are cousins and companions. Since we were childs we spent a lot of time together - in sports, travelling and photographing.

A few years ago we were looking for a camera bag, but not the typical one, more a casual style camera bag. After a long search we were frustrated and started to think about our own camera bag. 

And today, a long way after these days we are here with our compagnon camera bag.

You are a photographer? You love nice looking and functional gear? You love natural tanned leather? 

You can help us to bring the compagnon story to the next level.

A few facts about the bag

The compagnon bag is designed and developed for your daily use. The outer material is buffalo leather that is vegetable tanned without further additions.

The compagnon bag has a fully customizable interior compartment for lenses, flashes and all the gear you use. 

Our leather has that "pull-up" effect, that gives the compagnon bag a patina effect over time, which tells your story of your compagnon bag. 

The bag is intended for the following equipment (you can, of course, put more or less inside) 

In the bag are two long and three short pads for a fully customizable interior, so you can customize the bag how you need it.

  • Full frame - SLR body with attached 24-70 mm 2.8 lens 
  • 70-200 mm 2.8 lens 
  • two focal length lenses, alternatively, a fixed lens and a flash unit 
  • padded laptop compartment fits up to 15" 
  • space for an iPad mini or documents in the pocket on the backside of the bag 
  • many compartments for lens filter, lens cover, memory cards, etc. 
  • various compartments on the front for your phone, keys, wallet, etc.


Internal dimensions of the compagnon bag 
27 cm (10.5 inch) height x 40 cm (16 inch) width x 14 cm (5.5 inch) deep

Outer dimensions of the compagnon bag
30 cm (12 inch) height x 42 cm (16.5 inch) width x 15 cm (6 inch) deep


  

A few features more 

  • inside of the front pocket is space for cell phone, wallet, pens, keys, etc.
  • zipped compartment, over the front pocket for business cards, etc. 
  • document compartment with zipper on the back side of the bag 
  • many compartments for lens cap (up to 77mm), SD or CF cards 
  • ergonomic padded shoulder strap - reinforced with a strong industrial strap 
  • on the bottom we use metal feet 
  • we use only high quality parts for the camera bag 
  • many compartments for lens cap (up to 77mm), SD or CF cards 

The compagnon camera bag is in three colours available (light brown, brown and black) 


Your perk no1 // diary

Back us with 45 € and you will get an original compagnon diary / sketchbook.
It is made of the same leather like our light brown compagnon bag.
Dimensions: A5 - 14,8 cm x 21,0 cm // 5,8 x 8,3 inches

International shipping is included. Estimated delivery February 2014.


Your perk no2 // lens cover

Back us with 45 € and you will get an original compagnon lens cover.
It is made of the same leather like our dark brown compagnon bag, with padded bottom and waxed canvas lining... (material we will use in the future)
Dimensions: maximum fitted for the big Nikon or Canon lens 70-200 mm f2.8

International shipping is included. Estimated delivery February 2014.


Your perk no3 // diary + lens cover

Back us with 75 € you will get an original compagnon diary / sketchbook and lens cover.

International shipping is included. Estimated delivery February 2014.


Your perk no4 // earlybird // compagnon camera bag

Back us with 350 € and you will get an original compagnon camera bag. You can choose your colour.

Note - only 25 compagnon earlybird bags are available. 

International shipping is included. Shipping early december 2013.


Your perk no5 // compagnon camera bag

Back us with 379 €  and you will get an original compagnon camera bag. You can choose your colour.

International shipping is included. Estimated delivery February 2014.


Your perk no6 // compagnon camera bag + diary + lens cover

Back us with 429 €  and you will get a compagnon camera bag and a compagnon diary / sketchbook and a compagnon lens cover. 

International shipping is included. Estimated delivery February 2014.

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Please note -  a lot of people got their compagnon camera bag in the last months and they are very happy with it. 

A few blogposts about the compagnon camera bag. Sorry they are in German language, but with very nice pictures.

http://www.stilpirat.de/compagnon-meine-gefahrtin/

http://www.dpicture.net/2013/11/compagnon-fototasche-ein-erfahrungsbericht/

http://andersgrafie.de/compagnon-die-reise-beginnt

http://offenesauge.de/compagnon-bags/

Risks and challenges

The last thing we want to tell you. We are producing these compagnon camera bags since one year. The production will definetely go on. 

No matter with which perk you back us - you will get it. No matter we will reach our goal or not.

Thank you for sharing and supporting this campaign.

Nice greetings from the Black Forest - 

Vitalis & Valentin

story:
View the entire collection at www.onesixfivejewelry.com.



ABOUT US

The numbers one, six, five have special importance to designer Kaleigh Shrigley. These are the numbers of her mother’s home address, where she spends some of her happiest moments. Onesixfive is heavily influenced by the comforts of home. The precious materials and simplistic designs allow the pieces to be worn everyday to the wearer’s most-loved places.

Onesixfive Jewelry was founded in 2013 by Kaleigh and creativity connoisseur Claire Lowe. Though Kaleigh possessed the metalsmithing background, Claire fell in love with metal within the first 20 minutes of Kaleigh teaching her the ropes. Now, each piece in the collection is completely handmade in their studio in Columbus, Ohio. Onesixfive is entirely handmade because they feel that without that, the character of the piece is lost.



OUR GOAL

We are hoping to raise enough money to fund the cost of a PR firm in Los Angeles for 6 months. Up until now, we have been doing all of the work ourselves; everything from initial design sketches to shipping out the product (and everything in between!). Though we have made some headway in the PR department on our own, we simply don't have the resources and connections needed to elevate our brand to the next level. Delegating this responsibility to a PR firm will allow us to focus more on designing and creating handmade products at the highest quality possible.



INCENTIVES

For each donation over $25, you will receive one of the following pieces made just for you! The higher contributors will receive 14k gold pieces ($250 and up). Remember to email us at onesixfivejewelry@gmail.com with your full name and ring size choices (whole sizes 3-8) so that we can make the piece just for you!



OUR PRODUCT

  • Designed and handmade in our studio in Columbus, OH
  • Metal used is responsibly sourced
  • Made with high quality materials; gold-filled, sterling silver, 14k gold
  • These materials allow the piece to be worn every single day
  • Will not tarnish
  • Will not irritate sensitive skin
  • Can be worn to bed and in the shower
  • Simplistic designs compliment every style
  • Handmade to order in a variety of sizes to ensure a perfect fit


Videography: Alexa Sison

Photography: Adam Lowe

Video music: Tycho - Coastal Brakes
