story:
The Pilot Watch. Reinvented. 　 

One hundred years ago today, The Great War came to a close. 

A stunning tribute to a man of that most heroic era and to those who faced the impossible. A perfect match of the latest technology and timeless design, we are proud to release our most refined and advanced timepiece ever.

 

But let's start from the beginning.

A LITTLE BIT OF AXIOM HISTORY

The success of our two KICKSTARTER campaigns in 2017 and 2018 was beyond all our expectations:

 

With your support, we have been able to create our own watches. Please now let's see our lattest timepiece.

 

"EVERYTHING HAS A LIMIT THAT MUST BE SURPASSED"

Man has always raised his eyes to the sky, hoping to imitate the bird, free and independent, reigning over the Earth and discovering countries still unknown, with no other constraint than the air that carries it. 

 At the dawn of the twentieth century, birds of metal, wood, and fabric replaced the wildest dreams. They dominated the battlefields with their beaks, equipped with sophisticated weapons, and were tamed by men whose boundless audacity was matched only by bravery. 

Masters of the skies, Legendary heroes, this was the time of the Aviateurs.

Montre d'Aviateur, Modèle I 

Born of our passion for the dawn of military aviation, this timepiece is a tribute to the Knights of the Air and their flying mounts. 

With a diameter of 42 mm and a thickness of 14.70 mm, resistant to depths of up to 200 meters, and fully sculpted 316L stainless steel, the case of the Montre D'Aviateur, Modèle I has been redesigned to incorporate a heart of 31 jewels beating at 28,800 vph with a power reserve of 38 hours: The mythical and extremely accurate Swiss Made Sellita SW 260-1.

This is the first AXIOM watch fitted with a movement made in Switzerland. In addition to its outstanding characteristics and its flawless reliability, this movement allows the use of a seconds dial at 6 o'clock, which was a must for us, in order to respect the unique style of watches from the beginning of the Twentieth century. 

THE SWISS PRECISION FOR A FIELD USE

Engraved with the AXIOM logo, the rotor is visible thanks to the sapphire caseback; itself encased in a brushed stainless steel piece precisely engraved (not laser engraved) with the unique serial number of the watch.

The case, with a slightly flattened side, is proudly engraved in depth with the name "Modèle I" on its left side, reminding the markings on military firearms, while the onion-shaped screw-down crown is a nod to the watches mounted on the cockpits of the fighter planes of the Great War. 

Finely sandblasted, the case has the exclusive AXIOM "Gris de Guerre" ("War Grey") finish, an anthracite grey PVD process imitating the bluing of the British twin 7,7 mm (.303) Vickers Machine Guns. 

Firing through the propeller of some of the most the legendary fighters like the SPAD XIII or Nieuport 28, the Vickers was standard on French and British military aircrafts.

AN INSTRUMENT ON THE SIDE OF THE WRIST

The dial of the Montre d'Aviateur Modèle I, whose deep matte, non-reflective black texture is revealed in full light, has been conceived and designed as a true instrument panel of the fighter plane. 

Stylishly contrasting with their dark background, the light-relief figures have the pale yellow colour of ageing Radium, like an Aircraft instrument dial of the Great War having developed a graceful patina over this last century.

The result of long research and development work, the seconds hand was created according to the drawing of a classic model of a circa 1918 French on-board instrument hand.

With only the diamond of ageing Radium colour, the tip reveals the shiny polish of the metal, this hand, absolutely new in the world of watchmaking, is a real pride for us, and in our eyes is the true signature of the Montre d'Aviateur, Modèle I. 

The small dial, encircled with polished metal, is placed slightly below the main dial, bringing a structural depth already present in the form of contrasting colours and finishes, such as the glossy polish of the skeleton hands and the logo. 

In order to make it possible to read the time instantly, whatever the conditions, the numbers 1 to 11, as well as the three hands, have a latest-generation luminous coating which is effective even with minimum exposure to light. 

Resistant to scratches, we opted for a curved sapphire crystal to bring a final touch of elegance and vintage refinement to this new model. 　

QUALITY AS OUR OBJECTIVE

All the parts of our watches are strictly selected. Calf leather was chosen for our straps, both for its natural flexibility to fit perfectly around the wrist, and for its silkiness and softness to the touch. 

The Montre d'Aviateur Modèle I originally comes with the "Noyer" strap, but an "Acajou" strap with its buckle is also offered to the project contributors. 

We decided to keep to the spirit of the first military watches, using a 14 mm wide strap, sliding into a 26 mm wide reinforcement strap. This particular design was once standard, making the watch better suited for field and combat use, giving it a unique identity that we wanted to respect.

Nevertheless, the Montre d'Aviateur, Modèle I can obviously be worn with the 14mm strap alone!

Finally, each watch is delivered in a strong box of excellent quality  cardboard covered with kraft paper, reproducing the codes and same manufacturing techniques as the packaging of the early 1900s. 　 

VETERAN LEATHER TRAVEL ROLL

The Montre D'Aviateur, Modèle I, can also be delivered with a very high quality travel roll in addition to the standard cardboard box. Made entirely of selected leather, our Veteran roll has features a beautiful patina, just like a WWI Aviator jacket!

There are only 5 pieces are available, don't miss your chance!

A WATCH OF TODAY FOR EVERY DAY

The Montre D'Aviateur, Modèle I. Unique. Perfect for any day, any occasion. Built to last. Through masterful craftsmanship, it demonstrates the toughness of a military designed watch, with the classic beauty of the most elegant Era.

 

AXIOM NEEDS YOU!

 

Launched in 2017, AXIOM needs your support to grow.

Believing in us will secure our brand and production, and trust us, we have many other very exciting and totally innovative watchmaking projects in mind!

The success of our previous KICKSTARTER campaigns and sales has allowed us to fund all the needed components: cases, dials, hands, etc., of the Montre d'Aviateur, Modèle I.

This INDIEGOGO campaign will help us funding the NEXT 2019 watch! A prototype will be manufactured early 2019, and a full production is planned for May or June 2019. We really need your support!

Our dream to offer you this timepiece with ageless style, a vibrant tribute to men with only courage as their principle, is now in your hands!

Thank you for your support. 　

Sincerely,
Jonathan & Priscillia. 　

 

 

TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS  　 

CASE: Montre D'Aviateur, Modèle I 

DIAMETER: 42 mm 

THICKNESS OF THE CASE: 14.70 mm  

MATERIAL: 316L stainless steel 

FINISH: Exclusive "Gris de Guerre" ("War Grey") PVD process

GLASS: Curved sapphire crystal                                                   

SEALING: Waterproof up to 200 meters and screw-down crown

MOVEMENT: Swiss Made Sellita SW 260-1 engraved self-winding, 28,800 A/h (4 Hz), 31 jewels  

FUNCTIONS: Hours and minutes in the centre. Seconds dial at 6 o'clock

POWER RESERVE: 38 hours 

DIAL: Black dial with satin finishing, 1 to 11 luminescent numerals

HANDS: Luminescent skeleton hands 　 

STRAP MATERIAL: Selected calfskin "Noyer" (standard) and "Acajou" (offered) stamped on the back 　 

STRAP DIMENSIONS: In two parts: 14 mm by 260 mm without buckle 26 mm by 135 mm 　 

CLASP: Stainless steel pin buckle with "Gris de Guerre" ("War Grey") process 　 

WARRANTY: 2 years 　                                                                                                                                                                                       

 

THEY TALK ABOUT US
story_txt: The Pilot Watch. Reinvented. 　 One hundred years ago today, The Great War came to a close. A stunning tribute to a man of that most heroic era and to those who faced the impossible. A perfect match of the latest technology and timeless design, we are proud to release our most refined and advanced timepiece ever. But let's start from the beginning.A LITTLE BIT OF AXIOM HISTORYThe success of our two KICKSTARTER campaigns in 2017 and 2018 was beyond all our expectations: With your support, we have been able to create our own watches. Please now let's see our lattest timepiece. "EVERYTHING HAS A LIMIT THAT MUST BE SURPASSED"Man has always raised his eyes to the sky, hoping to imitate the bird, free and independent, reigning over the Earth and discovering countries still unknown, with no other constraint than the air that carries it.  At the dawn of the twentieth century, birds of metal, wood, and fabric replaced the wildest dreams. They dominated the battlefields with their beaks, equipped with sophisticated weapons, and were tamed by men whose boundless audacity was matched only by bravery. Masters of the skies, Legendary heroes, this was the time of the Aviateurs.Montre d'Aviateur, Modèle I Born of our passion for the dawn of military aviation, this timepiece is a tribute to the Knights of the Air and their flying mounts. With a diameter of 42 mm and a thickness of 14.70 mm, resistant to depths of up to 200 meters, and fully sculpted 316L stainless steel, the case of the Montre D'Aviateur, Modèle I has been redesigned to incorporate a heart of 31 jewels beating at 28,800 vph with a power reserve of 38 hours: The mythical and extremely accurate Swiss Made Sellita SW 260-1.This is the first AXIOM watch fitted with a movement made in Switzerland. In addition to its outstanding characteristics and its flawless reliability, this movement allows the use of a seconds dial at 6 o'clock, which was a must for us, in order to respect the unique style of watches from the beginning of the Twentieth century. THE SWISS PRECISION FOR A FIELD USEEngraved with the AXIOM logo, the rotor is visible thanks to the sapphire caseback; itself encased in a brushed stainless steel piece precisely engraved (not laser engraved) with the unique serial number of the watch.The case, with a slightly flattened side, is proudly engraved in depth with the name "Modèle I" on its left side, reminding the markings on military firearms, while the onion-shaped screw-down crown is a nod to the watches mounted on the cockpits of the fighter planes of the Great War. Finely sandblasted, the case has the exclusive AXIOM "Gris de Guerre" ("War Grey") finish, an anthracite grey PVD process imitating the bluing of the British twin 7,7 mm (.303) Vickers Machine Guns. Firing through the propeller of some of the most the legendary fighters like the SPAD XIII or Nieuport 28, the Vickers was standard on French and British military aircrafts.AN INSTRUMENT ON THE SIDE OF THE WRISTThe dial of the Montre d'Aviateur Modèle I, whose deep matte, non-reflective black texture is revealed in full light, has been conceived and designed as a true instrument panel of the fighter plane. Stylishly contrasting with their dark background, the light-relief figures have the pale yellow colour of ageing Radium, like an Aircraft instrument dial of the Great War having developed a graceful patina over this last century.The result of long research and development work, the seconds hand was created according to the drawing of a classic model of a circa 1918 French on-board instrument hand.With only the diamond of ageing Radium colour, the tip reveals the shiny polish of the metal, this hand, absolutely new in the world of watchmaking, is a real pride for us, and in our eyes is the true signature of the Montre d'Aviateur, Modèle I. The small dial, encircled with polished metal, is placed slightly below the main dial, bringing a structural depth already present in the form of contrasting colours and finishes, such as the glossy polish of the skeleton hands and the logo. In order to make it possible to read the time instantly, whatever the conditions, the numbers 1 to 11, as well as the three hands, have a latest-generation luminous coating which is effective even with minimum exposure to light. Resistant to scratches, we opted for a curved sapphire crystal to bring a final touch of elegance and vintage refinement to this new model. 　QUALITY AS OUR OBJECTIVEAll the parts of our watches are strictly selected. Calf leather was chosen for our straps, both for its natural flexibility to fit perfectly around the wrist, and for its silkiness and softness to the touch. The Montre d'Aviateur Modèle I originally comes with the "Noyer" strap, but an "Acajou" strap with its buckle is also offered to the project contributors. We decided to keep to the spirit of the first military watches, using a 14 mm wide strap, sliding into a 26 mm wide reinforcement strap. This particular design was once standard, making the watch better suited for field and combat use, giving it a unique identity that we wanted to respect.Nevertheless, the Montre d'Aviateur, Modèle I can obviously be worn with the 14mm strap alone!Finally, each watch is delivered in a strong box of excellent quality  cardboard covered with kraft paper, reproducing the codes and same manufacturing techniques as the packaging of the early 1900s. 　 VETERAN LEATHER TRAVEL ROLLThe Montre D'Aviateur, Modèle I, can also be delivered with a very high quality travel roll in addition to the standard cardboard box. Made entirely of selected leather, our Veteran roll has features a beautiful patina, just like a WWI Aviator jacket!There are only 5 pieces are available, don't miss your chance!A WATCH OF TODAY FOR EVERY DAYThe Montre D'Aviateur, Modèle I. Unique. Perfect for any day, any occasion. Built to last. Through masterful craftsmanship, it demonstrates the toughness of a military designed watch, with the classic beauty of the most elegant Era. AXIOM NEEDS YOU! Launched in 2017, AXIOM needs your support to grow.Believing in us will secure our brand and production, and trust us, we have many other very exciting and totally innovative watchmaking projects in mind!The success of our previous KICKSTARTER campaigns and sales has allowed us to fund all the needed components: cases, dials, hands, etc., of the Montre d'Aviateur, Modèle I.This INDIEGOGO campaign will help us funding the NEXT 2019 watch! A prototype will be manufactured early 2019, and a full production is planned for May or June 2019. We really need your support!Our dream to offer you this timepiece with ageless style, a vibrant tribute to men with only courage as their principle, is now in your hands!Thank you for your support. 　Sincerely,Jonathan & Priscillia. 　  TECHNICAL SPECIFICATIONS  　 CASE: Montre D'Aviateur, Modèle I DIAMETER: 42 mm THICKNESS OF THE CASE: 14.70 mm  MATERIAL: 316L stainless steel FINISH: Exclusive "Gris de Guerre" ("War Grey") PVD processGLASS: Curved sapphire crystal                                                   SEALING: Waterproof up to 200 meters and screw-down crownMOVEMENT: Swiss Made Sellita SW 260-1 engraved self-winding, 28,800 A/h (4 Hz), 31 jewels  FUNCTIONS: Hours and minutes in the centre. Seconds dial at 6 o'clockPOWER RESERVE: 38 hours DIAL: Black dial with satin finishing, 1 to 11 luminescent numeralsHANDS: Luminescent skeleton hands 　 STRAP MATERIAL: Selected calfskin "Noyer" (standard) and "Acajou" (offered) stamped on the back 　 STRAP DIMENSIONS: In two parts: 14 mm by 260 mm without buckle 26 mm by 135 mm 　 CLASP: Stainless steel pin buckle with "Gris de Guerre" ("War Grey") process 　 WARRANTY: 2 years 　                                                                                                                                                                                        THEY TALK ABOUT US

story:
"SYNERGOS WALLET MAY BE THE MINIMALISTIC WALLET YOU'VE ALWAYS WANTED, PLUS A USB DRIVE. As we move further and further into minimalistic times, one thing that hasn't evolved too much is the traditional wallet. The team behind Synergos Wallet wants to change that. They have designed a wallet that not only looks great, can pack in all your cards and even bank notes, but also doubles up as a RFID blocking USB drive."  http:isozial.so

_______________________________________________________________


SYNERGOS: "To work together, referring to two or more influences, working together to create an effort greater than acting individually."

Your Synergos Wallet Easily  Carries 8 Credit Cards & A Cash Management System & Your Choice Of 8 - 64 GB Of Integrated Memory

Easily Move Your Cards and Money In & Out

Just Insert Your Machined, RFID Blocking, Minimal Synergos 8 - 64GB Wallet In Any USB Port

And Synergos Will Deliver A Much More From Far Less Experience

Synergos Wallet Makes Your Life Simpler

OUR STORY

We're fans and users of minimal wallets. Their very nature disciplines you to streamline a small part of your everyday life - to bring only what you truly need for the 10-12 hours per day you're carrying a wallet - not the junk that somehow accumulates over time in a traditional wallet or purse.

(Did you notice in the video the traditional wallet in the back pocket how about the Synergos? Can you find the Synergos?)

The choice between an uncomfortable traditional wallet in your back pocket - (which has the potential of damaging your sciatic nerve over time) or a front pocket Minimal Wallet, is for us, a no brainer. We're fans of the Minimal aesthetic.


SYNERGOS WALLET vs A TRADITIONAL WALLET

 Synergos Wallet started about seven months ago after a series of events pointed us in its direction. The first was going to see a potential new client  (a 1200 mile trip). Just before the presentation, our team stopped at a FedEx/Kinko's to print some pages we forgot. We left the presentation that took nearly 6 weeks to create - on a USB in their computer.


 When we arrived for the meeting and realized we didn't have the USB - we figured, no problem,  we'd go online and access our Drop Box account - the company's Internet was out - we made our apologizes and headed back to the airport.... an embarrassing and expensive moment. We had joined the over  ONE MILLION + folks that lose their USB's yearly.

That same week, a friend told us about a party where a party goer had hacked his Smart Phone and "borrowed"  most of the other party goers credit card numbers without them knowing - he thought it was a funny trick. Our friend said it basically "creeped" everyone at the party out.

 We've all heard about skimmers (about the size of a Netbook) for stealing credit card info via RFID - but we never  heard of something as simple as a Smartphone.

So we began making sketches and prototypes to see if it would be feasible to create an RFID Blocking, USB, Small, Simple, Functional Minimal Wallet that felt great to carry.

One of the first prototypes we tested to make sure we were on the right track for the RFID blocking.

We also wanted to concentrate  on the weight factor with the Synergos Design - The heavier the wallet, the more noticeable it becomes over a long day.  Synergos Wallet weighs just at one ounce.


-We also felt it important to be able to  get our cash in and out easily. Many of the Minimal Wallets we own have an inherent awkwardness to their designs for getting paper bills in and out. So we chose to create a slim and efficient "Money Card" to solve the problem.

 We considered a money clip/ band, but felt the use of a money clip or an exterior elastic band - for us -  we felt it would take away from the aesthetics of the wallet's cleanly defined lines.


More Testing to make sure the Money Card helped make our money and lives easier

So after a number of months of prototyping we were able to Mashup all our wants and needs into a simple clean Minimal Piece - with just the right balance of form, function, which we love to carry in our pockets everyday. 


So small you don't know it's in your pocket - but yet can carry all the information you may need.



SYNERGOS WALLET'S precision machining feels at home in any environment.

__________________________________

 

WALLET SPECIFICATIONS

  • Small unobtrusive profile - you will barely know it's in your pocket

  • Easily holds 8 credit cards

  • Weighs just 1 ounce

  • Measures just 86 X 54mm

  • Aluminum Construction

  • Cash Management Card for easy handling

  • Comes with either 8,16, 32 or 64 GB of memory

    _______________________________________________________

How we got there

- We wanted a wallet that was small, simple, easy to use and made our lives easier and maybe a bit more fun.

- We wanted to integrate  a USB that was so unobtrusive we wouldn't know it was even there - resumes, videos,  presentations, games, storage, backups, virus cleanup, etc - could now easily come with us - fortunately we've never left our wallet behind - but have over the years left behind a half a dozen USB's.

- We wanted to be able to get paper money in and out of our Minimal Wallets easily.

- We wanted to stop thieves from skimming our credit card info.

- We wanted the wallet to be so slight (1 ounce) you would not even feel it    in your pocket even after a 10 - 12 hour day.

     _____________________________________________________________

Here's a few of the steps we used

After the first rough hand made prototypes we had a CAD program done for the metal parts we needed.

 

Testing of various elastic brands & tensil strengths


Testing of placement and configurations of chips


Manufacturing Plan

To ensure a timely delivery of Synergos Wallet to our supporters we have developed a manufacturing plan/flow chart to guarantee we stay on schedule.

Upon receipt of funds:

PHASE ONE:

- Order elastic material from supplier for internal "pouch" of the Synergos Wallet. (delivery of material to sewing contractor- 3 working days)

- Order USB Chips - 10 working days for production, 3 days in transport

- Order metal for wallet - 5 working days fulfillment and 5 days in transport to Machine Shop in US

PHASE TWO:

- US Sewing Contractor receives "pouch" material for Synergos Wallet. A single sewer can produce a minimum of 45 "pouches"per hour or 360 for one day.

- US Machine Shop receives material and cuts a metal plate 1 every approx.: 30 seconds ( see video above) - 2 per minute - with material change outs, 360 sets in approx.: 8 hours.

PHASE THREE:

-  Approx: 25 working days after receipt of funds, components of the Synergos Wallet are ready for assembly. Assembly and packaging of the Synergos Wallet is anticipated to take less than 1 working day, but we are projecting the turn around will take place within 5 working days.

Production Summary: Approx: 30 days for the potential production of 360 sets or less, with the ability to add an additional 360 Synergos Wallets each additional day - ie  1800 wallets per 5 working days. We are adding an additional 10 working days for any issues that may arise. Which will allow for a successful delivery by December 12, 2013.

Thanks for taking the time to look at my project. If you have any questions, please do not hesitate to contact me. If you could help get the word out - it really would be appreciated!

story:
Help Pay it Forward and Fund a Pre-Product Launch

What better way to enter the holiday season than doing something for yourself that also helps others?

What are we doing and why?

We are trying to gain as much support for charities over the holidays and in turn give you something to help raise awareness and share this message with others. 

For example the celebrity charity bracelet perk profits go to the charity listed with the bracelet chosen. Each celebrity designed their own bracelet, donating their time and talent. They gave 100% of their time to the charities and this project. We as a company have donated countless hours and resources to prepare for this launch. 

Because you receive this great bracelet as a thank you for your support, we ask that when you wear it, it reminds you to pay it forward in life. Do something nice for someone else especially during the holiday season when so many people can use help.

  **Every bracelet is hand assembled in the USA.

There are multiple ways you can get involved...

 PERK:  ALL FOR CHARITIES

All of the funding from the $2.00 category will get split equally by the charities below:

 

PERK: DYOB (Design Your Own Bracelet)

* Show your artistic side (even if you don't think you're creative) design a bracelet online for yourself or someone else. A donation from this perk will be divided equally among the 8 charities.

  We promise this is fun! We will send you a link, you submit the design, we send you the finished bracelet.

Select from 5 different bracelet styles. 

(black or brown leather, silver,charm style or guitar string style)

Next choose from over 75 different charms.

Hit submit

We will do the rest.

You will receive your design in time for Christmas if support is received by Dec. 3rd

 TESTIMONIALS:

SOO much fun! I loved the selection. So easy to do. I am going to impress my sister for Christmas.      Sue R.  Phila, Pa

I never in my wildest dreams thought I would design a bracelet. My wife will be shocked on Christmas!   Alex P.  NYC, NY

I loved doing this. I actually liked it so much I made two.                         D.J. La, Calif

 

MANY MORE OPTIONS THAN PICTURED BELOW

 


PERK: DYOB x 2

Want to have fun with a friend?

Design one yourself and we will send a gift card you can share with a friend or family member who can also design a bracelet.

 

PERK: I CARE

These bracelets are great to wear but at the same time benefit others.

Below are the celebrities and their chosen charities that will benefit from your support:

 

 

PERK: BIG HEART & BIGGEST HEART

Here comes the never before offered opportunities available only through this platform

You get to be the celebrity:

**Select a charity of YOUR CHOICE.

**Design your own bracelet

**We will manufacture that exact bracelet and sell it on www.hopepaige.com.

***The profits from the sale of your bracelet will go to the charity of your choice. ****

Choose from a one month charity sale and 5 of your custom designed bracelets to the most amazing perk we offer.

OR

***Your charity bracelet sold on our site for 3 months, promoted on our Facebook page to our 164,000+ fans and receive 10 of your custom designs***

What better way can you support your favorite charity?

What better way to celebrate the holidays?

**NOTE** Bracelets will be online for sale after manufacturing. Approximate time 8-10 weeks

 

 

 

Final Perk: Thumbs Up

Most drivers think they are focused enough on the road while sending a text. Unfortunately there are countless family and friends who will tell you a very different story.

This perk will send you 10 Don't Text and Drive Thumbands. Each comes with an information card on the statistics of Texting and Driving.  The selection of bands include the words  TXTING KILLS, LIVE LONG, and THUMB.

Pass these bands on to those who can use a reminder, before it is too late.

YOU CAN HELP EVEN WITHOUT A PERK:

Even if you can’t contribute, it doesn’t mean you can’t help!

Please help us get the word out on this campaign. We appreciate every single second and every single bit of effort everyone puts into helping these charities.

You can use the Indiegogo share tools in order to spread the word!

You will receive your design in time for Christmas if support is received by Dec. 3rd
 TESTIMONIALS:
SOO much fun! I loved the selection. So easy to do. I am going to impress my sister for Christmas.      Sue R.  Phila, Pa
I never in my wildest dreams thought I would design a bracelet. My wife will be shocked on Christmas!   Alex P.  NYC, NY
I loved doing this. I actually liked it so much I made two.                         D.J. La, Calif
 
MANY MORE OPTIONS THAN PICTURED BELOW

 

PERK: DYOB x 2
Want to have fun with a friend?
Design one yourself and we will send a gift card you can share with a friend or family member who can also design a bracelet.
 
PERK: I CARE
These bracelets are great to wear but at the same time benefit others.
Below are the celebrities and their chosen charities that will benefit from your support:

 

 
PERK: BIG HEART & BIGGEST HEART
Here comes the never before offered opportunities available only through this platform
You get to be the celebrity:
**Select a charity of YOUR CHOICE.
**Design your own bracelet
**We will manufacture that exact bracelet and sell it on www.hopepaige.com.
***The profits from the sale of your bracelet will go to the charity of your choice. ****
Choose from a one month charity sale and 5 of your custom designed bracelets to the most amazing perk we offer.
OR
***Your charity bracelet sold on our site for 3 months, promoted on our Facebook page to our 164,000+ fans and receive 10 of your custom designs***
What better way can you support your favorite charity?
What better way to celebrate the holidays?
**NOTE** Bracelets will be online for sale after manufacturing. Approximate time 8-10 weeks
 
 
 


Final Perk: Thumbs Up


Most drivers think they are focused enough on the road while sending a text. Unfortunately there are countless family and friends who will tell you a very different story.
This perk will send you 10 Don't Text and Drive Thumbands. Each comes with an information card on the statistics of Texting and Driving.  The selection of bands include the words  TXTING KILLS, LIVE LONG, and THUMB.
Pass these bands on to those who can use a reminder, before it is too late.



YOU CAN HELP EVEN WITHOUT A PERK:
Even if you can’t contribute, it doesn’t mean you can’t help!
Please help us get the word out on this campaign. We appreciate every single second and every single bit of effort everyone puts into helping these charities.
You can use the Indiegogo share tools in order to spread the word!

story:
Introducing the MINUS-8 Anza field watch

Ships to you in Mid-December, in time for Christmas

 

 

The journey of our latest timepiece began at the Anza Borrego Desert in California. The beginnings of this watch are emblematic of the fearless exploration and admiration of machine aesthetics that makes MINUS-8 different. We received incredible support from the Indiegogo community last year with our MINUS-8 Diver watch and as the Anza watch continues on its journey, we want you to join us and take the Anza to your next destination. Don’t be afraid to break away. Be a pioneer. Step into the void and grab a little bit of tomorrow. Set forth and own a piece of the future.

 

The Leather Watch Travel Pouch Perk is now LIVE!

 

 

 

 

 

 

Stretch Goal: ACHIEVED!

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

FEATURES

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Each Anza ships with two NATO straps that make it versatile and easy to wear for different occasions and activities. It is 38mm in diameter and only 10mm tall, for a modern, lightweight design. With water resistance of 10ATM, this timepiece can go from the office to the ocean and back with ease, staying true to your active lifestyle. The woven Nylon NATO straps are perfect for those who like to wear their favorite watch at the gym or in the water. The suede straps give the ANZA a more sophisticated, yet rugged look for work and evening.

 

​​​

 

 Anza embodies the spirit of West Coast culture and was built for those that are looking for an everyday timepiece to fit their busy lifestyle. We built our first field watch to meet the constantly evolving demands of today's consumer.  Those demands led us to create a watch that is tough enough to handle everyday use, but can easily transition from an active tool during  the day, to a refined accessory in the evening. Rugged and active, sophisticated and elegant, the MINUS-8 field watch blends easily into your lifestyle.

 

​

 

 

 

PERKS

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Our inspriation is grounded in machine aesthetics and the landscape around us. Like all of our watches, Anza is the result of our pursuit of pure form and fearless exploration. At MINUS-8 we strive to bring you artifacts from the future.

As your go-to watch, Anza is the timepiece you will keep closest to you wherever you go. We crafted our case of a solid stainless steel block to retain the integrity of the machines that inspire us. This unibody design means not having to remove pins to swap straps, or risk breaking them in the process. The solid slugs on our watch make it a more durable timepiece, while the 2 separate straps and scratch-resistant sapphire crystal face offer a premium value for under $200.

 

 

 

BRETT LOVELADY / FOUNDER & CEO. As the founder of ASTRO Studios and co-founder of MINUS-8, Brett and ASTRO have designed hundreds of products, wearables and watches for companies like Nike, Samsung, Shinola, Electric, Xbox, and many more. MINUS-8 as an original brand inspired by West Coast design culture and the love of machines.

 

KYLE SWEN / EVP of DESIGN.  As an ASTRO partner and design leader at MINUS-8, Kyle has designed and directed the development of many products, wearables & watches including the inernationally acclaimed Nike Fuelband and Nike Triax Watch line. Kyle currently directs the design team for the whole MINUS-8 watch collection.

 

DAVID WHETSTONE / DIRECTOR. As an ASTRO Art Director & Designer at ASTRO Studios and MINUS-8, David has developed the modern vision for MINUS-8.  He’s personally designed many watches for a variety of brands like Nike, Nixon, Electric, etc. He currently leads the design team for the whole MINUS-8 watch collection.

 

SEAN MISSAL / LEAD DESIGNER. As a lead designer at ASTRO Studios and MINUS-8, Sean has helped developed the modern vision of MINUS-8, with focus on the new ANZA Field Watch Series. 

 

 

FAQs

 

Q: Does MINUS-8 have a Warranty on the Anza?

A: YES! MINUS-8 offers a limited warranty against defects in materials and workmanship for a period of two years following the original purchase date of your MINUS-8 watch from an authorized dealer. This warranty covers defects in materials and workmanship with your MINUS-8 watch. If you encounter either of these issues with your watch we will repair or replace it, subject to our inspection of the watch. The warranty does not cover normal wear and tear, glass, watch case, strap, bracelet, loss or theft. You will void your warranty if you open your caseback, push the buttons underwater, or forget to screw down or push in the crown and expose your watch to moisture. The foregoing does not affect your statutory rights. 

Q: What comes in the box with my Anza watch?

A: Each Anza watch ships with 1 watch body and 2 interchangeable NATO straps (3 total parts).

Q: How much does shipping cost?

A: Shipping is FREE in the US (ships via ground service). International orders ship for a flat rate of $50.

Q: When will I receive my MINUS-8 Anza?

A: Fall, 2017. We’ve received our first round of working prototypes and are moving into manufacturing soon. We anticipate shipping the watches September of this year.

Q: What are the risks associated with backing the MINUS-8 Anza?

A: Very low risk. The Anza watch has already gone through the design and prototyping phase. MINUS-8 has been producing and shipping watches globally for over 3 years, so we are confident in the development and shipping timeline for the Anza watch.

Q: How easy is it to swap out bands?

A. Swapping out bands on the Anza watch is very simple. There are no pins to remove, the bands slide easily in and out of the watch body.

Q: Is the watch waterproof?

A. The Anza watch is water resistant up to 10 ATM (100M).

Q. Is this watch battery powered?

A. Yes, the Anza watch is a quartz movement (battery powered) and the battery is built to last approximately 2 years. The battery is replaceable.

Q: Is this watch visible in the dark?

A. The Anza watch features Superluminova hands and numerals for optimal viewing in multiple environments.  

Q: Can I buy extra straps?

A. The watches ship with 2 straps at this time and when the watch starts shipping in September, we will have replacement straps available. 

 

Thank you!

story:
Short Summary

Hello! We are the Men's Ultimate Frisbee team at the University of Massachusetts, Amherst. Last year, the team made its first appearance at the College National Championships and finished 13th in the country.

In our first tournament this Spring, at Queen City Tuneup in North Carolina, we had an extremely strong showing where we overcame University of North Carolina(previously #2 in the country) in the semifinals  and came up just short against University of North Carolina Wilmington in the finals. 

This year, stakes are even higher. We are all in, with a full year of coaching from Tiina Booth and Evan Johnson, and we need you to help us make this an unforgettable season for current players, alumnus, friends and family!

We've shown that we are serious contenders for a deep run this season, but we need your support to help us getting there! Your purchase will help to fund the increasingly expensive spring season that we are about to embark on, and allow the players to focus on working out 6 days a week in order to get ahead of the competition for this season.

LET'S GO! Here is the BLACK jersey.


What We Need & What You Get

In order to reach the highest competitive level, we must travel all over the country to get to the best tournaments available. We traveled to North Carolina(Queen City) and finished second. We will also be traveling to Texas(Centex), and, if we raise enough money, then South Carolina(Eastern's) to round out our Spring season at three of the highest level tournaments in the country.
Following these events, we will need to travel to the College Championships in Wisconsin. 
Every single purchase will help UMass Ultimate get closer to achieving what it has never achieved before!
If we are short of our goal, then we may not be able to attend Eastern's, which would provide us with valuable experience against the nation's top teams.


The Impact

As college students at a public university, coming up with significant funds for traveling all over the country is extremely difficult. For this reason, we are pleading for your support of our season. Thank you.

Risks & Challenges

If we don't raise enough money through this fundraiser, and others, we may not be able to attend all of the tournaments that we hope to attend. This would be a major hurdle for us to have to overcome this season.

We need to go to these tournaments, so that we may qualify for Nationals, which by no means is guaranteed.

Here is my WHITE jersey used at Queen City Tuneup. It is in fact a white jersey...


Other Ways You Can Help

Please, like our facebook page! https://www.facebook.com/UMassUltimate

And come support in person at any of our tournaments, specifically Regionals and Nationals. A supportive sideline is the best thing we can ask from you!

Discount if you order 2 or more shirts (see perks)

story:
Fling is a new brand that has an aim to help young people who may be unemployed or in an environment which does not recognize their talent and allow them to make a living out of this passion.

We have the aim to have an artist from every country across the world in five years designing work that will go onto t-shirts and clothing.

Its really exciting for us to see these artists grow and design some amazing styles but we need your help to get this off the ground!

We have currently got a basic range of clothing going live and need your help to fund the next order of stock and products.

We want to allow people the chance to wear some amazing styles and designs that don't just look great but have also got a strong belief in the environment we live in and the conditions our clothes are manufactured in.

story:
Hey Guys!! 

My name is Vicki aka Pixel. I am launching this little project to raise some funds for a HUGE bulk order of supplies. I usually order my jewellery supplies on a weekly basis because i unfortunately do not have the financial out lay to order hundreds of pounds worth of pretty sparkly gems and beads. Im hoping this will change with a little help from you guys!! Im going to offering some awesome deals on Pixel Princess' pixelated jewellery!! 

All money raise from this will be going straight back into my business... i usually make the items once ordered from the customer... but with excess supplies ill be able to keep items in stock which will reduce the wait time on items ordered :) 

Thank you for taking the time to read this... i have link both our Facebook page and Website for you to check us out!!

Facebook Page - https://www.facebook.com/pixelprincessdesigns

Website - www.pixelprincessdesigns.com

story:
DOLLICA: THE NAME, THE BRAND, THE MISSION: WHO WE ARE AND WHERE WE ARE GOING

………………………………………………………………

The name Dollica comes from the combination of two sisters; Dollie and Angelica. The company has been created with the goal of bringing forth contemporary fine jewelry that has heart. It was registered this year and is moving full steam ahead to introduce the world to their voice. Each piece will reflect beautiful craftsmanship and stunning design that highlights genuine gemstones set in recycled 14K gold or sterling silver. Expect items that you can layer into everyday wear along with special looks that are bold, exciting and can make a statement!

*Dollica LLC also has the mission to donate a 10% portion of all profit to Young Survival Coalition, a national organization that aids women throughout their journey to beat this detrimental disease. 


MEET AND GREET ………………………………………………………………...........

My name is Dollie, and I am one of the co- founders of Dollica.  I’m a fun loving girl who adores jewelry, ice cream, morning runs, swimming, thunderstorms and butterflies.  

In January of 2012, I was diagnosed with stage III breast cancer.  Never in a million years did I think I would be diagnosed with cancer and especially at the young age of 31.  I considered myself to be a healthy person. I worked out on a regular basis and mostly ate healthy with the exception of my ice cream escapades. Thankfully the cancer had not spread to other parts of my body.  But needless to say, after my diagnosis my life seemed to be turned upside down……..

What would I do next? I became obsessed with worrying about the future and things that I had no way of changing.  “What if” became a constant fixture in my mind. I eventually realized that I wanted something to replace the fear about my diagnosis. Before 2012, life was happening at high speed and with an active family the pastimes that I enjoyed doing sometimes got bumped to last on the “to-do” list. It was time to revise my priorities and push the little enjoyments in life a bit higher on the list. That’s when I found time to explore jewelry making. It was something that I really took pleasure in doing! And during chemo, it was an escape for me. Assembling jewelry was an endorphin release and the distraction that I was looking for.

  My cancer diagnosis inspired me to start making pieces that highlight breast cancer awareness. It was a way for me to express myself without any limitations. That experience has developed into a full fledged dream to make beautiful jewelry that inspires others to never stop believing. I have learned that we should try to embrace any challenges; because in the end, challenges are what create depth and backbone. Sometimes you have to go through the “bad” stuff to get to the “good” stuff. Today I am a two year cancer survivor!!!!! And I’m happy to say that there is plenty of phenomenal stuff to come from Dollica!

My name is Angelica and I am the second half of Dollica. To sum me up in a nut shell, I’m a goof ball, a hard worker who loves ice cream, traveling, a good chick flick or comedy, a juicy read, some Sunday football, music, the arts and twinkling lights. I’m a self proclaimed jewelry freak and I’m passionate about leaving the world a little better than I found it.

At 28 years old, I feel humbled to have found my passion early on and work within my desired industry. I’ve worked as a Merchandise Coordinator for a jewelry company that mass produces & supplies to reputable catalog and television outlets. And I’m currently working as a Marketing and Sales Manager for a fine jewelry brand. I’m obsessed with beautiful gemstones and find the details of jewelry design to be fascinating. My creative energies are bursting at the seams and are ready to be unleashed to the public. It was an inspiration to see my sister take on the life altering experience with such determination and poise. And this event has also taught me to actively pursue your dreams because life is too unpredictable to do otherwise. I’ve always wanted to achieve entrepreneurship and my working experience gives me the confidence to take on the expectations for our desired industry.

I believe that the timing is perfect for both my sister and I to take our dream to the next level. After all, we’ve been prepping since the days of playing dress up in our mommy’s closet! And by combining the love of striking jewels with our passion to help fund a cure for the illness that touched our family in a personal way, we are presenting a collection with heart. I, along with my sister are excited to launch Dollica and present a gorgeous compilation of fine jewelry that women will love to wear and feel good about purchasing!


    Our Product 

    ………………………………………………………………………

    Need something to wear to work? Need something to wear to that amazing function? Need something to wear on a night on the town? Check, check and check! Dollica designs combine opulent genuine gemstones with chic finishes. Each piece is thoughtfully developed to add a touch of glam to your everyday lifestyle. The collections are stylish and yet everlasting due to the fine materials used in the crafting of each piece. We aim to use recycled precious metals in order to do our part in sustaining our environment and the resources within it. Our featured gemstones will also be sourced responsibly in order to provide a conflict free design. Visit www.Dollicashop.com to find out updates! 



    Ready. Set. Go! The Goal 

    ………………………………………………………………………

    With your help, we will be able to fund our dream of working together and combining elements that we are each passionate about. We hope to experience growth in the upcoming year through this development of a collection that is chic and quintessentially beautiful. Our wish is that you will be able to find our brand in boutiques and fine retailers across the nation by 2015. And through quarterly donations to the Breast Cancer foundation of our choice (a 10% portion of all sales for the quarter will be given), together we can help build awareness and support the continuation of ending this disease that affects so many of us on a daily basis. 


      Our Budget

      ………………………………………………………

      We have the vision. We have the will. Good Samaritans of the world, we would be greatly appreciative for any donations that you are able to provide. And if you are not able to help in funding we would be thrilled if you help to spread the word about our initiative!!!

      Share this, tweet this, pass the word! We need atleast $7800 and we plan to use the funds in the following way:

      • $3,500 - Materials for the first collection (the cost of gold is currently USD $1285.85 per oz as of Sept. 1st) And we are striving to have a first collection of 20 to 30 different silhouettes. So that’s quite a bit of gold…
      • $2,500 - The cost of labor. We are utilizing skilled metalsmiths in producing the physical samples. All samples will be produced in the USA.
      • $1,800- Photography and branding materials (catalog development, advertisements, promotional brochures, line sheets, packaging, displays and office supplies)

      Information about our perks: 

      *The jewelry featured in our perks are fashion items which are specially themed in support of this year's National Breast Cancer Awareness month. 

      * We expect to make the delivery of jewelry perks within the month of October. 

      *All jewelry is one size fits all unless you make a special request for sizing. 

      Follow us on Twitter @dollicallc to see updates of when to expect the fine jewelry Dollica collection to go into production! Or visit www.dollicashop.com 

      Awareness necklace that features 18K gold plated chain with crystal element pendant drop; handmade in the USA by one of the sisters

      Awareness bracelet on cord with block charms (to spell out Hope) and includes two bangles; handmade in the USA by one of the sisters

      Handmade awareness charm bracelet featuring 925 sterling silver and crystal element charms; handmade in the USA by one of the sisters

      Awareness bracelet that features Swarovski crystal elements and survivor pendant charm and includes 2 bangles; handmade in the USA by one of the sisters

      • * Image of commemorative photo on canvas not shown (Production of the canvas photo will take place after the first sample photo shoot)

story_txt:
DOLLICA: THE NAME, THE BRAND, THE MISSION: WHO WE ARE AND WHERE WE ARE GOING
………………………………………………………………


The name Dollica
comes from the combination of two sisters; Dollie and Angelica. The company has been created with
the goal of bringing forth contemporary fine jewelry that has heart. It was registered this year and is moving full steam ahead to introduce
the world to their voice. Each piece will reflect beautiful craftsmanship and
stunning design that highlights genuine gemstones set in recycled 14K gold or sterling silver. Expect items that you can layer into everyday wear along with special looks that are bold, exciting and can make a statement!
*Dollica LLC also has the mission to donate a 10% portion of all profit to Young Survival Coalition, a national organization that aids women throughout their journey to beat this detrimental disease. 




MEET AND
GREET ………………………………………………………………...........


My name is Dollie,
and I am one of the co- founders of Dollica.  I’m a fun
loving girl who adores jewelry, ice cream, morning runs, swimming,
thunderstorms and butterflies.  
In January of 2012, I was diagnosed
with stage III breast cancer.  Never in a million years did I think I
would be diagnosed with cancer and especially at the young age of 31.  I
considered myself to be a healthy person. I worked out on a regular basis and mostly
ate healthy with the exception of my ice cream escapades. Thankfully the cancer
had not spread to other parts of my body.  But needless to say, after my
diagnosis my life seemed to be turned upside down……..
What would I do next? I became obsessed
with worrying about the future and things that I had no way of changing.
 “What if” became a constant fixture in my mind. I eventually realized that I wanted something to
replace the fear about my diagnosis. Before 2012, life was happening at high speed
and with an active family the pastimes that I enjoyed doing sometimes got
bumped to last on the “to-do” list. It was time to revise my priorities and push the little
enjoyments in life a bit higher on the list. That’s when I found time to
explore jewelry making. It was something that I really took pleasure in doing! And
during chemo, it was an escape for me. Assembling jewelry was an endorphin release
and the distraction that I was looking for. 
  My cancer diagnosis inspired me to start making
pieces that highlight breast cancer awareness. It was a way for me to express
myself without any limitations. That experience has developed into a full
fledged dream to make beautiful jewelry that inspires others to never stop
believing. I have learned that we should try to embrace any challenges; because
in the end, challenges are what create depth and backbone. Sometimes you have
to go through the “bad” stuff to get to the “good” stuff. Today I am a two year
cancer survivor!!!!! And I’m happy to say that there is plenty of phenomenal
stuff to come from Dollica! 
My name is Angelica and I am the second half of Dollica. To
sum me up in a nut shell, I’m a goof ball, a hard worker who loves ice cream,
traveling, a good chick flick or comedy, a juicy read, some Sunday football,
music, the arts and twinkling lights. I’m a self proclaimed jewelry freak and
I’m passionate about leaving the world a little better than I found it. 
At 28 years old, I feel humbled to have found my passion
early on and work within my desired industry. I’ve worked as a Merchandise
Coordinator for a jewelry company that mass produces & supplies to
reputable catalog and television outlets. And I’m currently working as a
Marketing and Sales Manager for a fine jewelry brand. I’m obsessed with
beautiful gemstones and find the details of jewelry design to be fascinating.
My creative energies are bursting at the seams and are ready to be unleashed to
the public. It was an inspiration to see my sister take on the life altering
experience with such determination and poise. And this event has also taught me
to actively pursue your dreams because life is too unpredictable to do
otherwise. I’ve always wanted to achieve entrepreneurship and my working experience
gives me the confidence to take on the expectations for our desired industry. 
I believe that the timing is perfect for both my sister and
I to take our dream to the next level. After all, we’ve been prepping since the
days of playing dress up in our mommy’s closet! And by combining the love of
striking jewels with our passion to help fund a cure for the illness that
touched our family in a personal way, we are presenting a collection with heart.
I, along with my sister are excited to launch Dollica and present a gorgeous
compilation of fine jewelry that women will love to wear and feel good about
purchasing!
  

Our Product 

………………………………………………………………………


Need something to wear to work? Need something to wear to that amazing function? Need something to wear on a night on the town? Check, check and check! Dollica designs combine opulent genuine gemstones with chic finishes. Each piece is thoughtfully developed to add a touch of glam to your everyday lifestyle. The collections are stylish and yet everlasting due to the fine materials used in the crafting of each piece. We aim to use recycled precious metals in order to do our part in sustaining our environment and the resources within it. Our featured gemstones will also be sourced responsibly in order to provide a conflict free design. Visit www.Dollicashop.com to find out updates! 





Ready. Set. Go! The Goal 
………………………………………………………………………

With your help, we will be able to fund our dream of working together and combining elements that we are each passionate about. We hope to experience growth in the upcoming year through this development of a collection that is chic and quintessentially beautiful. Our wish is that you will be able to find our brand in boutiques and fine retailers across the nation by 2015. And through quarterly donations to the Breast Cancer foundation of our choice (a 10% portion of all sales for the quarter will be given), together we can help build awareness and support the continuation of ending this disease that affects so many of us on a daily basis. 

  

Our Budget 
………………………………………………………
We have the vision. We have the will. Good Samaritans of the world, we would be greatly appreciative for any donations that you are able to provide. And if you are not able to help in funding we would be thrilled if you help to spread the word about our initiative!!!
Share this, tweet this, pass the word! We need atleast $7800 and we plan to use the funds in the following way:



$3,500 - Materials for the first collection (the cost of gold is currently USD $1285.85 per oz as of Sept. 1st) And we are striving to have a first collection of 20 to 30 different silhouettes. So that’s quite a bit of gold…


$2,500 - The cost of labor. We are utilizing skilled metalsmiths in producing the physical samples. All samples will be produced in the USA.


$1,800- Photography and branding materials (catalog development, advertisements, promotional brochures, line sheets, packaging, displays and office supplies)


Information about our perks: 
*The jewelry featured in our perks are fashion items which are specially themed in support of this year's National Breast Cancer Awareness month. 
* We expect to make the delivery of jewelry perks within the month of October. 
*All jewelry is one size fits all unless you make a special request for sizing. 
Follow us on Twitter @dollicallc to see updates of when to expect the fine jewelry Dollica collection to go into production! Or visit www.dollicashop.com

story:
We sell fine leather goods without the luxury markup.

We started Linjer because we ourselves struggled to find high-quality leather laptop bags that we could actually afford. They all seemed to cost well above $1,200.

At some point we learned of the outrageous markups that luxury brands place on their leather goods. In many cases, retail prices can be 10 or 20 times the production price!

We thought: why don’t we start our own brand, sell directly to customers and cut out all the needless costs? Then more people (including ourselves and our friends) can actually dream of owning beautiful, well-made leather products!

So here we are! Our products are crafted with premium materials alongside products of top luxury brands. We design everything in house. We keep our prices lower by selling directly to customers; cutting out middlemen, storefront costs and inefficient marketing spend; and not marking our products up just because.


We've come to Indiegogo to raise funds so that we can place orders for leather and fund our next production at the factory. We'd be grateful for your help in reaching our fundraising goal of $15,000 USD!




ABOUT LINJER


MATERIALS
We use the best of the best: full-grain, vegetable-tanned leather, YKK Excella zippers, and military-grade polyester thread.


CRAFTSMANSHIP
Our factory supplies the world's top luxury brands and shares our painstaking attention to detail and passion for heirloom-quality products.


DESIGN
Our design is clean and minimalist, in true Scandinavian style. Our logos are always discreet.


FAIR PRICES
We work with the same tanneries and factories as top luxury brands. However, by selling to you directly and reducing inefficient marketing spend, we offer comparable products at a fraction of the price off luxury prices.







BILLFOLD WALLET

$99 Secret launch
$120 Indiegogo
$145 Regular


Compare with luxury brands: $200 - $650


Lean and clean. Our take on the classic wallet. All unnecessary layers eliminated to cut the bulk. The ideal everyday companion.


FEATURES
6 slots for everyday cards, 2 pouches for infrequent-use cards, a banknote section with divider, a hidden pocket for large bills and other secret items


SIZING
11.3cm x 8.5cm
Works great with USD, CAD, AUD, GBP, EUR, HKD, SGD, NOK and more.


COLOURS
Cognac, mocha, navy, black










VERTICAL WALLET

$75 Secret launch
$79 Indiegogo
$95 Regular


Compare with luxury brands: $170 - $530


Simple, compact, and friendly on your thumbs.


FEATURES
4 thumb-friendly slots for everyday cards, 2 pouches for business cards and folded banknotes


SIZING
7.5cm x 11cm
Works great with USD and other currencies with width ≤ 6.6cm
Not ideal for banknotes of CAD, AUD, GBP, EUR, HKD, SGD, NOK


COLOURS
Cognac, mocha, navy, black









CARDHOLDER WALLET

$49 Secret launch
$55 Indiegogo
$65 Regular


Compare with luxury brands: $140 - $265


For the true minimalist - a cardholder for carrying the essentials.


FEATURES
4 thumb-friendly card slots, a pouch for banknotes


SIZING
7.3cm x 10.2cm
Works great with USD, CAD, AUD, GBP, EUR, HKD, SGD, NOK and more.


COLOURS
Cognac, mocha, navy, black









PASSPORT WALLET

$145 Secret launch
$155 Indiegogo
$175 Regular


Compare with luxury brands:
Simple passport sleeves with minimal function: $130 - $200
Regular billfold wallets: $200 - $650


On the move. Organize all your travel documents and tuck them into your back pocket. Comes with a Walkie pen.


FEATURES
1 passport slot; 1 mini pen slot + Walkie pen; 4 card slots; 2 pouches for a second passport, passport photos, or additional cards; 1 long section for boarding passes; 2 smaller sections for currencies and receipts.


SIZING
10.4cm x 15cm
The passport pouch can fit a passport up to 92mm wide, including Canadian passports. As far as we know, Canadian passports are the widest passports out there. All currencies fit.


COLOURS
Cognac, mocha, navy, black









TOTE

$349 Secret launch
$369 Indiegogo
$389 Regular


Compare with luxury brands: $2,300 - $3,700

Grab and go. Carry your laptop and documents in style.


FEATURES
1 zippered pouch and 1 open pouch for phone, keys, etc.


SIZING
33cm wide x 34cm tall (without handle)
Fits a 13" Macbook and charger, with room for two books and a sweater.
A 15" Macbook sticks out about 1.5cm.


COLOURS
Navy, black










SOFT BRIEFCASE

$489 Regular
For discounts, see our bundles below


Compare with luxury brands: $1,200 - $2,600


Stylish and slim. Fit for both the boardroom and your neighbourhood café.


FEATURES
Adjustable shoulder strap, metal feet, padded laptop pouch, easy-access slip pouch, and smaller pouches to organize your things


SIZING
41.5cm x 29.5cm x 6.5cm
Fits a 15" Macbook


COLOURS
Cognac, navy



br>






PORTFOLIO

$329 Regular
For discounts, see our bundles below


Compare with luxury brands: $1,100 - $1,700

Practical and beautiful. An instant upgrade to your wardrobe.


FEATURES
Collapsible handle on spine, 3 pouches for paper (A4 or letter), 1 card pouch with plastic window, 10 pouches for cards, 1 flap pocket, 1 pen holder


SIZING
33.3cm wide x 26.5cm tall x 2.5cm thick
Comfortably fits a 13" Macbook Air


COLOURS
Cognac, mocha, navy, black



 







OUR LEATHER


We use only the best vegetable-tanned, full grain leather.
We're sure you'll love it.


WHAT DOES "VEGETABLE-TANNED" MEAN?

Vegetable tanning is the traditional tanning method refined by the Spanish, Italians and French during the Renaissance. Today it makes up only 10% of leather produced. Unaided by potent chemicals, vegetable tanning takes much longer than chrome tanning (several weeks/months vs a day). As a result, it can be more expensive…but it’s worth it. Vegetable-tanned leather looks natural, smells sweet and develops a unique patina over time.


WHAT IS "FULL GRAIN" LEATHER?

The top surface of a hide, or the grain, is the strongest part of the hide. "Full grain" means that the surface has not been buffed or sanded to remove imperfections. It is much longer-lasting and durable than top-grain leather (which has been buffed or sanded) or split-grain leather (which doesn't have any grain at all). Top-grain leather is more prevalent on the market because it's cheaper to buy low-quality leather and buff off the defects than to buy quality hides.


Read more about our leather on our website.





FULFILLMENT SCHEDULE


March 31: Place order with factory

May 15: All material arrives at factory; begin cutting leather

July 1: Finish production

Early July: Begin fulfillment and send you your tracking numbers




FAQ


Q: How do I select multiple perks that aren't an existing Bundle?
A: Simply add up all of the relevant contribution amounts, select the most expensive of your perks, and enter in your custom total contribution amount. We'll send you an email after you order to confirm your selection of items and colours.


Q: How much is shipping?
A: Shipping is free to anywhere in the world!




NOTES


Delivery time: For our first pre-order campaign, we were marginally late with delivery of the first batch of products (~1-2 weeks) as we had some issues with our box manufacturer. However, the first time is always the roughest, and we've since straightened out our supply chain. We're confident that we'll be able to fulfill according to schedule. We'll also try our best to deliver ahead of schedule.

Duty/VAT charges: If you live outside of the US, you will be responsible for any applicable duty/VAT charges.

Customs: Some countries are known for being very slow with customs, and you probably know if you live in one. We're sorry that we can't put a magic stamp on our packages to help them get through faster.

We'll update you frequently about our progress, and if there are any blips along the way, we'll let you know!




ABOUT THE FOUNDERS




Hi! We are Roman and Jenn, the founders of Linjer.


We started Linjer because we ourselves struggled to find high-quality leather goods that didn't break the bank. At some point we learned of the outrageous markups that luxury brands place on their leather goods.


We thought: why don’t we start our own brand, sell directly to customers and cut out all the needless costs? Then more people (including ourselves and our friends) could actually dream of owning beautiful, well-made leather products.


So we did. We spent a couple years preparing our first collection, which we launched on Indiegogo in October. We met our funding goal of $50,000 within 48 hours. The support from our backers enabled us to place our first orders for leather and fund our first production run.


We've already shipped many orders and we're delighted by the enthusiastic reception from our early backers. We're really excited to share our second collection with you!


Thank you for your support!


www.linjer.co



Special thanks to the uber-talented Mark Wickens for photography and video. Thank you also to the team at Floyd for the Floyd legs that supported the table used in our video.

story:
Let me introduce you unique collection of the rings made of common coins, which established because of original manufacturing processes.That is why every coin can be changed to unique ring.                                                                                                                                                       



                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                                

Why indiegoo?

With establishing the project on indiegogo I want to share with other people the hidden beauty, that we do not perceive in normal life. By obtained resource I want to buy a better equipment and buy more coins across the whole world and make absolutely original collection of the rings.






                         



 

         

You can help not only with subsidy, but also with sharing with you friends.
Thank you :-)

story:
ABOUT ME

I’m Thulare Monareng, a South African fashion designer and creator of The Fashion Deli, which is a unique concept store, that I first opened in Cape Town, South Africa in 2011, specializing in ethically produced and sustainable fashion & lifestyle products inspired by and made in Africa 

My DREAM is to bring this concept to New York and I need YOUR help!

 

ABOUT THE FASHION DELI

The creation and launch of The Fashion Deli, was conceived to leverage a niche retail opportunity for eco concious, made in Africa brands, as well as to provide consumers with an exciting, experiential and sustainably conscious retail alternative.

We carefully select and work with some of Africa’s most talented designers, who are committed to ethical & sustainable design as well as the long-term development of Africa’s creative, textile and manufacturing industries.

 

WHY THIS MATTERS

Africa has long been regarded as a mysterious, beautiful and tragic continent. Acknowledged by world leaders as a continent of abounding potential, it is also leading the world of sustainable fashion and has become the go-to destination for ethical designers due to highly skilled artisans, raw materials & rich culture.

Over the past 10 years I have had the pleasure of travelling throughout Africa, meeting  & working with some of these talented designers and artisans and have developed an immense passion and commitment to exposing their vision to the world. It is this journey that inspired the Fashion Deli, and it is my hope that it will inspire you just the same.

 

Our Goals

1. To showcase ethically produced & sustainable fashion and lifestyle products inspired by and made in Africa.

2.  To provide a unique globally focused retail platform for emerging and established African designers, whose exquisite products would otherwise go unrecognized.

3. To build iconic African designer brands and manufacturing capabilities on the continent for the international market.

4. To encourage an awareness of the diversity in talent, ingenuity and creativity found on the African continent.

5.  To challenge misconceptions about Africa and African design, art & culture.

6. To connect with our customers in an experiential and interactive way.

 

ABOUT THE CONCEPT

As opposed to the traditional rails and racks of department stores, The Fashion Deli re-imagines the classic delicatessen as a unique retail experience. With social and ethical responsibility at the core of our business, we adhere to fair trade principles in the sourcing, manufacturing and retail of ALL our products. As a result brands are merchandised in repurposed refrigerators, ice cream freezers and beverage crates, and packaged in recycled pizza boxes, ice cream tubs, brown paper bags and other innovative packaging.

The Fashion Deli teaches the world that sustainability, style and presentation fused with creative interaction is the way forward. It showcases African design differently than expected or typified, through fashion as art and innovative retail. It mirrors the electric energy of contemporary Africa and represents the most promising talent of the Africa’s creative explosion.

 

OUR MISSION

It is our mission to become the world’s pre-eminent purveyor of cutting edge African designer fashion & lifestyle products, as well as to Influence, inform and inspire consumers by stimulating dialogue around contemporary African design, art and culture.

The next step, towards achieving this goal, is to bring the Fashion Deli to New York, for a month long, Pop-Up store, during New York Fashion Week in September. This is strategically intended to broaden brand awareness of The Fashion Deli and our featured designers and products within the US market, as well as laying the foundation for a permanent flagship store in New York, where our market research indicates a lucrative, niche retail opportunity, for our specific brands and products.

Our goal therefore is to raise a total of $175,000 to bring this project to life. Our expenses include store rental in a strategically located area of New York to ensure maximum foot traffic and exposure to our target customers, fixtures & packaging in line with our eco-sustainable delicatessen concept, staff salaries, permits, insurance, travel, promotional costs, utilities, signage fit out and much more.

 

HOW YOU CAN HELP

YOU can help us realize this dream by making a financial contribution to OUR campaign. If you’re not in a position to contribute YOU can help by telling as many of your friends, family and colleagues as possible. You can also help by sharing THIS link, encouraging them to contribute to our great campaign. IN RETURN we are offering discount vouchers and other great giveaways from select designers and brands sold at the Fashion Deli.

 

PRESS

Press about Thulare Monareng
http://issuu.com/thulare/docs/thulare_monareng_lookbook2012_v3

Press about The Fashion Deli

http://issuu.com/thulare/docs/thulare_monareng_fashiondeli2012_v3

 

YOUTUBE

www.youtube.com/thularemonareng 

 

FOLLOW US:

FACEBOOK.COM/THEFASHIONDELI

TWITTER: @THEFASHIONDELI

FACEBOOK.COM/THULAREMONARENG

TWITTER: @THULAREMONARENG

story:
Our Vision:

Simply, a world without hunger.




How will it work?

Each global tie has the potential to feed a defined amount of people. Transparency is our main focus. We strive to ensure that you know exactly what kinds of changes are being made with the funding of Global Ties.

Perks!

There are three bracelets in our first collection of Global Ties:

  • Black Rope with Silver Pendant // Feed 12 Individuals
  • Brown Leather with Rose Gold Pendant // Feed 24 Individuals
  • Black Leather with Gold Pendant // Feed 48 Individuals

Black Rope // Silver

The bracelets have two adjustable knots to fit all.

Brown Leather // Rose Gold

Black Leather // Gold

Social Media // Help Spread Awareness

We can only push our campaign so much. Far greater changes can be enabled if our supporters help to spread the word about Global Ties. Sharing on any social media can be just as powerful as contributing for a bracelet.

It would only take a second to share our project with your loved ones, but it could mean a lifetime for someone in need.

Where will our funds go?

The majority of the funds raised will be allocated for the fulfillment of the defined metrics for each reward. The rest funds will go towards the production, distribution, and marketing of the first collection of Global Ties.

Manufacturing – We have already started production on a small scale. We now need your help to expand our movement on an international scale.

Marketing – You are ones behind powering this movement. We need every supporters' help to spread our message to friends and loved ones.

Growth – If successfully funded, we want to focus our efforts to other causes. We will create new collections of Global Ties among different products that will help create diversified change.

We have been working for the past year to ensure that all goes smoothly with this campaign. We have designed the product, lined up mass production, and partnered with a notable charity. We just need your help now. Each of us can make an impact. 

Our Mission:

To provide a service that creates opportunity for change. Through the power of consumers, we will be able to make a tangible change in the world.

This first campaign will focus on world's single biggest, but solvable issue; hunger.

Your support will contribute to towards the effort of ending hunger in our lifetime. This is done by providing food, sustainable resources, and life saving aid to the world’s most vulnerable as well as creating a global commitment to mobilize the necessary support for transformational development programs.

As we expand our mission, we will be able focus on other global issues such as a Clean Water Initiative, Poverty, HIV/AIDS, and Cancer.

Who we are:

Global Ties is a 501(c)(3) non-profit organization founded in San Francisco and operating in Los Angeles. Founder Steven Elliot is at third year student at UCLA currently.

Our Partners:

No animals were harmed in the manufacturing of our synthetic leather bracelets.

Hi-Res Photos here!
