story:
Veltimera Needs Your Help!

Veltimera is so grateful to be contacted and asked to participate in New
York, London, and Japan Fall Fashion Week this coming Feb/March '14! But,
unfortuntely it cant be done alone! Being a new fashion label still in the
"start-up" phase, funds are very tight! This campaign was started to
reach out for help from anyone who loves fashion, animals, the environment, the
earth and all those who live on it! The exposure and opportunities that will
come with participating in the Fashion Weeks are priceless and extremely
important for Veltimera and the cause to succeed!

All proceeds go towards travel expenses, models, hair and makeup teams, production team, dressers, venue, press and media coverage!

Any donation, whether BIG or small (even something as little as $1) help
Veltimera get one step closer! Amazing Perks are also included with the
donations!

Together WE can change the industry to be all around Eco-friendly!

 

The Perks! (all prices in USD)

$5 - A Little Bit Goes A Long Way

Anything and Everything helps! Veltimera is extremely grateful for all of
the love and support! Thank You!


$25 - Social Shout Out

Be featured with other contributors on all of Veltimera's social media sites
and website www.veltimera.com!


$45 - Thank You Postcard

Receive a hand made, personalized Veltimera Thank-You Postcard! Contains:
(1) Veltimera illustration sketch made of recycled glossy paper and (1)
personal hand written Thank You note


$75 - Veltimera on the Big Screen

Can't come to the shows but interested in watching the action? Receive a
limited edition DVD collection of Veltimera debuting at Fashion Week! New York,
London, and Japan right in the comfort of your own home!


$135 - Welcome Home Veltimera

Receive the limited edition Veltimera DVD collection with an added Bonus DVD
containing exclusive backstage footage and behind the scenes! Includes a
personally created photo album filled with fun Polaroids of the show, and your
name personalized on the cover!

(Best part is: The Photo album will be made of recycled materials!)


$250 - Complete Outfit

10% OFF! Choose (1) complete Veltimera outfit that includes (1) Blouse and
(1) Pants, Shorts, or Skirt, coming straight off the runway!
(value $280)


$280 - Veltimera Cocktail

Choose (1) hand made and beautifully designed Veltimera Cocktail dress
directly off the runway! Be one of few people in the world to own the design!


$400 - Chic It Up

10% OFF Complete Veltimera Outfit straight from the runway! Includes (1)
Jacket or Vest (1) Blouse (1) Pants, Shorts, or Skirt
(Value $480)


$1200 - Red Carpet Ready

Choose any (1) beautifully designed, hand made Veltimera Gown, coming to you
directly off the runway! Be one of few in the world to own the exclusive
design!


$1330 - Tea With The Queen

10% OFF your choice of (1) Handmade Veltimera Gown and (1) Exclusively
designed Cocktail dress  (value $1480)


$2000- Your Ultimate Wardrobe

15% OFF steal of the century! Your choice of (1) beautifully crafted
Veltimera gown (1) exclusive cocktail dress (1) Jacket or Vest (3) Blouses (3)
Pants, Shorts, or Skirts (value $2290)


OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

Can't donate at the moment, but want this fundraiser to gain
momentum? Spread the word about this fundraiser! Email your friends
the link, facebook message or tweet them, tell people by word of mouth.
Every action makes this project closer to becoming a reality.

Behind Veltimera:

Creator and Designer Angelica Chavez came up with the concept of Veltimera
during her early years as a teenager. Always having a passion for fashion growing
up, she eventually began the start up process in September 2012 for her very own
Fashion Label: Veltimera. After extensive well-rounded research in all aspects of the Fashion Industry, Angelica was left speechless after stumbling upon its dark side. Being exposed to videos showing unethical treatment to animals for their skin and slave labor in top brand label factories, inspired Angelica to create a fashion line with a cause.

All Veltimera apparel is made in the heart of Los Angeles, using only materials that are organic, recycled, vegetable dyed, and sourced from ethically certified fair-trade companies around the world. Her drive behind the designs are not only to create beautifully crafted apparel, but to spread awareness on the effects that everyday actions in the Fashion Industry have on families in impoverished countries, animals, and the overall environment.

story:
Funding ended, order your wallet right now at:

www.pyramidwallet.com



Super thin and lightweight, durable and simple to use, eye catching and stylish - it's all about your Pyramid Wallet!



You can use it as cardholder or add some cash and business cards - in any case everyone around would find out your style awesome!


Pyramid Wallets are built using real, solid and high quality materials, not cheap plastic, faux leather or Tyvek, and built handmade.


It's not mass production faceless clones! Each Pyramid Wallet assembled one by one, after you tell us which exotic hardwood from our wide assortment you prefer, which metal, leather color and additional options you want to see in your Wallet!


And yes, you can't open a beer with it :) It's handmade piece of art, which cost a lot, don't even try! Like beer? Buy also our Pyramid Wallet bottle opener keychain!


Not only modern design counts, it's also durable and simple to use!


Don't have problems with money? Want to have accessorie which would confirm your status and taste? Yes, you can buy some famous brand wallet. But looks like most of your friends already have something similar?..

Limited Edition Pyramid Wallet is for you! Made with 5460 years old Bog Oak wood insert and Titanium border, packaged with Rosewood and leather gift box, your wallet would be really hard to compete with. Radiocarbon date certificate will be included. Only 30 pcs per year production limit!




Other higher resolution pictures of wood, metal and leather available here: 

All thirty wood insert samples with Aluminum border: http://imgur.com/a/W7xxN 

All thirty wood insert samples with Titanium border: http://imgur.com/a/bWKGm 

All thirty leather samples, with embroidery and without: http://imgur.com/a/UfEaJ



Pyramid Wallet accounts in social networks: 

Twitter: http://bit.ly/PyramidWalletTwit 

Facebook: http://bit.ly/PyramidWalletFB 

Pinterest: http://bit.ly/PyramidWalletPin 

Google+: http://bit.ly/PyramidWalletGPlus 

Vine: http://bit.ly/PyramidWalletVine

 

Now, few words about different Pyramid Wallets from less expensive to most expensive:

1) Pyramid Wallet Mini:




-- Up to thirty exotic hardwood types
-- No leather for vegetarians and vegans
-- Aluminum or Titanium border
-- Additional options: gift packaging and wood burned edge
-- Holds up to 8 credit cards and five notes fourfold
-- Sized same as any credit card, thickness 10mm with 8 cards, weight from 16g (yes, only 16g, half of ounce!!!)
-- Cost only fraction of Pyramid Wallet Original


2) Pyramid Wallet Original:



(ukrainian embroidery is an option)

-- Up to thirty exotic hardwood types
-- Up to thirty Italian leather colors
-- Aluminum or Titanium border
-- Additional options:gift packaging, wood burned edge, paper money clip, embroidery, QR code
-- Holds up to 7 credit cards and up to five notes with paper money clip option
-- Up to 13500 assembly combinations depends from stretch goal reached
-- Sizes same as any credit card, thickness 13mm, weight from 40g (aluminum) to 55g (titanium)


3) Limited Edition Pyramid Wallet:




-- Manufacturing limit, only 30pcs per year
-- 5460 years old Bog Oak wood insert, pure black color
-- Rosewood and leather gift box with Pyramid Wallet logo
-- Bog Oak radiocarbon date certificate copy included
-- Magnesium Alloy border available, in case if we reach Stretch Goal #5


Additional options:

1) Wood Burned Edge option, for more customization! Available with Pyramid Wallet Original and Pyramid Wallet Mini ($8).


2) Gift Packaging option! Craft paper, natural jute cord, sealed using sealing wax stamp with Pyramid Wallet logo, made using cold enamel. Available with Pyramid Wallet Original and Pyramid Wallet Mini ($12).


3) Paper Money Clip option for those, who not ready to forget about paper money! Holds up to five banknotes, fourfold. Available with Pyramid Wallet Original ($15).


4) QR Code laser engraving option. Lost your wallet? Finder would scan QR Code at your wallet and receive your contacts to return it to you! Try to scan this picture by your smartphone and you would get a link to our Twitter page (QR Code reader app needed)! Available with Pyramid Wallet Original and Limited Edition Pyramid Wallet ($25).


5) Traditional Ukrainian cross-stitch Embroidery option, performed handmade by master. One of the most eye-catching elements of wallet, available with Pyramid Wallet Original and Limited Edition Pyramid Wallet ($45).
("Prosperity" word embroidered, would definitely bring more wealth!)


How it works:

1) Deside which wallet you wish, Pyramid Wallet Mini, Pyramid Wallet Original or Limited Edition and select a Perk accordingly
2) Deside which additional options you want and calculate Total Amount as a sum of wallet cost and additional options cost.
3) In "How much would you like to contribute?" field type in Total Amount calculated and click "Continue" to contribute.
4) We will contact you when project ends, to clarify which wood type and leather color you wish, as well as additional options list and other details, to be 100% sure that you receive exactly what you expect!


Goals:

Initial Goal (if project reach $5000):

(Choose between this five Wood Insert types (Birdseye Maple, Mayan Walnut, Purple Hearth, Red Hearth, Bocote) and five Leather colors (Distressed Collection: Anthracite, Chaps, Brass. Kenya Collection: Aluminum, Amber)

Stretch Goal #1 (if project reach $10000):

(Additional five Wood Insert types (Jatoba, Bolivian Rosewood, Shedua, Red Oak, Canarywood) and five Leather colors (Distressed Collection: Chocolate, Denim. Kenya Collection: Arctic, Blue Jay, Brick Red).

Stretch Goal #2 (if project reach $15000):

(Additional five Wood Insert types (Honduras Rosewood, Wenge, East Indian Rosewood, Hickory, Curly Hard Maple) and five Leather types (Distressed Collection: Fennel, Garnet, Irish Cream. Kenya Collection: Charcoal, Cigar).

Stretch Goal #3 (if project reach $20000):

(Additional five Wood Insert types (Bubinga, Walnut, Genuine Mahogany, Curly Cherry, Yellow Hearth) and five Leather types (Distressed Collection: Moccasin, Nutmeg. Kenya Collection: Clay, Clove, Crimson).

Stretch Goal #4 (if project reach $25000):

(Additional five Wood Insert types (Padauk, Zebrawood, Honey Locust, White Oak, Lacewood) and five Leather types (Distressed Collection: Oyster, Palomino, Paprika. Kenya Collection: Kelp, Latte).

Stretch Goal #5 (if project reach $30000):

(Additional five Wood Insert types (Chechen, African Mahogany, White Ash, Cherry, Goncalo Alves) and five Leather types (Distressed Collection: Russet, Verde. Kenya Collection: Mushroom, Pine, Sapphire).

Few more pictures!




About me!


Business owner, live in Kyiv, Ukraine! Married, have two childrens! Have more questions about me or project - ask!

Thanks guys! Please tell all your friends about my project!!!

Limited Edition Pyramid Wallet is for you! Made with 5460 years old Bog Oak wood insert and Titanium border, packaged with Rosewood and leather gift box, your wallet would be really hard to compete with. Radiocarbon date certificate will be included. Only 30 pcs per year production limit!



Other higher resolution pictures of wood, metal and leather available here: 
All thirty wood insert samples with Aluminum border: http://imgur.com/a/W7xxN 
All thirty wood insert samples with Titanium border: http://imgur.com/a/bWKGm 
All thirty leather samples, with embroidery and without: http://imgur.com/a/UfEaJ

Pyramid Wallet accounts in social networks: 
Twitter: http://bit.ly/PyramidWalletTwit 
Facebook: http://bit.ly/PyramidWalletFB 
Pinterest: http://bit.ly/PyramidWalletPin 
Google+: http://bit.ly/PyramidWalletGPlus 
Vine: http://bit.ly/PyramidWalletVine
 
Now, few words about different Pyramid Wallets from less expensive to most expensive:
1) Pyramid Wallet Mini:

-- Up to thirty exotic hardwood types
-- No leather for vegetarians and vegans
-- Aluminum or Titanium border
-- Additional options: gift packaging and wood burned edge
-- Holds up to 8 credit cards and five notes fourfold
-- Sized same as any credit card, thickness 10mm with 8 cards, weight from 16g (yes, only 16g, half of ounce!!!)
-- Cost only fraction of Pyramid Wallet Original

2) Pyramid Wallet Original:

(ukrainian embroidery is an option)

-- Up to thirty exotic hardwood types
-- Up to thirty Italian leather colors
-- Aluminum or Titanium border
-- Additional options:gift packaging, wood burned edge, paper money clip, embroidery, QR code
-- Holds up to 7 credit cards and up to five notes with paper money clip option
-- Up to 13500 assembly combinations depends from stretch goal reached
-- Sizes same as any credit card, thickness 13mm, weight from 40g (aluminum) to 55g (titanium)

3) Limited Edition Pyramid Wallet:

-- Manufacturing limit, only 30pcs per year
-- 5460 years old Bog Oak wood insert, pure black color
-- Rosewood and leather gift box with Pyramid Wallet logo
-- Bog Oak radiocarbon date certificate copy included
-- Magnesium Alloy border available, in case if we reach Stretch Goal #5

Additional options:
1) Wood Burned Edge option, for more customization! Available with Pyramid Wallet Original and Pyramid Wallet Mini ($8).



2) Gift Packaging option! Craft paper, natural jute cord, sealed using sealing wax stamp with Pyramid Wallet logo, made using cold enamel. Available with Pyramid Wallet Original and Pyramid Wallet Mini ($12).



3) Paper Money Clip option for those, who not ready to forget about paper money! Holds up to five banknotes, fourfold. Available with Pyramid Wallet Original ($15).



4) QR Code laser engraving option. Lost your wallet? Finder would scan QR Code at your wallet and receive your contacts to return it to you! Try to scan this picture by your smartphone and you would get a link to our Twitter page (QR Code reader app needed)! Available with Pyramid Wallet Original and Limited Edition Pyramid Wallet ($25).



5) Traditional Ukrainian cross-stitch Embroidery option, performed handmade by master. One of the most eye-catching elements of wallet, available with Pyramid Wallet Original and Limited Edition Pyramid Wallet ($45).


("Prosperity" word embroidered, would definitely bring more wealth!)

How it works:
1) Deside which wallet you wish, Pyramid Wallet Mini, Pyramid Wallet Original or Limited Edition and select a Perk accordingly
2) Deside which additional options you want and calculate Total Amount as a sum of wallet cost and additional options cost.
3) In "How much would you like to contribute?" field type in Total Amount calculated and click "Continue" to contribute.
4) We will contact you when project ends, to clarify which wood type and leather color you wish, as well as additional options list and other details, to be 100% sure that you receive exactly what you expect!

Goals:
Initial Goal (if project reach $5000):

  (Choose between this five Wood Insert types (Birdseye Maple, Mayan Walnut, Purple Hearth, Red Hearth, Bocote) and five Leather colors (Distressed Collection: Anthracite, Chaps, Brass. Kenya Collection: Aluminum, Amber)

Stretch Goal #1 (if project reach $10000):

  (Additional five Wood Insert types (Jatoba, Bolivian Rosewood, Shedua, Red Oak, Canarywood) and five Leather colors (Distressed Collection: Chocolate, Denim. Kenya Collection: Arctic, Blue Jay, Brick Red).

Stretch Goal #2 (if project reach $15000):

  (Additional five Wood Insert types (Honduras Rosewood, Wenge, East Indian Rosewood, Hickory, Curly Hard Maple) and five Leather types (Distressed Collection: Fennel, Garnet, Irish Cream. Kenya Collection: Charcoal, Cigar).

Stretch Goal #3 (if project reach $20000):

  (Additional five Wood Insert types (Bubinga, Walnut, Genuine Mahogany, Curly Cherry, Yellow Hearth) and five Leather types (Distressed Collection: Moccasin, Nutmeg. Kenya Collection: Clay, Clove, Crimson).

Stretch Goal #4 (if project reach $25000):

  (Additional five Wood Insert types (Padauk, Zebrawood, Honey Locust, White Oak, Lacewood) and five Leather types (Distressed Collection: Oyster, Palomino, Paprika. Kenya Collection: Kelp, Latte).

Stretch Goal #5 (if project reach $30000):

  (Additional five Wood Insert types (Chechen, African Mahogany, White Ash, Cherry, Goncalo Alves) and five Leather types (Distressed Collection: Russet, Verde. Kenya Collection: Mushroom, Pine, Sapphire).


Few more pictures!



About me!

Business owner, live in Kyiv, Ukraine! Married, have two childrens! Have more questions about me or project - ask!

Thanks guys! Please tell all your friends about my project!!!

story:
What is "The Gravity Edge Belt" better known as "The G Belt"

“The G Belt” is a exercise and fitness training enhancement product which can be used safely by runners, walkers, fitness and aerobic personnel, anyone training for any other leg related sport and people looking to lose weight quicker.  It is an adjustably weighted belt and is adjustable from 1 to 9 pounds.  It has a very specific memory foam cushioning system which allows the user to comfortably wear the belt around their waist or center of gravity and keeps the belt from moving around along with making sure the user doesn’t get bruised or chafed.  The weight itself goes all the way around the belt so that the user will always maintain perfect balance while wearing the belt.  It is made of water proof materials so it can get wet and dirty and yet clean up easily in a sink or shower without harming the belt especially the memory foam.
    “The G Belt” was designed so that it would safely help runners, walkers, aerobic personnel and all other athletes become better at what they do while performing the same activities in the same amount of time they already do now.  It will make the user faster, stronger and in the case where the user is trying to lose weight the belt will help because it makes the user burn more calories when they use the belt in their workouts.  Once funded I will be able to get the belts made so that everyone needing to improve their performance will be able to do so in less time.  Please help me help the athletes, military, police and firemen.

(Click here for more information and educational Videos)
    

Who Really Can Benefit From "The G Belt"?

Runners: While running the same mileage and workouts you already do now only with the added weight around your center of gravity forcing you to work harder, get stronger legs and a fitter cardiovascular sysytem.  Then on race day you leave the belt at home and you show up feeling lighter, stronger, faster and race faster times. "(The PR Maker) Belt"

Walkers:  You do the same walks at the same pace for the same milage you already do now but with the added weight around your center of gravity you get stronger, slimmer legs and burn more calories per mile causing you to lose weight quicker than you would have without the belt.  "(The Body Slimmer, Fat Burning) Belt"

Aerobic Personnel and Dancers:  You go to your aerobc or dance class or stay at home performing your activities in front of your TV only now with the added weight around your center of gravity.  No matter what activity you do your legs and cardiovascular system are forced to work harder, you burn more calories per hour and end up making yourself a stronger leaner you.  "(The Weight Lose, Fitness) Belt"

Sport Athletes:  You go to practice and follow the same practice routines and activities your coach always has you perform.  The difference now is the added weight around your center of gravity will make every activity you perform harder allowing you to get more out of your practice in the same amount or less time.  You get stronger, faster, quicker, jump higher, become more agile and on game day perform better than you ever have before which then helps your team to victory.  "(The Game Changer) Belt" or "(The Scholarship Producing) Belt"

Military Soldiers:  You need to be fit to stay alive in combat or to support other combat troops.  Every branch of the Military performs some form of PT ( Physical Training ) and utilizes many different exercises and activities.  With the extra weight around a soldiers center of gravity they will be forced to work harder and benefit by getting stronger and fitter in less time than they would have without the belt.  The military then gets a stronger, faster, fitter fighting force in less time.  "(The Super Soldier) Belt"

Police and Firemen:  To save lives while keeping temselves alive in the process all police and firemen personnel train especially hard to get into and stay in top shape.  There are many ways they accomplish this but in every case if they increase the weight around their center of gravity they will achieve more in a faster time frame.  Then while on duty they will better be able to serve and protect better than they ever have before.  "(The Saves More Lives) Belt"

 

Funding Needed:

We need $30,000.00 to send to the manufacturer so that they can make the belts.  This money covers materials and labor.  I can’t sell the belt to anyone needing it until they get made.  Due to economy of scale and the price of the materials the more I have the manufacturer make the less the price is to make each one.  These are the savings I want to pass on to the comsumer so I am hoping to see at least 750 sold for the first run.

***IMPORTANT NOTICE*** 

Delivery Schedule:

Due to the ramp up of manufacturing there will be a restriction put on the delivery dates of the belts ordered.  I hope everyone will be patient with us while we get through these early months of production.  These will be established on a first to order the belt will be the first to receive the belt basis.  Shortly after this campaign is over everyone who has ordered a belt will receive an email update which will give you an approximate date of delivery of the belt you have ordered.  To get the belt soonest you must try and be one of the first to place your order.  The number amounts and delivery dates will go as follows:  

The first 500 orders of “The G Belt” will get made and delivered starting May 01, 2013 until July 01, 2013.  After that any other belts ordered will be delivered after July 01, 2013 but no later than September 01, 2013 no matter what the number of belts that get ordered.  After September 01, 2013 any belts ordered will be shipped out with no more than a two week wait.  


What are Athletes Looking for?

Athletes are always looking for an edge to make themselves better, faster and stronger athletes so their chances of winning go up.  Other people need or want to lose weight so they can be healthier and look better.  In both cases, some people have chosen not so safe, legal or healthy ways of achieving their goals.  Blood doping, steroids and very unhealthy weight lose drugs find their way into these peoples lives.  We read about this in the news way to often. 

One of the ways which can help prevent this from happening is the use of the Gravity Edge Belt or “The G Belt” by these athletes and weight lose personnel.  "The G Belt" will help these personnel achieve their goals without having to seek out the alternative bad solutions.  We especially want to help the younger people choose "The G Belt" over the alternatives so that they can achieve greater results while staying clean and healthy.  In the end we hope to help everyone looking to better themselves as an athlete, fitness or weight lose personnel so that they may achieve all of their own personnal endeavors and goals. 

Victory Within Reach!!!  Go Ahead, EXCEL!!!

This Campaigns Main Objectives:   

As part of this campaign we are not only hoping to raise the money we need to get "The G Belt's" manufactured but to get the word out that there is now a better alternative to better training and training practices.  Please if you know anyone you think could use this product let them know right away.  If you know or can get in contact with your local Athletic Director or School Coaches please lead them to this campaign so they can take advantage of the group discounts for all of their athletes and kids.  If you know of a Soldier, Policemen or Firemen also let them know about this new product and the many ways it can help them in their endevors.  Even if the only people you know are simply fighting their own weight gains and loses can be greatly helped by this product and should be told of it's existance. 

Together we can all help make better, safer, healthier persons and athletes of everyone we know.

 

     

What's Included with "The G Belt":

  • Carrying Case:  This handy 14" x 12" x 6" carrying case will hold not only "The G Belt" itself, with it's two weighted bean bags, but can also carry other accessories that you may need to when you're on the go.  It comes with both a Velcro enclosure handle and an over-the-shoulder sling for ease in carrying.  ( Pictured Above )
  • Two Weighted Bean Bags:  There are two different weighted bean bags which will come with each size Belt.  The Small Belt will come with 1 1/2 and 3 1/2 pound bean bags.  The Medium Belt will come with 2 and 4 pound bean bags.  And the Large Belt will come with 3 and 5 pound bean bags.
  • Instructional and Warranty Information: The information will have instructions for all care and maintenance of the Belt as well as the warranty information. 

 Not Included but Available Seperatly:

  • How-to Videos:  In May 2013 you will find free videos on how to train with the Belt for all ability levels, including videos for using "The G Belt" in other activities such as Aerobics and all other athletic sports.  These and other videos will all be available online on our web site.
  • Attachable Accessories:  We will have MP3 and Phones Holders for all the various makes and models which will attach to the front left Velcro section of the belt.  We will also offer a Utility Carrying Case which will attach in the same area and can be used to carry money, cards, keys, or any other small items you may want to take with you on your workout.
  • Heavier weighted bean bags: will be available this summer as a sold seperatly item for anyone wanting to add even more weight to "The G Belt".

 

"The G Belt's" Many Features:

  • Three Sizes of The Belt:  The Small Belt fits 26" to 30" waist lines, The Medium Belt fits 30" to 34" waist lines and the Large Belt fits 34" to 38" waist lines.
  • Two 360 Degree Weight Chambers:  These allow for easy changing of the two different weighted Bean Bags and hold the weighted Bean Bags tightly and securely around the wearer's waist.
  • Two Differently Weighted Bean Bags:  There are two differently weighted bean bags for each size Belt, making for three differently weighted options for each size Belt.  The Small Belt comes with 1 1/2 and 3 1/2 pound bean bags and makes the three weighted options for this size belt either 1, 2 1/2, 4 1/2 or 6 pounds.  The Medium Belt comes with 2 and 4 pound bean bags and makes the three weighted options for this size belt either 1, 3, 5 or 7 pounds.  The Large Belt comes with 3 and 5 pound bean bags and makes the three weighted options for this size belt either 1, 4, 6 or 9 pounds.
  • 360 Degree Memory Foam Padding: The Memory Foam is a specially selected foam which compresses to form a thin but very protective comfort layer around the wearer's waist.  It protects the wearer from chafing and bruising and makes the Belt very comfortable to wear.
  • Velcro Strapping:  This allows the wearer to easily put the Belt on and also allows for easy size adjustments.  We will later be using a hook and loop fastener to accomplish the same thing
  • Velcro Patch Area:  This area is found in the front section of the Belt and allows the wearer to attach many different items when on the go.  You will be able to attach your favorite music device, phone or pouch, which could hold almost anything such as your money, keys, ID or cards.  We will later be using a hook and loop fastener to accomplish the same thing.
  • Ear Phone Cord Holder:  This keeps the ear phone cord safely out of the wearer's way in the back of the belt and allows for ease of exercise without your cord getting in the way.
  • Waterproof Material:  The entire Belt is made with high strength waterproof material to ensure it holds up to all sorts of weather, sweat and use.  It allows for easy cleaning after use with a simple washing in the sink or shower and drys quickly afterwards so it is ready for the next use.

Additional Scienctific Information:

The Natural Force known as "Gravity":

Running and almost all other sports require you to push your body as fast and as far as you can.  You do this by exerting your body weight against the natural force of gravity.  Regardless of your size and weight, your body over time learns to adapt. 
The more you train against the force of gravity, the more efficiently your body adjusts to it and the faster and further you can run and perform all athletic endeavors. 

"The Gravity Edge Belt" Advantage:

Now, increase your own body weight during your training and your body will adapt even more to the force of gravity to overcome it’s basic effect.  You will gradually become stronger and faster, because of the added weight.  In short, you will accomplish more.  Once you have become stronger and faster by training at the heavier weight, we want you to do the following:

          Remove the added weight on your race or game day.  Here is what you will experience: 

You will instantly feel lighter, stronger, and faster.  We guarantee you will excel like never before.  You will feel as if you are defying nature and gravity’s effect, and you will feel stronger and run faster and further on your race or game day than you ever thought possible.

Here at Sport and Fitness Propulsion we have developed the perfect way to accomplish this instant weight gain, which in turn will allow you to push harder against gravity and in time accomplish much more than ever before. 

It’s called “The Gravity Edge Belt,” better known as “The G Belt.”


Go Ahead, EXCEL !!!

                               

Professional Introduction:

Hello:  My name is James Garrett, President and CEO of Sport and Fitness Propulsion.  I am a former national class distance runner and winner of three of the seven marathons I competed in.  I have a Sport Management degree from Slippery Rock University were I studied Anatomy, Anatomy and Physiology, Exercise Physiology, and Kinesiology just to name a few of the studies I have taken.  It is the running and school experience that helped me design and develop my new product “The Gravity Edge Belt” better known as “The G Belt”. (Click here for full Bio:)

story:
Who We Are

Printworks Screen Printing Ltd. is a small, independent screen printing company located in uptown Saint John, New Brunswick. Owned and operated by Mike Davidson and Stephanie Butler, we've been designing and printing customized apparel for local individuals and businesses since 2012. We started the business in our basement, and have grown to our current 1500 sq ft location at the Exchange Building on Canterbury Street over the last three years.

The Idea

In 2017, Canada will be celebrating 150 years since Confederation. Our new line of apparel will help Canadians celebrate this milestone, while showing their pride and patriotism for our great country. Strong & Free Apparel will let us wear our hearts on our sleeve (so to speak)!

For this project, we are partnering with Canada Strong & Free Emblem creator Denise Dow (as an official licensee) to design and print a new line of t-shirts and other apparel based on the Strong & Free brand.

That's where you come in! We are raising funds to purchase blank apparel inventory, online advertising, and photography for our website. Printworks will be designing and producing this new line of apparel from our shop in uptown Saint John, using Canadian manufactured items when available.

We have already established social media identities and have begun building our audience for the website launch. Here are our official pages:

Website: http://strongandfreeapparel.com and http://strongandfreeapparel.ca
Facebook: https://www.facebook.com/strongandfreeapparel
Twitter: https://twitter.com/StrongFreeGear
Instagram: https://instagram.com/strongandfreeapparel/
Google+: https://plus.google.com/+Strongandfreeapparelcanada

What You Get

If you choose to support our campaign, you'll be helping a small business with big dreams get a start in Saint John. PLUS you'll receive a bag of treats from the Strong & Free Apparel collection:

  • T-shirts
  • Hoodies
  • Tote Bags
  • Decals
  • Leather Messenger Bags
Strong & Free Leather Messenger Bag 
We are pleased to be launching our new Strong & Free leather messenger bag manufactured in Roots' Canadian factory:

Other Ways You Can Help

If you can't contribute to our campaign, you can still help! Please share our campaign with your friends and family. You can also find us on Facebook, Twitter, and Google+ – follow us and help spread the word!

Thank you, we appreciate your support!

story: IMPORTANT: To see the slide show go to, www. youtube.com, & search, "GENEPOOL APPAREL" (it does exist}.   Hello & Welcome to a possible future. My name is William Ladeau .In 2002 I was awarded a USPTO PATENT for a "new and usefull" denim/jean accessory item. After having all the big faceless brand names, and big box retailers slam the door in my face,, I've decided to go DIRECT TO THE PEOPLE.  I call them,  "POCKETS". Why? Because that's really the whole thing in a nut shell . A classic jean "appearance", with fully functioning pockets. Let's face the facts, women just can't cut their shorts short enough. They cut,and cut,and cut, until there's almost nothing left.  There's a "GOAL"  being sought in all that cutting..,to show what's underneath !!! Using reverse engineering, and negative space. Starting with the pockets, I've created an add-on blue jean accessory that allows the wearer to show off her figure,swimwear or leggings,and jeans, AT THE SAME TIME!!!  All this while still having five functioning pockets and the asthetics of a traditional jean. Great design must have two importatant qualities."POCKETS" is aperfect balance of FORM vs. FUNCTION. A fanny pack, "GONE WILD",  I've spent my own money and time securing all the required fore plannig needed to manufacture. The patterns,fittings,adjustments,and sampling is done.All trim materials have been sourced. The FTC has issued me an RN nuber.  Leather patch tooling/die charges are paid for, and ready to go,along with care lables, and size tags are in inventory. I am seeking funding to purchase denim and lining.The factory will cut/sew/wash, and ship directly to you. I've set a rewards ship date of Dec. 15th to allow for expected delays. Market research has indicated a suggested retail potential of up to $80. per pair if sold in stores. If you act now you can get a limited first edition pair of "POCKETS" for the low wholesale pledge price of only $25. You will also recieve a numbered certificate of authenticity and a promotional order form to get a SECOND UNIT for only the cost of shipping/processing for referring a single sale  {at  $44. } to a friend. There is nothing even close to the simplicity,innovative design, and excitement being generated by this product. Isn't it time for you to, "WEAR WHAT YOU WILL "   Thank you for your support, Wm. Ladeau/GENEPOOL APPAREL CO.

story:
Short Summary

State Line is ALL about regional pride and representing where you are from, no matter where you go. 

I got the idea for State Line one day at work in Las Vegas, NV. This particular job gave me the opportunity to meet people every day from all over the world. While we all come from different places, one thing we all had in common was our sense of pride and joy that comes over us when we get the question"Where are you from?" I began noticing that this passion was common amongst everyone, regardless of region! I instantly started thinking of ways I could create something for everyone that embodies that euphoric feeling we feel when discussing our home towns. 

That is how State Line came to fruition! This campaign is important because it gives us all a voice, an opportunity to put our cities and states "on the map". Your contributions will help this come to past.

What We Need & What You Get

I need to raise $800 to at least get started. The money will help fund my first two designs that you see in the video. Any more contributions, like maybe my stretch goal of $2,500, will allow me to expand my designs, grow the brand and get more cities and states represented at the beginning of launching rather than further down the line.

As a result of your contributions not only will a new and unique clothing brand be launched, but you will receive something tangible for your participation. These perks can range anywhere from a personal shout out on our website, hand written thank you post card, logo stickers, to even merchandise!

If we are unable to reach our entire goal, the funds received will still go towards developing the brand and bringing to the market whatever we can afford.


    The Impact

    It's time that there is a brand that is the voice for everyone, every where. Yes, there are city based brands but none embody the entire nation. None speak to the values that we learned growing up in our homes that we take with us everywhere. Life sends us to different places, why not be reminded of where we started the journey by displaying it on our chests.

    Risks & Challenges

    The biggest risk is time! But, we are dedicated to putting in whatever is necessary to make this dream a reality. Our activity on social networks speaks to how serious we are about this brand. And the words of encouragement the public has given us lets us know that you are also excited about the possibilities!

    Other Ways You Can Help

    Even without a monetary contribution your reach to various other people can be a huge help to us. Sharing our campaign on popular social networks or with anyone you think might be interested will go a long way and we would greatly appreciate it!

story:
Boutique on Wheels

We all love food trucks...so why not a fashion truck? Mobile shops have sprung up all over the West Coast, and it is now time for the greater NYC area to share in the love. Nomad will feature a carefully curated selection of funky & affordable ladies' fashions (and a few items for the guys too!) We strive to become a (mobile) destination where local artists can showcase their designs, and where customers can purchase wallet friendly, one-of-a-kind items in a fun and intimate space.

Our plan is to pop-up shop on the streets of Hoboken, NJ, park our truck at various NYC Flea Markets, visit colleges, and provide private party services.

But first, we need the truck.

In The Driver's Seat

I got the idea for Nomad in the early summer of 2012. In the two years since I had graduated from college, I'd held four jobs, all of which I disliked. I was plagued by my early-twenties-state-of-confusion, and got increasingly fed up letting my age determine my state of being.

It was then that I promised myself, I was going to love what I do, to truly enjoy getting up for work each day. Combining my love for travel, style, and self-expression, I formed Nomad Boutique, LLC in September and have been working fiercely around the clock to make our forecasted April 1st launch a reality.

I've enlisted close friend, Matt Friend, as my Head of Operations, and together we will run the day to day, road to road, efforts of this enterprise.

Finding funding for such a venture when you are young and have limited resources can be tasking, but there is not a doubt in my mind that we will accomplish this. Your help in purchasing this truck will bring us one step closer to hittin' the road.

Your Contribution

While the overhead costs for a mobile retail shop are less than those of a traditional brick-and-mortar boutique, we still have a vast list of start-up expenses. However, one of our top priorities is the truck, and that is where you come in.

We are asking Indiegogo for $10,000, of which:

$8,000: used Chevy P30 Stepvan

$2,000: interior and exterior renovations for truck (matched with $2,000 of my own savings)

Anything additional will go towards the start up of our base inventory.

On The Road

Any help (even a hug!) takes us one step closer to getting Nomad on the road. Please help spread word of this IndieGoGo Campaign, and drop us a line if you are a designer interested in having your goods on the truck!

story:
Who We Are

We are the UCSB Wrestling team. Our club consists of about 15 students and community members who either want to get in shape, compete, or get back on the mat a few times a week to reconnect with the sport they love. We do more than just wrestle. We participate  in community projects such as restoration projects around the Goleta area and beach clean ups (Pictures are included in our gallery). We also helped the Save Olympic Wrestling Campaign this past spring by holding an event and donating all of our proceeds to the cause. We are under the recreation sports department for our campus and compete in the National Collegiate Wrestling Association (NCWA). However, we do not receive funding and most of our money comes out of our own pocket. This year both our regional and national tournaments will be out of state (Regionals in Utah and Nationals in Texas) and therefore is beyond the budgets of financially challenged students. We leave our hearts and spirits out on the mat three times a week in addition to team weight lifting, runs, and other workouts. It would be very disappointing if all of our hard work goes to waste because of financial deficiency and complications. We would extremely appreciate any contribution from your part, whether it be through donated funds or spreading the word; it will make everything worthwhile knowing that we have the support from people like you.


Our Goal 

We hope to obtain a minimum of $2500 donated to our cause. We require the money for both our regional and national competitions. This money will help pay for:

  • Registration Fees
  • Plane Tickets
  • Lodging
  • Rental Vehicles
  • Gas
  • Food

Again, please help us in any way you can whether it be through funds or sharing our story to your social networks.

A journey of a thousand miles begins with a
single step!

story:
Summary

We are a small authentic company consisting of myself (Catherine) and my partner James. I grew up in a small Kentish village around country pursuits and tweed and James grew up on the South Coast surrounded by water sports and bright colours. Touch of Tweed was born when James and I met a number of years ago in sunny Somerset.  We spotted a niche in the market to create a new brand that combined both our upbringings and styles, but stayed true to who we are.

We wanted something different so we designed and created our very first products; one male and one female sweatshirt.  These combine the fashions of both country and coast using high quality materials to give you durable, comfortable and well fitted garments.  

Our mission is to create that go to item of your wardrobe. Somewhere in everyone’s wardrobe there’s an item of clothing, you know the one, you've owned it for years, but it just keeps on giving!  We are that brand….perfect for long walks, a day on the beach, a summers evening BBQ, or indeed any occasion, whether causal or smart.  Our garments are made to last and journey with you...

Our campaign will bring our brand to life and hopefully take us to production, but not without your backing.  We are starting out with our original sweatshirts, but the more backing we receive, the more products we can offer you lovely people!  Your contributions will directly support British manufacturing to bring you the garments we know you'll love and treasure. 

Your contribution will mean more than words can describe and allow us the opportunity to bring our ideas and dreams to life.   Sharing our story with you is so exciting and the support so far has been unbelievable.  We just need to get over this last hurdle to really make this happen!

We are unique, fresh and made in Britain, we are Touch of Tweed...

What We Need...

We need £20,000 to take our brand to full production..

We are offering a range of perks, our biggest includes being amongst the first to get our original sweatshirt (they only available to pre-order here, no where else). The RRP of theses are; £79.00 and for this one time only we are offering, 25% off RRP(£59) for the first 20 pledges of the required amount. Once these 20 pledges are up there will be another chance for 15% off the RRP (£67) to the next 25 pledges of the required amount. After these have all gone, the sweatshirts will be back to their RRP, so be quick to get your discount. 

If you like us and our story but perhaps a sweatshirt isn't for you, any donation would be greatly appreciated, we are of course offering other perks for your kind donations so please take a look at what we have available. 

Even if we don't reach our overall goal, your contributions will make a huge difference..  Why is that, I hear you ask?  Because much of the global fashion industry is opaque, exploitative and environmentally damaging, as Ghandi said: '"There is no beauty in the finest cloth if it brings hunger and unhappiness'".   We are different, we love fashion, people and the environment and we don’t want our clothes to come at the cost of people or our planet.  The people who make our clothes deserve to be celebrated, along with British manufacturing as a whole. 

You won't find us on your local high street or sat in a glitzy office.  Yes you could buy a cheaper sweatshirt from others, but if you care about the origins and story of that sweatshirt, or indeed any item of your wardrobe, please join us in our campaign and help make a difference (and look pretty damn cool and trendy in the process!)  Who doesn't love a Touch of Tweed?!

What you get...

One male or one female British made sweatshirt; made in Sheffield by the talented team at Hall UK Manufacturing; made with proper manufacturing techniques by local ladies and gentlemen.  We are proud to be able to trace our steps to production and share this journey with you.

The devil is in the detail... we use 100% Organic Cotton - it's thick, it's super soft and has a fleecy brushed-back lining.  We use small elements of high quality Tweed, but not just any tweed...ours is bright, it's beautiful and it's British.  We add high quality details to finish the look: Robust YKK zips finished in 'antique copper', providing you with the comfort that it won't fail after two goes.  We have branded buttons, zip pulls and leather patches to give those subtle hints that they are made with love, from us to you.  Finally we will be sending our products to you in packaging that is either made from recycled materials or can be fully recycled. 

** please be aware the cuff detailing is to change slightly - to a portrait piece of tweed not landscape.

Sizes...

We are offering a range of sizes, as follows:

Ladies:
Extra Small (UK 6)
Small (UK 8/10)
Medium (UK 12/14)
Large (UK 16/18)

Mens:
Small 
Medium
Large
Extra Large

Please note when making a purchase that all of the option boxes have to be filled, so please click 'no option' on the opposite sex garment to that of which you are ordering to make sure all boxes are complete. Or is you would like one of each, please complete these as separate transactions. 

If you cannot see your size above or perhaps need something a little more custom, then please do contact us at: info@touchoftweed.com and we are more than happy to see what we could do for you.

The Impact

We've been working towards our launch for nearly 2 years now and your support will bring our hard work, late nights and determination to life.

You will help bring back British manufacturing to the forefront of the World map and give us a fighting chance to get our foot in the vast fashion industry door, leading the way for small brands rather than High Street big boys!

We use 100% organic cotton from Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS) certified mills.  This is the world's leading textile processing standard for organic fibres, including ecological and social criteria, backed by independent certification of the entire textile supply chain, through environmental and social responsibility.

Organic cotton is grown without the use of harmful pesticides, using pheromone traps, crop rotation, hand picking of bugs and natural repellents. This allows the farmer to grow food and keep animals instead of being reliant on costly chemicals and fertilisers, allowing them to receive more for their crop.  Input costs are lower and the fabrics we use end up pesticide free.

Our Tweed is British Tweed made in Yorkshire and has been ever since 1837, where bales of raw wool arrived at the mill's doorstep to begin the process of creating beautiful fabrics.

We trust our suppliers, we believe in better and we support our industry and environment.  Do you?!

Risks & Challenges

One of our biggest advantages is that our factory is right here in the UK and we will be sending the pre-orders off to our factory in two batches, one at the end of December and one at the end of January. To ensure that you get your product by the end of February you need to have ordered before the end of December, or place an order by the end of January to receive it by the end of March.

You may have to wait a little for your sweatshirt, but trust us when we say it'll be worth the wait, after all "all good things come to those who wait".  Just think, once the Christmas hype is over and the January blues kick in, you will have your Touch of Tweed order on its way to bring you a 'Brighter Monday' (and everyday from then on..)

100% organic cotton with a brushed-back, from GOTS sources, hasn't been easy to source and we have already had two discontinued lines to contend with.  However, as we grow we are connecting with more suppliers so are confident that we can overcome any future hurdles.  We rely on your feedback and we will always give you the opportunity to help, shape and develop our products to suit your needs. 

We appreciate that our first designs may not be to everyone's personal taste, but the more backing we have, the more we can grow and experiment with products we release, whether that's clothing, accessories, or perhaps something for your pet.  We would love to hear what you would like to see next. 

Other Ways You Can Help

You may not be able to contribute to a sweatshirt but that's OK, any contribution will make all the difference..

You may not be able to contribute at all, but that's OK to, it doesn't mean you can't help in other ways, by spreading the word and making some noise about us and our campaign - Don't forget to use those Indiegogo share tools (and tell all your friends and family).

And that's all there is to it.

Thank you all,

All our love, 

Touch of Tweed

 

With thanks to:
Lord Margadale and Fonthill Estate,
Hall UK Manufacturing,
James Barber of Barbster360 (Our talented film maker),
Hollie B Davey of Hollie B Davey photography (for our stunning photography),
Freddie White and Chloe Morley (our fantastic models),
Our friends and family and last but not least, you our supporters.
story_txt:
Summary
We are a small authentic company consisting of myself (Catherine) and my partner James. I grew up in a small Kentish village around country pursuits and tweed and James grew up on the South Coast surrounded by water sports and bright colours. Touch of Tweed was born when James and I met a number of years ago in sunny Somerset.  We spotted a niche in the market to create a new brand that combined both our upbringings and styles, but stayed true to who we are.
We wanted something different so we designed and created our very first products; one male and one female sweatshirt.  These combine the fashions of both country and coast using high quality materials to give you durable, comfortable and well fitted garments.  
Our mission is to create that go to item of your wardrobe. Somewhere in everyone’s wardrobe there’s an item of clothing, you know the one, you've owned it for years, but it just keeps on giving!  We are that brand….perfect for long walks, a day on the beach, a summers evening BBQ, or indeed any occasion, whether causal or smart.  Our garments are made to last and journey with you...
Our campaign will bring our brand to life and hopefully take us to production, but not without your backing.  We are starting out with our original sweatshirts, but the more backing we receive, the more products we can offer you lovely people!  Your contributions will directly support British manufacturing to bring you the garments we know you'll love and treasure. 
Your contribution will mean more than words can describe and allow us the opportunity to bring our ideas and dreams to life.   Sharing our story with you is so exciting and the support so far has been unbelievable.  We just need to get over this last hurdle to really make this happen!
We are unique, fresh and made in Britain, we are Touch of Tweed...


What We Need...
We need £20,000 to take our brand to full production..
We are offering a range of perks, our biggest includes being amongst the first to get our original sweatshirt (they only available to pre-order here, no where else). The RRP of theses are; £79.00 and for this one time only we are offering, 25% off RRP(£59) for the first 20 pledges of the required amount. Once these 20 pledges are up there will be another chance for 15% off the RRP (£67) to the next 25 pledges of the required amount. After these have all gone, the sweatshirts will be back to their RRP, so be quick to get your discount. 
If you like us and our story but perhaps a sweatshirt isn't for you, any donation would be greatly appreciated, we are of course offering other perks for your kind donations so please take a look at what we have available. 

Even if we don't reach our overall goal, your contributions will make a huge difference..  Why is that, I hear you ask?  Because much of the global fashion industry is opaque, exploitative and environmentally damaging, as Ghandi said: '"There is no beauty in the finest cloth if it brings hunger and unhappiness'".   We are different, we love fashion, people and the environment and we don’t want our clothes to come at the cost of people or our planet.  The people who make our clothes deserve to be celebrated, along with British manufacturing as a whole. 
You won't find us on your local high street or sat in a glitzy office.  Yes you could buy a cheaper sweatshirt from others, but if you care about the origins and story of that sweatshirt, or indeed any item of your wardrobe, please join us in our campaign and help make a difference (and look pretty damn cool and trendy in the process!)  Who doesn't love a Touch of Tweed?!
What you get...
One male or one female British made sweatshirt; made in Sheffield by the talented team at Hall UK Manufacturing; made with proper manufacturing techniques by local ladies and gentlemen.  We are proud to be able to trace our steps to production and share this journey with you.


The devil is in the detail... we use 100% Organic Cotton - it's thick, it's super soft and has a fleecy brushed-back lining.  We use small elements of high quality Tweed, but not just any tweed...ours is bright, it's beautiful and it's British.  We add high quality details to finish the look: Robust YKK zips finished in 'antique copper', providing you with the comfort that it won't fail after two goes.  We have branded buttons, zip pulls and leather patches to give those subtle hints that they are made with love, from us to you.  Finally we will be sending our products to you in packaging that is either made from recycled materials or can be fully recycled. 



** please be aware the cuff detailing is to change slightly - to a portrait piece of tweed not landscape.


Sizes...
We are offering a range of sizes, as follows:Ladies:Extra Small (UK 6)Small (UK 8/10)Medium (UK 12/14)Large (UK 16/18)Mens:Small MediumLargeExtra LargePlease note when making a purchase that all of the option boxes have to be filled, so please click 'no option' on the opposite sex garment to that of which you are ordering to make sure all boxes are complete. Or is you would like one of each, please complete these as separate transactions. 
If you cannot see your size above or perhaps need something a little more custom, then please do contact us at: info@touchoftweed.com and we are more than happy to see what we could do for you.
The Impact

We've been working towards our launch for nearly 2 years now and your support will bring our hard work, late nights and determination to life.
You will help bring back British manufacturing to the forefront of the World map and give us a fighting chance to get our foot in the vast fashion industry door, leading the way for small brands rather than High Street big boys!
We use 100% organic cotton from Global Organic Textile Standard (GOTS) certified mills.  This is the world's leading textile processing standard for organic fibres, including ecological and social criteria, backed by independent certification of the entire textile supply chain, through environmental and social responsibility.
Organic cotton is grown without the use of harmful pesticides, using pheromone traps, crop rotation, hand picking of bugs and natural repellents. This allows the farmer to grow food and keep animals instead of being reliant on costly chemicals and fertilisers, allowing them to receive more for their crop.  Input costs are lower and the fabrics we use end up pesticide free.Our Tweed is British Tweed made in Yorkshire and has been ever since 1837, where bales of raw wool arrived at the mill's doorstep to begin the process of creating beautiful fabrics.
We trust our suppliers, we believe in better and we support our industry and environment.  Do you?!

Risks & Challenges
One of our biggest advantages is that our factory is right here in the UK and we will be sending the pre-orders off to our factory in two batches, one at the end of December and one at the end of January. To ensure that you get your product by the end of February you need to have ordered before the end of December, or place an order by the end of January to receive it by the end of March.
You may have to wait a little for your sweatshirt, but trust us when we say it'll be worth the wait, after all "all good things come to those who wait".  Just think, once the Christmas hype is over and the January blues kick in, you will have your Touch of Tweed order on its way to bring you a 'Brighter Monday' (and everyday from then on..)
100% organic cotton with a brushed-back, from GOTS sources, hasn't been easy to source and we have already had two discontinued lines to contend with.  However, as we grow we are connecting with more suppliers so are confident that we can overcome any future hurdles.  We rely on your feedback and we will always give you the opportunity to help, shape and develop our products to suit your needs. 
We appreciate that our first designs may not be to everyone's personal taste, but the more backing we have, the more we can grow and experiment with products we release, whether that's clothing, accessories, or perhaps something for your pet.  We would love to hear what you would like to see next. 

Other Ways You Can Help
You may not be able to contribute to a sweatshirt but that's OK, any contribution will make all the difference..
You may not be able to contribute at all, but that's OK to, it doesn't mean you can't help in other ways, by spreading the word and making some noise about us and our campaign - Don't forget to use those Indiegogo share tools (and tell all your friends and family).
And that's all there is to it.Thank you all,All our love, Touch of Tweed With thanks to:Lord Margadale and Fonthill Estate,Hall UK Manufacturing,James Barber of Barbster360 (Our talented film maker),Hollie B Davey of Hollie B Davey photography (for our stunning photography),Freddie White and Chloe Morley (our fantastic models),Our friends and family and last but not least, you our supporters.

story: The Ascent Pro marks the second creation from us at Deviate. We completed our campaign in June 2015 and have worked on the Ascent Pro full time since August. Here is some feedback from our last watch release, the C-SERIES that was successfully funded on Kickstarter.

story:
GIN CLEAR DIVER IS SOLD OUT!

Production COMPLETE.
Shipping wrapping up.

Pre-orders are open once again.
Head to www.secondhour.com.au and pre-order with 20% off until October 9.
 

Funded in 33 Minutes on Kickstarter

After an incredible sold out Kickstarter campaign, the Gin Clear Diver is available to pre-order right now!

  • Funded in 33 minutes on Kickstarter
  • Five incredible Stretch goals - unlocked!
  • The best value microbrand dive watch release of 2020
  • Second production run has kicked off with pre-orders happening at www.secondhour.com.au

Here's What You Get

  • A high beat, Swiss made Sellita SW200 automatic movement (regulated in four positions) 
  • Full 316L Stainless Steel construction, from case to bracelet and clasp
  • 200 metres of water resistance, 
  • 8 layers of Swiss BGW9 SuperLuminova across the bezel, hands and indexes
  • 3.5mm thick sapphire crystal with 6 layers of anti-reflective coating inside
  • Fully milled clasp with 6 micro-adjustments
  • Two year warranty

The Gin Clear Diver is simply the finest dive watch that can be made at this price point.

The dials and Bezels: some dials and bezel types are being made for the first time right now. All bezel and dial colour combinations are available to you.

Seven Dial Colours - four with date option:

  • Black Sand - no date and date
  • Cream Sand - no date and date
  • Pastel Blue - no date and date
  • Arctic White - no date and date
  • Enamel Green - no date
  • Enamel Blue - no date
  • Enamel Red - no date

Four Bezel Options - all fully lumed with BGW9 (stainless steel bezels shown below):

  • Gloss Black ceramic
  • Matt brushed Black ceramic
  • Matt brushed Green ceramic (see pictures above)  
  • Brushed stainless steel (pictures below)

The Black Sand, Cream Sand and Enamel Green dials feature gold hands and markers.

The Pastel Blue, Arctic White, Enamel Blue and Enamel Red have silver hands and markers.

With a unique geometry to the dial design there truly is no other dive watch quite like the Gin Clear Diver. The design acknowledges the vintage divers of the past but, through the combination of modern manufacturing techniques and the Second Hour Watches design language, the Gin Clear Diver has its eye firmly on the future.  We divided our dial up into thirds, with major markers at 12, 4 and 8 o'clock offsetting the rounded circular indexes at all other positions. We absolutely love the effect created, and believe it sets the Gin Clear Diver apart.

Because of the build quality, careful selection of components and quality controls applied throughout the manufacture and post-manufacture stages the Gin Clear Diver can be relied upon to function at its peak for years to come. We not only strongly believe in what we have created, but are certain our watches will take pride of place in your collection, however large or small. The Gin Clear Diver dial design, just like our logo, embodies our love for sacred geometry. 

 

After developing the design and specification requirements for the Gin Clear Diver, around 15 manufacturing partners were engaged and tested to gauge the quality of service and ability to correctly interpret the design. After a costly process of elimination, several prototypes were produced from just three remaining manufacturers. Once these were examined in the Second Hour Watches workshop there was one clear choice with whom to partner.

The Gin Clear Divers you see here today are the result of this exhaustive (and exhausting) search for the perfection we want to share with you. We know you'll agree that the Gin Clear Diver not only looks spectacular, but has outstanding specifications and finishing at a price point that cannot be matched.

SO WHAT'S IN THE GIN CLEAR DIVER?

 

DIMENSIONS

Here's the vital statistics of the Gin Clear Diver, a perfectly proportioned diver targeted to fit every wrist.

  • Case diameter: 41.5mm. 42.5mm including the coin edge bezel
  • Lug to lug length: 49mm
  • Lug opening: 22mm
  • Case thickness (excluding domed sapphire crystal): 12.3mm
  • Bracelet: 22mm tapering to 18mm at the clasp

The Movement:  you can't make a watch with the finishing and build quality of the Gin Clear Diver and pair it with anything less than the finest Swiss automatic movement available at the price point: the Sellita SW200. The SW200 is a 26 jewel high beat movement beating at a vibration rate of 28,800 bph, 4Hz that features 38 hour power reserve, seconds hacking and hand winding. With a stated accuracy of between +/-12 seconds and +/- 30 seconds per day, in real world use our prototypes were performing between +2 to +6.5 seconds per day. 

Movement Regulation: high accuracy can only be achieved because we regulate each movement during assembly in four positions, allowing us to hone that accuracy and monitor the movement for beat rate errors which may indicate a fault and require a change of movement.

The dials: When you want a diver that screams class as well as utility you use highly detailed, 3D embossed dials. The Gin Clear Diver comes in four standard colours (Pastel Blue, Arctic White, Cream Sand and Black Sand) and two surface textures (light sheen and sand). Each dial is clean, precise and beautiful in its own right, with something to see every time you catch yourself staring deeply into its surface.

THE REVIEWS

We've sent the Gin Clear Diver around the world to reviewers large and small. We wanted to expose this watch to all the feedback, no matter the cost. This was all done with one key purpose: to allow our backers to hear expert, unbiased opinions on the the Gin Clear Diver design, fit, finish and build quality. The results have confirmed the hard work we put into the watch design, parts selection and assembly and are overwhelmingly positive, and we present to you here a selection. We invite you to take the time to check out these reviews and there are plenty more on our website here.

CHANGES FOR THE PRODUCTION VERSION

Since producing the prototypes and sending them around the world for review we have received and absorbed extensive feedback. Second Hour Watches have listened and are happy to announce the following changes for our production models:

  • A VERSION OF THE BLACK CERAMIC BEZEL INSERT WILL BE PRODUCED WITH A MATT, LIGHTLY BRUSHED FINISH TO REDUCE REFLECTIONS - GLOSS BLACK WILL STILL BE AVAILABLE
  • THE APPLICATION OF BGW9 SUPERLUMINOVA TO THE CERAMIC BEZEL INSERT, ALTHOUGH STRONG, WILL BE INCREASED TO MATCH THE DIAL AND HANDS
  • HEAD LINK INTEGRATION IS TO BE IMPROVED SO AS TO PROVIDE A MORE SEAMLESS BRACELET TO WATCH HEAD INTEGRATION
  • WE’LL BE LENGTHENING THE CROWN BY A SMALL AMOUNT FOR IMPROVED ABILITY TO GRIP AND ACTUATE
  • LUGS HAVE BEEN REDESIGNED TO HAVE A POLISHED BEVELLED EDGE THAT ADDS A DRESSIER EDGE TO THE WATCH
  • OUR LOGO HAS BEEN REDESIGNED, REMOVING THE LINE BENEATH SECOND HOUR ALONG WITH A CHANGE OF FONT WHICH GREATLY IMPROVES THE DIAL PRESENTATION
  • DIAL TEXT HAS BEEN IMPROVED: CAPITALISING THE WORDS GIN CLEAR AND REMOVING THE WORD DIVER, GIVING A MUCH CLEANER, BALANCED LOOK
  • WE’RE ADDING AN ADDITIONAL LAYER OF ANTI-REFLECTIVE COATING TO THE SAPPHIRE CRYSTAL (BECAUSE WHY NOT) - NOW 6 LAYERS!!

WHAT'S INCLUDED

Every single Gin Clear Diver will have the following inclusions:

  • 1 x Gin Clear Diver on high quality solid stainless steel, screw link bracelet in your choice of dial colour and bezel
  • 1 x leather two watch travel case. A zip up hard case that will keep your watches safe when you roam (see pictures below)
  • 1 x Bracelet sizing tool (screwdriver)
  • 1 x Spring bar removal tool, for swapping straps
  • 1 x Watch cleaning cloth
  • 1 x Warranty Card - a two (2) year international warranty covering parts and labour

Note: final travel case colour is dark blue.

Leather Straps
We have a range of leather straps available to add onto your pledge, in both 22mm and 20mm. 

Timeline for Delivery

For additional information see our kiickstarter campaign or send us a message.

Second Hour Watches is an Australian company with a genuine, long term passion for both horology and quality design. Operating out of Melbourne, Australia, we spend countless hours designing and working with our manufacturing partners to create high performance, stylish and durable watches that are both functional, affordable but offer unparalleled value. With four different models already in prototyping phase and a detailed plan for management of their realisation, Second Hour Watches is around for the long haul.

Kingship will be actively engaged in the business of designing, marketing, and outsourcing the manufacturing of the Kingship’s proprietarily designed clothing. 

Kingship will start an expansive marketing campaign that will create a brand identity for the Kingship’s clothing line.

Kingship can offer a range of clothing items:
