story:
Introducing LIMITS.

 

                 

              

 

The World's Smartest Cycling Power Meter is here!

 

Introducing a cycling training tool designed to maximize your training efforts and performance and revolutionize cycling power meters. LIMITS is a truly unique cycling power meter. LIMITS power meter is inspired by our cycling passion and our goal to remove all existing limitations in the marketplace.

 

  • Affordable – to make power meters accessible to cyclists at every level.
  • Interchangeable – compatible with all bikes, no need to replace any parts.
  • Simple to use - the easiest ever to install and use.

 

 

 

                                         

 

Cycling is about pushing your LIMITS; so are we!

 

 

 

 

 

 

LIMITS provides you with the power data to facilitate reliable, quantitative analysis of training loads eliminating the guesswork from gauging exercise intensity so training becomes less haphazard..

See LIMITS technology features below  for more info

 

                               Recently featured in                                               

 

"Limits is said to be compatible with all types of bicycles, and is simple to instal, with no specialised tools required" - Bike Biz

 

"The LIMITS cycling power meter may be the simplest, cheapest one yet" - Gizmag                                                                                              

 

"The world of power meters will be shaken up this week when an inventor seeks crowdfunding for a novel system called Limits, which promises breakthroughs in price, simplicity and technology" - Cycling Weekly                                                                                              

 

"That makes it highly affordable by current power meter standards" - road.cc                                                                                              

 

 

"UK-based startup LIMITS looks to be the cheapest and most universally compatible power meter yet" - bikeradar                                                                                             

 

 

 

                                                As reviewed by

 

"A Power meter is a priceless training tool taking the guess work out of training by telling you exactly what you're doing and if you're doing it right".- 

Spokes Racing Team

 

 

"A power meter can be used by professional and amateur cyclists giving you the data you need to tailor your training towards your goals. Where heart rate is an effect of what you're doing it can be effected by other factors whereas power is an absolute that you can't escape from".-

 Commonwealth Games athlete, Jane Barr 

 

 

Affordable

Developing the smartest power meter means creating a powerful tool - at an unbelievable price. LIMITS is designed to make cycling power meters affordable, so all cyclists can power their performance.
LIMITS is available on Indiegogo from just $249 and the expected retail price will be only $384. Such a price will now make it possible for everyone to own a power meter.

                                           

 

 

 

Interchangeable

Every aspect of LIMITS is designed to give you efficiency. 
It is truly interchangeable and compatible with every type of bicycle. For the first time, a bicycle power meter is located between the pedal and crank arm. And for the first time you can be flexible and move LIMITS between bicycles.

 

                         

 

 

 

Simple to use

LIMITS takes user-friendly to the next level. Thanks to its unique design, which allows it to sit between the pedal and crank arm, you simply have to pedal. This means that no replacement parts or specialised tools are required. Removal and fitting of the pedal is easily achieved with standard bike tools.

 

 

 

 

LIMITS technology features

With technology that's been designed to take your performance to the edge, LIMITS isn't just a smart power meter, it's also incredibly powerful. Not only is it designed to be efficient and easy to use, but it’s also engineered to measure your power reliably and consistently. And it comes with replaceable battery, waterproof as standard, shock resistance and temperature compensation technology so you can maximize your training efforts and performance.

                                                       

Cadence is the rate at which you pedal, measured in revolutions per minute. LIMITS uses an inclinometer to measure your cadence. The inclinometer is highly accurate (detecting rotational change of sub 1 degree), and does not require the use of additional magnets.

 

                                                       

Torque is the product of the force provided by the rider and the length of the lever-arm or crank. The LIMITS power meter measures the true force input by you to drive the bike forward. The true force is measured by precision strain gauges.

                                                       
Power is a product of cadence and torque. Power output is how much energy you are providing over time. By knowing both power and heart rate, you can accurately measure your efficiency and significantly extend your peak performance. LIMITS gives you accurate, reliable power measurements in real time, allowing you to power your performance.
 

Feel free to download the LIMITS technical specifications PDF.

 

The five key factors for choosing a power meter*

 
Here's how LIMITS stacks up

 

* According to Cycling Fitness magazine
 

Project Roadmap

 

 

 

 

 

Meet LIMITS Team

 

 

 

 

 

 

 

Why we need your support

Only with your help can we achieve our vision - a power meter that offers all cyclists the real time data they need to power their performance, at a price point they can afford and in a solution they can use every day.


For us, our crowfunding campaign is a chance to connect with passionate cyclists like us worldwide and share our vision. That's why we're running this campaign, to let you know that at the heart of LIMITS design is understanding your needs and that with this training tool you can meet them!


Please help us to get LIMITS to the market faster. Our mission is to become a seamless and essential part of your training routine and to support you in becoming the best you can be by removing any limitations and enabling you to Push your LIMITS. Which is why our mantra is PUSH YOUR LIMITS SMART. Together we can make this happen.

 

 

Questions & Answers

 
BUYING & SHIPPING 
 
When will I receive LIMITS?
Backers LIMITS will ship December 2015
 
Where do you ship to?
We ship globally
 
Is shipping included?
No, please add $10 for shipping 
  
 
TECHNICAL QUESTIONS
 
Right hand side spacing?
The product is shipped with a dummy LIMITS to balance spacing on the right hand side.  
 
How does the LIMITS power meter work?
LIMITS measures your power output through the pedal, where force is applied. LIMITS detects the tiny micro-strain caused by the force you apply to the pedal over the entire pedal stroke, using the torque and the cadence to calculate power.  
    
Does LIMITS measure cadence?
Yes, LIMITS measures cadence using an inclinometer at a resolution of 1degree. It does not need a magnet or anything else fitted to your bike.
 
Does LIMITS need special pedals?
No, LIMITS works with all standard 9/16th x 20tpi pedals. All the sensors are within the LIMITS. 
 
What makes of pedal and crank arm does LIMITS work with?
All standard pedals and crank arms designed to take 9/16th x 20tpi pedals.
 
How does LIMITS affect the Q-Factor?
LIMITS has been used by a number of the Spokes Racing Team and Club Members generating positive feedback with many of the cyclists reporting an improvement in foot position leading to an improvement in comfort, especially over longer rides. Analysis of this feedback highlighted that many cyclists knees track outward at the top of the pedal stroke adding unwanted stress on the knee and splaying the power outwards on an inefficient vector relative to the pedal travel. This outward tracking is typically addressed by adjusting cleat position or/and adding spacers between the cleat and shoe to intentionally narrow the knees all the way through the pedal stroke but this over recruits the stabilizers to track the knee on a unnatural plane, good pedal action involves as straight a vertical tracking of the knees as the riders physiology permits. LIMITS allows the cyclist to ride with a stance width that is comfortable and so allows the knee to track on the most vertically linear path as possible, it stands to reason that this action will put power directly down through the pedal.
 
How long does the LIMITS battery last?
Excellent battery life means you’ll only need to replace your power meter batteries once a year. They’re inexpensive and commonly available.
 
How is the LIMITS battery replaced?
The batteries are simple and quick to change using a standard 2mm allen key. 
 
Will it work with my road/TT/triathlon/track/mountain bike?
Yes, LIMITS works with any bike. It measures the forces applied to the pedals so the type of bike doesn’t matter.
 
Is LIMITS waterproof?
Yes. It’s designed to withstand submerging down to 1 metre for 30 seconds.
 
Will it work on my turbo trainer?
Yes, LIMITS works with any bike.
 
How accurate is LIMITS?
The LIMITS power meter is fitted with 4 high accuracy strain gauges. LIMITS has been designed with repeatability in mind that enables day-to-day consistency.
 
Does LIMITS measure power individually for each leg?
The initial version is a single-sensing power meter that measures power on the left pedal only and approximates total power. Future versions will independently measure power from each leg and report total power as well as the balance between your right and left leg.
 
What bike computer does LIMITS work with?
LIMITS uses ANT+ for wireless communications, so it is compatible with any ANT+ devices that can display power. That includes devices from Garmin, Timex, Bontrager, O-Synce and Wahoo (for iPhone) as well as displays from other power meter companies that use ANT+. Use the ANT+ device directory to check compatibility.
 
Does LIMITS work with Bluetooth Smart?
We are releasing Bluetooth support and everyone who has pre-order LIMITS through Indiegogo will receive it with both Bluetooth & ANT+ support. 
 
 

Comments, Questions, Ideas?

Feel free to ask on the comment thread here or email TEAM@limits.technology
story_txt:
Introducing LIMITS.                                  The World's Smartest Cycling Power Meter is here! Introducing a cycling training tool designed to maximize your training efforts and performance and revolutionize cycling power meters. LIMITS is a truly unique cycling power meter. LIMITS power meter is inspired by our cycling passion and our goal to remove all existing limitations in the marketplace. 

Affordable – to make power meters accessible to cyclists at every level.


Interchangeable – compatible with all bikes, no need to replace any parts.


Simple to use - the easiest ever to install and use.

                                             Cycling is about pushing your LIMITS; so are we!      LIMITS provides you with the power data to facilitate reliable, quantitative analysis of training loads eliminating the guesswork from gauging exercise intensity so training becomes less haphazard..See LIMITS technology features below  for more info 
                               Recently featured in                                               
 "Limits is said to be compatible with all types of bicycles, and is simple to instal, with no specialised tools required" - Bike Biz "The LIMITS cycling power meter may be the simplest, cheapest one yet" - Gizmag                                                                                               "The world of power meters will be shaken up this week when an inventor seeks crowdfunding for a novel system called Limits, which promises breakthroughs in price, simplicity and technology" - Cycling Weekly                                                                                               "That makes it highly affordable by current power meter standards" -  road.cc                                                                                                "UK-based startup LIMITS looks to be the cheapest and most universally compatible power meter yet" - bikeradar                                                                                                                                                As reviewed by "A Power meter is a priceless training tool taking the guess work out of training by telling you exactly what you're doing and if you're doing it right".- Spokes Racing Team  "A power meter can be used by professional and amateur cyclists giving you the data you need to tailor your training towards your goals. Where heart rate is an effect of what you're doing it can be effected by other factors whereas power is an absolute that you can't escape from".- Commonwealth Games athlete, Jane Barr   AffordableDeveloping the smartest power meter means creating a powerful tool - at an unbelievable price. The inclinometer is highly accurate (detecting rotational change of sub 1 degree), and does not require the use of additional magnets.
 
                                                       
Torque is the product of the force provided by the rider and the length of the lever-arm or crank. The LIMITS power meter measures the true force input by you to drive the bike forward. The true force is measured by precision strain gauges.

By knowing both power and heart rate, you can accurately measure your efficiency and significantly extend your peak performance. LIMITS gives you accurate, reliable power measurements in real time, allowing you to power your performance. 


Feel free to download the LIMITS technical specifications PDF.
 

The five key factors for choosing a power meter*

 
Here's how LIMITS stacks up

 

* According to Cycling Fitness magazine
 

Project Roadmap
 
 
 

 
 
Meet LIMITS Team

story:
What and Why

I started this Brand about 8 months ago after finally getting fed up with a job I didn't enjoy, doing the same thing for 8-10 hours every day. When I started I had one goal, to pursue something I love doing and hopefully break even in the process. After the first print series went so well and was even picked up by "The Archives" in Ft. Lauderdale, which has become one of my favorite boutique fashions stores. I've come to realize how much I really do enjoy doing this, so I've decided to push it further. I have a passion for design and have always been a fan of clothing brands that are more limited, unique and have a story to them. Brands that want to do more than simply sell as much as possible. My goal for this brand is to become well known and established but hold fast to staying a custom, limited, and unique brand that doesnt just become another typical un-original clothing line. 

 

The Details 

Every last penny raised by this campaign (whether we reach the full goal or not) is going straight into purchasing product and building the brand.

Previously We have purchased the product before hand and then sold it from there. But this time, Since we have pushed it further by adding more designs, snapbacks, backpacks, and even higher quality print processes, costs add up which makes it harder to front the entire bill up front. 

I have set the funding goal at $2,000 which is being put towards the following

4 - different shirt prints

1 - the 1st series of our embroidered snapback hats

1 - the 1st order of our custom hand made backpacks

When you add it all up the cost will actually be significantly more than the goal. But hey in order to pursue something you want you have to take risks and be willing to support your own ideas am I right? 

 

The Perks!

Perk #1:

Every little bit helps! For helping support the building of this brand you get the following:

A teddy Grahams vynal sticker to place where ever you want, car, laptop, street light etc. 

A teddy grahams printed bottle cap! why do we have custom printed bottle caps? becuase its different and awesome of course! make a key chain, necklace, you can even recap a beer with it if you feel like it. Just another way we strive to be unique and different. 

Sealed with our wax stamp. Packaging is everything, and this is just another way to stand out. We will seal up these goodies by hand dripping and stamping wax with our custom logo seal. 

Ships within 1 week (add $3 for international orders)

 

 

Perk #2:

 Pick any one of the shirts below from our first release, or from our new "Sweet Series" release and we will ship it to you in our custom packaging! 

Pre Christmas Shipping available upon request. (depending on design)

All other orders ship within 1 week after campaign ends. 

(Add $6 for US/Canada shipping, $12 for international orders)

 

Unisex Get Buzzed 

(Available in XS - 2XL)

100% Combed Cotton 

Printed on American Apparel for a more comfortable form fitting look and feel.

 Cream Color shirt 

Unisex Stuffed with Kindness

(Available in XS - 2XL)

100% Combed Cotton 

Printed on American Apparel for a more comfortable form fitting look and feel.

Mint color shirt

 

Unisex Logo Crest

(Available in XS - 2XL)

100% Combed Cotton 

Printed on American Apparel for a more comfortable form fitting look and feel.

White color shirt 

Unisex Basic logo

(Available in XS - 2XL)

100% Combed Cotton 

Printed on American Apparel for a more comfortable form fitting look and feel.

Purple color shirt

 

Unisex Tank top 

(Available in XS - 2XL)

100% Combed Cotton 

Printed on American Apparel for a more comfortable form fitting look and feel.

ash white strip / white color shirt 

Girls Deep V-neck

(Available in S - XL)

100% Combed Cotton 

Printed on Next level Apparel for a more comfortable form fitting look and feel.

White color shirt 

Unisex Buzz

(Available in XS - 2XL)

100% Combed Cotton 

Printed on American Apparel for a more comfortable form fitting look and feel.

Turquoise color shirt

Logo printed on upper back of shirt. 

Unisex  Stay Healthy

(Available in XS - 2XL)

100% Combed Cotton 

Printed on American Apparel for a more comfortable form fitting look and feel.

truffle color shirt 

Logo printed on upper back of shirt. 

Unisex  Girls Sweeter

(Available in XS - 2XL)

100% Cotton 

Turquoise color shirt 

Logo printed on upper back of shirt. 

Unisex  Logo Tank

(Available in XS - 2XL)

100% Combed Cotton 

Printed on American Apparel for a more comfortable form fitting look and feel.

truffle color shirt 

Logo printed on upper back of shirt. 

 

Perk #3:

Be one of the first to sport the first of our snapback series!

Pre Christmas Shipping available upon request.

All other orders ship within 1 week after campaign ends. 

(Add $6 for US/Canada shipping, $12 for international orders)

Unisex  snapback

White color Hat

light blue bill and buttons

black embroidery 

 

Perk #4:

Bundle it up! Any previous shirt, and our snapback cap

Pre Christmas Shipping available upon request. (depending on design)

All other orders ship within 1 week after campaign ends. 

(Add $6 for US/Canada shipping, $12 for international orders)

 

Perk #5:

introducing the first if our signature backpack series! pick one of the two versions and we will throw perk #1 in and ship it to you! 

Pre Christmas Shipping available upon request. (pending demand)

All other orders ship within 1-2 week after campaign ends. 

(Add $10 for US/Canada shipping, $18 for international orders)

UPDATED IMAGES COMING SOON

 

 

grey canvas exterier

green interior & detail

zipper main compartment

interior laptop sleeve

adjustable straps

embroidered exterior logo 

13 in width x 18 inch height 

 

Perk #6:

1. pick your favorite shirt & size.

2. add the snapback hat. 

3. stuff into your favorite version of backpack. 

4.add custom packaging and ship! 

Pre Christmas Shipping available upon request. (pending demand and design)

All other orders ship within 2 week after campaign ends. 

(Add $10 for US/Canada shipping, $18 for international orders)

 

Perk #7:

Its simple really.

1. You get the previous perk as specified. 

2. Any future 2 shirts of your choice. (no matter how limited) 

3. Any other future single item of your choice. 

4. A skype session (if you so choose) to talk about whatever you see fit. 

Pre Christmas Shipping available upon request. (pending demand / availability)

All other orders ship within 1-2 week after campaign ends. 

 

Perk #8:

1. You get perk #5 as specified. Personally delivered!

2. Any future 2 items of your choice. (no matter how limited) 

3. Lunch on me!

Pre Christmas Shipping available upon request. (pending demand / availability)

All other orders delivered within 2 week after campaign ends. 

 

What you get

Its always a good feeling to be a part of something that most people aren't aware of, or to own something limited that you know everyone can't get. By supporting this brand you are helping build something from its beginning stages, not to mention sporting some original gear that is sure to stand out from any other brand.

Not only that but these prints, snapbacks, and backpacks ARE ALL LIMITED EDITION! after we sell out of our first release they are GONE! we won't have a second batch made, We will have new designs, colors, and products to release. Anybody can print the same shirt over and over and over again. But if you do that whats so special about it? Our goal is to constantly have new designs AND products that keep things fun and interesting, while also rewarding those who support the brand from the beginning.

Other Ways You Can Help

Lastly you may like the brand and idea but simply not want to support financially right now, and thats totally fine! The greatest way to build and support any cause is by creating awareness through word of mouth and social medias. Spread the love! 

Tell a friend about the cause or brand!

Use the indiegogo share tools!

spread the word on twitter, instagram, facebook, wordpress, and like/follow us!

 

And finally thanks for checking us out!

4.add custom packaging and ship! 
Pre Christmas Shipping available upon request. (pending demand and design)
All other orders ship within 2 week after campaign ends. 
(Add $10 for US/Canada shipping, $18 for international orders)
 
Perk #7:
Its simple really.
1. You get the previous perk as specified. 
2. Any future 2 shirts of your choice. (no matter how limited) 
3. Any other future single item of your choice. 
4. A skype session (if you so choose) to talk about whatever you see fit. 
Pre Christmas Shipping available upon request. (pending demand / availability)
All other orders ship within 1-2 week after campaign ends. 
 
Perk #8:
1. You get perk #5 as specified. Personally delivered!
2. Any future 2 items of your choice. (no matter how limited) 
3. Lunch on me!
Pre Christmas Shipping available upon request. (pending demand / availability)
All other orders delivered within 2 week after campaign ends. 
 
What you get


Its always a good feeling to be a part of something that most people aren't aware of, or to own something limited that you know everyone can't get. By supporting this brand you are helping build something from its beginning stages, not to mention sporting some original gear that is sure to stand out from any other brand.
Not only that but these prints, snapbacks, and backpacks ARE ALL LIMITED EDITION! after we sell out of our first release they are GONE! we won't have a second batch made, We will have new designs, colors, and products to release. Anybody can print the same shirt over and over and over again. But if you do that whats so special about it? Our goal is to constantly have new designs AND products that keep things fun and interesting, while also rewarding those who support the brand from the beginning.


Other Ways You Can Help
Lastly you may like the brand and idea but simply not want to support financially right now, and thats totally fine! The greatest way to build and support any cause is by creating awareness through word of mouth and social medias. Spread the love! 
Tell a friend about the cause or brand!
Use the indiegogo share tools!
spread the word on twitter, instagram, facebook, wordpress, and like/follow us!
 

And finally thanks for checking us out!

story:
Introduction

Reverie is an independent watch company from Singapore which prides itself on creating limited edition timepieces with ornate guilloché dials and Japanese mechanical movements. Having successfully launched the Sea-Spirit collection last year,  we are excited to unveil our latest collection, the Classic. 

The pre-order prices are a substantial discount over our retail price (US$400) and will only be available for the duration of this campaign. 

 

The Classic

The Classic is a timepiece inspired by the Japanese concept of 'Shibui' - the artful balance of simplicity and complexity. As such, it marries elegant simplicity with intricate detailing which is only revealed upon closer inspection. 

Here is a summary of the Classic's standout features:

1. Exclusivity; only 250 pieces made worldwide with individual reference number engraved on the display case-back (reference number 138 out of 250 is pictured below).

2. 316L stainless steel case with both polished and brushed finishing. With a 41mm diameter, the Classic strikes a perfect balance between wrist presence and comfort. The case has a 22mm lug width and a lug-to-lug length of 47mm.

3. Robust 21-jewel automatic movement made in Japan (Miyota 820A) with day-date function in two languages (English and Spanish), visible via a display case-back. 

4. Ornate guilloché dial inspired by sun rays, which transforms under different lighting conditions. The blue hands and faceted hour markers add to the light-play of the watch.

5. Sapphire crystal (dial-side) with inner anti-reflective coating. Sapphire is twice as hard as normal glass and nearly as hard as diamond, making it highly scratch-resistant.

6. Water resistant up to 10 atmospheres; take the Classic swimming if you wish.

7. Comes on a black leather strap with butterfly clasp and an additional brown leather strap with tang buckle. Both straps have our convenient strap-change (CSC) design function for effortless strap-changing.

8. International repair warranty valid for 12 months upon delivery of the Classic.

 

Guaranteed Delivery

As production of the Classic is completed, we can guarantee that you will receive your timepiece anytime from 5 to 15 working days after the campaign ends. We offer free worldwide delivery.
 

Press Coverage

Here is what reviewers say about the Classic:

"What I like...is the throwback design and classic face combined with a nicely decorated automatic movement. All of these together make a delightful umami for the watch lover’s soul." - John Biggs (TechCrunch)

"...the Reverie Classic nailed it nicely. It is a watch the might look uncomplicated, but then you take a closer look and suddenly you are taken by surprise by an unexpected detail. It’s a fun watch to wear!" - Adam Sofineti (Watch Paper)

"Overall, we think that the Reverie Classic is a decent dress watch...the Classic differentiates itself with a slightly unusual case, as well as a nice guilloché dial." - National University of Singapore Horology Club
 

Since our launch last year, we have been covered by the following publications:
        

       

           

 

Bonus NATO Strap

Backers who select the "Classic with bonus NATO strap" option will receive an extra NATO strap with our convenient strap-change feature as photographed below:

Questions?

Feel free to contact us here or at reveriewatches@outlook.com should you have any questions. We can also be found at www.reveriewatches.com and on the following social media platforms:



 

Thanks for your time - we look forward to your support!

story:
Just to give you a little insight about me, I am much better at expressing myself in writing, so I hope you enjoy the blooper reel. So now that we have that cleared up...

In 2008, I did a lot of shopping online. I lived in Stillwater, Oklahoma where I had limited access to all of the boutiques I had come to love growing up in Florida. I was searching for some fashionable eco-friendly clothing like Stella McCartney, but without the Stella McCartney price tag. I searched and searched only to find that cute eco-friendly clothing was hard to come by, let alone affordable. I started to wonder why isn't there an online boutique for women like me?  Then I thought... why don't I just create it myself? 

I loved the idea of creating a store that reflected both my Spanish heritage and my eco-friendly point of view. I came up with verrrde. Verde in Spanish means green and the three R's represent the famous mantra, "Reduce, Reuse, Recycle". 

I created verrrde.com as a lifestyle blog and come Spring 2014 I will add e-commerce to the site that will focus on eco-friendly clothing. I have a marketing strategy and a great team which I like to call my Think Tank. Now all we need are clothes to fill the pages! With your generous contributions, we will have enough to buy our merchandise (with a focus on dresses, tops, and accessories) for the first quarter Spring 2014. 

I have done a lot of research finding wholesalers who offer clothing using renewable resources, recycled materials, and who are also committed to making the planet a better place to live. All items sold will be under $100, making eco-friendly clothing more accessible to the everyday woman. I have been in the retail business for over 7 years and I am a master at being thrifty and fashionable.

As with any business, you have to account for delayed items, not getting enough inventory, having too much inventory, website kinks, and overall mayhem. I have worked in both large and small retail companies. Being an online company, we are very flexible to the demands of consumers. We will be able to reach a broader base than a stand alone brick and mortar shop plus we will be accessible 24 hours a day. Working as a stylist has made me confident in my buying/curating abilities. I also have a wonderful team who can help me with any issues from taxes to web design to social media marketing.

I look forward to saving you a little green while going green. I have lined up some great rewards that you will not only love but will leave your friends verrrde with envy. :) 

A special thanks to all of those who have helped me throughout the way: David Fedele, Kara Foley, Jessica Walther, Kate and David Ahern, Dave Harrison, and Ashley Johnson for being in my Think Tank, AJ Paglia for his awesome aesthetic and logo design (find out more at www.ajpaglia.com), Streightangular for her awesome music (find out more at www.streightangular.com). I have been blessed with wonderful family and friends and I can't say thank you enough!

story:
SUMMARY
 
Still Foxy was born out of the idea to encourage women who have or have had breast cancer.  It began as a commemorative effort for a very dear friend’s mother who passed away from breast cancer in 2009.  We printed a few shirts using our mascot (Starla Fox) from our children’s publication, Children’s View.  Everyone loved the shirts and so began this journey.  The amount of women diagnosed with breast cancer rises every year and those same women along with those who have beat it, need encouragement somewhere along their journey.  We want to remind them in a tangible way that they are Still Foxy.  Now we understand the huge financial strain breast cancer can create so that is why FOXY FORWARD was created.  The idea is simple; fund an item or items through IndieGoGo for someone you know or don’t know who is currently going through or has gone through breast cancer, or for you.  Our goal is to encourage women around the world with two words, Still Foxy.  A percentage of the proceeds from this project go to breast cancer research, so we can eventually beat this disease.

 

WHAT WE NEED AND WHAT YOU GET

A million dollars, we know that is the question you are asking and why, more importantly?  It is simple, it is estimated that 226,870 women will be diagnosed with breast cancer in 2012 according to the American Cancer Society.  If you funded a bracelet for $5 X 226,870=$1,134,350.  Our goal is that you help us encourage the same amount of women as it is estimated to be diagnosed this year.  Told you it was simple.  Funding will go towards expanding our product line, ordering a screen printer, and ordering an embroidery machine.  We also have to save 25% for taxes as this is considered income.  We have ideas to expand into scrubs, pajamas, under garments, and hosting Still Foxy events (such as a motorcycle ride and tennis tournament to name a few).  The ideas are limitless and we want to be able to encourage as many women on as many different levels in as many different areas as we can. We just need to get the ball rolling.

 

It gets more exciting as the perks go:

 

Perk 1: Foxy Forward a Bracelet $5

We have two versions of this unisex bracelet (tell us which one you like best, by your funding).  The first bracelet (pictured) has our mascot Starla on one side and the words Still Foxy on the opposite side.  The other looks the same with the words Still on one side of Starla and Foxy on the other side.  They are a great conversation piece and reminder that you are Still Foxy.  

 

Perk 2: Foxy Forward a Hat $20

Not everyone wears hats, but there are some hat lovers out there and this is for you.  This adjustable unisex head piece has the words Still Foxy embroidered in pink across the top and comes in khaki, pink, and white.  A nice accessory to a relaxing day outside and oh yeah it helps keep the sun out of your face.

 

Perk 3: Foxy Forward a T-shirt $30

This is what started our journey of encouragement.  The Still Foxy t-shirt is a cotton shirt with your choice of logos.  You can pick from the Big Ribbon logo with Starla’s head in the center or the Silhouette logo with Still Foxy on the sides.  The shirts come in Ladies and Junior sizes, so please be specific and they range from S-XL.  Tell everyone how you feel without saying a word, Still Foxy!

 

Perk 4:  Foxy Forward a T and Hat Combo $45

We know some of you want it all, so get the shirt and hat and we’ll add a bracelet of your choice. 2 out 3 is good, but 3 out of 3 is better.

 

Perk 5:  Foxy Forward a group of 5 $225

This is where encouragement goes to another level.  Know of a breast cancer support group in your area, send them this encouragement pack?  It includes 5 shirts, 5 hats and 5 bracelets.  If you don’t know of any, we’ll gladly send it to one in your name and forward the information to you.

 

Perk 6:  Foxy Forward a group 10 $450

This is the same as perk 5 times 2.  You’ll receive or send 10 shirts, 10 hats, and 10 bracelets.

 

All items include shipping in the United States.  An additional $10-$25 will be added for international shipping.

 

IF WE DON'T REACH OUR GOAL

Now if we don’t reach our target goal, we’ll still be able to encourage the women you’ve made a part of the Still Foxy family.  Also, we’ll focus on what you; our funders want to see next.

 

OTHER WAYS TO HELP

Like we stated earlier, we understand the enormous costs associated with breast cancer, so if you are unable to contribute we understand.  Spreading the word about Foxy Forward is just as valuable, because you know somebody that we don’t.  Help us out by using the IndieGoGo share tools or give someone a call (the old fashion way) and tell them about.  Thanks so much.

 

THANK YOU’S

Thanks to everyone for all of your support every step of the way

Our models:  Tameika, Ambrosia, Rashekia, and Sara

Eric Martin of Martin Photography

Eric Martin of Martin Photography

story:
Sans Soucie Italy//Australia Eco Fashion Week Tour 2018.

Image from the Runway, Eco Fashion Week, Vancouver, 2013.  photo by Alfonso Arnold. 


Sans Soucie Textile + Design has been invited to showcase at Green Fashion Week (Rome, Italy) in October, 2017 and at Eco Fashion Week ( Perth, Australia) in November, 2017.

 

Image from the Runway, Eco Fashion Week, Vancouver, 2013.  photo by Alfonso Arnold. 

 

We recently completed a residency at HCMA Architecture + Design in Vancouver where we explored various circular knitting techniques using hand craft looms and knitting machines with hosiery yarn we have been developing in the studio over the last couple of years.  This opportunity not only allowed for us to continue our material research and development with this resource it completely transformed our idea of what can be done in the future.  We have not only created a new novelty yarn, Noutextil, we can knit and design new circular knit garments and accessories with but we want to make it possible for others to work with too! 

 

Behind the Scenes: Knitting Research and Process. Hosiery Yarn made from Waste Hosiery + Scraps that have been hand dyed in Vancouver. photos: Katherine Soucie

 

In addition to our experience at HCMA this past year, our mission to produce zero waste textiles made from Canadian mill waste lead us to establish a new partnership with the Montreal based manufacturer, Gildan.  This new partnership is a 1 year contract (can be renewed) that will give us sole access to their hosiery waste/castoffs.  This will allow us to produce our next collection with ease and to make Noutextil available to consumers this holiday season.  

 

Image from the Runway, Eco Fashion Week, Vancouver, 2013.  photo by Peter Jensen. 

 

Our next collection, Symposium will be a unique collection that embodies beauty and harmony in all its forms. It will incorporate new silhouettes and be the launch to our circular knit hosiery garments.     This timely news arrived  upon receiving invitations to represent Canada at Green Fashion Week (Italy) and Eco Fashion Week (Australia). We are in need of financial donations and sponsors to help make this happen. 

The funds we require will assist in the production, documentation, travel/promotion of our next collection and initiate our first small run of our Noutextil hosiery yarn to sell to YOU!

  Your support will contribute to our story, our mission and how entrepreneurs can help create change.Like other Canadian designers, independent designer rely upon public support and private sponsorship.  There are no government programs that support textile and fashion design research and representation abroad.

With the help of our friends, clients, and generosity of the public  we are aiming to reach our goal of 20,000 (USD) over the next 30 days. We hope that you will either consider contributing or sharing amongst your friends to help make this dream come true!  

Please share and/or follow us online or on social media. 

To view our work please visit www.sanssoucie.ca 

To purchase work visit our Etsy Store
https://www.etsy.com/shop/sanssoucie

Follow us on Facebook
https://www.facebook.com/sanssoucietextiles

Follow us on Instagram 
https://instagram.com/sanssoucietextiles/

Follow on Twitter 
https://twitter.com/katherinesoucie  

You Tube

This video is a summary of collections that include our research and development and media we have received over the years. 

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h5sAQStTsHo

For those of you that do know our work, our textiles have a story to tell and it is a story that speaks of transformation, creativity, cultural identity, empowerment and a love for our environment and what we do. By taking our next collection on tour to Green Fashion Week (Italy) and Eco Fashion Week (Australia)  we will have the unique opportunity to tell our story and represent Vancouver, Canada and Zero Waste Design .  

We have always believed our work is universal. We strive to maintain a vision where zero waste textile and design production made from local/nationally acquired resources is more than just a disruption to the traditional fashion system. What we offer is a balance to the cycle,  which has resulted in collaboration with industry.  It has given us the opportunity to employ our artisanal techniques to create unique textiles, clothing and by-products made from waste textiles made in Canada.  It is also an opportunity to rethink what we can do with local manufactured resources and what this can provide in the future.

Sans Soucie  came to be out of a response to create new textiles out of castoff waste textiles made in Canada. It celebrates cultural identity, self expression without impacting the environment.  It is designed with care and meant to serve the wearer for years to come.  

We only hope our story can inspire others and will continue to showcase work to an international audience in order to allow for our message to be seen and heard. 

Your help will assist in bringing voice to our mission, our work and to the global Eco Fashion Industry both here in Canada and abroad.  




Stretch Goal

If we break $20,000 any additional funding will go towards additional assistance for our production needs post runway presentation, website update/maintenance, etc

"Let Our Textiles Tell Your Story"
story_txt: Sans Soucie Italy//Australia Eco Fashion Week Tour 2018.Image from the Runway, Eco Fashion Week, Vancouver, 2013.  photo by Alfonso Arnold. Sans Soucie Textile + Design has been invited to showcase at Green Fashion Week (Rome, Italy) in October, 2017 and at Eco Fashion Week ( Perth, Australia) in November, 2017. Image from the Runway, Eco Fashion Week, Vancouver, 2013.  photo by Alfonso Arnold.  We recently completed a residency at HCMA Architecture + Design in Vancouver where we explored various circular knitting techniques using hand craft looms and knitting machines with hosiery yarn we have been developing in the studio over the last couple of years.  This opportunity not only allowed for us to continue our material research and development with this resource it completely transformed our idea of what can be done in the future.  We have not only created a new novelty yarn, Noutextil, we can knit and design new circular knit garments and accessories with but we want to make it possible for others to work with too!  Behind the Scenes: Knitting Research and Process. Hosiery Yarn made from Waste Hosiery + Scraps that have been hand dyed in Vancouver. photos: Katherine Soucie In addition to our experience at HCMA this past year, our mission to produce zero waste textiles made from Canadian mill waste lead us to establish a new partnership with the Montreal based manufacturer, Gildan.  This new partnership is a 1 year contract (can be renewed) that will give us sole access to their hosiery waste/castoffs.  This will allow us to produce our next collection with ease and to make Noutextil available to consumers this holiday season.   Image from the Runway, Eco Fashion Week, Vancouver, 2013.  photo by Peter Jensen.  Our next collection, Symposium will be a unique collection that embodies beauty and harmony in all its forms. It will incorporate new silhouettes and be the launch to our circular knit hosiery garments.     This timely news arrived  upon receiving invitations to represent Canada at Green Fashion Week (Italy) and Eco Fashion Week (Australia). We are in need of financial donations and sponsors to help make this happen. The funds we require will assist in the production, documentation, travel/promotion of our next collection and initiate our first small run of our Noutextil hosiery yarn to sell to YOU!  Your support will contribute to our story, our mission and how entrepreneurs can help create change.Like other Canadian designers, independent designer rely upon public support and private sponsorship.  There are no government programs that support textile and fashion design research and representation abroad.With the help of our friends, clients, and generosity of the public  we are aiming to reach our goal of 20,000 (USD) over the next 30 days. We hope that you will either consider contributing or sharing amongst your friends to help make this dream come true!  Please share and/or follow us online or on social media. To view our work please visit www.sanssoucie.ca To purchase work visit our Etsy Storehttps://www.etsy.com/shop/sanssoucieFollow us on Facebookhttps://www.facebook.com/sanssoucietextilesFollow us on Instagram https://instagram.com/sanssoucietextiles/Follow on Twitter https://twitter.com/katherinesoucie  You TubeThis video is a summary of collections that include our research and development and media we have received over the years. https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=h5sAQStTsHoFor those of you that do know our work, our textiles have a story to tell and it is a story that speaks of transformation, creativity, cultural identity, empowerment and a love for our environment and what we do. By taking our next collection on tour to Green Fashion Week (Italy) and Eco Fashion Week (Australia)  we will have the unique opportunity to tell our story and represent Vancouver, Canada and Zero Waste Design .  We have always believed our work is universal. We strive to maintain a vision where zero waste textile and design production made from local/nationally acquired resources is more than just a disruption to the traditional fashion system. What we offer is a balance to the cycle,  which has resulted in collaboration with industry.  It has given us the opportunity to employ our artisanal techniques to create unique textiles, clothing and by-products made from waste textiles made in Canada.  It is also an opportunity to rethink what we can do with local manufactured resources and what this can provide in the future.Sans Soucie  came to be out of a response to create new textiles out of castoff waste textiles made in Canada. It celebrates cultural identity, self expression without impacting the environment.  It is designed with care and meant to serve the wearer for years to come.  We only hope our story can inspire others and will continue to showcase work to an international audience in order to allow for our message to be seen and heard. Your help will assist in bringing voice to our mission, our work and to the global Eco Fashion Industry both here in Canada and abroad.  Stretch GoalIf we break $20,000 any additional funding will go towards additional assistance for our production needs post runway presentation, website update/maintenance, etc"Let Our Textiles Tell Your Story"

story:
THE SAME BUT DIFFERENT

How can you improve on a product that everyone owns and carries with them all the time? Over the past few years the way we pay for our purchases has changed dramatically. That means we no longer need to walk around with a pocket full of cash.

Not long ago we successfully developed the c-secure wallet: an aluminum credit card wallet that stops malicious parties reading the RFID chip on your cards. Thanks to our high-end leather cases, this product is not only secure, but stylish too.

THE SAME BUT SMALLER

However, customers frequently asked us if we could come up with a slimmer solution that offered the same elegant designer look as well as the same level of security.

We've now managed to develop such a wallet. It's even more compact than its metal counterpart, is made from the same Italian leather and is lined with a newly developed special fabric that offers the same level of protection against the malicious reading of RFID chips.

THE SAME BUT SAFER

The wallet can hold 2 to 8 credit cards inside the special developed protective fabric. This fabric protects your cards just as effectively as our c-secure wallet.

An extra compartment has been provided outside the special fabric, which you can use for a public transport chip card, for example. That means you won’t have to remove it from your wallet at entry and exit points. This compartment can also hold a banknote for cash-only situations.

THE SAME BUT NICER

We believe this is the slimmest and most compact RFID-blocking wallet that can be produced without compromising on style and design. The wallets are made from high-quality Italian leather and are available in a range of different colors, which means you'll always find one that's just right for you. In the future we'll expand the range further by adding different types of leather, textures and prints.

Convinced of the benefits? Check the perks how to purchase one of these enhanced wallets and benefit from our attractive discounts.

THE SAME BUT BETTER!

story:
Featured On

ONE8Ø Halo Headlamp

ONE8Ø Trek Beltlamp 

For years we have used headlamps to light our adventures, work, and projects. Unfortunately every traditional headlamp has one common problem - tunnel vision or a narrow beam of visibility. The ONE80 solves that problem by eliminating the possibility of tunnel vision.

The ONE80 solves tunnel vision by providing enough light to simulate daylight. The 180 degree light allows you to naturally use your eyes the way you use them during the day, with your peripheries. This eliminates the need to precariously turn your head to see, and opens you to a full peripheral perspective in the dark.

Headlamp Comparison

Check out a first hand view of what it's like to hike with a ONE8Ø Light. Rusty and Ammon hiking though the Nevada desert with a GoPro on a chesty mount. 

Strong, clean and clear peripheral sight. Most headlamps have 1 or 2 LEDs. If they’re super powerful you may see 4 or 5. The ONE8Ø Lights’ 20 LEDs wrap the front half of your head or waist to ensure you don’t lose any of your peripheral vision. You can rely on the natural movement of your eyes to see and experience everything around you.

Whether you’re running up a trail through the trees or rappelling down a canyon wall the ONE8Ø Light will give a steady and even light source. You no longer have to worry about the bouncing beam of light that jolts around and shakes with every head and body movement. Experience steady Illumination no matter how active you are.  

New possibilities open up with interchangeable parts. Quickly and easily trade out with a backup battery. Remove the LED illumination band and the battery pack from your Halo or Trek and light up your tent. Regardless of how you use your ONE8Ø Light, it will likely get dirty. Simply remove the illumination band and battery pack to machine or hand wash your headband and/or belt.

Quick and convenient, the micro USB charging cable makes the ONE80 ready when you are. Recharge the battery with an outlet, your computer or solar panel. Each 1800mA battery pack gives you 3hrs of battery life.  

The ONE8Ø Light fits comfortably to the contour of your head and waist. There are no protruding plastic pieces or parts that stick out from your body. The lightweight and flexible fit makes wearing it hardly noticeable.

 At only 3.3 oz you’ll forget you’re wearing anything. Even the battery packs are extremely light weight. Pack along a few extras at only 1.5 oz each. Built and designed for an active, minimalist lifestyle.

Unlike a AA or AAA battery powered light that begins dim shortly after turning on, the ONE8Ø lithium battery pack gives you the same constant power from full charge to no charge. That way you can reliably count on a full capacity light source for the entire charge of each battery.

story:
Thank to all of you who have have supported us from the beginning! After months of prototyping and many iterations, we are now ready to introduce 2 new products which is the fruit of our most successful product combined with your feedback. 
 

As seen in

Want to know a bit more about our story? Find us on our social media platform (350K followers combined and counting!):
www.facebook.com/eoniq

www.instagram.com/eoniqdesign

 

Right after we complete our campaign with your support, we will send you the exclusive access to our design application.

Step 1: Design intuitively with our design application

  1. Choose from our design templates and completed designs
  2. Personalize by uploading a photo of any drawing
  3. For advanced users: uploading a complete design of your own or modifying font, number sizes and more!

 

Step 2: We hand craft your watch. Each by 1 dedicated watch maker

Yes. One watch maker per watch. We believe this is the only way to respect true watch making craftmanship, and to convey your unique story.

 

Step 3: Some will get your watches by Christmas! The others will get them shortly after.

We don't mass produce any of our watches so it will take time and effort for each and every watch. We will do our best to complete everyone's custom watches as soon as possible.

 

Our watches are one of the very few offering in the market where you can add your own signature, and still have a great looking watch. We have intentionally designed our watch face so everything will look refined along with your personalization.

 

Choose from quality designs and components

Customizing a watch with us is simple. You start with either a watch face design, or any watches you see on this page and our gallery. You can then start mix and matching with the many options we have to offer to create your own personalized watch.

 

Detailed case finish (Navigator)

 

Detailed case finish (Pinot Blanc)

 

Detailed, customized glow in the dark watch face (Navigator Only)

What we have here, is the most detailed lume for any custom watches

 

Movement of choice: the Miyota 8 series skeletonized

No it is not a quartz like most (almost ALL) of the watches at this price point.

Our choice of movement was a careful process of comparison between several cost-efficient, skeletonised calibres. We wanted to make watches that last for decades, so the durable and highly reliable Miyota/Citizen 8N24 became our choice. Beating at 21,600 VPH, the movement gives the watch a smooth sweep, yet retains the longevity advantages of lower-beat movements. With Parashock technology and an indirect drive shock-resistant gear train, this tiny movement is surprisingly shock resistant – yet at the same time with its skeletonised frame, it looks fantastic whether you want to admire it through an open heart or through the see-through case back we include as a standard.

 


How our customers feel about us?

 

With skeleton Japanese movement, quality components, made to order watch face and hand assembly for each watch, our custom watches are second to none for the value for money. Even online today, a 200-300 dollar watch is usually quartz driven, not even mechanical. Looking for a mechanical marvel that is bespoke at this price point? We are proud to tell you that based on what we know, we are the ONLY one offering such a product.

 

 

 
 

Choose from our quality components

 

 

Design inspiration (Navigator)

 

Design inspiration (Pinot Blanc)

 

Disclaimer

Delivery of rewards/perks is subject to best efforts and not guaranteed.

 

FAQ

Q: Can anything be marked on the dial?

A: As long as it doesn’t infringe other’s copyright.

 

Q: How fine can the signature or logo be marked?

A: The finest line we can do is as thin as 0.05mm. To achieve the best result,  we recommend the picture you provided should be  1800px x 1800px resolution.

 

Q: Can we mark different color on the dial?

A. At the moment no as we weren’t satisfied with the level of finish.

 

Q: Can I engrave the image without marking color on the dial or text cut-outs? 

A: Unfortunately, no. Pinot Blanc and Navigator only offers color marking on dial. This is our preferred method of customisation as it can personalised at a much higher resolution. If you would like to have our previous model Pinot Noir which includes the mentioned features, please contact us at contact@eoniq.co . FYI, the Pinot Noir is a pricier option and takes longer to craft.

 

Q: How can I customize a watch?

A: After backing, we will send you an access code for designing your watch 6 weeks before you will receive it. On our design app, you will be able to select the watch components, design the watch face, upload your own designs and graphics, from signatures to personal logos. With professionally designed templates and endless combination possibilities, you’ll be able to tell your own stories with a bespoke, timeless watch that is as unique as you are.

 

Q: Do you guys ship outside USA?

A: Yes, we ship globally.

 

Q: What are the shipping costs?

A: Global shipping costs USD20 to anywhere in the world with the exception of Hong Kong, where delivery is free.

 

Q: Can I get it before Christmas?

A: Day 1 Only Perk - Yes.

If you back us with Super Early Bird or Indiegogo Special Perks, you will get your watch before Valentine’s day.

 

Q: Do I need to pay any tax?

A: Some countries outside Hong Kong may require import tax, duties and related Customs fees for imports, and these costs are NOT covered by payments made to us. These charges, if applicable, are determined and charged by the Customs office of the destination country. For further details of charges, please contact your local Customs office.

 

Q: How long is the warranty and what does it cover?

A: We offer 24-months warranty for our custom bespoke pieces. The warranty covers defective watches from the date of shipment. Should the watch stop working on its own, we will make you a new one. Simply contact us at contact@eoniq.co and we'll walk you through the process. We are not responsible for any accidental damage to the watch. We will refund warranty related shipping fees to the customer after we have clarified that the problem with your watch falls under warranty. However, please note that all return/warranty packages remain the responsibility of the customer until received by us. We therefore advise you to take the necessary precautions to ship your watch safely by using registered traceable services and appropriate packaging for all watch shipments.

 

Q: Can I return my watch after I receive it?

A: Each of the watches we make are made to order and produced just for you. That means once the watch is produced, it will be extremely challenging for us to re-purpose it should you decide that you do not want it. Therefore we will not be able to accept returns unless the watch was defective when shipped.

 

Q: Will it fit my wrist?

A: Wrist circumference of our straps:

  Leather strap Metal Band
44mm (Navigator Series) 17.5 - 21.8 cm
6.9 - 8.6 in		 -
42mm (Pinot Blanc Series) 16.5 - 20.1 cm
6.5 - 7.9 in		 17.9 - 20.9 cm
7.0 - 8.2 in
38mm (Pinot Blanc Series) 16.1 - 19.7 cm
6.3 - 7.8 in		 14.3 - 18.2 cm
5.6 - 7.2 in

 

(Figures adjusted by 3mm to account for lug and strap curvature)
If you think you may need to have additional holes on your strap(s), please contact info@eoniq.co before your watch is shipped.

 

Q: Does it need batteries?

A: No, mechanical watches are powered by the movement’s mechanical parts. The movement is fitted with an oscillating weight called therotor – meaning that the watch automatically winds and powers itself from the owner’s natural wrist movement. When the power reserve left in the watch runs down due to the watch not being worn, the watch stops running and needs to be re-set before wearing again.

 

Q: How long will the watch run for? How much power can the watch reserve?

A: 40 hours or more across all models.

 

Q: Is there any maintenance required for the watch?

A: For automatic mechanical watches, you should wind it at least once a week, though regular wear is often enough to maintain it. For hand-wound, manual watches, you should wind it daily Try to avoid letting any mechanical watch sit inactive for more than a month. Minimal maintenance is needed for mechanical watches, but we recommend having the watch serviced every 5-10 years by a qualified watchmaker.

 

Q: Can EONIQ service my watch?

A: Yes, we can service your EONIQ watch. Please send us an email at info@eoniq.co and we will get back to you with a quote.

 

Q: My watch has a problem but my warranty has expired. What do I do?

A: Please send us an email at info@eoniq.co with as much information about your problem as possible, with pictures if relevant to the issue. We will get back to you with a repair quote as soon as possible.

 

Q: Do you have glow in the dark dial for Pinot Blanc Series?

A: No, glow-in-the-dark dials are only available for Navigator Series.

 

Q: Your watch is made to order. Why do you need crowdfunding?

A: The dials of our watches and the assembly is made to order. However, there is a minimum order quantity as well as batch pricing for other components - the more watches we make, the less we have to charge you for them. We need your help to make EONIQ better for everyone.  

 

Q: Can I get a refund?

A: We’re sorry to hear you feel this way, but we’re here to help you out. Simply drop us an email at contact@eoniq.co. We will go through the process with you.

 

Got any more questions we haven't covered? Ask us in the comments section or chat with us now. 

Chat with us
 

 

Press Kit

Download Media Kit for Publications (Oct 2016)

A: Please send us an email at info@eoniq.co with as much information about your problem as possible, with pictures if relevant to the issue. We will get back to you with a repair quote as soon as possible. Q: Do you have glow in the dark dial for Pinot Blanc Series?
A: No, glow-in-the-dark dials are only available for Navigator Series. Q: Your watch is made to order. Why do you need crowdfunding?
A: The dials of our watches and the assembly is made to order. However, there is a minimum order quantity as well as batch pricing for other components - the more watches we make, the less we have to charge you for them. We need your help to make EONIQ better for everyone.   Q: Can I get a refund?
A: We’re sorry to hear you feel this way, but we’re here to help you out. Simply drop us an email at contact@eoniq.co. We will go through the process with you.
 
Got any more questions we haven't covered? Ask us in the comments section or chat with us now. 
Chat with us 
 
Press Kit
Download Media Kit for Publications (Oct 2016)

story:
THE STORY!!!!!!!!!!!!!!

  • Hello World my name is Corey Orlando Cooper, I'm an Inventor from Mobile, AL. I've been inventing things since I was a KID!!!!!!! "Growing up in a house of SEVEN BOYYYS I had to use my imagination. LOL!!!!
  • The reason this campaign is so important and personal to me is because I once had a brother that was a bike rider. He had his motorcycle for 1 week before his fatal accident. I was very close with my older brother. He left behind a wife & 3 daughters. One 16, and twin 2 year olds.  Since this tragedy this has become something I became so passionate about! "MOTORCYCLE SAFETY" If I can save just one life and never make a penny that would be payment enough. Just the thought of saving one life, or saving one family from going through what my family and I did makes my heart warms. 
  • With the help of you guys I will be able to further my testing. Also refine my design from the testing. Then get these JACKETS in stores and on shelves ASAP!!!! Motorcycle safety has not improved in at least 15 years according to GHSA (Governors Highway Safety Association). Also with the rising fuel cost, sales for motorcycles has risen. More and more people are purchasing bikes but inexperience is the big PROBLEM!!!!
What We Need & What You Get
$300,000 will go directly toward proper testing and test facilities. This will allow me access to private engineering firms with wind tunnels, & G Force testing. The funds we raise will also allow us to be able to pay for changes and purchase first production run.  
  • PERKS!!!!!!!!! lets talk about PERKS!!!!!!!! I have available perks for everyone. If you want to be a part of something MUCH LARGER then your self and assist in saving riders lives one day, you can do. I have PERKS available for Everyone. Starting at $1.00 all the way up to $2,500.00. Even perks that would allow people to meet myself, and discuss other products etc.
  • If we don't reach our goal we will shop the most economic route to get this job done. I actually would like to personally challenge any independent engineering firm that think they have exactly what it takes to contact me directly!!!!! I can be reached internationally with open availability @ 1-805-314-1397 or 1-251-367-7453
  • The Team will email you after the campaign for cut and size choices.

The Impact

  • Motorcycles are UNIVERSAL!!!!!!!!! and as any rider can attest they can be very dangerous. We just want to give the riders an option to be safer. To every contributor I already know that you know someone personally who owns a bike. You know someone who has had an accident on a bike, fatal/non fatal or someone who wants a bike. With completion of this campaign this effects ALL!!!!!
  • After the loss of my brother, I will not stop until a change in motorcycle safety is made.........

COOL FACTORS, Risks & Challenges

  • This is only a base model. We will have base models in all the basic colors. As well as a Breast Cancer Edition, Lupus Edition, We do expect to have some risk associated. We do understand that it will not be the easiest obstacle to secure license-ships to obtain MARVEL/DC comics rights to make a their versions. But we are very business savvy and plan on pursuing until we can't no longer.   
  • But in the event we aren't able to obtain license-ships we will do a custom comic design not associated. 

Other Ways You Can Help

Even if you can't contribute, that doesn't mean you can't help please get the word out and make some noise about my campaign. please use the Indiegogo share tool!

And that's all there is to it.

story:
Short Summary

I'm Edwin Jones, CEO/President of Brazen Fire. I played sports, specifically football and basketball since 2 years old and still have the passion to watch the game of sports. Also, I serve in the United States Army as Full time Kansas National Guardsmen.

            The name of the campaign is called Brazen Sports. Brazen Sports is a sports component of Brazen Fire. It's changing the perception and approach of the game of sports.  We're bringing the game of sports back to life by removing the weaknesses, flaws, and imperfections and replacing them with passion in order to achieve a complete polished game. The word "Brazen" symbolize the cleansing of an athletes' game to be refined and restored. We believe that an athlete's heart and mind must change first before performing at peak levels. We're adding a little Brazen flavor to the world of sports.  We're showing the world our passion in sports through our unique t shirts to start and then more into other avenues. It's extremely important to express our passion for sports to help ignite and encourage the youth around the world to become active. We believe with our unique designs of sports objects will capture young peoples attention and instill a positive message. Also, we love to be original in whatever we do. People love to be distinguishable from the crowd. With Brazen Sports' t shirts, you are bold and original. 

What We Need & What You Get

           We will distribute the money towards operational expenses, marketing expenses, legal expenses, and able to donate towards wounded veterans and youth active charities, and place us in great position for upcoming campaign, Brazen Fire. Like we said in the video this is just the first step. From sleek, elegant, women's clothing to Brazen Supports, we have a lot of idea's but need your help.

            Your contributions will help achieve the cost of manufacturing, shipping, operational and production cost of not just this project but many more to come.

A Brazen Sports t-shirt,

 

a bottle of the Adrenaline Rush,

autograph signed CD single "Gorilla" by Rapper Artist Cash Hollisher,

input in the next campaign, customize names and numbers in GLO are a list of some of the perks that you can receive by helping this cause.

Also there is a special Brazen intensity shirt available for those that go a little further.

             The funds will disperse towards production of all displayed items for all purchasing customers, paid initial expenses of Brazen Fire's marketing efforts and of  course, donate to wounded veterans charities.

The Impact

              This campaign is resolute on change, uplifting, encourage individuals hearts and minds which is imperative in the game called life. This world needs to see something rare and original with a positive message. The campaign encourages people to be different and unique. There's people around the world who are afraid to be themselves. The campaign brings positive swagger/confidence.  We are asking people around the world become part of something very original, rare, and special. Are you tired of traditional or routine? Do you need something new in your life? Do you want to stand out from the rest? Do you embrace uniqueness and diversity?

               With your contributions, it will help spread uniqueness and originality of Brazen Sports all over the World of Sports. The world embraces and appreciates innovations and originality. Your not just contributing into a t shirt but help change the perception of the sports World. Together, we can we bring forth something sooo rare, something never seen before, sooo unique, that you and i can look back and say wow! Look what we have establish in this world. Are you ready to be different and  unique?            

        - If you're unable to contribute, we would just ask you please contribute in other ways by opening your mouth and spreading the word and images of Brazen Sports through Facebook, Twitter, Instagram, Youtube. If you decide to help, know that your contributions are going to positive idea that we hope spreads into every facet of sports. Please indicate what size, color and sports logo you would like on your shirt. Thank you again for your time.

story:
Mind bending lightness, extreme durability and practical design. All in a stunning blade with a legendary past, a jewel class metal value and a strongly inspirational character!

The blades are named after some of the SI Metric Prefixes in order of size and they are very limited. The weight of the blades in the picture ranges from only 5gr (0.2oz) to 75gr (2.6oz) !!!

Designed, engineered, researched and developed to make the most out of the extraordinary titanium-based superalloy and the stories the blades are made of.

Due to their advanced composition and processing, the prices of the blades when new range from hundreds to thousands of US dollars!

Early users and testers of the blades talk about their experiences! They all have their own way of integrating the blades into their life and a common thing: a passionate enthusiasm about Jetk.

They are made of superalloys (non-toxic and non-reactive) with metals such us Titanium, Tungsten, Molybdenum, Niobium, Tantalum, Cobalt, Nickel, Aluminum and even Gold!

Open your beer with style! No bottle can resist a real fighter jet engine blade!

Even the dullest keys can become something to be proud of. Don't ever hide your keys in your pocket again!

Peta blades look cool, feel great and affect your thinking positively.

It's as good a conversation starter as it can get.

Beautiful and practical even before coming out of the box!

The shape and the strength of this amazing superalloy transform the blade into the favourite toy of every ambitious life hacker…

Similar to air force ops, we are well prepared and we have our time planned out to the last detail.

After a test run of the production line we've optimized our final cost structure. The money we're going to raise for the product is going  to be invested in the following way:

We are a team of four young aviation fans armed with very different skills and unconditional dedication to Jetk. A genius of an engineer, a guru of a web developer, an experienced graphic designer and a restless media producer.

So, we need your help to get the commercial production rolling in the efficient way we have planned, tested and optimized over the past months.

Despite all of the risk mitigation we enforced in our processes, there are still two risks that are not to underestimate:

We'll do our best to deal with these risks as a community all the way to the day you receive your very own blades and beyond... Come fly with us and we promise it's going to be an amazing flight!

1. Why are you so cool?

Just kidding, proceed with number 2.

2. What is this titanium-based superalloy you are mentioning everywhere?

Frankly put, the superalloy of the blades is the best of what humanity can do currently in terms of creating the perfect metal for extreme conditions. It presents the best possible ratio of extreme lightness to insane durability. Titanium is approximately two times stronger and two times lighter than steel! Titanium is also corrosion resistant to the point where it is estimated it would only corrode to the thickness of a sheet of paper after 4,000 years in seawater! Now imagine that this superalloy is something of an enhanced version of titanium...

3. Where can I buy them?

You can only buy them here, on Indiegogo, for as long as our campaign is live.

4. Can I take a Jetk. blade in my hand luggage?

So far, some of our beta testers have been flying with their blades in Europe, India, Africa and the United States without any problem. Only once, a security officer asked a question about a blade and then let it pass, maybe he thought it was cool!

***

A very big THANK YOU to haf.gr for the fighter jet shots of our video.

story:
Still want a shirt? Jump on over to the Queer Confederates Facebook page and Private Message us - we'll arrange to get one in the mail to you!

How Is Wearing A Shirt Political Advocacy? 

Something as simple as wearing a t-shirt can be an act of radical, political advocacy. As the Supreme Court debates the constitutionality of Prop 8 and the Defense of Marriage Act, wearing the JUDGE ME t-shirt keeps the debate centered on you and me, the real faces of the LGBTQ community and its allies. It is a reminder that it is not an issue, but people’s lives and civil rights being judged.
 
The gay rights movement was born when those in our community dared to come out and be visible. To continue our progress, we must continue to be visible. Stand up and stand out with us by wearing the DOMA/Prop 8 t shirt.
 
You'll also be supporting some amazing LGTBQ organizations by purchasing one. 

Supporting LGBTQ Organization

If we reach our full goal, we'll be donating a portion of the campaign funds to Lyric (a San Francisco based LGBTQQ youth empowerment program), San Francisco's The Center, and the Human Rights Campaign (HRC).

We will take a survey of our supporters at the end of the campaign to help decide how to split the money among the organizations. 

If we don't reach the full goal, we'll be putting all of the Indiegogo funds towards printing the shirts and will donate a portion of each public sale going forward to these organizations. 

Why This Shirt, Why Indiegogo, Why Now?

As a member of the LGBTQ community, it's been impossible to sit by idly while the debate over the Supreme Court's upcoming judgement on Prop 8 and DOMA pulses through our country. After signing dozens of petitions, my partner and I wanted to join the movement in a more creative and personal way and help others do the same. We also wanted to raise funds for some of our favorite LGBTQ organizations. 

With an extensive background in novelty t-shirt wearing, we have both marveled at the conversations that arise from wearing them. The JUDGE ME DOMA/Prop 8 t-shirt was our way of instigating more meaningful conversations about an issue that affects us and the people we love personally.

We've started the Indiegogo campaign to help us produce and distribute the shirts to those who want to add their voice to the movement. Join us in spreading popular support for LGBTQ marriage equality. Purchase a JUDGE ME shirt, put a face to the discrimination being debated and start an honest conversation about this issue with someone in your community.

What We Need & What You Get

The funds from the Indiegogo campaign will go towards producing our first bulk run of the shirt. Our goal is based on a 200 shirt run, which would drive the cost per shirt down to a reasonable price, allowing us to donate to LGBTQ advocacy organizations and invest time in distributing them at LGBTQ outlets and events throughout the next few months.

The Shirt

The JUDGE ME t-shirt will be printed on black American Apparel brand t-shirts.  The foreground shows JUDGE ME in white letters with “DOMA/Prop 8 – Supreme Court 2013” printed in smaller lettering underneath.  The background text, printed in gray, includes gay and lesbian slurs in English and other languages from all over the world.  Your shirts can be picked up at the San Francisco distribution party or delivered to you at your home.

Pre-Sale Perk

We have a limited number of "pre-sale" shirts for early supporters that are just a bit cheaper. We'll also be sure to send those shirts out first.

San Francisco Distribution Party Perk 

Live in San Francisco? Want to pick up your shirt and party with us? Buy this perk and the extra $5 will go towards getting a DJ and working with a venue for some excellent drink specials. Date and time TBD, but we'll keep you posted and give you plenty of advance notice. 

Other Ways You Can Help

It's all about visibility, right? If you can't contribute, help the cause by sharing this campaign with your friends and family! Here are some ideas - 

1) Change your Facebook profile to the red square image in our media gallery that says "Stand with me for marriage equality - visit judgeme2013.com".

2) Share the campaign on your Facebook page.

3) Share the campaign on Twitter.

4) Email the campaign to your friends and family who would be interested in supporting it.

If you've got more time, contact us. There's lots of outreach and coordination activities that we would love your help with.
