story:
CHAPPLICATOR CAMPAIGN IS ENDING

Due to unforeseen circumstances, our crowdfunding campaign is ending, effective immediately, and all contributions will be refunded. We apologize for the inconvenience that this has caused, and are very grateful to those who supported Chapplicator.

Despite this setback, we have every intent to bring Chapplicator to market. We believe it is an awesome and innovative product, and are excited to see it on ski helmets, jackets, bikes, and cars in the very near future. 

Rest assured, this is not the end of Chapplicator.  Thank you again to all of our contributors!



Chapplicator holds any type of tube lip balm and gives you quick access wherever you are.

Launch Colors

Choose from Black or Grey with a Black, White, or Pink Accent Arrow.
story_txt:
CHAPPLICATOR CAMPAIGN IS ENDINGDue to unforeseen circumstances, our crowdfunding campaign is ending, effective immediately, and all contributions will be refunded. We apologize for the inconvenience that this has caused, and are very grateful to those who supported Chapplicator.Despite this setback, we have every intent to bring Chapplicator to market. We believe it is an awesome and innovative product, and are excited to see it on ski helmets, jackets, bikes, and cars in the very near future. Rest assured, this is not the end of Chapplicator.  Thank you again to all of our contributors!Chapplicator holds any type of tube lip balm and gives you quick access wherever you are.Launch ColorsChoose from Black or Grey with a Black, White, or Pink Accent Arrow.




Picking Colors and Mounts
We will send an email to all contributors half way through our campaign so you can choose your colors and your mount.  We have set a stretch goal of $35,000!  If we raise $35,000, we will expand the color options from 6 to 18.  
WE WILL EMAIL ALL CONTRIBUTORS FOR COLOR AND MOUNT SELECTION.  Snow · Bike · Car · and More
Where to use Chapplicator · Choose Your Mount 
Chapplicator started out as a snow accessory, but we designed additional applications for snow jackets, biking, and the car visor.  You can choose one of five types of Chapplicator.Choose From:
Helmet Mount with 3M Tape
Jacket Clip
Car Visor Clip
Bike Clip
Anywhere - Flat Mount with 3M Tape




Developing ChapplicatorI created Chapplicator for lip balm users, like myself. If you use lip balm, you know it’s a challenge to apply it consistently. The tiny tubes are constantly disappearing, and it never seems to be accessible when you need it. Enter Chapplicator. With Chapplicator, you always know where your lip balm is, and you can quickly and easily apply it, with just one hand, and without that annoying little cap.I originally developed Chapplicator for snowsports. I learned to ski in 2009 and quickly fell in love with the sport. But the cold and dry air caused some serious chapped lips, and applying lip balm while on the slopes was a huge hassle. If you keep lip balm in the pocket of your ski jacket, it’s impossible to remove and apply it without taking off a glove, and using two hands.  I knew there had to be a better way, so I started working on a solution.At first, I had a lot of crazy ideas. But I quickly recognized that the solution needed to be a simple, stand-alone device that could hold any kind of lip balm. Drawing from my experience of having a GoPro camera mounted to my helmet, I decided that the side of my helmet was the perfect place for a lip balm holder. That way, I could just reach up, pull it off, apply, and put it back.Once I had the general concept, I needed to create prototypes. The very first prototype was made with Play-Doh. I took my molded model to a local industrial designer, and he and I worked together to create a CAD model of the device. We then created working prototypes using 3D-printing, slowly improving the function with each version. Finally, I took the model to a product development company who refined the design and is currently heading up the manufacturing process.With manufacturing quotes in-hand, I am coming to Indiegogo so that I can share Chapplicator with everyone!

story:
Be a part of the BEACH!

No sunscreen required

With your support, the National Building Museum hopes to make its largest installation ever a reality. With the goal to open from July 4 to September 7, we want the BEACH to offer visitors the chance to participate in a quintessential summer activity without the risk of sand in their suit or getting a sunburn. We've teamed up with Snarkitecture, a Brooklyn based collaborative practice, to make this a reality. Now all we need is your help. 

#TheBeachDC

With your generosity, the National Building Museum will be able to construct the BEACH, fill the “ocean” with nearly one million white plastic balls, and equip the “shoreline” with chairs, umbrellas, and beach games. We will even have a snack concession operated through a partnership with Union Kitchen, a D.C.-based food incubator. If we surpass our goal, the Museum will be able to host many more public programs, family activities, and community outreach events in association with the BEACH.

Why crowdfunding? Support from individuals and corporations accounts for 33% of the Museum’s budget. We rely on generous donors like you to support our acclaimed exhibitions and education programs. Learn more here.

If you would like a different name on a ball than the one associated with your shipping address, please contact dbridges@nbm.org. 

Thank you to Ditto Residential for its generous support of the Museum's first crowdfunding campaign and the BEACH.


What We Need

$1 gets us 5 balls to fill up our Great Hall (we're aiming for around 750,000)

$100 gets us an umbrella for the BEACH (we're aiming for 4)

$1,000 will staff one late night event at the BEACH

$5,000 for walls surrounding the "ocean"

About the National Building Museum

The National Building Museum is a private nonprofit 501(c)3 that receives support from individuals, corporations, foundations, and grants. The Museum’s mission is to advance the quality of the built environment by education people about its impact on their lives. Learn more about the Museum here.

Have you heard about the BIG Maze? The centerpiece of last year’s Summer Block Party at the Museum, the BIG Maze saw over 50,000 visitors and 2 marriage proposals in just over the 2 months it was open. We hope to make this year’s installation the biggest attraction yet.


Aloha!

The National Building Museum is using Indiegogo, a third-party online advocacy and fundraising application. Please be advised that Indiegogo’s Terms of Service and Privacy Policy apply to your use of this service.

We thank you for your interest in making a gift to the National Building Museum through Indiegogo. We want you to be aware that in doing so, your contribution is managed by Indiegogo, a third party not managed by or affiliated with the National Building Museum. Please familiarize yourself with their terms, including their privacy policy. The Museum is unable to answer any inquiries regarding the status of your donation while it is being processed by Indiegogo.

Photos, from top: renderings courtesy Snarkitecture. Photo by Kevin Allen Photography.

story:
My name is Hugh Quattlebaum and I'm a former professional baseball player who has spent the last ten years coaching players from middle school through college.  Throughout those years, I've been searching for a better way to help my kids get stronger and stay healthier so they can accelerate the improvement of everything we do on the field.  When I try to help parents and coaches pick the best off-field conditioning programs, I always run into the same problems...

1.  COST

COMMON COSTS FOR SERIOUS ATHLETES TO STAY IN SHAPE:

Personal training = $50-100 per session
Gym Membership = $500-$1500 per year
Velocity Performance Training = $1000-3000 per year at 2-4 visits per week

SportSWAT = $99.99 annual

2. TIME

Middle school, high school and college athletes don't have the time to train outside the home as many times per week as they should.  Juggling team practices and homework is hard enough, so finding time to go to a gym or drive to personal training sessions is hard.

SportSWAT = Done at home with minimal equipment in under 40 minutes.

3. SPORT-SPECIFIC TRAINING

It is very difficult to find facilities or trainers who specialize in targeting the muscles you need to improve and keep healthy for one specific sport.

SportSWAT = Sport Specific Workouts And Training.

The first installment of the Sport-SWAT program will be for BASEBALL (B-SWAT, BASEBALL SPECIFIC WORKOUTS AND TRAINING) and we want to show how valuable it is for baseball players so we can ultimately bring the idea of online, sport-specific training to ALL SPORTS.   Sport-SWAT is a digital training program designed to bring the most affordable and comprehensive sport-specific workouts into your home in under 40 minutes a day.  This will allow the student athlete to take less time out of his or her day while working out more frequently and more effectively than ever.  They can just log on, and get better.

The B-SWAT program targets all five tools that coaches and scouts look for, with workouts designed specifically to improve hitting, hitting for power, arm strength, defense, and speed. Also, because so many young players are specializing in just baseball, we've added the tool of health and designed workouts to REDUCE THE RISK OF INJURY and combat potential over-use while targeting the muscles we often forget so we stay on the field...because as the old saying goes "you can't make a club in the tub!"

We've consulted and trained with dozens of physical therapists, doctors, specialists, personal trainers, and MLB strength-and-conditioning coaches in creating the B-SWAT program.  It has been tested by current Major Leaguers and has been vetted for health and safety by Dr. Frank Amato of DABCO and The Center for Orthopedic and Athletic Injuries. 

The SportSWAT team is also proud to announce their partnership with ProAngle Media as the production team behind the videos.

Risks and challenges

FITNESS ACCOUNTABILITY...

"That all sounds great, and I'd love to buy that for my kid, but I don't want to force him to do it if (s)he's not motivated."

We've already created the B-SWAT workout, but we all know that getting your butt to actually work out requires motivation.  Providing a new technological environment where coaches can track their players' progress, so they can establish accountability and motivation for their team, is the future of training.

- Coaches will be able to track their players' workouts and progress and motivate them to improve.

- Teams will have online profiles and improvement scores so they can see where they stack up nationally and fuel each other to raise the team score to win big team prizes.

- Individuals can see where they stack up against other players on their team and with other users from around the world and compete for individual rewards.

SportSWAT will provide the most cost-effective and cutting edge training to improve play on the field while maintaining health, but we need funding for web development to create the technology that can support the means for coaches and parents to help drive their athletes to take pride in their strength and conditioning gains. We can stir that competitive gene with the right technology that helps coaches create an accountability standard for their players, and we firmly believe we can generate a new culture of young athletes that compete as hard off the field as they do on the field, staying healthier as a result.

The success of at-home workout programs - like P90X and Insanity under the Beachbodies Inc. umbrella - shows the value of being able to work out at home, but those workouts are for the weight loss generation.  SportSWAT has a new target.  We want to strengthen 14-24 year-old athletes that can be highly motivated by their desire to improve their athletic performance and minimize their risk of injury.

story:
Hello my name is Dakotah Lucero, my best friend Jace Hatfield and I have been friends for near 13 years now. We are both 17 years old.  We have always had big dreams, high standards and hopes for everything we do. We had a great idea  to create our own clothing line. With this clothing line we aim to inspire many people to follow their dreams no matter how big or small. A dream is a dream go out and chase that dream, don't let anyone judge you for it or tell you that you can't do it. With this clothing line we want to design, inspire and share our dreams with you.

We will need $5,000 dollars to get everything we need to start up this dream. $3,000 of the money will go to printing the shirts, the other $2,000 will go to buying our Tax ID, Business License, Trade marking our company name(Negative Five) and finally a web site for us so people can buy our clothes no matter where they are in the world. If we don't reach our entire goal we will use all of the money to print our shirts.

This company can change the view and thinking of people all over the world. We aim to help people believe in themselves, be confident, be ambitious and not stop pushing the boundaries. We want people to be inspired by us to do anything they dream of. This brand means the world to us, this is our life and dream. If you could please be a blessing in our life and donate to us no matter the amount, anything will help us. Thank You God Bless You, Keep Chasing That Dream.

Thank You God Bless You, Keep Chasing That Dream.

story:
As seen in

 

Production Timeline To Collection

The team have put their heart and soul into the early stages of our timeline, you will see that we have invested much more testing and development upfront than most of our competitors and you can guarantee the rigorous nature of our supply chain from a leading manufacturer in watches established since 2012. 

Who We Are

Established in 2012, Larsson & Jennings’ British founder, Andrew Jennings, set out to create a watch that would strike the perfect balance between form and function, classic and modern. He designed a watch with a distinct style and a classic aesthetic; inspired by the brand’s home cities of London and Stockholm.

Today, Larsson & Jennings is currently sold at over 50 fashion and luxury retailers, including Harvey Nichols and Bloomingdales, and at a growing number of watch specialist retailers.

Larsson & Jenning’s flagship store is located in the heart of London’s fashion district: Covent Garden. At our flagship store, customers can browse our collection while enjoying a complimentary ‘Fika’, or coffee with friends. 

What our customers say

In the Press

story:
We are Stefan and Marc, both born in 1970 which means we grew up the 70’s, a time when technology was rapidly changing and a decade where self-expression and individuality were hallmarks of the time.

Our first design, the Robusto, has an awesome retro style and strong aesthetic influences from the decade of our childhood.

An era where high-tech futurism and radical experimentation with form were a reaction against the sleek mid-century modernism. The architects had exuberant spirits; they reveled in form, function, and funkiness. and watches had fantastic and futuristic designs that got you noticed.

We were looking for a high quality timepiece that would withstand, not only, the test of time but also the burden of daily wear and tear. A timepiece that is engineered to the highest specifications, build with the best materials and designed to be robust yet elegant. We didn’t find what we were looking for, and what we found we couldn’t afford… Designing and engineering our own watch was the only way to follow and so the TiMe22 story started. 

 

Don't keep Robusto a secret..

30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the TiMe22 Robusto community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who loves watches!

 

 

 

 

 


 
 
 
 

 
 
 
 
Creating something is fun. Especially if you get to design something that you are passionate about. We believe that design is an integral part of product development. Designers are included in the earliest phases of innovative processes and the production development cycle.
 
We also believe that there is always a better way to solve a problem and that is why we never stop trying to make great ideas better. Lastly, we believe that people who use and love our watches deserve a lifetime guarantee.
 
Stefan Wessels and Marc Schot with the TiMe22 Robusto
 

 

Only the best materials and components

The Robusto Ti5 Titanium watch is made of the same material as jet engines and other aerospace components, titanium is 45% lighter than steel and anti-corrosive.

Most titanium watches are made from commercially pure titanium (grade-2  or Ti2 titanium). For us this material just isn't strong enough and most high quality watchmakers feel the same. 

The titanium alloy used for TiMe22 bracelets and cases is one of the strongest alloys available. Grade-5 or Ti5 titanium, also known as Ti-6Al-4V, is obtained by a smelting process where pure titanium is alloyed with small amounts of aluminium and vanadium. The result is a metal that is significantly stronger and far more scratch-resistant than pure titanium or even stainless steel. 

Ti5 titanium is anti-magnetic, hypoallergenic and particularly resistant to corrosion by acids found in the sea and in perspiration.

Inside the brushed Ti5 titanium 45mm case you’ll find a Swiss made ETA movement, water resistant down to 200 meters, featuring sapphire crystal and Swiss Super-Luminova® lumed dial and hands.



 

 

All our watches are hand-assembled and come with a lifetime warranty. The Robusto is waterresistant up to 20ATM / 200m / 660 ft (you can wear it when scuba-diving without any worries). 

Each watch has an Individual Serial String with authenticity method.

 

 

Features

  • The case and bracelet are made in scratch resistant and very hard grade 5 titanium and have a brushed surface finish. 

  • The bracelet is constructed from single-piece chains which we have designed for the Robusto. 

  • The hidden clasp is made in stainless steel. It folds like a butterfly and opens with a double push button. 

  • Robusto Precision features a Swiss made ETA Normflatline 955.112 battery operated movement with 7 jewels and battery End-of-Life display. 

  • Robusto Automatic features a Swiss made ETA Mecaline 2824-2 self-winding movement with 25 Jewels, 28.800 vibrations per hour and ETACHRON regulator system. 

  • The screwed down crown has the atomic number from titanium, 22, engraved in the center. 

  • The hands and hour-markers are coated with Swiss Super-Luminova® BGW9. This makes them luminescent (glow-in-the-dark) and easy to read. 

  • The Sapphire crystal is treated with an anti-reflective coating on the inside.

  • The dial is made from bronze and painted in colour. In direct sunlight the dial has a sparkle.

 

Dimensions

The Case has a diameter (width) of 45mm, creating a large bezel around the 29.50mm crystal. At the lugs (where the bracelet connects) the Robusto measures 28mm. The case is only 10mm thick (height). The bracelet is 24mm wide and the watch weighs under 130gr.

 

 

We have made two different variations of the Robusto:

  • Robusto Precision (battery operated)
  • Robusto Automatic (self-winding)

Both variations come with the same Ti5 titanium case and bracelet, the distinction is the movement.

 

Robusto Precision

The Robusto Precision features the Swiss made ETA Normflatline 955.112 battery operated movement with 7 jewels and battery End-of-Life display.

This movement is popular and widely used (most Tag Heuer battery operated watches use this movement). It is also one of the most reliable quartz movements you can get on the market today.

 

Robusto Automatic

The Robusto Automatic features the Swiss made ETA Mecaline 2824-2 Self-winding movement with 25 Jewels, 28.800 vibrations per hour and ETACHRON regulator system.

This movement is one of the best known and most widely used mechanical movements at all. It is considered to be accurate, robust and reliable and can be found in Tudors, Breitlings, Tag Heuers and many other brands.

 

Which movement should I choose?

When compared both movements have their advantages and dis-advantages. The first that comes to mind is that the Robusto Precision is more economically priced and the Robusto Automatic is more technically advanced.

 

 

Choose from 4 dial colors

You will have a chance to choose from the following four dial colors before we produce your watch. Please note that all options will be available on the Robusto Automatic as well as the Robusto Precision. In direct light/sunlight there is a sparkle in both colours.

  • Mocha: The Mocha features a Pantone 411PC painted bronze dial. 
  • Royal Blue: The Royal Blue feautures a Pantone 281PC painted bronze dial.
  • Imperial Red: The Imperial Red features a Pantone 1797PC painted bronze dial.

  • Lunar Black: The Lunar Black features a Pantone 412PC painted bronze dial.

 

Your Robusto watch will come in a presentation box. Take a quick look at our unboxing video:

 

 

We offer FREE shipping for the Robusto. As an international customer, we’d like to make sure that you are aware that prices billed for goods shipped outside the European Union do not include any taxes, duties, VAT or other charges due to the recipient’s local or national government authority. These other charges, duties and taxes (including VAT) are the sole responsibility of the recipient and must be paid upon arrival in the destination country. Usually these fees are demanded prior to delivery and are collected by the shipping courier or local customs authority.

For more details please contact your local customs office. You may also use a Duty Calculator to calculate what you may be charged by your local government.

 

 

Quality control is carried out at every step during the watch assembly process. Each watchmaker is expected to verify the work of the previous watchmaker handling the piece and verify whether it conforms to TiMe22's strict quality standards.

Should a problem arise at any point in the assembly line, the watch is sent back to the start of the production line to be disassembled, and the process starts all over again.  

We stand firmly behind our products and are committed to fanatical service. Each TiMe22 watch comes with a limited lifetime warranty of flaws in workmanship and materials.

 

 

We've been working on this INDIEGOGO project for the past year. It hasn't been easy, and we're proud to say, we're finally here!

 

We're a professional team of 2 experienced engineers and watch designers from The Netherlands, friends for over 30 years. Both of us work on the design of our watches and we love what we do!

We are travelers, engineers and watch & cigar aficionados. We love the touch and feel of high tech materials and the typical minimalist, experimental, innovative, quirky, and humorous Dutch design. Born and raised in The Netherlands, a country where technology keeps our feet dry (literally), we value technological innovation and creative solutions. After several years of dreaming, imagining and planning we started this small Dutch brand to design high quality Titanium wristwatches.

 

Be part of the TiMe22 Story

This is a story where we invite you to become part of: together we can turn the world of high quality watches upside down! Our reach only reaches our direct network. Liking TiMe22 on Facebook, Instagram or Twitter, or via email will make a huge difference and help our project gain the momentum we need.    

 

 

Please click here to access the TiMe22 Robusto Press Kit.
story_txt:
We are Stefan and Marc, both born in 1970 which means we grew up the 70’s, a time when technology was rapidly changing and a decade where self-expression and individuality were hallmarks of the time.
Our first design, the Robusto, has an awesome retro style and strong aesthetic influences from the decade of our childhood.
An era where high-tech futurism and radical experimentation with form were a reaction against the sleek mid-century modernism. The architects had exuberant spirits; they reveled in form, function, and funkiness. and watches had fantastic and futuristic designs that got you noticed.
We were looking for a high quality timepiece that would withstand, not only, the test of time but also the burden of daily wear and tear. A timepiece that is engineered to the highest specifications, build with the best materials and designed to be robust yet elegant. We didn’t find what we were looking for, and what we found we couldn’t afford… Designing and engineering our own watch was the only way to follow and so the TiMe22 story started. 
 
Don't keep Robusto a secret..
30 seconds of your time could make the difference in growing the TiMe22 Robusto community. Hit one of the buttons below and tag a friend or coworker who loves watches!
 

 

 

 

 
    
    Creating something is fun. Especially if you get to design something that you are passionate about. We believe that design is an integral part of product development. Designers are included in the earliest phases of innovative processes and the production development cycle. We also believe that there is always a better way to solve a problem and that is why we never stop trying to make great ideas better. Lastly, we believe that people who use and love our watches deserve a lifetime guarantee. Stefan Wessels and Marc Schot with the TiMe22 Robusto 
 
Only the best materials and components
The Robusto Ti5 Titanium watch is made of the same material as jet engines and other aerospace components, titanium is 45% lighter than steel and anti-corrosive.
Most titanium watches are made from commercially pure titanium (grade-2  or Ti2 titanium). For us this material just isn't strong enough and most high quality watchmakers feel the same. 
The titanium alloy used for TiMe22 bracelets and cases is one of the strongest alloys available. Grade-5 or Ti5 titanium, also known as Ti-6Al-4V, is obtained by a smelting process where pure titanium is alloyed with small amounts of aluminium and vanadium. The result is a metal that is significantly stronger and far more scratch-resistant than pure titanium or even stainless steel. 
Ti5 titanium is anti-magnetic, hypoallergenic and particularly resistant to corrosion by acids found in the sea and in perspiration.
Inside the brushed Ti5 titanium 45mm case you’ll find a Swiss made ETA movement, water resistant down to 200 meters, featuring sapphire crystal and Swiss Super-Luminova® lumed dial and hands.









 
 

All our watches are hand-assembled and come with a lifetime warranty. The Robusto is waterresistant up to 20ATM / 200m / 660 ft (you can wear it when scuba-diving without any worries). 
Each watch has an Individual Serial String with authenticity method.
 

 
Features


The case and bracelet are made in scratch resistant and very hard grade 5 titanium and have a brushed surface finish. 
The bracelet is constructed from single-piece chains which we have designed for the Robusto. 
The hidden clasp is made in stainless steel. It folds like a butterfly and opens with a double push button. 
Robusto Precision features a Swiss made ETA Normflatline 955.112 battery operated movement with 7 jewels and battery End-of-Life display. 
Robusto Automatic features a Swiss made ETA Mecaline 2824-2 self-winding movement with 25 Jewels, 28.800 vibrations per hour and ETACHRON regulator system. 
The screwed down crown has the atomic number from titanium, 22, engraved in the center. 
The hands and hour-markers are coated with Swiss Super-Luminova® BGW9. This makes them luminescent (glow-in-the-dark) and easy to read. 
The Sapphire crystal is treated with an anti-reflective coating on the inside.
The dial is made from bronze and painted in colour. In direct sunlight the dial has a sparkle.


 

Dimensions
The Case has a diameter (width) of 45mm, creating a large bezel around the 29.50mm crystal. At the lugs (where the bracelet connects) the Robusto measures 28mm. The case is only 10mm thick (height). The bracelet is 24mm wide and the watch weighs under 130gr.
 
 

We have made two different variations of the Robusto:


Robusto Precision (battery operated)

Robusto Automatic (self-winding)

Both variations come with the same Ti5 titanium case and bracelet, the distinction is the movement.
 
Robusto Precision

The Robusto Precision features the Swiss made ETA Normflatline 955.112 battery operated movement with 7 jewels and battery End-of-Life display.
This movement is popular and widely used (most Tag Heuer battery operated watches use this movement). It is also one of the most reliable quartz movements you can get on the market today.
 
Robusto Automatic

The Robusto Automatic features the Swiss made ETA Mecaline 2824-2 Self-winding movement with 25 Jewels, 28.800 vibrations per hour and ETACHRON regulator system.
This movement is one of the best known and most widely used mechanical movements at all. It is considered to be accurate, robust and reliable and can be found in Tudors, Breitlings, Tag Heuers and many other brands.
 
Which movement should I choose?
When compared both movements have their advantages and dis-advantages. The first that comes to mind is that the Robusto Precision is more economically priced and the Robusto Automatic is more technically advanced.

 
 
Choose from 4 dial colors
You will have a chance to choose from the following four dial colors before we produce your watch. Please note that all options will be available on the Robusto Automatic as well as the Robusto Precision. In direct light/sunlight there is a sparkle in both colours.



Mocha: The Mocha features a Pantone 411PC painted bronze dial. 

Royal Blue: The Royal Blue feautures a Pantone 281PC painted bronze dial.

Imperial Red: The Imperial Red features a Pantone 1797PC painted bronze dial.
Lunar Black: The Lunar Black features a Pantone 412PC painted bronze dial.



 

Your Robusto watch will come in a presentation box. Take a quick look at our unboxing video:

 
 

We offer FREE shipping for the Robusto. As an international customer, we’d like to make sure that you are aware that prices billed for goods shipped outside the European Union do not include any taxes, duties, VAT or other charges due to the recipient’s local or national government authority. These other charges, duties and taxes (including VAT) are the sole responsibility of the recipient and must be paid upon arrival in the destination country. Usually these fees are demanded prior to delivery and are collected by the shipping courier or local customs authority.
For more details please contact your local customs office. You may also use a Duty Calculator to calculate what you may be charged by your local government.
 
 

Quality control is carried out at every step during the watch assembly process. Each watchmaker is expected to verify the work of the previous watchmaker handling the piece and verify whether it conforms to TiMe22's strict quality standards.
Should a problem arise at any point in the assembly line, the watch is sent back to the start of the production line to be disassembled, and the process starts all over again.  
We stand firmly behind our products and are committed to fanatical service. Each TiMe22 watch comes with a limited lifetime warranty of flaws in workmanship and materials.
 
 

We've been working on this INDIEGOGO project for the past year. It hasn't been easy, and we're proud to say, we're finally here!

 

We're a professional team of 2 experienced engineers and watch designers from The Netherlands, friends for over 30 years. Both of us work on the design of our watches and we love what we do!

We are travelers, engineers and watch & cigar aficionados. We love the touch and feel of high tech materials and the typical minimalist, experimental, innovative, quirky, and humorous Dutch design. Born and raised in The Netherlands, a country where technology keeps our feet dry (literally), we value technological innovation and creative solutions. After several years of dreaming, imagining and planning we started this small Dutch brand to design high quality Titanium wristwatches.
 
Be part of the TiMe22 Story
This is a story where we invite you to become part of: together we can turn the world of high quality watches upside down! Our reach only reaches our direct network. Liking TiMe22 on Facebook, Instagram or Twitter, or via email will make a huge difference and help our project gain the momentum we need.    
 
 

Please click here to access the TiMe22 Robusto Press Kit.

story:
Sustainable. Ethical. Style.

For us,  the planet comes first. This is why we exclusively source reclaimed fabrics and reimagine them into fashion forward garments. What's second? Aspiring to create space for formerly incarcerated women.  And here's why: we want to reduce recidivism for women who, due in part to their criminal records, struggle with barriers to employment.

The data is painfully clear: “the rate of growth for female imprisonment has been twice as high as that of men since 1980. There are 1.3 million women under the supervision of the criminal justice system” ("The Sentencing Project" 2019). The majority of these women (60%) are parents of minors and without employment, they won't be able to secure housing or be reunited with their children. We see them, we know that they need forward thinking allies, and we're on a mission to create space without judgement.

Let's be clear: tackling mass incarceration & imminent climate catastrophe require new solutions and Grant Blvd is one of them.

 

What We Really Need Right Now & What You'll Get!

We need to raise money in order to:

-expand our Maker Fellowship class (a course that teaches the sewing arts & valuable life skills to formerly incarcerated women)

-expand our production capacity, inventory, & our design offerings 

-launch a concept store 

By contributing to our campaign you'll get access to a variety of amazing PERKS!

 

Your Support Will Definitely Have An Impact:

It’s time for us to move even further forward in this powerful work and we’d value your help. We need capital in order to grow our Maker’s fellowship program, a program that creates a unique opportunity for professional skill development & life skill development. This is what research says reducing recidivism requires and this is the work your support will help us do.

 

Other Ways You Can Help

We totally get it- you want to do your part to help us meet our amazing goals, but you just can't contribute money right now. That in no way means you can't show your belief in our mission. Here are some other ideas:

  • Get the word out about our campaign. Share this link with folks you know who value what we do (fair wage employment, challenging mass incarceration, the future of the planet, and /or supporting women) through a super short email ("Hey, I just heard about this new sustainable apparel brand out of Philly. They're doing dope work and I thought you'd be interested")
  • Use the Indiegogo share tools to get the word out about us!
  • Post about us on your social media feeds- maybe a screenshot of this page in your story?
  • Add a link to this page to our bio on your social media accounts
  • Follow us on social media and invite your followers to follow us, too!

 

Want to learn more?

If you want to learn more about Grant Blvd, have any questions, or are interested in getting even more directly involved as a volunteer, advisor, or investor, please say hello! You can reach us at: customerservice@grantblvd.com

story:
-We are high school freshman in New Rochelle 
-We have been Girl Scouts for many years
-Our troop has done many public service activities: 
   *PSA- beach clean-up and anti-bullying
   *Cleaned Hudson Park Beach 3 times
   *Cereal Drives for the Hope Food Pantry


We are working on our silver award, the second highest award. 
We are trying to raise money to buy identification bracelets for families withspecial needs children. We chose to do this project after reading about Avonte Oquendo and Senator Chuck Schumer's idea for tracking bracelets.

story:
Yell Mothers & Daughters

Thank you for being one of our positive Yell Mothers & Daughters with Saving Our Daughters. In April through June you will be a part of our national PUSH with all of our Yell mothers to receive our new Saving Our Daughters hats for the summer. 

By supporting our SOD Hats, all of our Yell Moms will be helping with some of our special activities with our homeless girls this summer.

We thank you again for being such a powerful influence in your daughters' lives and being a blessing for our homeless girls we serve.

Special MTV Story with Lala Anthony with our girls 

La La Anthony has become a bestselling author with her book “The Love Playbook” and she wants to make sure she shares the goodness by helping others. Twice now she’s worked with Saving Our Daughters for special book signings where she helps and honors homeless young women of the Covenant House.

More story on MTV

story:
MY PAFFS™ MISSION

MY PAFFS™ inspire people to create their own unique fashion style by giving their clothes an individualized new look.
 

MY PAFFS™ VISION

MY PAFFS™ vision is to change the fashion world, by establishing new products and tools which will empower people in their creativity and self-expression.

MY PAFFS GOALS

  • Offer something entirely new which is currently missing in the fashion world.

  • Provide products that will inspire and enable people to create an individual, personal fashion style.

  • Establish a new approach to creativity and innovation within the world of fashion.

  • Provide people with an outlet for everyday creativity.

  • Establish a new fashion trend that will offer infinite different configuration possibilities.

  • Allow people to redesign clothes that they already own.

  • Empower inspiration, imagination, innovation, creation and self-expression for all people.

​
MY PAFFS - My Personal Accessories for Fashion Style

As every person is different, every design is different. Our products reflect how we are all unique and creative in our own right, yet we encourage people to be inspired and collaborate with each other with our interactive products.

 

MY PAFFS PRODUCTS & PACKAGING

MY PAFFS are offered in various colorful shapes, by using our special glue we transform them into reusable stickers, which, unlike traditionally fixed stickers, can be reused multiple times.We offer MY PAFFS sets in designed packages, with our special foil inside, created to store these longlasting reusable stickers.

Our sets contain proposed patterns carefully picked by our designers, showing numerous possibilities within each package.
MY PAFFS™ is offering in one pack endless configuration possibilities to redesign clothes that you already own.

For more ideas and possibilities go to https://mypaffs.com/ . 

WE NEED YOUR HELP

We believe in MY PAFFS and we have already invested our own money in the production of the first quantities that are ready for sales and shipment worldwide from Sarajevo, Bosnia and Herzegovina.

We need your help to cover additional marketing expenses, necessary for finding our target markets and promoting our product to a wider audience in order to define target group and sell already produced quantities, so we can continue to finance further development and production of our product.

ABOUT US

"MY PAFFS is developed and designed in studio non stop in Sarajevo, Bosnia and Herzegovina. Studio non stop, established by Igor Grozdanic and Sanja Galic Grozdanic, is multidisciplinary design practice, constantly striving to achieve inspiring and exciting design solutions that make a genuine difference and add value to our Clients, the end users, and our society. Studio non stop is active in the field of architectural and interior design, city planning and urban design.

MY PAFFS project is our attempt to establish new fashion design philosophy giving the possibility to young people to create their own fashion style.

Check studio non stop work and credentials  http://www.studiononstop.com.ba

OTHER WAYS YOU CAN HELP

We understand that some people can’t contribute, still if you like our products you can help us by spreading the word about us to your friends and colleagues by sharing our story with them.
Connect with us on Facebook https://www.facebook.com/MYPAFFS/ and Instagram https://www.instagram.com/mypaffs/ to follow our story.
 

 

 

"We see our designs as an important way for people to play, experiment, have fun, connect, and navigate life – being unique, but creating together."

THANK YOU

MY PAFFS team

story:
Please move to our site to get your Wave Cable Bracelet. 

http://bit.ly/infinitylinks

 

Wave is the world’s smallest braided cable bracelet, a true combination of technology and fashion. Say goodbye to tangled wires and forgetting your charger at home. The Wave offers a solution combining fashion with function to simplify your life by having a charging cable at arms length… literally.

Wave bracelets are able to charge and sync your devices at the fastest possible speed, available in:

  • Type-C - Works with latest Android phones that use the USB-C connector. 
  • Micro USB - Works with every smartphone and device with a standard micro USB connector.
  • Lightning Connector - Works with every new generation iPhone, iPad and iPod with a Lightning connector.

 

 

 

We wanted to design something that offered convenience and fashion at the same time - and Wave is just that. Wrapped in braided leather combined with our high graded magnetic clasp with a light pull it’ll reveal the charger allowing you to charge and sync your devices.

Wave is now available in 5 different color's - a statement for any outfit.

WEAR ON ANY OCCASION

Wave is crafted just like a piece of jewelry, making it extremely lightweight and thin, you wouldn't even think it's a charging cable at first glance! Combining our wide selection of colors there's an option to match any outfit.

QUALITY MATERIALS FOR A QUALITY BRACELET

Express yourself with Wave. Combined with high grade aluminium and braided leather - you can now charge your phone in style. 

What Size Should I Get?

We offer two sizes. If your wrist size is <15cm it will fit the women's size. If it is bigger than 16cm you should get the men's size. *Wrist sizes above 18cm will likely not fit our Double Loop Variant.*

If you are struggling to choose the right size then simply DM us on Instagram @infinitylinks or shoot us an email support@infinitylinksnow.com and our friendly support team will give you some guidance.

How Do I Use The Bracelet?

The bracelet has a functional slot that you simply pull to reveal the USB charger. From there you simply plug it into a USB socket or port as you normally would and charge your phone from there. It's that simple!

What is the shipping cost?

Exclusively for Indiegogo backers only we are offering free shipping worldwide!

Tech Specs?

Wave charges at quicker speeds than the original Apple cable - at 1.6A. It weighs ONLY 15 grams and each bracelet is braided. 

Have you got a customer support email?

support@infinitylinksnow.com

Production:

We didn’t want to release a product that was half finished and poorly produced. We spent months testing different samples and materials to ensure the highest quality. Our original bracelet was too bulky and the clasp was unreliable. Our team went back to the drawing board and after several back and forth communications with our supplier we settled on a design that not only had a magnetic clasp but also was half the size of our original bracelet.

Supplier:

Sourcing the right supplier for this particular project was a mission on its own. Each cable produced had to be certified and work seamlessly and be certified with each iOS device or Android device with no issues at all. Thus, we found a reliable supplier that is able to produce our product exceptionally, from a technology and fashionable standpoint. We have all our contracts in place with our manufacturer for exclusivity, delivery time, manufacturing costs and product quality.

Shipping:

We’ve tackled this ahead of time and have organized contracts with fulfilment centres based in the USA that are ensuring the delivery of the products whilst also being reliable.

story:
Keep your keys safe from thieves.

After five years of successful Kickstarter campaigns, we've looked to address an issue that is affecting more people every day. Keyless car theft through signal relay attacks have seen a massive increase over the past three years and in light of our RFID-blocking wallets, we wanted to do something about it.

KeyBlock is similar to current car key protectors that block all RFID signals, preventing thieves from gaining access to your car without a key, but our new design has some new features that make it much easier to use and it’s also finished with genuine leathers from Aston Martin, Tesla and BMW.

**IMPORTATNT UPDATE** See our latest update, for the most recent changes and upgrades.

Two thieves with commercially available transmitters can boost the signal from your key inside your house and gain access to your car in under 60 seconds.

We found the current solutions just weren't user friendly and of poor quality. So we set out to design a case specifically for your car key.

Now we have a product that not only keeps your keys safe from hackers, it prevents damage, keeps things together, has free personalisation and will instantly upgrade any car key.

 

Here’s what you could do: keep your key in a metal box (some recommend the fridge), wrap it in aluminium foil, settle for a cheap pouch from who-knows-where, and that’s fine. But we don’t want ‘fine’, we want ‘good’. 

What about the more stylised items on the market? Mass-manufactured car key pouches with four button holes for a three-button fob, garish stitching and cheap materials that barely hold together. You wouldn’t buy a car that barely held together. Or shoes. Or windows. You lock your house door at night, not just roll a boulder in front of it. This is an elegant solution to an increasing problem.

So here’s what you should do: invest in KeyBlock. It looks good and it works. Bingpot.

 

Car Access

Unlocking your car at a distance is a convenience we don’t want to deprive you of. KeyBlock is easy to use single-handed, leaving your other hand free to carry the shopping, open the door for your partner or keep your child close. We opted for a one-handed use magnetic closure which allows you to access all of the lock/unlock buttons without removing the key from the holder. This proved to be a great choice for keyless start cars that still required entry through a manual click of the fob.

 

Carbon leather

Why settle for some plastic or polyurethane cover? We have the actual leathers used in Aston Martin and Tesla models to cover your keys. You don’t compromise on security, so why compromise on looks?

Unrivaled in it’s wear-resistance, the leathers we have are used in high-end cars and by the Ministry of Defence. They don’t skimp on quality and neither do we.

Composite construction for maximum signal blocking 

Modern security has many layers: doors, locks, alarms, sensors, so it only makes sense that so does KeyBlock: multi-layered RFID shielding within a modern polymer housing, wrapped in wear-resistant leather. Security that doesn’t sacrifice style.

Keyless Ignition

For keyless ignition simply open the magnetic closure for the car to recognise your key. The single-handed operation makes it a dream to use, so you can get on the road quickly and easily.

   

 

Magnetic Closure

Buttons are nice, but magnets are better! We wanted to create a seamless look on the front and the redesign allowed us to do away with the button and make it a magnetic closure. This was part of our mission to make it easy to open and close one-handed.

 

Split ring

But what about your other keys, the ones that can’t be scanned (as easily, anyway)? A built-in split ring allows you the option of keeping all your keys together.

 

Stands up for you

We wanted this to look great even when on the side board in your house, so we designed it to stand wherever it was placed, keeping your keybowl organised.

 

Personalised

It already looks the business but it needs something else. How about free personalisation? Put your name on it, phone number, a message or a date. Whatever you like. Probably avoid your registration though. Gives the game away too easy.

 

Mint condition

Now you can keep the key in as good condition as the day you bought it, all while keeping it safe.

 

Ultra-lightweight

Anybody who says ‘just put it in a box’ clearly doesn’t know what it’s like to carry a metal box around in their pocket all day. And have you seen what a tin can do to jeans? It’ll wear through a pocket like a lightsabre through a youngling.

 

Pocket sized 

KeyBlock is sized to fit neatly in any pocket, whether suit, trouser or otter.

 

 

 

We genuinely love to hear your thoughts and field your questions, so get in touch.
 

 

If your key is something that we have not come across before and is bigger than the internal sizes, we want to hear from you! Let us know the dimensions of your key and we can get to work on a larger size! 

RFID Signal Test
 

We've tested many forms of KeyBlock to make sure your keys are protected, using faraday key pouches, boxes and a whole variety of signal blocking materials until we settled on this design. 

We have also ensured Keyblock, blocks all signals from any manufactured car. 

Testing of the materials also went far and beyond cars, as this is the same materials we use in a majority of our wallets we can say for sure that it also blocks rfid, radio and mobile phone signals.  

 

The original

The original Carbon wallet was a big hit among professionals around the world, so we’ve brought that same game-changing look and feel to the automotive world. Now you can upgrade your car key, not just protect it.
 

Hand-assembled in the UK

Everything that goes into this design is sourced from UK companies and then put together here in the UK by skilled craftspeople. No middlemen, no chief financial officer forcing us to cut corners to pump up profits. Just a desire to make the best car key signal blocking case we can. 

Backed by you

This isn’t our idea, it’s yours. Over the years, we’ve had repeated calls for something like this and now the time is right to do it. It’s not about blasting ‘Vanacci’ wherever you go: this is yours to have, use and enjoy. This is why we have only  discreetly branded the base of KeyBlock with our logo.

Who we are

A team of designers, engineers and makers with a passion for quality goods that provide security to everyday scenarios.

How will you pull this off?

We've a lot of experience in creating, running and fulfilling Kickstarter campaigns. Over the past five years, we've started and fulfilled ten campaigns to thousands of backers all over the world.

This activity has established an international business that produces everything by hand here in the UK. We work with leather, 3D printing, a wide variety of metals and plastics. All production takes place in house by our skilled team and all shipping is handled from our workshop.

Risks and challenges

As this is our 11th Kickstarter project, we're well prepared to manufacture and fulfil the project, using key partners Royal Mail and FedEx to do so.

We are problem solvers so if anything doesn't go to plan, we'll sort it out and get you what was promised, you'll be kept in the loop all the way. We've delivered on our 10 previous Kickstarters and KeyBlock will be no different, because we truly care about the things we make.
story_txt:
Keep your keys safe from thieves.
After five years of successful Kickstarter campaigns, we've looked to address an issue that is affecting more people every day. Keyless car theft through signal relay attacks have seen a massive increase over the past three years and in light of our RFID-blocking wallets, we wanted to do something about it.
KeyBlock is similar to current car key protectors that block all RFID signals, preventing thieves from gaining access to your car without a key, but our new design has some new features that make it much easier to use and it’s also finished with genuine leathers from Aston Martin, Tesla and BMW.
**IMPORTATNT UPDATE** See our latest update, for the most recent changes and upgrades.



Two thieves with commercially available transmitters can boost the signal from your key inside your house and gain access to your car in under 60 seconds.

story:
• Solar powered. Continually charges in natural and artificial light. 
  • A full charge lasts 6 months without light.
  • Made with recycled and sustainable materials.
  • 10 ATM water resistant. Safe for swimming.
  • Luminous hands and indicators.

​

Good planets are hard to find and we’re determined to do our part to take care of this one. So we set out to create an eco-friendly watch brand that puts our planet and the people who live on it, at the forefront of our promise.

Our watches are timeless, fun, durable, and crafted with sustainable materials like castor oil based bioplastic, rPet straps made from recycled water bottles, and are powered by the sun, which means we're not sending batteries to the landfill every few months. We have also chosen to focus solely on traditional analogue watches with the hopes of inspiring our customers to make the most of their time by unplugging, getting outside, having fun, and living in the moment.

All One Eleven watches are designed with sustainability in mind and feature solar powered movement that continually charges in both natural and artificial light. This helps us do our part to reduce batteries in landfills.

The Field Watch features Seiko solar powered movement designed to support your adventures on and off the grid. 3 hours in natural OR artificial light will give you a full charge that will last 6 months without light... so if you're trapped in a cave (or a cubical), you're good for a solid 6 months.

Our rPet fabric straps are crafted from recycled plastic bottles. When consumers purchase products made with recycled content, they're sending a message to companies that they value their sustainability efforts! By creating awareness and demand for recycled products, we help solidify recycling programs and recycled goods as valuable pieces in the production process.

The Field Watch features a durable, corrosion-resistant case crafted from 85% recycled stainless steel. The top ring is made from plant-based, petroleum-free castor oil, which is a sustainable alternative to conventional plastics. The water, temperature and abrasion resistance of this material is comparable to conventional plastics but boasts a significantly smaller carbon footprint.

Our mission is to protect our planet by using sustainable materials whenever possible, which means using 100% recycled paper and non-toxic inks in all our packaging.

Our Field Watch features a screw down crown to ensure water-resistance up to 10 ATM, which means it is cleared for swimming and snorkeling but not deep sea diving.

Super luminous hands and indicators make it easy to tell time under any and all conditions. Whether you're off-the-grid and don't have a flashlight or in a dust storm, we got you.

The Field Watch dates back to WWI when soldiers needed a simple, durable, watch with superior timekeeping abilities while they were in the trenches. They were made to be dust-proof and swim-proof, typically featuring a stainless steel casing and a durable canvas or leather Nato strap to prevent the user from losing the watch on the battlefield.

The One Eleven team set out to create an adventure watch that was sustainable, durable and took style inspiration from the original field watches but was also modern and uniquely One Eleven. This meant multiple iterations of the dial to ensure it was bold and visible in any and all conditions the universe might throw your way and testing out dozens of color variations before landing on the Field Watch you see today.

One Eleven was born out of a creative incubation hub at Fossil Group, one of the world's largest watch manufacturing and design companies. The team behind One Eleven is a group of individuals charged with throwing out the corporate rule book, incubating new product ideas, and doing it all with a disruptively unconventional approach.

 

The Field Watch comes with a two year limited warranty. Your watch is warranted by Fossil Group, Inc. (“One Eleven”) for a period two (2) years from the original date of purchase.

 

We are shipping now!

story:
Hi, my name is Shyla Fannan and I have a dream.
I'm a recent graduate of the Southern Illinois University Fashion Design and Merchandising program, fashion stylist, and a young entrepreneur of my online fashion consulting business, "Partly Cloudy".
My goal is to raise the funds necessary so I can attend a weekend of the St. Louis Fashion Week this October, in order to network with the St. Louis fashion community, gain practical field experience as a professional blogger, and share this opportunity with my readership in preparation for my goal to attend next years St. Louis Fashion Week as an invited guest blogger.
Your donations will fund ticket costs, accommodations, transportation, business cards, and miscellaneous costs and fees. With your support, this opportunity would advance my growing business and professional career and allow me to share this rewarding experience with others who were unable to attend but wish to be involved in the fashion community.

What I Need & What You Get

UPDATED: These are the costs for the events I want to attend

$75 for tickets and fees

$350 for hotel and food for one night

$50 for transportation

All other funds will be used towards fees, business cards and preparing for next years fashion week. This includes things such as: a smart phone so that I can get started on building an Instagram audience, advertising and other costs associated with successfully building a blog. 

Honestly, when I started this campaign, I thought I'd need a lot more than I do, but I will still put any extra money raised to good use!

If I reach my goal, every cent will be applied towards St. Louis fashion week. I want to attend as many events as possible and really get to know the environment in which I will be working!

The more I raise, the longer I will be able to stay and the more of a splash I will be able to make! 

If you choose, I have created several perks for your enjoyment. I am offering promotion and my fashion styling services at a discount. This is the lowest price I am offering for them this year.

My clients rave about my services and I am glad to offer them to my loving sponsors. If you donate, you will see that I go to great lengths to create a valuable and memorable experience!

The Impact

I don't ask for many things and my needs are few, but I truly believe that this experience will change my business and my life.

This campaign isn't just about the money. It's about what I was called to do with my life.

As a fashion stylist, I help women (and sometimes even men) feel more confident in and out of their clothing. I see style as the best way to express and love yourself and I want to make this experience accessible to as many people as possible.
Since I will be moving to St. Louis in the next few years, I need to start making connections there. Networking at fashion week is a great opportunity to get my name out there and learn more about my future home.

Reaching this goal will also give me the opportunity to practice my fashion blogging skills. I will be blogging events as they happen so that my followers may get the freshest information. This will help train me for the fast paced environment that I long to be a part of.   I have a unique and open perspective and I want to share this with everyone I meet. Your donation can help me get there.

P.S. My husband asked me a strange question but I feel like it needs to be addressed.
 "So it's basically glorified job shadowing?"
Actually, that's a simplified way of looking at it, but yes.
Many of you are aware that this is a strange time we live in. As a young person just starting in a career, we're expected to have experience just to get our foot in the door. However, we need our foot in the door to gain said experience. What is a person to do?
My answer is this: I'm creating my own experience. Right here. Right now.

Challenges

The only thing standing between me and the job that I love is gaining more experience and I can't get that in the small city.

There is no extent that I am not willing to go for this chance. Afterall, that's why I got off my high-horse and decided to ask for help.  I look forward to the early mornings and long nights that this experience will bring. Fashion isn't for the faint-hearted and I've never been a coward.

Other Ways You Can Help

Believe me, I know some of you can't donate money, but you can still help!

Please feel free to share this with your friends and family. Every person who sees this is another step closer to my dream!

I humbly ask for any help you can provide and I am grateful for your consideration.
